atk-s0513a4:7_0: Catudvāramidaṃ nagaranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:7_1: kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu navakanipātassa paṭhamajātake vitthāritameva. Idha pana
atk-s0513a4:7_2: satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbaco”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0513a4:7_3: vutte “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbacatāya paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā khuracakkaṃ āpādesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:8_0: Atīte kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino eko putto
atk-s0513a4:8_1: mittavindako nāma ahosi. Tassa mātāpitaro sotāpannā ahesuṃ, so pana dussīlo assaddho.
atk-s0513a4:8_2: Atha naṃ aparabhāge pitari kālakate mātā kuṭumbaṃ vicārentī āha – “tāta, tayā dullabhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:8_3: manussattaṃ laddhaṃ, dānaṃ dehi, sīlaṃ rakkhāhi, uposathakammaṃ karohi, dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:8_4: Amma, na mayhaṃ dānādīhi attho, mā maṃ kiñci avacuttha, ahaṃ yathākammaṃ gamissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:8_5: Evaṃ vadantampi naṃ ekadivasaṃ puṇṇamuposathadivase mātā āha – “tāta, ajja abhilakkhito
atk-s0513a4:8_6: mahāuposathadivaso, ajja uposathaṃ samādiyitvā vihāraṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:8_7: sutvā ehi, ahaṃ te sahassaṃ dassāmī”ti. So “sādhū”ti dhanalobhena uposathaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0513a4:8_8: bhuttapātarāso vihāraṃ gantvā divasaṃ vītināmetvā rattiṃ yathā ekampi dhammapadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:8_9: kaṇṇaṃ na paharati, tathā ekasmiṃ padese nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkamitvā punadivase pātova
atk-s0513a4:9_0: Mātā panassa “ajja me putto dhammaṃ sutvā pātova dhammakathikattheraṃ ādāya āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:9_1: yāguṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā tassāgamanaṃ paṭimānentī
atk-s0513a4:9_2: taṃ ekakaṃ āgataṃ disvā “tāta, dhammakathiko kena na ānīto”ti vatvā “na mayhaṃ dhammakathikena
atk-s0513a4:9_3: attho”ti vutte “tena hi yāguṃ pivā”ti āha. So “tumhehi mayhaṃ sahassaṃ paṭissutaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:9_4: taṃ tāva me detha, pacchā pivissāmī”ti āha. “Piva, tāta, pacchā dassāmī”ti. “Gahetvāva
atk-s0513a4:9_5: pivissāmī”ti. Athassa mātā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ purato ṭhapesi. So yāguṃ pivitvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:9_6: gahetvā vohāraṃ karonto na cirasseva vīsasatasahassaṃ uppādesi. Athassa etadahosi
atk-s0513a4:9_7: – “nāvaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā vohāraṃ karissāmī”ti. So nāvaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā “amma, ahaṃ nāvāya
atk-s0513a4:9_8: vohāraṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ mātā “tvaṃ tāta, ekaputtako, imasmiṃ ghare dhanampi
atk-s0513a4:9_9: bahu, samuddo anekādīnavo, mā gamī”ti nivāresi. So “ahaṃ gamissāmeva, na sakkā maṃ
atk-s0513a4:9_10: nivāretu”nti vatvā “ahaṃ taṃ, tāta, vāressāmī”ti mātarā hatthe gahito hatthaṃ vissajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:9_11: mātaraṃ paharitvā pātetvā antaraṃ katvā gantvā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:10_0: Nāvā sattame divase mittavindakaṃ nissāya samuddapiṭṭhe niccalā aṭṭhāsi. Kāḷakaṇṇisalākā
atk-s0513a4:10_1: kariyamānā mittavindakasseva hatthe tikkhattuṃ pati. Athassa uḷumpaṃ datvā “imaṃ
atk-s0513a4:10_2: ekaṃ nissāya bahū mā nassantū”ti taṃ samuddapiṭṭhe khipiṃsu. Tāvadeva nāvā javena
atk-s0513a4:10_3: mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhandi. Sopi uḷumpe nipajjitvā ekaṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi. Tattha phalikavimāne
atk-s0513a4:10_4: catasso vemānikapetiyo addasa. Tā sattāhaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti, sattāhaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:10_5: So tāhi saddhiṃ sattāhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavi. Atha naṃ tā dukkhānubhavanatthāya
atk-s0513a4:10_6: gacchamānā “sāmi, mayaṃ sattame divase āgamissāma, yāva mayaṃ āgacchāma, tāva anukkaṇṭhamāno
atk-s0513a4:10_7: idheva vasā”ti vatvā agamaṃsu. So taṇhāvasiko hutvā tasmiṃyeva phalake nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a4:10_8: puna samuddapiṭṭhena gacchanto aparaṃ dīpakaṃ patvā tattha rajatavimāne aṭṭha vemānikapetiyo
atk-s0513a4:10_9: disvā eteneva upāyena aparasmiṃ dīpake maṇivimāne soḷasa, aparasmiṃ dīpake kanakavimāne
atk-s0513a4:10_10: dvattiṃsa vemānikapetiyo disvā tāhi saddhiṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tāsampi dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:10_11: anubhavituṃ gatakāle puna samuddapiṭṭhena gacchanto ekaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ catudvāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:10_12: nagaraṃ addasa. Ussadanirayo kiresa, bahūnaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ kammakaraṇānubhavanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:11_0: So “imaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājā bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā khuracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā sīse
atk-s0513a4:11_1: paccamānaṃ nerayikasattaṃ addasa. Athassa taṃ tassa sīse khuracakkaṃ padumaṃ viya
atk-s0513a4:11_2: hutvā upaṭṭhāsi. Ure pañcaṅgikabandhanaṃ uracchadapasādhanaṃ hutvā sīsato galantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:11_3: lohitaṃ lohitacandanavilepanaṃ viya hutvā paridevanasaddo madhurasaro gītasaddo viya
atk-s0513a4:11_4: hutvā upaṭṭhāsi. So tassa santikaṃ gantvā “bho purisa, ciraṃ tayā padumaṃ dhāritaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:11_5: dehi me eta”nti āha. “Samma, nayidaṃ padumaṃ, khuracakkaṃ eta”nti. “Tvaṃ mayhaṃ adātukāmatāya
atk-s0513a4:11_6: evaṃ vadasī”ti. Nerayikasatto cintesi “mayhaṃ kammaṃ khīṇaṃ bhavissati, imināpi mayā
atk-s0513a4:11_7: viya mātaraṃ paharitvā āgatena bhavitabbaṃ, dassāmissa khuracakka”nti. Atha naṃ “ehi
atk-s0513a4:11_8: bho, gaṇha ima”nti vatvā khuracakkaṃ tassa sīse khipi, taṃ tassa matthakaṃ pisamānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:11_9: bhassi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mittavindako tassa khuracakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “tava khuracakkaṃ
atk-s0513a4:11_10: gaṇha, tava khuracakkaṃ gaṇhā”ti vedanāppatto paridevi, itaro antaradhāyi. Tadā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a4:11_11: rukkhadevatā hutvā mahantena parivārena ussadacārikaṃ caramāno taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:11_12: Mittavindako taṃ oloketvā “sāmi devarāja, idaṃ maṃ cakkaṃ saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ viya tilāni
atk-s0513a4:11_13: pisamānaṃ otarati, kiṃ nu kho mayā pāpaṃ pakata”nti pucchanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:18_0: Tattha daḷhapākāranti thirapākāraṃ. “Daḷhatoraṇa”ntipi pāṭho, thiradvāranti attho.
atk-s0513a4:18_1: Oruddhapaṭiruddhosmīti anto katvā samantā pākārena ruddho, palāyanaṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-s0513a4:18_2: Kiṃ pāpaṃ pakatanti kiṃ nu kho mayā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ. Apihitāti thakitā. Yathā dijoti
atk-s0513a4:18_3: pañjare pakkhitto sakuṇo viya. Kimādhikaraṇanti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. Cakkābhinihatoti cakkena abhinihato.
atk-s0513a4:19: Athassa devarājā kāraṇaṃ kathetuṃ cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:31: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhanti, te honti cakkadhārino.
atk-s0513a4:36: “Kammaṃ samekkhe vipulañca bhogaṃ, icchaṃ na seveyya anatthasaṃhitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:37: Kareyya vākyaṃ anukampakānaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ nātivatteyya cakka”nti.
atk-s0513a4:38_0: Tattha laddhā satasahassāni, atirekāni vīsatīti tvaṃ uposathaṃ katvā mātu santikā
atk-s0513a4:38_1: sahassaṃ gahetvā vohāraṃ karonto satasahassāni ca atirekāni vīsatisahassāni labhitvā.
atk-s0513a4:38_2: Nākarīti tena dhanena asantuṭṭho nāvāya samuddaṃ pavisanto samudde ādīnavañca kathetvā
atk-s0513a4:38_3: mātuyā vāriyamānopi anukampakānaṃ ñātīnaṃ vacanaṃ na karosi, sotāpannaṃ mātaraṃ paharitvā
atk-s0513a4:39_0: Laṅghinti nāvaṃ ullaṅghanasamatthaṃ. Pakkhandīti pakkhandosi. Appasiddhikanti mandasiddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:39_1: vināsabahulaṃ. Catubbhi aṭṭhāti atha naṃ nissāya ṭhitāya nāvāya phalakaṃ datvā samudde
atk-s0513a4:39_2: khittopi tvaṃ mātaraṃ nissāya ekadivasaṃ katassa uposathakammassa nissandena phalikavimāne
atk-s0513a4:39_3: catasso itthiyo labhitvā tato rajatavimāne aṭṭha, maṇivimāne soḷasa, kanakavimāne
atk-s0513a4:39_4: dvattiṃsa adhigatosīti. Aticchaṃ cakkamāsadoti atha tvaṃ yathāladdhena asantuṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:39_5: “atra uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī”ti evaṃ laddhaṃ laddhaṃ atikkamanalobhasaṅkhātāya aticchāya
atk-s0513a4:39_6: samannāgatattā aticcho pāpapuggalo tassa uposathakammassa khīṇattā dvattiṃsa itthiyo
atk-s0513a4:39_7: atikkamitvā imaṃ petanagaraṃ āgantvā tassa mātupahāradānaakusalassa nissandena idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:39_8: khuracakkaṃ sampattosi. “Atriccha”ntipi pāṭho, atra atra icchamānoti attho. “Atricchā”tipi
atk-s0513a4:39_9: pāṭho, atricchāyāti attho. Bhamatīti tassa te icchāhatassa posassa idaṃ cakkaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:39_10: pisamānaṃ idāni kumbhakāracakkaṃ viya matthake bhamatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:40_0: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhantīti taṇhā nāmesā gacchantī uparūpari visālā hoti, samuddo viya
atk-s0513a4:40_1: ca duppūrā, rūpādīsu tassa tassa icchanaicchāya visaṭagāminī, taṃ evarūpaṃ taṇhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:40_2: ye ca anugijjhanti giddhā gadhitā hutvā punappunaṃ allīyanti. Te honti cakkadhārinoti
atk-s0513a4:40_3: te evaṃ paccantā khuracakkaṃ dhārenti. Bahubhaṇḍanti mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ bahudhanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:40_4: ohāya. Magganti gantabbaṃ appasiddhikaṃ samuddamaggaṃ apaccavekkhitvā yathā tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:40_5: paṭipanno, evameva aññesampi yesañcetaṃ asaṅkhātaṃ avīmaṃsitaṃ, te yathā tvaṃ tatheva
atk-s0513a4:40_6: taṇhāvasikā hutvā dhanaṃ pahāya gamanamaggaṃ anapekkhitvā paṭipannā cakkadhārino
atk-s0513a4:40_7: honti. Kammaṃ samekkheti tasmā paṇḍito puriso attanā kattabbakammaṃ “sadosaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a4:40_8: niddosa”nti samekkheyya paccavekkheyya. Vipulañca bhoganti attano dhammaladdhaṃ dhanarāsimpi
atk-s0513a4:40_9: samekkheyya. Nātivatteyyāti taṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ idaṃ cakkaṃ na ativatteyya nāvatthareyya.
atk-s0513a4:41: Taṃ sutvā mittavindako “iminā devaputtena mayā katakammaṃ tathato ñātaṃ, ayaṃ mayhaṃ paccanapamāṇampi jānissati, pucchāmi na”nti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:43: “Kīvaciraṃ nu me yakkha, cakkaṃ sirasi ṭhassati;
atk-s0513a4:44: Kati vassasahassāni, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:48: Cakkaṃ te sirasi māviddhaṃ, na taṃ jīvaṃ pamokkhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:49_0: Tattha atisaroti atisarītipi atisaro, atisarissatītipi atisaro. Paccasaroti tasseva
atk-s0513a4:49_1: vevacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – samma mittavindaka, suṇohi me vacanaṃ, tvañhi atidāruṇassa
atk-s0513a4:49_2: kammassa katattā atisaro, tassa pana na sakkā vassagaṇanāya vipāko paññāpetunti aparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:49_3: atimahantaṃ vipākadukkhaṃ sarissasi paṭipajjissasīti atisaro. Tena te “ettakāni vassasahassānī”ti
atk-s0513a4:49_4: vattuṃ na sakkomi. Sirasimāviddhanti yaṃ pana te idaṃ cakkaṃ sirasmiṃ āviddhaṃ kumbhakāracakkamiva
atk-s0513a4:49_5: bhamati. Na taṃ jīvaṃ pamokkhasīti taṃ tvaṃ yāva te kammavipāko na khīyati, tāva
atk-s0513a4:49_6: jīvamāno na pamokkhasi, kammavipāke pana khīṇe idaṃ cakkaṃ pahāya yathākammaṃ gamissasīti.
atk-s0513a4:50: Idaṃ vatvā devaputto attano devaṭṭhānameva gato, itaropi mahādukkhaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:51: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mittavindako ayaṃ dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, devarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:55_0: Kaṇho vatāyaṃ purisoti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto
atk-s0513a4:55_1: sitapātukammaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tadā kira satthā sāyanhasamaye nigrodhārāme bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:55_2: jaṅghavihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Ānandatthero “ko
atk-s0513a4:55_3: nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya, na ahetu tathāgatā sitaṃ pātukaronti,
atk-s0513a4:55_4: pucchissāmi tāvā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha sitakāraṇaṃ pucchi. Athassa satthā “bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:55_5: ānanda, kaṇho nāma isi ahosi, so imasmiṃ bhūmippadese vihāsi jhāyī jhānarato, tassa
atk-s0513a4:55_6: sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampī”ti sitakāraṇaṃ vatvā tassa vatthuno apākaṭattā
atk-s0513a4:56_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiyaṃ ekena asītikoṭivibhavena
atk-s0513a4:56_1: aputtakena brāhmaṇena sīlaṃ samādiyitvā putte patthite bodhisatto tassa brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0513a4:56_2: kucchimhi nibbatti. Kāḷavaṇṇattā panassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “kaṇhakumāro”ti nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a4:56_3: akaṃsu. So soḷasavassakāle maṇipaṭimā viya sobhaggappatto hutvā pitarā sippuggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:56_4: pesito takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggahetvā paccāgacchi. Atha naṃ pitā anurūpena dārena
atk-s0513a4:56_5: saṃyojesi. So aparabhāge mātāpitūnaṃ accayena sabbissariyaṃ paṭipajji. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:56_7: dhanaṃ asukena uppāditaṃ, ettakaṃ asukenā”ti pubbañātīhi suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitāni akkharāni
atk-s0513a4:56_8: disvā cintesi “yehi imaṃ dhanaṃ uppāditaṃ, te na paññāyanti, dhanameva paññāyati,
atk-s0513a4:56_9: ekopi idaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gato nāma natthi, na kho pana sakkā dhanabhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:56_10: paralokaṃ gantuṃ. Pañcannaṃ verānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena hi asārassa dhanassa dānaṃ sāro,
atk-s0513a4:56_11: bahurogasādhāraṇabhāvena asārassa sarīrassa sīlavantesu abhivādanādikammaṃ sāro,
atk-s0513a4:56_12: aniccābhibhūtabhāvena asārassa jīvitassa aniccādivasena vipassanāyogo sāro, tasmā
atk-s0513a4:57_0: So āsanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Yāva
atk-s0513a4:57_1: sattamā divasā dhanaṃ aparikkhīyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ me dhanena, yāva maṃ jarā nābhibhavati,
atk-s0513a4:57_2: tāvadeva pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:57_3: cintetvā gehe sabbadvārāni vivarāpetvā “dinnaṃ me, harantū”ti asuciṃ viya jigucchanto
atk-s0513a4:57_4: vatthukāme pahāya mahājanassa rodantassa paridevantassa nagarā nikkhamitvā himavantapadesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:57_5: pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā attano vasanatthāya ramaṇīyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a4:57_6: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā “idha vasissāmī”ti ekaṃ indavāruṇīrukkhaṃ gocaragāmaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:57_7: tasseva rukkhassa mūle vihāsi. Gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya āraññiko ahosi, paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:57_8: akatvā rukkhamūliko ahosi, abbhokāsiko nesajjiko. Sace nipajjitukāmo, bhūmiyaṃyeva
atk-s0513a4:57_9: nipajjati, dantamūsaliko hutvā anaggipakkameva khādati, thusaparikkhittaṃ kiñci na
atk-s0513a4:57_10: khādati, ekadivasaṃ ekavārameva khādati, ekāsaniko ahosi. Khamāya pathavīāpatejavāyusamo
atk-s0513a4:57_11: hutvā ete ettake dhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattati, imasmiṃ kira jātake bodhisatto paramappiccho
atk-s0513a4:57_12: ahosi. So na cirasseva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto tattheva
atk-s0513a4:57_13: vasati, phalāphalatthampi aññattha na gacchati, rukkhassa phalitakāle phalaṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a4:57_14: pupphitakāle pupphaṃ khādati, sapattakāle pattāni khādati, nippattakāle papaṭikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:57_15: khādati. Evaṃ paramasantuṭṭho hutvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ciraṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a4:58_0: So ekadivasaṃ pubbaṇhasamaye tassa rukkhassa pakkāni phalāni gaṇhi, gaṇhanto pana
atk-s0513a4:58_1: loluppacārena uṭṭhāya aññasmiṃ padese na gaṇhāti, yathānisinnova hatthaṃ pasāretvā
atk-s0513a4:58_2: hatthappasāraṇaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni phalāni saṃharati, tesupi manāpāmanāpaṃ avicinitvā
atk-s0513a4:58_3: sampattasampattameva gaṇhāti. Evaṃ paramasantuṭṭhassa tassa sīlatejena sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:58_4: uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Taṃ kira sakkassa āyukkhayena vā uṇhaṃ hoti puññakkhayena vā,
atk-s0513a4:58_5: aññasmiṃ vā mahānubhāvasatte taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthente, dhammikānaṃ vā mahiddhikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:58_6: sīlatejena uṇhaṃ hoti. Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti āvajjetvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:58_7: padese vasantaṃ kaṇhaṃ isiṃ rukkhaphalāni uccinantaṃ disvā cintesi “ayaṃ isi ghoratapo
atk-s0513a4:58_8: paramajitindriyo, imaṃ dhammakathāya sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā sukāraṇaṃ sutvā varena santappetvā
atk-s0513a4:58_9: imamassa rukkhaṃ dhuvaphalaṃ katvā āgamissāmī”ti. So mahantenānubhāvena sīghaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0513a4:58_10: tasmiṃ rukkhamūle tassa piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā “attano avaṇṇe kathite kujjhissati nu
atk-s0513a4:61: Kaṇhe bhūmipadesasmiṃ, na mayhaṃ manaso piyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:63: Kaṇho isi sakkassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ko nu kho mayā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti dibbacakkhunā upadhārento “sakko”ti ñatvā anivattitvā anoloketvāva dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:65: “Na kaṇho tacasā hoti, antosāro hi brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0513a4:66: Yasmiṃ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:67_0: Tattha tacasāti tacena kaṇho nāma na hotīti attho. Antosāroti abbhantare sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasārehi
atk-s0513a4:67_1: samannāgato. Evarūpo hi bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo nāma hoti. Sa veti yasmiṃ pana pāpāni
atk-s0513a4:67_2: kammāni atthi, so yattha katthaci kule jātopi yena kenaci sarīravaṇṇena samannāgatopi kāḷakova.
atk-s0513a4:68_0: Evañca pana vatvā imesaṃ sattānaṃ kaṇhabhāvakarāni pāpakammāni ekavidhādibhedehi
atk-s0513a4:68_1: vitthāretvā sabbānipi tāni garahitvā sīlādayo guṇe pasaṃsitvā ākāse candaṃ uṭṭhāpento
atk-s0513a4:68_2: viya sakkassa dhammaṃ desesi. Sakko tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pamudito somanassajāto
atk-s0513a4:71: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:72_0: Tattha etasminti yaṃ idaṃ tayā sabbaññubuddhena viya sulapitaṃ, tasmiṃ sulapite tumhākameva
atk-s0513a4:72_1: anucchavikattā patirūpe subhāsite yaṃ kiñci manasā icchasi, sabbaṃ te yaṃ varaṃ icchitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:73_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi “ayaṃ kiṃ nu kho attano avaṇṇe kathite kujjhissati, noti
atk-s0513a4:73_1: maṃ vīmaṃsanto mayhaṃ chavivaṇṇañca bhojanañca vasanaṭṭhānañca garahitvā idāni mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:73_2: akuddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā pasannacitto varaṃ deti, maṃ kho panesa ‘sakkissariyabrhmissariyānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:73_3: atthāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī’tipi maññeyya, tatrassa nikkaṅkhabhāvatthaṃ mayhaṃ paresu
atk-s0513a4:73_4: kodho vā doso vā mā uppajjatu, parasampattiyaṃ lobho vā paresu sineho vā mā uppajjatu,
atk-s0513a4:73_5: majjhattova bhaveyyanti ime mayā cattāro vare gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So tassa nikkaṅkhabhāvatthāya
atk-s0513a4:78_0: Tattha varañce me ado sakkāti sace tvaṃ mayhaṃ varaṃ adāsi. Sunikkodhanti akujjhanavasena
atk-s0513a4:78_1: suṭṭhu nikkodhaṃ. Suniddosanti adussanavasena suṭṭhu niddosaṃ. Nillobhanti parasampattīsu
atk-s0513a4:78_2: nillobhaṃ. Vuttimattanoti evarūpaṃ attano vuttiṃ. Nisnehanti puttadhītādīsu vā saviññāṇakesu
atk-s0513a4:78_3: dhanadhaññādīsu vā aviññāṇakesu attano santakesupi nisnehaṃ apagatalobhaṃ. Abhikaṅkhāmīti
atk-s0513a4:78_4: evarūpaṃ imehi catūhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ attano vuttiṃ abhikaṅkhāmi. Ete me caturo
atk-s0513a4:78_5: vareti ete nikkodhādike caturo mayhaṃ vare dehīti.
atk-s0513a4:79_0: Kiṃ panesa na jānāti “yathā na sakkā sakkassa santike varaṃ gahetvā varena kodhādayo
atk-s0513a4:79_1: hanitu”nti. No na jānāti, sakke kho pana varaṃ dente na gaṇhāmīti vacanaṃ na yuttanti
atk-s0513a4:79_2: tassa ca nikkaṅkhabhāvatthāya gaṇhi. Tato sakko cintesi “kaṇhapaṇḍito varaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0513a4:79_3: ativiya anavajje vare gaṇhi, etesu varesu guṇadosaṃ etameva pucchissāmī”ti. Atha
atk-s0513a4:81: “Kiṃnu kodhe vā dose vā, lobhe snehe ca brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0513a4:82: Ādīnavaṃ tvaṃ passasi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:83: Tassattho – brāhmaṇa kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ kodhe dose lobhe snehe ca ādīnavaṃ passasi, taṃ tāva me pucchito akkhāhi, na hi mayaṃ ettha ādīnavaṃ jānāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:84: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tena hi suṇāhī”ti vatvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:86: “Appo hutvā bahu hoti, vaḍḍhate so akhantijo;
atk-s0513a4:87: Āsaṅgī bahupāyāso, tasmā kodhaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:90: Tato pāṇi tato daṇḍo, satthassa paramā gati;
atk-s0513a4:91: Doso kodhasamuṭṭhāno, tasmā dosaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:94: Dissanti lobhadhammesu, tasmā lobhaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:97: Te bhusaṃ upatāpenti, tasmā snehaṃ na rocaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:98_0: Tattha akhantijoti so anadhivāsakajātikassa akhantito jāto kodho paṭhamaṃ paritto
atk-s0513a4:98_1: hutvā pacchā bahu hoti aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhati. Tassa vaḍḍhanabhāvo khantivādījātakena
atk-s0513a4:98_2: ceva cūḷadhammapālajātakena ca vaṇṇetabbo. Apica tissāmaccassapettha bhariyaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0513a4:98_3: katvā sabbaṃ saparijanaṃ māretvā pacchā attano māritavatthu kathetabbaṃ. Āsaṅgīti
atk-s0513a4:98_4: āsaṅgakaraṇo. Yassa uppajjati, taṃ āsattaṃ laggitaṃ karoti, taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0513a4:98_5: gantuṃ na deti, nivattitvā akkosanādīni kāreti. Bahupāyāsoti bahunā kāyikacetasikadukkhasaṅkhātena
atk-s0513a4:98_6: upāyāsena kilamathena samannāgato. Kodhaṃ nissāya hi kodhavasena ariyādīsu katavītikkamā
atk-s0513a4:98_7: diṭṭhadhamme ceva samparāye ca vadhabandhavippaṭisārādīni ceva pañcavidhabandhanakammakaraṇādīni
atk-s0513a4:98_8: ca bahūni dukkhāni anubhavantīti kodho bahupāyāso nāma. Tasmāti yasmā esa evaṃ anekādīnavo,
atk-s0513a4:99_0: Duṭṭhassāti kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena kujjhitvā aparabhāge dussanalakkhaṇena dosena
atk-s0513a4:99_1: duṭṭhassa paṭhamaṃ tāva “are, dāsa, pessā”ti pharusavācā niccharati, vācāya anantarā
atk-s0513a4:99_2: ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanavasena hatthaparāmāso, tato anantarā upakkamanavasena pāṇi pavattati,
atk-s0513a4:99_3: tato daṇḍo, daṇḍappahāre atikkamitvā pana ekatodhāraubhatodhārassa satthassa paramā
atk-s0513a4:99_4: gati, sabbapariyantā satthanipphatti hoti. Yadā hi satthena paraṃ jīvitā voropetvā
atk-s0513a4:99_5: pacchā teneva satthena attānaṃ jīvitā voropeti, tadā doso matthakappatto hoti. Doso
atk-s0513a4:99_6: kodhasamuṭṭhānoti yathā anambilaṃ takkaṃ vā kañjikaṃ vā pariṇāmavasena parivattitvā
atk-s0513a4:99_7: ambilaṃ hoti, taṃ ekajātikampi samānaṃ ambilaṃ anambilanti nānā vuccati, tathā pubbakāle
atk-s0513a4:99_8: kodho pariṇamitvā aparabhāge doso hoti. So akusalamūlattena ekajātikopi samāno kodho
atk-s0513a4:99_9: dosoti nānā vuccati. Yathā anambilato ambilaṃ, evaṃ sopi kodhato samuṭṭhātīti kodhasamuṭṭhāno.
atk-s0513a4:99_10: Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ anekādīnavo doso, tasmā dosampi na rocemi.
atk-s0513a4:100_0: Ālopasāhasākārāti divā divasseva gāmaṃ paharitvā vilumpanāni ca āvudhaṃ sarīre ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:100_1: “idaṃ nāma me dehī”ti sāhasākārā ca. Nikatī vañcanāni cāti patirūpakaṃ dassetvā parassa
atk-s0513a4:100_2: haraṇaṃ nikati nāma, sā asuvaṇṇameva “suvaṇṇa”nti kūṭakahāpaṇaṃ “kahāpaṇo”ti datvā
atk-s0513a4:100_3: parasantakaggahaṇe daṭṭhabbā. Paṭibhānavasena pana upāyakusalatāya parasantakaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:100_4: vañcanaṃ nāma. Tassevaṃ pavatti daṭṭhabbā – eko kira ujujātiko gāmikapuriso araññato
atk-s0513a4:100_5: sasakaṃ ānetvā nadītīre ṭhapetvā nhāyituṃ otari. Atheko dhutto taṃ sasakaṃ sīse katvā
atk-s0513a4:100_6: nhāyituṃ otiṇṇo. Itaro uttaritvā sasakaṃ apassanto ito cito ca vilokesi. Tamenaṃ
atk-s0513a4:100_7: dhutto “kiṃ bho vilokesī”ti vatvā “imasmiṃ me ṭhāne sasako ṭhapito, taṃ na passāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:100_8: vutte “andhabāla, tvaṃ na jānāsi, sasakā nāma nadītīre ṭhapitā palāyanti, passa ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:100_9: attano sasakaṃ sīse ṭhapetvāva nhāyāmī”ti āha. So appaṭibhānatāya “evaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:100_10: pakkāmi. Ekakahāpaṇena migapotakaṃ gahetvā puna taṃ datvā dvikahāpaṇagghanakassa
atk-s0513a4:100_11: migassa gahitavatthupettha kathetabbaṃ. Dissanti lobhadhammesūti sakka, ime ālopādayo
atk-s0513a4:100_12: pāpadhammā lobhasabhāvesu lobhābhibhūtesu sattesu dissanti. Na hi aluddhā evarūpāni
atk-s0513a4:100_13: kammāni karonti. Evaṃ lobho anekādīnavo, tasmā lobhampi na rocemi.
atk-s0513a4:101_0: Snehasaṅgathitā ganthāti ārammaṇesu allīyanalakkhaṇena snehena saṅgathitā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:101_1: uppādavasena ghaṭitā suttena pupphāni viya baddhā nānappakāresu ārammaṇesu pavattamānā
atk-s0513a4:101_2: abhijjhākāyaganthā. Senti manomayā puthūti te puthūsu ārammaṇesu uppannā suvaṇṇādīhi
atk-s0513a4:101_3: nibbattāni suvaṇṇādimayāni ābharaṇādīni viya manena nibbattattā manomayā abhijjhākāyaganthā
atk-s0513a4:101_4: tesu ārammaṇesu senti anusenti. Te bhusaṃ upatāpentīti te evaṃ anusayitā balavatāpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:101_5: janentā bhusaṃ upatāpenti atikilamenti. Tesaṃ pana bhusaṃ upatāpane “sallaviddhova
atk-s0513a4:101_6: ruppatī”ti gāthāya vatthu, “piyajātikā hi gahapati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā
atk-s0513a4:101_7: piyappabhutikā”, “piyato jāyatī soko”tiādīni suttāni ca āharitabbāni. Apica maṅgalabodhisattassa
atk-s0513a4:101_8: dārake datvā balavasokena hadayaṃ phali, vessantarabodhisattassa mahantaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0513a4:101_9: udapādi. Evaṃ pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ pemaṃ upatāpaṃ karotiyeva. Ayaṃ snehe
atk-s0513a4:102: Sakko pañhavissajjanaṃ sutvā “kaṇhapaṇḍita tayā ime pañhā buddhalīḷāya sādhukaṃ kathitā, ativiya tuṭṭhosmi te, aparampi varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:105: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:111: Tattha antarāyakarā bhusāti imassa me tapokammassa antarāyakarā.
atk-s0513a4:112_0: Taṃ sutvā sakko “kaṇhapaṇḍito varaṃ gaṇhanto na āmisasannissitaṃ gaṇhāti, tapokammanissitameva
atk-s0513a4:112_1: gaṇhātī”ti cintetvā bhiyyosomattāya pasanno aparampi varaṃ dadamāno itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:115: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:116: Bodhisattopi varaggahaṇāpadesena tassa dhammaṃ desento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:119: Na mano vā sarīraṃ vā, maṃ-kate sakka kassaci;
atk-s0513a4:120: Kadāci upahaññetha, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare”ti.
atk-s0513a4:121_0: Tattha mano vāti manodvāraṃ vā. Sarīraṃ vāti kāyadvāraṃ vā, vacīdvārampi etesaṃ gahaṇena
atk-s0513a4:121_1: gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Maṃ-kateti mama kāraṇā. Upahaññethāti upaghātaṃ āpajjeyya
atk-s0513a4:121_2: aparisuddhaṃ assa. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sakka devarāja, mama kāraṇā maṃ nissāya mama
atk-s0513a4:121_3: anatthakāmatāya kassaci sattassa kismiñci kāle idaṃ tividhampi kammadvāraṃ na upahaññetha,
atk-s0513a4:121_4: pāṇātipātādīhi dasahi akusalakammapathehi vimuttaṃ parisuddhameva bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:122_0: Iti mahāsatto chasupi ṭhānesu varaṃ gaṇhanto nekkhammanissitameva gaṇhi, jānāti cesa
atk-s0513a4:122_1: “sarīraṃ nāma byādhidhammaṃ, na taṃ sakkā sakkena abyādhidhammaṃ kātu”nti. Sattānañhi
atk-s0513a4:122_2: tīsu dvāresu parisuddhabhāvo asakkāyattova, evaṃ santepi tassa dhammadesanatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:122_3: ime vare gaṇhi. Sakkopi taṃ rukkhaṃ dhuvaphalaṃ katvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā sirasi
atk-s0513a4:122_4: añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā “arogā idheva vasathā”ti vatvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a4:123: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “ānanda, pubbe mayā nivutthabhūmippadeso ceso”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sakko anuruddho ahosi, kaṇhapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:127: 24-38. Yo kopaneyyoti idaṃ catuposathikajātakaṃ puṇṇakajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:131_0: Bahussutoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:131_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko upāsako tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto svātanāya
atk-s0513a4:131_2: nimantetvā attano gharadvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā alaṅkaritvā punadivase tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:131_3: kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Satthā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro tattha gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:131_4: Upāsako saputtadāro saparijano buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a4:131_5: puna svātanāyāti evaṃ sattāhaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase sabbaparikkhāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:131_6: adāsi. Taṃ pana dadamāno upāhanadānaṃ ussannaṃ katvā adāsi. Dasabalassa dinno upāhanasaṅghāṭo
atk-s0513a4:131_7: sahassagghanako ahosi, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ pañcasatagghanako, sesānaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0513a4:131_8: bhikkhusatānaṃ satagghanako. Iti so sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ datvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:131_9: bhagavato santike nisīdi. Athassa satthā madhurena sarena anumodanaṃ karonto “upāsaka,
atk-s0513a4:131_10: uḷāraṃ te sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ, attamano hohi, pubbe anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0513a4:131_11: ekaṃ upāhanasaṅghāṭaṃ datvā nāvāya bhinnāya appatiṭṭhe mahāsamuddepi upāhanadānanissandena
atk-s0513a4:131_12: patiṭṭhaṃ labhiṃsu, tvaṃ pana buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:131_13: adāsi, tassa te upāhanadānassa phalaṃ kasmā na patiṭṭhā bhavissatī”ti vatvā tena
atk-s0513a4:132_0: Atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī moḷinī nāma ahosi. Moḷininagare brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente saṅkho
atk-s0513a4:132_1: nāma brāhmaṇo aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo pahūtavittupakaraṇo pahūtadhanadhaññasuvaṇṇarajato
atk-s0513a4:132_2: catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti chasu ṭhānesu cha dānasālāyo
atk-s0513a4:132_3: kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassāni vissajjento kapaṇaddhikānaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0513a4:132_4: So ekadivasaṃ cintesi “ahaṃ gehe dhane khīṇe dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, aparikkhīṇeyeva
atk-s0513a4:132_5: dhane nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantvā dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti. So nāvaṃ bandhāpetvā bhaṇḍassa
atk-s0513a4:132_6: pūrāpetvā puttadāraṃ āmantetvā “yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, tāva me dānaṃ anupacchinditvā
atk-s0513a4:132_7: pavatteyyāthā”ti vatvā dāsakammakaraparivuto chattaṃ ādāya upāhanaṃ āruyha majjhanhikasamaye
atk-s0513a4:132_8: paṭṭanagāmābhimukho pāyāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho āvajjetvā
atk-s0513a4:132_9: taṃ dhanāharaṇatthāya gacchantaṃ disvā “mahāpuriso dhanaṃ āharituṃ gacchati, bhavissati
atk-s0513a4:132_10: nu kho assa samudde antarāyo, no”ti āvajjetvā “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “esa maṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:132_11: chattañca upāhanañca mayhaṃ datvā upāhanadānanissandena samudde bhinnāya nāvāya patiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:132_12: labhissati, karissāmissa anuggaha”nti ākāsenāgantvā tassāvidūre otaritvā caṇḍavātātape
atk-s0513a4:132_13: aṅgārasantharasadisaṃ uṇhavālukaṃ maddanto tassa abhimukho āgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:133_0: So taṃ disvāva “puññakkhettaṃ me āgataṃ, ajja mayā ettha dānabījaṃ ropetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:133_1: tuṭṭhacitto vegena taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “bhante, mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya thokaṃ
atk-s0513a4:133_2: maggā okkamma imaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamathā”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamante
atk-s0513a4:133_3: rukkhamūle vālukaṃ ussāpetvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ nisīdāpetvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:133_4: vāsitaparissāvitena udakena pāde dhovitvā gandhatelena makkhetvā attano upāhanā omuñcitvā
atk-s0513a4:133_5: papphoṭetvā gandhatelena makkhetvā tassa pādesu paṭimuñcitvā “bhante, imā upāhanā
atk-s0513a4:133_6: āruyha chattaṃ matthake katvā gacchathā”ti chattupāhanaṃ adāsi. So assa anuggahatthāya
atk-s0513a4:133_7: taṃ gahetvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ passantassevassa uppatitvā gandhamādanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:133_8: Bodhisattopi taṃ disvā ativiya pasannacitto paṭṭanaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi. Athassa
atk-s0513a4:133_9: mahāsamuddaṃ paṭipannassa sattame divase nāvā vivaraṃ adāsi, udakaṃ ussiñcituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:133_10: Mahājano maraṇabhayabhīto attano attano devatā namassitvā mahāviravaṃ viravi. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a4:133_11: ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ gahetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā sappinā saddhiṃ sakkharacuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:133_12: yāvadatthaṃ khāditvā tampi khādāpetvā tena saddhiṃ kūpakayaṭṭhimatthakaṃ āruyha “imāya
atk-s0513a4:133_13: disāya amhākaṃ nagara”nti disaṃ vavatthapetvā macchakacchapaparipanthato attānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:133_14: mocento tena saddhiṃ usabhamattaṃ atikkamitvā pati. Mahājano vināsaṃ pāpuṇi. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a4:133_15: pana upaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ samuddaṃ tarituṃ ārabhi. Tassa tarantasseva sattamo divaso
atk-s0513a4:133_16: jāto. So tasmimpi kāle loṇodakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko ahosiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:134_0: Tadā pana catūhi lokapālehi maṇimekhalā nāma devadhītā “sace samudde nāvāya bhinnāya
atk-s0513a4:134_1: tisaraṇagatā vā sīlasampannā vā mātāpitupaṭṭhākā vā manussā dukkhappattā honti, te
atk-s0513a4:134_2: rakkheyyāsī”ti samudde ārakkhaṇatthāya ṭhapitā hoti. Sā attano issariyena sattāhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0513a4:134_3: pamajjitvā sattame divase samuddaṃ olokentī sīlācārasaṃyuttaṃ saṅkhabrāhmaṇaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:134_4: “imassa sattamo divaso samudde patitassa, sace so marissati ativiya gārayhā me bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:134_5: saṃviggamānahadayā hutvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā vātavegena
atk-s0513a4:134_6: tattha gantvā tassa purato ākāse ṭhatvā “brāhmaṇa, tvaṃ sattāhaṃ nirāhāro, idaṃ dibbabhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:134_7: bhuñjā”ti āha. So taṃ oloketvā “apanehi tava bhattaṃ, ahaṃ uposathiko”ti āha. Athassa
atk-s0513a4:134_8: upaṭṭhāko pacchato āgato devataṃ adisvā saddameva sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pakatisukhumālo
atk-s0513a4:134_9: sattāhaṃ nirāhāratāya dukkhito maraṇabhayena vilapati maññe, assāsessāmi na”nti cintetvā
atk-s0513a4:136: “Bahussuto sutadhammosi saṅkha, diṭṭhā tayā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a4:137: Athakkhaṇe dassayase vilāpaṃ, añño nu ko te paṭimantako mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:138_0: Tattha sutadhammosīti dhammopi tayā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ santike suto asi. Diṭṭhā
atk-s0513a4:138_1: tayāti tesaṃ paccaye dentena veyyāvaccaṃ karontena dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ca tayā
atk-s0513a4:138_2: diṭṭhā. Evaṃ akaronto hi passantopi te na passatiyeva. Athakkhaṇeti atha akkhaṇe
atk-s0513a4:138_3: sallapantassa kassaci abhāvena vacanassa anokāse. Dassayaseti “ahaṃ uposathiko”ti
atk-s0513a4:138_4: vadanto vilāpaṃ dassesi. Paṭimantakoti mayā añño ko tava paṭimantako paṭivacanadāyako,
atk-s0513a4:139: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “imassa devatā na paññāyati maññe”ti cintetvā “samma, nāhaṃ maraṇassa bhāyāmi, atthi pana me añño paṭimantako”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:142: ‘Bhuñjassu bhattaṃ’ iti maṃ vadeti, saddhāvittā, tamahaṃ noti brūmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:143_0: Tattha subbhūti subhamukhā. Subhāti pāsādikā uttamarūpadharā. Suppaṭimukkakambūti
atk-s0513a4:143_1: paṭimukkasuvaṇṇālaṅkārā. Paggayhāti suvaṇṇapātiyā bhattaṃ gahetvā ukkhipitvā. Saddhāvittāti
atk-s0513a4:143_2: saddhā ceva tuṭṭhacittā ca. “Saddhaṃ citta”ntipi pāṭho, tassattho saddhanti saddahantaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:143_3: cittanti tuṭṭhacittaṃ. Tamahaṃ notīti tamahaṃ devataṃ uposathikattā paṭikkhipanto
atk-s0513a4:146: “Etādisaṃ brāhmaṇa disvāna yakkhaṃ, puccheyya poso sukhamāsisāno;
atk-s0513a4:147: Uṭṭhehi naṃ pañjalikābhipuccha, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:148_0: Tattha sukhamāsisānoti etādisaṃ yakkhaṃ disvā attano sukhaṃ āsīsanto paṇḍito puriso
atk-s0513a4:148_1: “amhākaṃ sukhaṃ bhavissati, na bhavissatī”ti puccheyya. Uṭṭhehīti udakato uṭṭhānākāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:148_2: dassento uṭṭhaha. Pañjalikābhipucchāti añjaliko hutvā abhipuccha. Uda mānusīti udāhu
atk-s0513a4:149: Bodhisatto “yuttaṃ kathesī”ti taṃ pucchanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:151: “Yaṃ tvaṃ sukhenābhisamekkhase maṃ, bhuñjassu bhattaṃ iti maṃ vadesi;
atk-s0513a4:152: Pucchāmi taṃ nāri mahānubhāve, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:153: Tattha yaṃ tvanti yasmā tvaṃ sukhena maṃ abhisamekkhase, piyacakkhūhi olokesi. Pucchāmi tanti tena kāraṇena taṃ pucchāmi.
atk-s0513a4:157: Anukampikā no ca paduṭṭhacittā, taveva atthāya idhāgatāsmi.
atk-s0513a4:160: Sabbassa tyāhaṃ paṭipādayāmi, yaṃ kiñci tuyhaṃ manasābhipatthita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:161_0: Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ mahāsamudde. Nānāvividhānīti bahūni ca anekappakārāni ca hatthiyānaassayānādīni
atk-s0513a4:161_1: atthi. Sabbassa tyāhanti tassa annapānādino sabbassa sāmikaṃ katvā taṃ te annapānādiṃ
atk-s0513a4:161_2: paṭipādayāmi dadāmi. Yaṃ kiñcīti aññampi yaṃ kiñci manasā icchitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ te dammīti.
atk-s0513a4:162_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ devadhītā samuddapiṭṭhe mayhaṃ ‘idañcidañca dammī’ti vadati,
atk-s0513a4:162_1: kiṃ nu kho esā mayā katena puññakammena dātukāmā, udāhu attano balena, pucchissāmi
atk-s0513a4:162_2: tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:164: “Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhañca hutañca mayhaṃ, sabbassa no issarā tvaṃ sugatte;
atk-s0513a4:165: Sussoṇi subbhamu suvilaggamajjhe, kissa me kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti.
atk-s0513a4:166_0: Tattha yiṭṭhanti dānavasena yajitaṃ. Hutanti āhunapāhunavasena dinnaṃ. Sabbassa no
atk-s0513a4:166_1: issarā tvanti tassa amhākaṃ puññakammassa tvaṃ issarā, “imassa ayaṃ vipāko, imassa
atk-s0513a4:166_2: aya”nti byākarituṃ samatthāti attho. Sussoṇīti sundaraūrulakkhaṇe. Subbhamūti sundarabhamuke.
atk-s0513a4:166_3: Suvilaggamajjheti suṭṭhuvilaggitatanumajjhe. Kissa meti mayā katakammesu katarakammassa
atk-s0513a4:166_4: ayaṃ vipāko, yenāhaṃ appatiṭṭhe samudde patiṭṭhaṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:167: Taṃ sutvā devadhītā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ‘yaṃ tena kusalaṃ kataṃ, taṃ kammaṃ na jānātī’ti aññāya pucchati maññe, kathayissāmi dānissā”ti taṃ kathentī aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:169: “Ghamme pathe brāhmaṇa ekabhikkhuṃ, ugghaṭṭapādaṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:170: Paṭipādayī saṅkha upāhanāni, sā dakkhiṇā kāmaduhā tavajjā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:171_0: Tattha ekabhikkhunti ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sandhāyāha. Ugghaṭṭapādanti uṇhavālukāya
atk-s0513a4:171_1: ghaṭṭitapādaṃ. Tasitanti pipāsitaṃ. Paṭipādayīti paṭipādesi, yojesīti attho. Kāmaduhāti sabbakāmadāyikā.
atk-s0513a4:172_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “evarūpepi nāma appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde mayā dinnaupāhanadānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:172_1: mama sabbakāmadadaṃ jātaṃ, aho sudinnaṃ me paccekabuddhassa dāna”nti tuṭṭhacitto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:175: Aññassa yānassa na hettha bhūmi, ajjeva maṃ moḷiniṃ pāpayassū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:176_0: Tassattho – devate, evaṃ sante mayhaṃ ekaṃ nāvaṃ māpehi, khuddakaṃ pana ekadoṇikanāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:176_1: māpehi, yaṃ nāvaṃ māpessasi, sā hotu nāvā bahūhi susibbitehi phalakehi upapannā,
atk-s0513a4:176_2: udakapavesanassābhāvena anavassutā, erakena sammā gahetvā gacchantena vātena yuttā,
atk-s0513a4:176_3: ṭhapetvā dibbanāvaṃ aññassa yānassa ettha bhūmi natthi, tāya pana dibbanāvāya ajjeva
atk-s0513a4:177_0: Devadhītā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacittā sattaratanamayaṃ nāvaṃ māpesi. Sā dīghato
atk-s0513a4:177_1: aṭṭhausabhā ahosi vitthārato catuusabhā, gambhīrato vīsatiyaṭṭhikā. Tassā indanīlamayā
atk-s0513a4:177_2: tayo kūpakā, sovaṇṇamayāni yottāni rajatamayāni pattāni sovaṇṇamayāni ca phiyārittāni
atk-s0513a4:177_3: ahesuṃ. Devatā taṃ nāvaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pūretvā brāhmaṇaṃ āliṅgitvā alaṅkatanāvāya
atk-s0513a4:177_4: āropesi, upaṭṭhākaṃ panassa na olokesi. Brāhmaṇo attanā katakalyāṇato tassa pattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:177_5: adāsi, so anumodi. Tadā devatā tampi āliṅgitvā nāvāya patiṭṭhāpesi. Atha naṃ nāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:177_6: moḷininagaraṃ netvā brāhmaṇassa ghare dhanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0513a4:179: “Sā tattha vittā sumanā patītā, nāvaṃ sucittaṃ abhinimminitvā;
atk-s0513a4:180: Ādāya saṅkhaṃ purisena saddhiṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ sādhuramma”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:182_0: Tattha sāti bhikkhave, sā devatā tattha samuddamajjhe tassa vacanaṃ sutvā vittisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0513a4:182_1: pītiyā samannāgatattā vittā. Sumanāti sundaramanā pāmojjena patītacittā hutvā vicitranāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:182_2: nimminitvā brāhmaṇaṃ paricārakena saddhiṃ ādāya sādhurammaṃ atiramaṇīyaṃ nagaraṃ upānayīti.
atk-s0513a4:183: Brāhmaṇopi yāvajīvaṃ aparimitadhanaṃ gehaṃ ajjhāvasanto dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā jīvitapariyosāne sapariso devanagaraṃ paripūresi.
atk-s0513a4:184: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:185: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, upaṭṭhākapuriso ānando, saṅkhabrāhmaṇo pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:189_0: Yo te imaṃ visālakkhinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kodhanaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:189_1: kathesi. So kira bhikkhu niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvāpi kodhaṃ niggahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:189_2: kodhano ahosi upāyāsabahulo, appampi vutto samāno abhisajji kuppi byāpajji patiṭṭhayi.
atk-s0513a4:189_3: Satthā tassa kodhanabhāvaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ kodhano”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a4:189_4: “saccaṃ bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kodho nāma vāretabbo, evarūpo hi idhaloke ca paraloke
atk-s0513a4:189_5: ca anatthakārako, tvaṃ nikkodhassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā kasmā kujjhasi, porāṇakapaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a4:189_6: bāhirasāsane pabbajitvāpi kodhaṃ na kariṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:190_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aññatarasmiṃ kāsinigame eko brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a4:190_1: aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo aputtako ahosi, tassa brāhmaṇī puttaṃ patthesi. Tadā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a4:190_2: brahmalokā cavitvā tassā kucchiyaṃ nibbatti, tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “bodhikumāro”ti
atk-s0513a4:190_3: nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tassa vayappattakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā paccāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:190_4: anicchantasseva mātāpitaro samānajātikā kulā kumārikaṃ ānesuṃ. Sāpi brahmalokā cutāva
atk-s0513a4:190_5: uttamarūpadharā devaccharapaṭibhāgā. Tesaṃ anicchamānānaññeva aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:190_6: kariṃsu. Ubhinnaṃ panetesaṃ kilesasamudācāro nāma na bhūtapubbo, saṃrāgavasena aññamaññassa
atk-s0513a4:190_7: olokanaṃ nāma nāhosi, supinepi methunadhammo nāma na diṭṭhapubbo, evaṃ parisuddhasīlā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:191_0: Athāparabhāge mahāsatto mātāpitūsu kālakatesu tesaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pakkositvā
atk-s0513a4:191_1: “bhadde, tvaṃ imaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvāhī”ti āha. “Kiṃ karissatha
atk-s0513a4:191_2: tumhe pana, ayyaputtā”ti? “Mayhaṃ dhanena kiccaṃ natthi, himavantapadesaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:191_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana ayyaputta pabbajjā
atk-s0513a4:191_4: nāma purisānaññeva vaṭṭatī”ti? “Itthīnampi vaṭṭati, bhadde”ti. “Tena hi ahaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0513a4:191_5: chaṭṭitakheḷaṃ na gaṇhissāmi, mayhampi dhanena kiccaṃ natthi, ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:191_6: “Sādhu, bhadde”ti. Te ubhopi mahādānaṃ datvā nikkhamitvā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge assamaṃ
atk-s0513a4:191_7: katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya phalāphalehi yāpentā tattha dasamattāni saṃvaccharāni
atk-s0513a4:191_8: vasiṃsu, jhānaṃ pana nesaṃ na tāva uppajjati. Te tattha pabbajjāsukheneva dasa saṃvacchare
atk-s0513a4:191_9: vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:192_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānapālaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgataṃ disvā “uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷissāma,
atk-s0513a4:192_1: uyyānaṃ sodhehī”ti vatvā tena sodhitaṃ sajjitaṃ uyyānaṃ mahantena parivārena agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:192_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe te ubhopi janā uyyānassa ekapasse pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā nisinnā
atk-s0513a4:192_3: honti. Atha rājā uyyāne vicaranto te ubhopi nisinnake disvā paramapāsādikaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ
atk-s0513a4:192_4: paribbājikaṃ olokento paṭibaddhacitto ahosi. So kilesavasena kampanto “pucchissāmi
atk-s0513a4:192_5: tāva, ayaṃ paribbājikā imassa kiṃ hotī”ti bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pabbajita ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:192_6: te paribbājikā kiṃ hotī”ti pucchi. Mahārāja, kiñci na hoti, kevalaṃ ekapabbajjāya
atk-s0513a4:192_7: pabbajitā, apica kho pana me gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosīti. Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:192_8: kiretassa kiñci na hoti, apica kho pana gihikāle pādaparicārikā kirassa ahosi, sace
atk-s0513a4:192_9: panāhaṃ issariyabalena gahetvā gaccheyyaṃ, kiṃ nu kho esa karissati, pariggaṇhissāmi
atk-s0513a4:192_10: tāva na”nti cintetvā upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:195: Ādāya balā gaccheyya, kiṃ nu kayirāsi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:196: Tattha saṃmhitabhāsininti mandahasitabhāsiniṃ. Balā gaccheyyāti balakkārena ādāya gaccheyya. Kiṃ nu kayirāsīti tassa tvaṃ brāhmaṇa kiṃ kareyyāsīti?
atk-s0513a4:197: Athassa kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:199: “Uppajje me na mucceyya, na me mucceyya jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:201_0: Tassattho – mahārāja, sace imaṃ gahetvā gacchante kismiñci mama abbhantare kopo uppajjeyya,
atk-s0513a4:201_1: so me anto uppajjitvā na mucceyya, yāvāhaṃ jīvāmi, tāva me na mucceyya. Nāssa anto
atk-s0513a4:201_2: ghanasannivāsena patiṭṭhātuṃ dassāmi, atha kho yathā uppannaṃ rajaṃ vipulā meghavuṭṭhi
atk-s0513a4:201_3: khippaṃ nivāreti, tathā khippameva naṃ mettābhāvanāya niggahetvā vāressāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:202_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto sīhanādaṃ nadi. Rājā panassa kathaṃ sutvāpi andhabālatāya paṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:202_1: attano cittaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi “imaṃ paribbājikaṃ rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:202_2: nehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā “adhammo loke vattati, ayutta”ntiādīni vatvā paridevamānaṃyeva
atk-s0513a4:202_3: naṃ ādāya pāyāsi. Bodhisatto tassā paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā ekavāraṃ oloketvā puna
atk-s0513a4:202_4: na olokesi. Taṃ rodantiṃ paridevantiṃ rājanivesanameva nayiṃsu. Sopi bārāṇasirājā
atk-s0513a4:202_5: uyyāne papañcaṃ akatvāva sīghataraṃ gantvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantena
atk-s0513a4:202_6: yasena nimantesi. Sā yasassa aguṇaṃ pabbajāya eva guṇaṃ kathesi. Rājā kenaci pariyāyena
atk-s0513a4:202_7: tassā manaṃ alabhanto taṃ ekasmiṃ gabbhe kāretvā cintesi “ayaṃ paribbājikā evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:202_8: yasaṃ na icchati, sopi tāpaso evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ gahetvā gacchante kujjhitvā olokitamattampi
atk-s0513a4:202_9: na akāsi, pabbajitā kho pana bahumāyā honti, kiñci payojetvā anatthampi me kareyya,
atk-s0513a4:202_10: gacchāmi tāva jānāmi kiṃ karonto nisinno”ti saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:202_11: Bodhisattopi cīvaraṃ sibbanto nisīdi. Rājā mandaparivārova padasaddaṃ akaronto saṇikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:202_12: upasaṅkami. Bodhisatto rājānaṃ anoloketvā cīvarameva sibbi. Rājā “ayaṃ kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:202_13: mayā saddhiṃ na sallapatī”ti maññamāno “ayaṃ kūṭatāpaso ‘kodhassa uppajjituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:202_14: uppannampi naṃ khippameva niggaṇhissāmī’ti paṭhamameva gajjitvā idāni kodhena thaddho
atk-s0513a4:202_15: hutvā mayā saddhiṃ na sallapatī”ti saññāya tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:206: Tattha balamhiva apassitoti balanissito viya hutvā. Tuṇhikatoti kiñci avadanto. Sibbamacchasīti sibbanto acchasi.
atk-s0513a4:207: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ rājā kodhavasena maṃ nālapatīti maññati, kathessāmi dānissa uppannassa kodhassa vasaṃ agatabhāva”nti cintetvā catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:209: “Uppajji me na muccittha, na me muccittha jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:211_0: Tassattho – mahārāja, uppajji me, na na uppajji, na pana me muccittha, nāssa pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:211_1: hadaye ṭhātuṃ adāsiṃ, iti so mama jīvato na muccittheva, rajaṃ vipulā vuṭṭhi viya
atk-s0513a4:212: Taṃ sutvā rājā “kiṃ nu kho esa kopameva sandhāya vadati, udāhu aññaṃ kiñci sippaṃ sandhāya kathesi, pucchissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:214: “Kiṃ te uppajji no mucci, kiṃ te na mucci jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:215: Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, katamaṃ taṃ nivārayī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:216: Tattha kiṃ te uppajji no muccīti kiṃ tava uppajji ceva na mucci ca.
atk-s0513a4:217: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “mahārāja, evaṃ kodho bahuādīnavo mahāvināsadāyako, eso mama uppajji, uppannañca naṃ mettābhāvanāya nivāresi”nti kodhe ādīnavaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0513a4:219: “Yamhi jāte na passati, ajāte sādhu passati;
atk-s0513a4:220: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:223: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:226: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:229: Sa bhīmaseno balavā pamaddī, kodho mahārāja na me amuccatha.
atk-s0513a4:232: Tameva kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahati, yasmā so jāyate gini.
atk-s0513a4:235: Sārambhā jāyate kodho, sopi teneva ḍayhati.
atk-s0513a4:241: Āpūrati tassa yaso, sukkapakkheva candimā”ti. – imā gāthā āha;
atk-s0513a4:242_0: Tattha na passatīti attatthampi na passati, pageva paratthaṃ. Sādhu passatīti attatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:242_1: paratthaṃ ubhayatthampi sādhu passati. Dummedhagocaroti nippaññānaṃ ādhārabhūto gocaro.
atk-s0513a4:242_2: Dukkhamesinoti dukkhaṃ icchantā. Sadatthanti attano atthabhūtaṃ atthato ceva dhammato
atk-s0513a4:242_3: ca vuddhiṃ. Parakkareti vipulampi atthaṃ uppannaṃ parato kāreti, apanetha, na me
atk-s0513a4:242_4: iminā atthoti vadati. Sa bhīmasenoti so kodho bhīmāya bhayajananiyā mahatiyā kilesasenāya
atk-s0513a4:242_5: samannāgato. Pamaddīti attano balavabhāvena uḷārepi satte gahetvā attano vase karaṇena
atk-s0513a4:242_6: maddanasamattho. Na me amuccathāti mama santikā mokkhaṃ na labhati, hadaye vā pana
atk-s0513a4:242_7: me khīraṃ viya muhuttaṃ dadhibhāvena na patiṭṭhahitthātipi attho.
atk-s0513a4:243_1: Yasmāti yato kaṭṭhā jāyati, tameva ḍahati. Ginīti aggi. Bālassa avijānatoti bālassa
atk-s0513a4:243_2: avijānantassa. Sārambhā jāyateti ahaṃ tvanti ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karontassa karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇā
atk-s0513a4:243_3: sārambhā araṇīmatthanā viya pāvako kodho jāyati. Sopi tenevāti sopi bālo teneva kodhena
atk-s0513a4:243_4: kaṭṭhaṃ viya agginā ḍayhati. Anedho dhūmaketūvāti anindhano aggi viya. Tassāti tassa
atk-s0513a4:243_5: adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatassa puggalassa sukkapakkhe cando viya laddho yaso aparāparaṃ āpūratīti.
atk-s0513a4:244_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭho ekaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpetvā paribbājikaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:244_1: “bhante nikkodhatāpasa, ubhopi tumhe pabbajjāsukhena vītināmentā idheva uyyāne vasatha,
atk-s0513a4:244_2: ahaṃ vo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā khamāpetvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:244_3: Te ubhopi tattheva vasiṃsu. Aparabhāge paribbājikā kālamakāsi. Bodhisatto tassā kālakatāya
atk-s0513a4:244_4: himavantaṃ pavisitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0513a4:245: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne kodhano bhikkhu anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:246: Tadā paribbājikā rāhulamātā ahosi, rājā ānando, paribbājako pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:250_0: Sattāhamevāhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:250_1: Vatthu kusajātake āvi bhavissati. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti
atk-s0513a4:250_2: pucchitvā “saccaṃ bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe bāhirakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:250_3: pabbajitvā atirekapaññāsavassāni anabhiratā brahmacariyaṃ carantā hirottappabhedabhayena
atk-s0513a4:250_4: attano ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ na kassaci kathesuṃ, tvaṃ kasmā evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a4:250_5: mādisassa garuno buddhassa sammukhe ṭhatvā catuparisamajjhe ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ āvi
atk-s0513a4:250_6: karosi, kimatthaṃ attano hirottappaṃ na rakkhasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:251_0: Atīte vaṃsaraṭṭhe kosambiyaṃ nāma nagare kosambako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā
atk-s0513a4:251_1: aññatarasmiṃ nigame dve brāhmaṇā asītikoṭidhanavibhavā aññamaññaṃ piyasahāyakā kāmesu
atk-s0513a4:251_2: dosaṃ disvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā ubhopi kāme pahāya mahājanassa rodantassa paridevantassa
atk-s0513a4:251_3: nikkhamitvā himavantapadese assamapadaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalāphalena
atk-s0513a4:251_4: yāpentā paṇṇāsa vassāni vasiṃsu, jhānaṃ uppādetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Te paṇṇāsavassaccayena
atk-s0513a4:251_5: loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ carantā kāsiraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. Tatra aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:251_6: nigamagāme dīpāyanatāpasassa gihisahāyo maṇḍabyo nāma atthi, te ubhopi tassa santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:251_7: agamaṃsu. So te disvāva attamano paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ubhopi te catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:251_8: Te tattha tīṇi cattāri vassāni vasitvā taṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ carantā bārāṇasiṃ patvā
atk-s0513a4:251_9: atimuttakasusāne vasiṃsu. Tattha dīpāyano yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā puna tasseva sahāyassa
atk-s0513a4:252_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko coro antonagare corikaṃ katvā dhanasāraṃ ādāya nikkhanto “coro”ti
atk-s0513a4:252_1: ñatvā paṭibuddhehi gharassāmikehi ceva ārakkhamanussehi ca anubaddho niddhamanena
atk-s0513a4:252_2: nikkhamitvā vegena susānaṃ pavisitvā tāpasassa paṇṇasāladvāre bhaṇḍikaṃ chaṭṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:252_3: palāyi. Manussā bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “are duṭṭhajaṭila, tvaṃ rattiṃ corikaṃ katvā divā
atk-s0513a4:252_4: tāpasarūpena carasī”ti tajjetvā pothetvā taṃ ādāya netvā rañño dassayiṃsu. Rājā anupaparikkhitvāva
atk-s0513a4:252_5: “gacchatha, naṃ sūle uttāsethā”ti āha. Te taṃ susānaṃ netvā khadirasūlaṃ āropayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:252_6: tāpasassa sarīre sūlaṃ na pavisati. Tato nimbasūlaṃ āhariṃsu, tampi na pavisati.
atk-s0513a4:252_7: Ayasūlaṃ āhariṃsu, tampi na pavisati. Tāpaso “kiṃ nu kho me pubbakamma”nti olokesi,
atk-s0513a4:252_8: athassa jātissarañāṇaṃ uppajji, tena pubbakammaṃ oloketvā addasa. Kiṃ panassa pubbakammanti?
atk-s0513a4:252_9: Koviḷārasūle makkhikāvedhanaṃ. So kira purimabhave vaḍḍhakiputto hutvā pitu rukkhatacchanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:252_10: gantvā ekaṃ makkhikaṃ gahetvā koviḷārasalākāya sūle viya vijjhi. Tamenaṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:252_11: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā gaṇhi. So “na sakkā ito pāpā mayā muccitu”nti ñatvā rājapurise
atk-s0513a4:252_12: āha “sace maṃ sūle uttāsetukāmattha, koviḷārasūlaṃ āharathā”ti. Te tathā katvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:253_0: Ārakkhakā paṭicchannā hutvā tassa santikaṃ āgacchante olokenti. Tadā dīpāyano “ciradiṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:253_1: me sahāyo”ti maṇḍabyassa santikaṃ āgacchanto “sūle uttāsito”ti taṃ divasaññeva antarāmagge
atk-s0513a4:253_2: sutvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ samma kārakosī”ti pucchitvā “akārakomhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:253_3: vutte “attano manopadosaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkhi, nāsakkhī”ti pucchi. “Samma, yehi ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:253_4: gahito, neva tesaṃ, na rañño upari mayhaṃ manopadoso atthī”ti. “Evaṃ sante tādisassa
atk-s0513a4:253_5: sīlavato chāyā mayhaṃ sukhā”ti vatvā dīpāyano sūlaṃ nissāya nisīdi. Athassa sarīre
atk-s0513a4:253_6: maṇḍabyassa sarīrato lohitabindūni patiṃsu. Tāni suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīre patitapatitāni
atk-s0513a4:253_7: sussitvā kāḷakāni uppajjiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāyeva so kaṇhadīpāyano nāma ahosi. So sabbarattiṃ tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:254_0: Punadivase ārakkhapurisā āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā “anisāmetvāva
atk-s0513a4:254_1: me kata”nti vegena tattha gantvā “pabbajita, kasmā sūlaṃ nissāya nisinnosī”ti dīpāyanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_2: pucchi. Mahārāja, imaṃ tāpasaṃ rakkhanto nisinnomhi. Kiṃ pana tvaṃ mahārāja, imassa
atk-s0513a4:254_3: kārakabhāvaṃ vā akārakabhāvaṃ vā ñatvā evaṃ kāresīti? So kammassa asodhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_4: ācikkhi. Athassa so “mahārāja, raññā nāma nisammakārinā bhavitabbaṃ, alaso gihī kāmabhogī
atk-s0513a4:254_5: na sādhū”tiādīni vatvā dhammaṃ desesi. Rājā maṇḍabyassa niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sūlaṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_6: harathā”ti āṇāpesi. Sūlaṃ harantā harituṃ na sakkhiṃsu. Maṇḍabyo āha – “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:254_7: ahaṃ pubbe katakammadosena evarūpaṃ bhayaṃ sampatto, mama sarīrato sūlaṃ harituṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_8: na sakkā, sace mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ dātukāmo, kakacaṃ āharāpetvā imaṃ sūlaṃ cammasamaṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_9: chindāpehī”ti. Rājā tathā kāresi. Antosarīre sūlo antoyeva ahosi. Tadā kira so sukhumaṃ
atk-s0513a4:254_10: koviḷārasalākaṃ gahetvā makkhikāya vaccamaggaṃ pavesesi, taṃ tassa antosarīreyeva
atk-s0513a4:254_11: ahosi. So tena kāraṇena amaritvā attano āyukkhayeneva mari, tasmā ayampi na mato.
atk-s0513a4:254_12: Rājā tāpase vanditvā khamāpetvā ubhopi uyyāne vasāpento paṭijaggi, tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:254_13: maṇḍabyo āṇimaṇḍabyo nāma jāto. So rājānaṃ upanissāya tattheva vasi, dīpāyano pana
atk-s0513a4:254_14: tassa vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ katvā attano gihisahāyamaṇḍabyassa santikameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:255_0: Taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā eko puriso sahāyassa ārocesi. So sutvāva tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0513a4:255_1: saputtadāro bahū gandhamālatelaphāṇitādīni ādāya taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā dīpāyanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:255_2: vanditvā pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā pānakaṃ pāyetvā āṇimaṇḍabyassa pavattiṃ suṇanto
atk-s0513a4:255_3: nisīdi. Athassa putto yaññadattakumāro nāma caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ geṇḍukena kīḷi, tatra
atk-s0513a4:255_4: cekasmiṃ vammike āsīviso vasati. Kumārassa bhūmiyaṃ pahaṭageṇḍuko gantvā vammikabile
atk-s0513a4:255_5: āsīvisassa matthake pati. So ajānanto bile hatthaṃ pavesesi. Atha naṃ kuddho āsīviso
atk-s0513a4:255_6: hatthe ḍaṃsi. So visavegena mucchito tattheva pati. Athassa mātāpitaro sappena ḍaṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:255_7: ñatvā kumārakaṃ ukkhipitvā tāpasassa santikaṃ ānetvā pādamūle nipajjāpetvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:255_8: pabbajitā nāma osadhaṃ vā parittaṃ vā jānanti, puttakaṃ no ārogaṃ karothā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:255_9: Ahaṃ osadhaṃ na jānāmi, nāhaṃ vejjakammaṃ karissāmīti. “Tena hi bhante, imasmiṃ kumārake
atk-s0513a4:255_10: mettaṃ katvā saccakiriyaṃ karothā”ti vutte tāpaso “sādhu, saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:255_11: vatvā yaññadattassa sīse hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:258: Athāparaṃ yaṃ caritaṃ mamedaṃ, vassāni paññāsa samādhikāni;
atk-s0513a4:259: Akāmakovāpi ahaṃ carāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu;
atk-s0513a4:261_0: Tattha athāparaṃ yaṃ caritanti tasmā sattāhā uttari yaṃ mama brahmacariyaṃ. Akāmakovāpīti
atk-s0513a4:261_1: pabbajjaṃ anicchantoyeva. Etena saccena suvatthi hotūti sace atirekapaṇṇāsavassāni
atk-s0513a4:261_2: anabhirativāsaṃ vasantena mayā kassaci anārocitabhāvo saccaṃ, etena saccena yaññadattakumārassa
atk-s0513a4:262_0: Athassa saha saccakiriyāya yaññadattassa thanappadesato uddhaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ
atk-s0513a4:262_1: pāvisi. Kumāro akkhīni ummīletvā mātāpitaro oloketvā “ammatātā”ti vatvā parivattitvā
atk-s0513a4:262_2: nipajji. Athassa pitaraṃ kaṇhadīpāyano āha – “mayā tāva mama balaṃ kataṃ, tvampi
atk-s0513a4:262_3: attano balaṃ karohī”ti. So “ahampi saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti puttassa ure hatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:264: “Yasmā dānaṃ nābhinandiṃ kadāci, disvānahaṃ atithiṃ vāsakāle;
atk-s0513a4:265: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ aveduṃ, bahussutā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a4:266: Akāmakovāpi ahaṃ dadāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu;
atk-s0513a4:268_0: Tattha vāsakāleti vasanatthāya gehaṃ āgatakāle. Na cāpi me appiyataṃ avedunti bahussutāpi
atk-s0513a4:268_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇā “ayaṃ neva dānaṃ abhinandati na amhe”ti imaṃ mama appiyabhāvaṃ neva
atk-s0513a4:268_2: jāniṃsu. Ahañhi te piyacakkhūhiyeva olokemīti dīpeti. Etena saccenāti sace ahaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:268_3: dadamāno vipākaṃ asaddahitvā attano anicchāya dammi, anicchanabhāvaṃ mama pare na
atk-s0513a4:268_4: jānanti, etena saccena suvatthi hotūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:269_0: Evaṃ tassa saccakiriyāya saha kaṭito uddhaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Kumāro
atk-s0513a4:269_1: uṭṭhāya nisīdi, ṭhātuṃ pana na sakkoti. Athassa pitā mātaraṃ āha “bhadde, mayā attano
atk-s0513a4:269_2: balaṃ kataṃ, tvaṃ idāni saccakiriyaṃ katvā puttassa uṭṭhāya gamanabhāvaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:269_3: “Sāmi, atthi mayhaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ, tava pana santike kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:269_4: yathā tathā me puttaṃ arogaṃ karohī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā saccaṃ karontī tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:271: “Āsīviso tāta pahūtatejo, yo taṃ aḍaṃsī bilarā udicca;
atk-s0513a4:272: Tasmiñca me appiyatāya ajja, pitarañca te natthi koci viseso;
atk-s0513a4:273: Etena saccena suvatthi hotu, hataṃ visaṃ jīvatu yaññadatto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:274_0: Tattha tātāti puttaṃ ālapati. Pahūtatejoti balavaviso. Bilarāti vivarā, ayameva vā
atk-s0513a4:274_1: pāṭho. Udiccāti uṭṭhahitvā, vammikabilato uṭṭhāyāti attho. Pitarañca teti pitari
atk-s0513a4:274_2: ca te. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayameva pāṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “tāta, yaññadatta tasmiñca
atk-s0513a4:274_3: āsīvise tava pitari ca appiyabhāvena mayhaṃ koci viseso natthi. Tañca pana appiyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:274_4: ṭhapetvā ajja mayā koci jānāpitapubbo nāma natthi, sace etaṃ saccaṃ, etena saccena
atk-s0513a4:275_0: Saha ca saccakiriyāya sabbaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Yaññadatto nibbisena
atk-s0513a4:275_1: sarīrena uṭṭhāya kīḷituṃ āraddho. Evaṃ putte uṭṭhite maṇḍabyo dīpāyanassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:278: Dīpāyana kissa jigucchamāno, akāmako carasi brahmacariya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:279_0: Tassattho – ye keci khattiyādayo kāme pahāya idha loke pabbajanti, te aññatra kaṇhā
atk-s0513a4:279_1: bhavantaṃ kaṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe akāmarūpā nāma natthi, sabbe jhānabhāvanāya kilesānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:279_2: samitattā santā, cakkhādīni dvārāni yathā nibbisevanāni honti, tathā tesaṃ damitattā
atk-s0513a4:279_3: dantā hutvā abhiratāva brahmacariyaṃ caranti, tvaṃ pana bhante dīpāyana, kiṃkāraṇā
atk-s0513a4:279_4: tapaṃ jigucchamāno akāmako hutvā brahmacariyaṃ carasi, kasmā puna na agārameva ajjhāvasasīti.
atk-s0513a4:280: Athassa so kāraṇaṃ kathento pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:282: “Saddhāya nikkhamma punaṃ nivatto, so eḷamūgova bālo vatāyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:283: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako carāmi brahmacariyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:284: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ, evampahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:285_0: Tassattho – kaṇho kammañca phalañca saddahitvā tāva mahantaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya agārā
atk-s0513a4:285_1: nikkhamitvā yaṃ jahi, puna tadatthameva nivatto. So ayaṃ eḷamūgo gāmadārako viya
atk-s0513a4:285_2: bālo vatāti imaṃ vādaṃ jigucchamāno ahaṃ attano hirottappabhedabhayena anicchamānopi
atk-s0513a4:285_3: brahmacariyaṃ carāmi. Kiñca bhiyyo pabbajjāpuññañca nāmetaṃ viññūhi buddhādīhi pasatthaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:285_4: tesaṃyeva ca sataṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ imināpi kāraṇena ahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmi, assumukhopi
atk-s0513a4:286: Evaṃ so attano ajjhāsayaṃ kathetvā puna maṇḍabyaṃ pucchanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:288: “Samaṇe tuvaṃ brāhmaṇe addhike ca, santappayāsi annapānena bhikkhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:289: Opānabhūtaṃva gharaṃ tava yidaṃ, annena pānena upetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:290: Atha kissa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako dānamimaṃ dadāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:291: Tattha bhikkhanti bhikkhāya carantānaṃ bhikkhañca sampādetvā dadāsi. Opānabhūtaṃvāti catumahāpathe khatasādhāraṇapokkharaṇī viya.
atk-s0513a4:292: Tato maṇḍabyo attano ajjhāsayaṃ kathento sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:294: “Pitaro ca me āsuṃ pitāmahā ca, saddhā ahuṃ dānapatī vadaññū;
atk-s0513a4:295: Taṃ kullavattaṃ anuvattamāno, māhaṃ kule antimagandhano ahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:296: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako dānamimaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:297_0: Tattha “āsu”nti padassa “saddhā”ti iminā sambandho, saddhā ahesunti attho. Ahunti
atk-s0513a4:297_1: saddhā hutvā tato uttari dānajeṭṭhakā ceva “detha karothā”ti vuttavacanassa atthajānanakā
atk-s0513a4:297_2: ca ahesuṃ. Taṃ kullavattanti taṃ kulavattaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayameva pāṭho. Māhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:297_3: kule antimagandhano ahunti “ahaṃ attano kule sabbapacchimako ceva kulapalāpo ca mā
atk-s0513a4:297_4: ahu”nti sallakkhetvā etaṃ “kulaantimo kulapalāpo”ti vādaṃ jigucchamāno dānaṃ anicchantopi
atk-s0513a4:298: Evañca pana vatvā maṇḍabyo attano bhariyaṃ pucchamāno aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:300: “Dahariṃ kumāriṃ asamatthapaññaṃ, yaṃ tānayiṃ ñātikulā sugatte;
atk-s0513a4:301: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ avedi, aññatra kāmā paricārayantā;
atk-s0513a4:302: Atha kena vaṇṇena mayā te bhoti, saṃvāsadhammo ahu evarūpo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:303_0: Tattha asamatthapaññanti kuṭumbaṃ vicāretuṃ appaṭibalapaññaṃ atitaruṇiññeva samānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:303_1: Yaṃ tānayinti yaṃ taṃ ānayiṃ, ahaṃ daharimeva samānaṃ taṃ ñātikulato ānesinti vuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:303_2: hoti. Aññatra kāmā paricārayantāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ vinā kāmena anicchāya maṃ paricārayantāpi
atk-s0513a4:303_3: attano appiyataṃ maṃ na jānāpesi, sampiyāyamānarūpāva paricari. Kena vaṇṇenāti kena
atk-s0513a4:303_4: kāraṇena. Bhotīti taṃ ālapati. Evarūpoti āsīvisasamānapaṭikūlabhāvena mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:303_5: tava saṃvāsadhammo evarūpo piyasaṃvāso viya kathaṃ jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:306: “Ārā dūre nayidha kadāci atthi, paramparā nāma kule imasmiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:307: Taṃ kullavattaṃ anuvattamānā, māhaṃ kule antimagandhinī ahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:308: Etassa vādassa jigucchamānā, akāmikā paddhacarāmhi tuyha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:309_0: Tattha ārā dūreti aññamaññavevacanaṃ. Atidūreti vā dassentī evamāha. Idhāti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:309_1: na kadācīti attho. Paramparāti purisaparamparā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sāmi, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:309_2: amhākaṃ ñātikule dūrato paṭṭhāya yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā purisaparamparā nāma
atk-s0513a4:309_3: na kadāci atthi, ekitthiyāpi sāmikaṃ chaḍḍetvā añño puriso gahitapubbo nāma natthīti.
atk-s0513a4:309_4: Taṃ kullavattanti ahampi taṃ kulavattaṃ kulapaveṇiṃ anuvattamānā attano kule pacchimikā
atk-s0513a4:309_5: palālabhūtā mā ahunti sallakkhetvā etaṃ kulaantimā kulagandhinīti vādaṃ jigucchamānā
atk-s0513a4:309_6: akāmikāpi tuyhaṃ paddhacarāmhi veyyāvaccakārikā pādaparicārikā jātāmhīti.
atk-s0513a4:310_0: Evañca pana vatvā “mayā sāmikassa santike abhāsitapubbaṃ guyhaṃ bhāsitaṃ, kujjheyyapi
atk-s0513a4:310_1: me ayaṃ, amhākaṃ kulūpakatāpasassa sammukheyeva khamāpessāmī”ti cintetvā khamāpentī dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:312: “Maṇḍabya bhāsiṃ yamabhāsaneyyaṃ, taṃ khamyataṃ puttakahetu majja;
atk-s0513a4:313: Puttapemā na idha paratthi kiñci, so no ayaṃ jīvati yaññadatto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:314_0: Tattha taṃ khamyatanti taṃ khamayatu. Puttakahetu majjāti taṃ mama bhāsitaṃ ajja
atk-s0513a4:314_1: imassa puttassa hetu khamayatu. So no ayanti yassa puttassa kāraṇā mayā etaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:314_2: so no putto jīvati, imassa jīvitalābhabhāvena me khama sāmi, ajjato paṭṭhāya tava
atk-s0513a4:315_0: Atha naṃ maṇḍabyo “uṭṭhehi bhadde, khamāmi te, ito pana paṭṭhāya mā pharusacittā
atk-s0513a4:315_1: ahosi, ahampi te appiyaṃ na karissāmī”ti āha. Bodhisatto maṇḍabyaṃ āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:315_2: tayā dussaṅgharaṃ dhanaṃ saṅgharitvā kammañca phalañca asaddahitvā dānaṃ dadantena
atk-s0513a4:315_3: ayuttaṃ kataṃ, ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ saddahitvā dehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a4:315_4: bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhante, tayā amhākaṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāve ṭhatvā anabhiratena brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:315_5: carantena ayuttaṃ kataṃ, ito paṭṭhāya idāni yathā tayi katakārā mahapphalā honti,
atk-s0513a4:315_6: evaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā suddhacitto abhirato hutvā brahmacariyaṃ carāhī”ti. Te mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:315_7: vanditvā uṭṭhāya agamaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya bhariyā sāmike sasnehā ahosi, maṇḍabyo pasannacitto
atk-s0513a4:315_8: saddhāya dānaṃ adāsi. Bodhisatto anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā jhānābhiññaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:316_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a4:316_1: ukkaṇṭhito bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā maṇḍabyo ānando ahosi, bhariyā
atk-s0513a4:316_2: visākhā, putto rāhulo, āṇimaṇḍabyo sāriputto, kaṇhadīpāyano pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:320_0: Na vāhametaṃ jānāmīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:320_1: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū tena “āvuso devadatta, satthā tava bahūpakāro, tvañhi satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:320_2: nissāya pabbajjaṃ labhi upasampadaṃ labhi, tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhi, jhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:320_3: uppādesi, lābhasakkāropi te dasabalasseva santako”ti bhikkhūhi vutte tiṇasalākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:320_4: ukkhipitvā “ettakampi samaṇena gotamena mayhaṃ kataṃ guṇaṃ na passāmī”ti vutte dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:320_5: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a4:320_6: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto akataññū
atk-s0513a4:320_7: mittadubbhī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:321_0: Atīte rājagahe magadhamahārājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā rājagahaseṭṭhi attano puttassa
atk-s0513a4:321_1: janapadaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ ānesi, sā vañjhā ahosi. Athassā aparabhāge sakkāro parihāyi.
atk-s0513a4:321_2: “Amhākaṃ puttassa gehe vañjhitthiyā vasantiyā kathaṃ kulavaṃso vaḍḍhissatī”ti yathā
atk-s0513a4:321_3: sā suṇāti, evampi kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Sā taṃ sutvā “hotu gabbhiniālayaṃ katvā ete
atk-s0513a4:321_4: vañcessāmī”ti cintetvā attano atthacārikaṃ dhātiṃ āha “amma, gabbhiniyo nāma kiñca
atk-s0513a4:321_5: kiñca karontī”ti gabbhiniparihāraṃ pucchitvā utunikāle paṭicchādetvā ambilādirucikā
atk-s0513a4:321_6: hutvā hatthapādānaṃ uddhumāyanakāle hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo koṭṭāpetvā bahalaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a4:321_7: divase divasepi pilotikāveṭhanena ca udaravaḍḍhanaṃ vaḍḍhesi, thanamukhāni kāḷāni
atk-s0513a4:321_8: kāresi, sarīrakiccaṃ karontīpi aññatra tassā dhātiyā aññesaṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne na karoti.
atk-s0513a4:321_9: Sāmikopissā gabbhaparihāraṃ adāsi. Evaṃ nava māse vasitvā “idāni janapade pitu gharaṃ
atk-s0513a4:321_10: gantvā vijāyissāmī”ti sasure āpucchitvā rathamāruhitvā mahantena parivārena rājagahā
atk-s0513a4:321_11: nikkhamitvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Tassā pana purato eko sattho gacchati. Satthena vasitvā
atk-s0513a4:322_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ satthe ekā duggatitthī rattiyā ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle puttaṃ vijāyitvā
atk-s0513a4:322_1: pātova satthe gacchante “ahaṃ vinā satthena gantuṃ na sakkhissāmi, sakkā kho pana
atk-s0513a4:322_2: jīvantiyā puttaṃ labhitu”nti nigrodhamūlajāle jalābuñceva gabbhamalañca attharitvā
atk-s0513a4:322_3: puttaṃ chaṭṭetvā agamāsi. Dārakassapi devatā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. So hi na yo vā so
atk-s0513a4:322_4: vā, bodhisattoyeva. So pana tadā tādisaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Itarā pātarāsakāle taṃ
atk-s0513a4:322_5: ṭhānaṃ patvā “sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmī”ti tāya dhātiyā saddhiṃ nigrodhamūlaṃ gatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:322_6: dārakaṃ disvā “amma, nipphannaṃ no kicca”nti pilotikāyo apanetvā ucchaṅgapadesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:322_7: lohitena ca gabbhamalena ca makkhetvā attano gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ārocesi. Tāvadeva naṃ
atk-s0513a4:322_8: sāṇiyā parikkhipitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho saparijano rājagahaṃ paṇṇaṃ pesesi. Athassā sassusasurā
atk-s0513a4:322_9: vijātakālato paṭṭhāya “pitu kule kiṃ karissati, idheva āgacchatū”ti pesayiṃsu. Sā
atk-s0513a4:322_10: paṭinivattitvā rājagahameva pāvisi. Tattha taṃ sampaṭicchitvā dārakassa nāmaṃ karontā
atk-s0513a4:322_11: nigrodhamūle jātattā “nigrodhakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ divasaññeva anuseṭṭhisuṇisāpi
atk-s0513a4:322_12: vijāyanatthāya kulagharaṃ gacchantī antarāmagge ekissā rukkhasākhāya heṭṭhā puttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:322_13: vijāyi, tassa “sākhakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ divasaññeva seṭṭhiṃ nissāya vasantassa
atk-s0513a4:322_14: tunnakārassa bhariyāpi pilotikantare puttaṃ vijāyi, tassa “pottiko”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:323_0: Mahāseṭṭhi ubhopi te dārake “nigrodhakumārassa jātadivasaññeva jātā”ti āṇāpetvā teneva
atk-s0513a4:323_1: saddhiṃ saṃvaḍḍhesi. Te ekato vaḍḍhitvā vayappattā takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:323_2: Ubhopi seṭṭhiputtā ācariyassa dve sahassāni adaṃsu. Nigrodhakumāro pottikassa attano
atk-s0513a4:323_3: santike sippaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Te nipphannasippā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā nikkhantā “janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:323_4: carissāmā”ti anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nipajjiṃsu. Tadā bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0513a4:323_5: kālakatassa sattamo divaso, “sve phussarathaṃ yojessāmā”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:323_6: Tesupi sahāyesu rukkhamūle nipajjitvā niddāyantesu pottiko paccūsakāle uṭṭhāya nigrodhakumārassa
atk-s0513a4:323_7: pāde parimajjanto nisīdi. Tasmiṃ rukkhe vutthakukkuṭesu uparikukkuṭo heṭṭhākukkuṭassa
atk-s0513a4:323_8: sarīre vaccaṃ pātesi. Atha naṃ so “kenetaṃ pātita”nti āha. “Samma, mā kujjhi, mayā
atk-s0513a4:323_9: ajānantena pātita”nti āha. “Are, tvaṃ mama sarīraṃ attano vaccaṭṭhānaṃ maññasi, kiṃ
atk-s0513a4:323_10: mama pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti. Atha naṃ itaro “are tvaṃ ‘ajānantena me kata’nti vuttepi
atk-s0513a4:323_11: kujjhasiyeva, kiṃ pana te pamāṇa”nti āha. “Yo maṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ khādati, so pātova
atk-s0513a4:323_12: sahassaṃ labhati, tasmā ahaṃ mānaṃ karomī”ti. Atha naṃ itaro “are ettakamattena tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:323_13: mānaṃ karosi, maṃ pana māretvā yo thūlamaṃsaṃ khādati, so pātova rājā hoti, yo majjhimamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:323_14: khādati, so senāpati, yo aṭṭhinissitaṃ khādati, so bhaṇḍāgāriko hotī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:324_0: Pottiko tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “kiṃ no sahassena, rajjameva vara”nti saṇikaṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:324_1: abhiruhitvā uparisayitakukkuṭaṃ gahetvā māretvā aṅgāre pacitvā thūlamaṃsaṃ nigrodhassa
atk-s0513a4:324_2: adāsi, majjhimamaṃsaṃ sākhassa adāsi, aṭṭhimaṃsaṃ attanā khādi. Khāditvā pana “samma
atk-s0513a4:324_3: nigrodha, tvaṃ ajja rājā bhavissasi, samma sākha, tvaṃ senāpati bhavissasi, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:324_4: pana bhaṇḍāgāriko bhavissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ jānāsī”ti puṭṭho taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:324_5: Te tayopi janā pātarāsavelāya bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā ekassa brāhmaṇassa gehe sappisakkarayuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:324_6: pāyāsaṃ bhuñjitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā uyyānaṃ pavisiṃsu. Nigrodhakumāro silāpaṭṭe
atk-s0513a4:324_7: nipajji, itare dve bahi nipajjiṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni anto
atk-s0513a4:324_8: ṭhapetvā phussarathaṃ vissajjesuṃ. Tattha vitthārakathā mahājanakajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:324_9: Phussaratho uyyānaṃ gantvā nivattitvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Purohito “uyyāne
atk-s0513a4:324_10: puññavatā sattena bhavitabba”nti uyyānaṃ pavisitvā kumāraṃ disvā pādantato sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:324_11: apanetvā pādesu lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā “tiṭṭhatu bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ, sakalajambudīpassa
atk-s0513a4:324_12: adhipatirājā bhavituṃ yutto”ti sabbatālāvacare paggaṇhāpesi. Nigrodhakumāro pabujjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:324_13: mukhato sāṭakaṃ apanetvā mahājanaṃ oloketvā parivattitvā nipanno thokaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0513a4:324_14: silāpaṭṭe pallaṅkena nisīdi. Atha naṃ purohito jaṇṇunā patiṭṭhāya “rajjaṃ te deva
atk-s0513a4:324_15: pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā “‘sādhū”ti vutte tattheva ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisiñci. So
atk-s0513a4:324_16: rajjaṃ patvā sākhassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ datvā mahantena sakkārena nagaraṃ pāvisi, pottikopi
atk-s0513a4:324_17: tehi saddhiññeva agamāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya mahāsatto bārāṇasiyaṃ dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:325_0: So ekadivasaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ saritvā sākhaṃ āha – “samma, na sakkā mātāpitūhi vinā vattituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:325_1: mahantena parivārena gantvā mātāpitaro no ānehī”ti. Sākho “na me tattha gamanakammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:325_2: atthī”ti paṭikkhipi. Tato pottikaṃ āṇāpesi. So “sādhū”ti tattha gantvā nigrodhassa
atk-s0513a4:325_3: mātāpitaro “putto vo rajje patiṭṭhito, etha gacchāmā”ti āha. Te “atthi no tāva vibhavamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:325_4: alaṃ tattha gamanenā”ti paṭikkhipiṃsu. Sākhassapi mātāpitaro avoca, tepi na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:325_5: Attano mātāpitaro avoca, “mayaṃ tāta tunnakārakammena jīvissāma ala”nti paṭikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:325_6: So tesaṃ manaṃ alabhitvā bārāṇasimeva paccāgantvā “senāpatissa ghare maggakilamathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:325_7: vinodetvā pacchā nigrodhasahāyaṃ passissāmī”ti cintetvā tassa nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:325_8: “sahāyo kira te pottiko nāma āgatoti senāpatissa ārocehī”ti dovārikaṃ āha, so tathā
atk-s0513a4:325_9: akāsi. Sākho pana “ayaṃ mayhaṃ rajjaṃ adatvā sahāyanigrodhassa adāsī”ti tasmiṃ veraṃ
atk-s0513a4:325_10: bandhi. So taṃ kathaṃ sutvāva kuddho āgantvā “ko imassa sahāyo ummattako dāsiputto,
atk-s0513a4:325_11: gaṇhatha na”nti vatvā hatthapādajaṇṇukapparehi koṭṭāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gāhāpetvā nīharāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:326_0: So cintesi “sākho mama santikā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā akataññū mittadubbhī, maṃ
atk-s0513a4:326_1: koṭṭāpetvā nīharāpesi, nigrodho pana paṇḍito kataññū sappuriso, tasseva santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:326_2: gamissāmī”ti. So rājadvāraṃ gantvā “deva, pottiko kira nāma te sahāyo dvāre ṭhito”ti
atk-s0513a4:326_3: rañño ārocāpesi. Rājā pakkosāpetvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya paccuggantvā
atk-s0513a4:326_4: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā massukammādīni kārāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitena paribhuttanānaggarasabhojanena
atk-s0513a4:326_5: tena saddhiṃ sukhanisinno mātāpitūnaṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā anāgamanabhāvaṃ suṇi. Sākhopi
atk-s0513a4:326_6: “pottiko maṃ rañño santike paribhindeyya, mayi pana gate kiñci vattuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:326_7: tattheva agamāsi. Pottiko tassa santikeyeva rājānaṃ āmantetvā “deva, ahaṃ maggakilanto
atk-s0513a4:326_8: ‘sākhassa gehaṃ gantvā vissamitvā idhāgamissāmī’ti agamiṃ. Atha maṃ sākho ‘nāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:326_9: taṃ jānāmī’ti vatvā koṭṭāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gāhāpetvā nīharāpesīti saddaheyyāsi tvaṃ eta”nti
atk-s0513a4:328: “Na vāhametaṃ jānāmi, ko vāyaṃ kassa vāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:329: Yathā sākho vadi eva, nigrodha kinti maññasi.
atk-s0513a4:335: Kataṃ anariyaṃ sākhena, sakhinā te janādhipā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:336_0: Tattha kinti maññasīti yathā maṃ sākho acari, kiṃ tvampi evameva maññasi, udāhu aññathā
atk-s0513a4:336_1: maññasi, maṃ sākho evaṃ vadeyyāti saddahasi, taṃ na saddahasīti adhippāyo. Galavinītenāti
atk-s0513a4:337: Taṃ sutvā nigrodho catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:339: “Na vāhametaṃ jānāmi, napi me koci saṃsati;
atk-s0513a4:340: Yaṃ me tvaṃ samma akkhāsi, sākhena kāraṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:344: Tayāmā labbhitā iddhī, ettha me natthi saṃsayo.
atk-s0513a4:347: Evaṃ kataṃ asappurise, nassati na virūhati.
atk-s0513a4:350: Sukhette viya bījāni, kataṃ tamhi na nassatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:351_1: kāraṇaṃ katanti attho. Sakhīnaṃ sājīvakaroti samma, pottika tvaṃ sahāyakānaṃ suājīvakaro
atk-s0513a4:351_2: jīvikāya uppādetā. Mama sākhassa cūbhayanti mayhañca sākhassa ca ubhinnampi sakhīnanti
atk-s0513a4:351_3: attho. Tvaṃ nosissariyanti tvaṃ no asi issariyaṃ dātā, tava santikā imā sampattī
atk-s0513a4:352_0: Evañca pana vatvā ettakaṃ kathente nigrodhe sākho tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ rājā
atk-s0513a4:352_1: “sākha imaṃ pottikaṃ sañjānāsī”ti pucchi. So tuṇhī ahosi. Athassa rājā daṇḍaṃ āṇāpento
atk-s0513a4:355: Hanantu sākhaṃ sattīhi, nāssa icchāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:357: Taṃ sutvā pottiko “mā esa bālo maṃ nissāya nassatū”ti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:360: Khama deva asappurisassa, nāssa icchāmahaṃ vadha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:361: Tattha khamatassāti khamataṃ assa, etassa asappurisassa khamathāti attho. Na paṭiānayāti matassa nāma pāṇā paṭiānetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a4:362_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sākhassa khami, senāpatiṭṭhānampi pottikasseva dātukāmo
atk-s0513a4:362_1: ahosi, so pana na icchi. Athassa sabbasenānīnaṃ vicāraṇārahaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:362_2: nāma adāsi. Pubbe kiretaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ nāhosi, tato paṭṭhāya jātaṃ. Aparabhāge pottiko
atk-s0513a4:362_3: bhaṇḍāgāriko puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhamāno attano puttadhītānaṃ ovādavasena osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:365: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:366_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, devadatto pubbepi akataññūyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:366_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sākho devadatto ahosi, pottiko ānando, nigrodho
atk-s0513a4:370_0: Na takkalā santi na āluvānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ pituposakaṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:370_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira daliddakule paccājāto mātari kālakatāya pātova uṭṭhāya dantakaṭṭhamukhodakadānādīni
atk-s0513a4:370_2: karonto bhatiṃ vā kasiṃ vā katvā laddhavibhavānurūpena yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0513a4:370_3: pitaraṃ posesi. Atha naṃ pitā āha – “tāta, tvaṃ ekakova anto ca bahi ca kattabbaṃ
atk-s0513a4:370_4: karosi, ekaṃ te kuladārikaṃ ānessāmi, sā te gehe kattabbaṃ karissatī”ti. “Tāta, itthiyo
atk-s0513a4:370_5: nāma gharaṃ āgatā neva mayhaṃ, na tumhākaṃ cittasukhaṃ karissanti, mā evarūpaṃ cintayittha,
atk-s0513a4:370_6: ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe posetvā tumhākaṃ accayena jānissāmī”ti. Athassa pitā anicchamānasseva
atk-s0513a4:370_7: ekaṃ kumārikaṃ ānesi. Sā sasurassa ca sāmikassa ca upakārikā ahosi nīcavutti. Sāmikopissā
atk-s0513a4:370_8: “mama pitu upakārikā”ti tussitvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ manāpaṃ āharitvā deti, sāpi taṃ
atk-s0513a4:370_9: sasurasseva upanāmesi. Sā aparabhāge cintesi “mayhaṃ sāmiko laddhaṃ laddhaṃ pitu
atk-s0513a4:370_10: adatvā mayhameva deti, addhā pitari nisneho jāto, imaṃ mahallakaṃ ekenupāyena mama
atk-s0513a4:371_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya udakaṃ atisītaṃ vā accuṇhaṃ vā, āhāraṃ atiloṇaṃ vā aloṇaṃ vā, bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:371_1: uttaṇḍulaṃ vā atikilinnaṃ vāti evamādīni tassa kodhuppattikāraṇāni katvā tasmiṃ kujjhante
atk-s0513a4:371_2: “ko imaṃ mahallakaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti pharusāni vatvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Tattha
atk-s0513a4:371_3: tattha kheḷapiṇḍādīni chaḍḍetvāpi sāmikaṃ ujjhāpesi “passa pitu kammaṃ, ‘idañcidañca
atk-s0513a4:371_4: mā karī’ti vutte kujjhati, imasmiṃ gehe pitaraṃ vā vasāpehi maṃ vā”ti. Atha naṃ so
atk-s0513a4:371_5: “bhadde, tvaṃ daharā yattha katthaci jīvituṃ sakkhissasi, mayhaṃ pitā mahallako,
atk-s0513a4:371_6: tvaṃ tassa asahantī imamhā gehā nikkhamā”ti āha. Sā bhītā “ito paṭṭhāya evaṃ na karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:371_7: sasurassa pādesu patitvā khamāpetvā pakatiniyāmeneva paṭijaggituṃ ārabhi. Atha so
atk-s0513a4:371_8: upāsako purimadivasesu tāya ubbāḷho satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanāya agantvā tassā
atk-s0513a4:371_9: pakatiyā patiṭṭhitakāle agamāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ, upāsaka, sattaṭṭha divasāni
atk-s0513a4:371_10: dhammassavanāya nāgatosī”ti pucchi. So taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathesi. Satthā “idāni tāva tassā
atk-s0513a4:371_11: kathaṃ aggahetvā pitaraṃ na nīharāpesi, pubbe pana etissā kathaṃ gahetvā pitaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:371_12: āmakasusānaṃ netvā āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tattha naṃ pakkhipitvā māraṇakāle ahaṃ sattavassiko
atk-s0513a4:371_13: hutvā mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ kathetvā pitughātakakammā nivāresiṃ, tadā tvaṃ mama kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:371_14: sutvā tava pitaraṃ yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitvā saggaparāyaṇo jāto, svāyaṃ mayā dinno ovādo
atk-s0513a4:371_15: bhavantaragatampi na vijahati, iminā kāraṇena tassā kathaṃ aggahetvā idāni tayā pitā
atk-s0513a4:371_16: na nīhaṭo”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:372_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aññatarasmiṃ kāsigāme ekassa kulassa
atk-s0513a4:372_1: ghare ekaputtako ahosi nāmena saviṭṭhako nāma. So mātāpitaro paṭijagganto aparabhāge
atk-s0513a4:372_2: mātari kālakatāya pitaraṃ posesīti sabbaṃ vatthu paccuppannavatthuniyāmeneva kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:372_3: Ayaṃ panettha viseso. Tadā sā itthī “passa pitu kammaṃ, ‘idañcidañca mā karī’ti vutte
atk-s0513a4:372_4: kujjhatī”ti vatvā “sāmi, pitā te caṇḍo pharuso niccaṃ kalahaṃ karoti, jarājiṇṇo byādhipīḷito
atk-s0513a4:372_5: na cirasseva marissati, ahañca etena saddhiṃ ekagehe vasituṃ na sakkomi, sayampesa
atk-s0513a4:372_6: katipāhena marissatiyeva, tvaṃ etaṃ āmakasusānaṃ netvā āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tattha naṃ
atk-s0513a4:372_7: pakkhipitvā kuddālena sīsaṃ chinditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā upari paṃsunā chādetvā
