atk-s0513a4:1318: Tadā saṃvaramahārājā ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, uposathakumāro sāriputto, sesabhātikā therānutherā, parisā buddhaparisā, ovādadāyako amacco pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:1322_0: Ummujjanti nimujjantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1322_1: Ekadivasañhi sāyanhasamaye tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ nikkhamanaṃ āgamayamānā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a4:1322_2: dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “āvuso, aho satthā mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño
atk-s0513a4:1322_3: tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño tatra tatra upāyapaññāya samannāgato vipulāya pathavīsamāya,
atk-s0513a4:1322_4: mahāsamuddo viya gambhīrāya, ākāso viya vitthiṇṇāya, sakalajambudīpasmiñhi uṭṭhitapañho
atk-s0513a4:1322_5: dasabalaṃ atikkamitvā gantuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Yathā mahāsamudde uṭṭhitaūmiyo
atk-s0513a4:1322_6: velaṃ nātikkamanti, velaṃ patvāva bhijjanti, evaṃ na koci pañho dasabalaṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0513a4:1322_7: satthu pādamūlaṃ patvā bhijjatevā”ti dasabalassa mahāpaññāpāramiṃ vaṇṇesuṃ. Satthā
atk-s0513a4:1322_8: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1322_9: vutte “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva paññavā, pubbepi aparipakke ñāṇe paññavāva,
atk-s0513a4:1322_10: andho hutvāpi mahāsamudde udakasaññāya ‘imasmiṃ imasmiṃ samudde idaṃ nāma idaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a4:1323_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe kururājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi, kurukacchaṃ nāma paṭṭanagāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1323_1: Tadā bodhisatto kurukacche niyāmakajeṭṭhakassa putto hutvā nibbatti pāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
atk-s0513a4:1323_2: “suppārakakumāro”tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhanto soḷasavassakāleyeva
atk-s0513a4:1323_3: niyāmakasippe nipphattiṃ patvā aparabhāge pitu accayena niyāmakajeṭṭhako hutvā niyāmakakammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1323_4: akāsi, paṇḍito ñāṇasampanno ahosi. Tena āruḷhanāvāya byāpatti nāma natthi. Tassa
atk-s0513a4:1323_5: aparabhāge loṇajalapahaṭāni dvepi cakkhūni nassiṃsu. So tato paṭṭhāya niyāmakajeṭṭhako
atk-s0513a4:1323_6: hutvāpi niyāmakakammaṃ akatvā “rājānaṃ nissāya jīvissāmī”ti rājānaṃ upasaṅkami. Atha
atk-s0513a4:1323_7: naṃ rājā agghāpaniyakamme ṭhapesi. So tato paṭṭhāya rañño hatthiratanaassaratanamuttasāramaṇisārādīni agghāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1324_0: Athekadivasaṃ “rañño maṅgalahatthī bhavissatī”ti kāḷapāsāṇakūṭavaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ vāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1324_1: ānesuṃ. Taṃ disvā rājā “paṇḍitassa dassethā”ti āha. Atha naṃ tassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1324_2: So hatthena tassa sarīraṃ parimajjitvā “nāyaṃ maṅgalahatthī bhavituṃ anucchaviko,
atk-s0513a4:1324_3: pādehi vāmanadhātuko esa, etañhi mātā vijāyamānā aṅkena sampaṭicchituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:1324_4: tasmā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā pacchimapādehi vāmanadhātuko hotī”ti āha. Hatthiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:1324_5: āgate pucchiṃsu. Te “saccaṃ paṇḍito kathetī”ti vadiṃsu. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ rājā sutvā tuṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:1325_0: Punekadivasaṃ “rañño maṅgalaasso bhavissatī”ti ekaṃ assaṃ ānayiṃsu. Tampi rājā paṇḍitassa
atk-s0513a4:1325_1: santikaṃ pesesi. So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “ayaṃ maṅgalaasso bhavituṃ na yutto,
atk-s0513a4:1325_2: etassa hi jātadivaseyeva mātā mari, tasmā mātu khīraṃ alabhanto na sammā vaḍḍhito”ti
atk-s0513a4:1325_3: āha. Sāpissa kathā saccāva ahosi. Tampi sutvā rājā tussitvā aṭṭha kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1325_4: Athekadivasaṃ “rañño maṅgalaratho bhavissatī”ti rathaṃ āhariṃsu. Tampi rājā tassa
atk-s0513a4:1325_5: santikaṃ pesesi. So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “ayaṃ ratho susirarukkhena kato, tasmā
atk-s0513a4:1325_6: rañño nānucchaviko”ti āha. Sāpissa kathā saccāva ahosi. Rājā tampi sutvā aṭṭheva
atk-s0513a4:1325_7: kahāpaṇe dāpesi. Athassa mahagghaṃ kambalaratanaṃ āhariṃsu. Tampi tasseva pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:1325_8: So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “imassa mūsikacchinnaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ atthī”ti āha. Sodhentā
atk-s0513a4:1325_9: taṃ disvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā sutvā tussitvā aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1326_0: So cintesi “ayaṃ rājā evarūpānipi acchariyāni disvā aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe dāpesi, imassa
atk-s0513a4:1326_1: dāyo nhāpitadāyo, nhāpitajātiko bhavissati, kiṃ me evarūpena rājupaṭṭhānena, attano
atk-s0513a4:1326_2: vasanaṭṭhānameva gamissāmī”ti. So kurukacchapaṭṭanameva paccāgami. Tasmiṃ tattha
atk-s0513a4:1326_3: vasante vāṇijā nāvaṃ sajjetvā “kaṃ niyāmakaṃ karissāmā”ti mantesuṃ. “Suppārakapaṇḍitena
atk-s0513a4:1326_4: āruḷhanāvā na byāpajjati, esa paṇḍito upāyakusalo, andho samānopi suppārakapaṇḍitova
atk-s0513a4:1326_5: uttamo”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “niyāmako no hohī”ti vatvā “tātā, ahaṃ andho, kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1326_6: niyāmakakammaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte “sāmi, andhāpi tumheyeva amhākaṃ uttamā”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1326_7: yāciyamāno “sādhu tātā, tumhehi ārocitasaññāya niyāmako bhavissāmī”ti tesaṃ nāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1326_8: abhiruhi. Te nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Nāvā satta divasāni nirupaddavā agamāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1326_9: tato akālavātaṃ uppātitaṃ uppajji, nāvā cattāro māse pakatisamuddapiṭṭhe vicaritvā
atk-s0513a4:1326_10: khuramālīsamuddaṃ nāma pattā. Tattha macchā manussasamānasarīrā khuranāsā udake ummujjanimujjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1326_11: karonti. Vāṇijā te disvā mahāsattaṃ tassa samuddassa nāmaṃ pucchantā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:1329: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1330: Evaṃ tehi puṭṭho mahāsatto attano niyāmakasuttena saṃsanditvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1334_0: Tattha payātānanti kurukacchapaṭṭanā nikkhamitvā gacchantānaṃ. Dhanesinanti tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1334_1: vāṇijānaṃ dhanaṃ pariyesantānaṃ. Nāvāya vippanaṭṭhāyāti tāta tumhākaṃ imāya videsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1334_2: pakkhandanāvāya kammakārakaṃ pakatisamuddaṃ atikkamitvā sampatto ayaṃ samuddo “khuramālī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1335_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde vajiraṃ ussannaṃ hoti. Mahāsatto “sacāhaṃ ‘ayaṃ vajirasamuddo’ti
atk-s0513a4:1335_1: evaṃ etesaṃ kathessāmi, lobhena bahuṃ vajiraṃ gaṇhitvā nāvaṃ osīdāpessantī”ti tesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1335_2: anācikkhitvāva nāvaṃ laggāpetvā upāyenekaṃ yottaṃ gahetvā macchagahaṇaniyāmena jālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1335_3: khipāpetvā vajirasāraṃ uddharitvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipitvā aññaṃ appagghabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1335_4: Nāvā taṃ samuddaṃ atikkamitvā purato aggimāliṃ nāma gatā. So pajjalitaaggikkhandho
atk-s0513a4:1335_5: viya majjhanhikasūriyo viya ca obhāsaṃ muñcanto aṭṭhāsi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1338: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. – gāthāya taṃ pucchiṃsu;
atk-s0513a4:1343_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde suvaṇṇaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi. Mahāsatto purimanayeneva tatopi suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1343_1: gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi. Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā khīraṃ viya dadhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1343_2: viya ca obhāsantaṃ dadhimāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1346: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1352_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde rajataṃ ussannaṃ ahosi. So tampi upāyena gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1352_1: Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā nīlakusatiṇaṃ viya sampannasassaṃ viya ca obhāsamānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1352_2: nīlavaṇṇaṃ kusamāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1355: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1361_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde nīlamaṇiratanaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi. So tampi upāyeneva gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1361_1: nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi. Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā naḷavanaṃ viya veḷuvanaṃ viya
atk-s0513a4:1361_2: ca khāyamānaṃ naḷamāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1364: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1370_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde masāragallaṃ veḷuriyaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi. So tampi upāyena gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1370_1: nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi. Aparo nayo – naḷoti vicchikanaḷopi kakkaṭakanaḷopi, so rattavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a4:1370_2: hoti. Veḷūti pana pavāḷassetaṃ nāmaṃ, so ca samuddo pavāḷussanno rattobhāso ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:1370_3: tasmā “yathā naḷova veḷuvā”ti pucchiṃsu. Mahāsatto tato pavāḷaṃ gāhāpesīti.
atk-s0513a4:1371_0: Vāṇijā naḷamāliṃ atikkantā balavāmukhasamuddaṃ nāma passiṃsu. Tattha udakaṃ kaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1371_1: kaḍḍhitvā sabbato bhāgena uggacchati. Tasmiṃ sabbato bhāgena uggate udakaṃ sabbato
atk-s0513a4:1371_2: bhāgena chinnapapātamahāsobbho viya paññāyati, ūmiyā uggatāya ekato papātasadisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1371_3: hoti, bhayajanano saddo uppajjati sotāni bhindanto viya hadayaṃ phālento viya ca.
atk-s0513a4:1375: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1381_0: Bodhisatto anantaragāthāya tassa nāmaṃ ācikkhitvā “tātā, imaṃ balavāmukhasamuddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1381_1: patvā nivattituṃ samatthā nāvā nāma natthi, ayaṃ sampattanāvaṃ nimujjāpetvā vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1381_2: pāpetī”ti āha. Tañca nāvaṃ satta manussasatāni abhiruhiṃsu. Te sabbe maraṇabhayabhītā
atk-s0513a4:1381_3: ekappahāreneva avīcimhi paccamānasattā viya atikāruññaṃ ravaṃ muñciṃsu. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a4:1381_4: “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etesaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi, saccakiriyāya
atk-s0513a4:1381_5: tesaṃ sotthiṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā te āmantetvā āha – “tātā, khippaṃ maṃ gandhodakena
atk-s0513a4:1381_6: nhāpetvā ahatavatthāni nivāsāpetvā puṇṇapātiṃ sajjetvā nāvāya dhure ṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1381_7: Te vegena tathā kariṃsu. Mahāsatto ubhohi hatthehi puṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nāvāya dhure
atk-s0513a4:1386_0: Tattha yatoti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi, yato paṭṭhāya camhi viññutaṃ pattoti
atk-s0513a4:1386_1: attho. Ekapāṇampi hiṃsitanti etthantare sañcicca ekaṃ kunthakipillikapāṇampi hiṃsitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1386_2: nābhijānāmi. Desanāmattamevetaṃ, bodhisatto pana tiṇasalākampi upādāya mayā parasantakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1386_3: na gahitapubbaṃ, lobhavasena paradāraṃ na olokitapubbaṃ, musā na bhāsitapubbā, tiṇaggenāpi
atk-s0513a4:1386_4: majjaṃ na pivitapubbanti evaṃ pañcasīlavasena pana saccakiriyaṃ akāsi, katvā ca pana
atk-s0513a4:1387_0: Cattāro māse videsaṃ pakkhandanāvā nivattitvā iddhimā viya saccānubhāvena ekadivaseneva
atk-s0513a4:1387_1: kurukacchapaṭṭanaṃ agamāsi. Gantvā ca pana thalepi aṭṭhusabhamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ pakkhanditvā
atk-s0513a4:1387_2: nāvikassa gharadvāreyeva aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto tesaṃ vāṇijānaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamuttavajirāni
atk-s0513a4:1387_3: bhājetvā adāsi. “Ettakehi vo ratanehi alaṃ, mā puna samuddaṃ pavisathā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1387_4: datvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā devapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:1388_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbepi tathāgato mahāpaññoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1388_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā parisā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, suppārakapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1391: Mātuposaka juṇho ca, dhamma udaya pānīyo;
atk-s0513a4:1399: Luddhānaṃ lahucittānanti idaṃ jātakaṃ kuṇālajātake āvi bhavissati;
atk-s0513a4:1403_0: Kā tvaṃ suddhehi vatthehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:1403_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyañhi anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesane pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ nibaddhabhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_2: pavattati, tathā visākhāya ca kosalarañño ca. Tattha pana kiñcāpi nānaggarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_3: dīyati, bhikkhūnaṃ panettha koci vissāsiko natthi, tasmā bhikkhū rājanivesane na
atk-s0513a4:1403_4: bhuñjanti, bhattaṃ gahetvā anāthapiṇḍikassa vā visākhāya vā aññesaṃ vā vissāsikānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_5: gharaṃ gantvā bhuñjanti. Rājā ekadivasaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ āhaṭaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ dethā”ti bhattaggaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_6: pesetvā “bhattagge bhikkhū natthī”ti vutte “kahaṃ gatā”ti pucchitvā “attano vissāsikagehesu
atk-s0513a4:1403_7: nisīditvā bhuñjantī”ti sutvā bhuttapātarāso satthu santikaṃ gantvā “bhante, bhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_8: nāma kiṃ parama”nti pucchi. Vissāsaparamaṃ mahārāja, kañjikamattakampi vissāsikena
atk-s0513a4:1403_9: dinnaṃ madhuraṃ hotīti. Bhante, kena pana saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vissāso hotīti? “Ñātīhi
atk-s0513a4:1403_10: vā sekkhakulehi vā, mahārājā”ti. Tato rājā cintesi “ekaṃ sakyadhītaraṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1403_11: karissāmi, evaṃ mayā saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñātake viya vissāso bhavissatī”ti. So uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a4:1403_12: attano nivesanaṃ gantvā kapilavatthuṃ dūtaṃ pesesi “dhītaraṃ me detha, ahaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0513a4:1404_0: Sākiyā dūtavacanaṃ sutvā sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu “mayaṃ kosalarañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:1404_1: vasāma, sace dārikaṃ na dassāma, mahantaṃ veraṃ bhavissati, sace dassāma, kulavaṃso
atk-s0513a4:1404_2: no bhijjissati, kiṃ nu kho kātabba”nti. Atha ne mahānāmo āha – “mā cintayittha, mama
atk-s0513a4:1404_3: dhītā vāsabhakhattiyā nāma nāgamuṇḍāya nāma dāsiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti. Sā soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0513a4:1404_4: uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā pitu vaṃsena khattiyajātikā, tamassa ‘khattiyakaññā’ti
atk-s0513a4:1404_5: pesessāmā”ti. Sākiyā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dūte pakkosāpetvā “sādhu, dārikaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0513a4:1404_6: idāneva naṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti āhaṃsu. Dūtā cintesuṃ “ime sākiyā nāma jātiṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:1404_7: atimānino, ‘sadisī no’ti vatvā asadisimpi dadeyyuṃ, etehi saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjamānameva
atk-s0513a4:1404_8: gaṇhissāmā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “mayaṃ gahetvā gacchantā yā tumhehi saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a4:1404_9: taṃ gahetvā gamissāmā”ti. Sākiyā tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ dāpetvā “kiṃ karissāmā”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1404_10: Mahānāmo āha – “tumhe mā cintayittha, ahaṃ upāyaṃ karissāmi, tumhe mama bhojanakāle
atk-s0513a4:1404_11: vāsabhakhattiyaṃ alaṅkaritvā ānetvā mayā ekasmiṃ kabaḷe gahitamatte ‘deva, asukarājā
atk-s0513a4:1404_12: paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi, imaṃ tāva sāsanaṃ suṇāthā’ti paṇṇaṃ dasseyyāthā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a4:1405_0: Mahānāmo “dhītaraṃ me ānetha, mayā saddhiṃ bhuñjatū”ti āha. Atha naṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0513a4:1405_1: tāvadeva thokaṃ papañcaṃ katvā ānayiṃsu. Sā “pitarā saddhiṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti ekapātiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1405_2: hatthaṃ otāresi. Mahānāmopi tāya saddhiṃ ekapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā mukhe ṭhapesi. Dutiyapiṇḍāya
atk-s0513a4:1405_3: hatthe pasārite “deva, asukaraññā paṇṇaṃ pahitaṃ, imaṃ tāva sāsanaṃ suṇāthā”ti paṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1405_4: upanāmesuṃ. Mahānāmo “amma, tvaṃ bhuñjāhī”ti dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pātiyāyeva katvā vāmahatthena
atk-s0513a4:1405_5: gahetvā paṇṇaṃ olokesi. Tassa taṃ sāsanaṃ upadhārentasseva itarā bhuñji. So tassā
atk-s0513a4:1405_6: bhuttakāle hatthaṃ dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhālesi. Taṃ disvā dūtā “nicchayenesā etassa
atk-s0513a4:1405_7: dhītā”ti niṭṭhamakaṃsu, na taṃ antaraṃ jānituṃ sakkhiṃsu. Mahānāmo mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a4:1405_8: dhītaraṃ pesesi. Dūtāpi naṃ sāvatthiṃ netvā “ayaṃ kumārikā jātisampannā mahānāmassa
atk-s0513a4:1405_9: dhītā”ti vadiṃsu. Rājā tussitvā sakalanagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā taṃ ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:1405_10: aggamahesiṭṭhāne abhisiñcāpesi. Sā rañño piyā ahosi manāpā.
atk-s0513a4:1406_0: Athassā na cirasseva gabbho patiṭṭhahi. Rājā gabbhaparihāramadāsi. Sā dasamāsaccayena
atk-s0513a4:1406_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase rājā attano ayyakassa santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1406_2: pesesi “sakyarājadhītā vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ vijāyi, kimassa nāmaṃ karomā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1406_3: pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā gato amacco thokaṃ badhiradhātuko, so gantvā rañño ayyakassārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:1406_4: So taṃ sutvā “vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ avijāyitvāpi sabbaṃ janaṃ abhibhavati, idāni
atk-s0513a4:1406_5: pana ativiya rañño vallabhā bhavissatī”ti āha. So badhiraamacco “vallabhā”ti vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1406_6: dussutaṃ sutvā “viṭaṭūbho”ti sallakkhetvā rājānaṃ upagantvā “deva, kumārassa kira
atk-s0513a4:1406_7: ‘viṭaṭūbho’ti nāmaṃ karothā”ti āha. Rājā “porāṇakaṃ no kuladattikaṃ nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1406_8: cintetvā “viṭaṭūbho”ti nāmaṃ akāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya kumāro kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhanto
atk-s0513a4:1406_9: sattavassikakāle aññesaṃ kumārānaṃ mātāmahakulato hatthirūpakaassarūpakādīni āhariyamānāni
atk-s0513a4:1406_10: disvā mātaraṃ pucchi “amma, aññesaṃ mātāmahakulato paṇṇākāro āhariyati, mayhaṃ koci
atk-s0513a4:1406_11: kiñci na pesesi, kiṃ tvaṃ nimmātā nippitāsī”ti? Atha naṃ sā “tāta, sakyarājāno mātāmahā
atk-s0513a4:1406_12: dūre pana vasanti, tena te kiñci na pesentī”ti vatvā vañcesi.
atk-s0513a4:1407_0: Puna soḷasavassikakāle “amma, mātāmahakulaṃ passitukāmomhī”ti vatvā “alaṃ tāta, kiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_1: tattha gantvā karissasī”ti vāriyamānopi punappunaṃ yāci. Athassa mātā “tena hi gacchāhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1407_2: sampaṭicchi. So pitu ārocetvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami. Vāsabhakhattiyā puretaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_3: paṇṇaṃ pesesi “ahaṃ idha sukhaṃ vasāmi, sāmino kiñci antaraṃ mā dassayiṃsū”ti. Sākiyā
atk-s0513a4:1407_4: viṭaṭūbhassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “vandituṃ na sakkā”ti tassa daharadahare kumārake janapadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_5: pahiṇiṃsu. Kumāre kapilavatthuṃ sampatte sākiyā santhāgāre sannipatiṃsu. Kumāro santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_6: gantvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ “ayaṃ te, tāta, mātāmaho, ayaṃ mātulo”ti vadiṃsu so sabbe
atk-s0513a4:1407_7: vandamāno vicari. So yāvapiṭṭhiyā rujanappamāṇā vanditvā ekampi attānaṃ vandamānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_8: adisvā “kiṃ nu kho maṃ vandantā natthī”ti pucchi. Sākiyā “tāta, tava kaniṭṭhakumārā
atk-s0513a4:1407_9: janapadaṃ gatā”ti vatvā tassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kariṃsu. So katipāhaṃ vasitvā mahantena
atk-s0513a4:1407_10: parivārena nikkhami. Athekā dāsī santhāgāre tena nisinnaphalakaṃ “idaṃ vāsabhakhattiyāya
atk-s0513a4:1407_11: dāsiyā puttassa nisinnaphalaka”nti akkositvā paribhāsitvā khīrodakena dhovi. Eko
atk-s0513a4:1407_12: puriso attano āvudhaṃ pamussitvā nivatto taṃ gaṇhanto viṭaṭūbhakumārassa akkosanasaddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_13: sutvā taṃ antaraṃ pucchitvā “vāsabhakhattiyā dāsiyā kucchismiṃ mahānāmasakkassa jātā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1407_14: ñatvā gantvā balakāyassa kathesi. “Vāsabhakhattiyā kira dāsiyā dhītā”ti mahākolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1408_0: Kumāro taṃ sutvā “ete tāva mama nisinnaphalakaṃ khīrodakena dhovantu, ahaṃ pana rajje
atk-s0513a4:1408_1: patiṭṭhitakāle etesaṃ galalohitaṃ gahetvā mama nisinnaphalakaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1408_2: paṭṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ sāvatthiṃ gate amaccā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā “sabbe
atk-s0513a4:1408_3: mayhaṃ dāsidhītaraṃ adaṃsū”ti sākiyānaṃ kujjhitvā vāsabhakhattiyāya ca puttassa ca
atk-s0513a4:1408_4: dinnaparihāraṃ acchinditvā dāsadāsīhi laddhabbaparihāramattameva dāpesi. Tato katipāhaccayena
atk-s0513a4:1408_5: satthā rājanivesanaṃ āgantvā nisīdi. Rājā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante, tumhākaṃ kira
atk-s0513a4:1408_6: ñātakehi dāsidhītā mayhaṃ dinnā, tenassā ahaṃ saputtāya parihāraṃ acchinditvā dāsadāsīhi
atk-s0513a4:1408_7: laddhabbaparihāramattameva dāpesi”nti āha. Satthā “ayuttaṃ, mahārāja, sākiyehi kataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1408_8: dadantehi nāma samānajātikā dātabbā assa. Taṃ pana mahārāja, vadāmi vāsabhakhattiyā
atk-s0513a4:1408_9: khattiyarājadhītā khattiyassa rañño gehe abhisekaṃ labhi, viṭaṭūbhopi khattiyarājānameva
atk-s0513a4:1408_10: paṭicca jāto, mātugottaṃ nāma kiṃ karissati, pitugottameva pamāṇanti porāṇakapaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a4:1408_11: dalidditthiyā kaṭṭhahārikāyapi aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ adaṃsu, tassā ca kucchimhi jātakumāro
atk-s0513a4:1408_12: dvādasayojanikāya bārāṇasiyā rajjaṃ katvā kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma jāto”ti kaṭṭhavāhanajātakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1408_13: kathesi. Rājā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā “pitugottameva kira pamāṇa”nti sutvā tussitvā
atk-s0513a4:1409_0: Rañño pana bandhulo nāma senāpati mallikaṃ nāma attano bhariyaṃ vañjhaṃ “tava kulagharameva
atk-s0513a4:1409_1: gacchāhī”ti kusinārameva pesesi. Sā “satthāraṃ disvāva gamissāmī”ti jetavanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:1409_2: tathāgataṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “sāmiko me, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:1409_3: kulagharaṃ pesesī”ti vatvā “kasmā”ti vuttā “vañjhā aputtikā, bhante”ti vatvā satthārā
atk-s0513a4:1409_4: “yadi evaṃ gamanakiccaṃ natthi, nivattāhī”ti vuttā tuṭṭhā satthāraṃ vanditvā nivesanameva
atk-s0513a4:1409_5: puna agamāsi. “Kasmā nivattasī”ti puṭṭhā “dasabalena nivattitāmhī”ti āha. Senāpati
atk-s0513a4:1409_6: “diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati tathāgatena kāraṇa”nti āha. Sā na cirasseva gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1409_7: uppannadohaḷā “dohaḷo me uppanno”ti ārocesi. “Kiṃ dohaḷo”ti? “Vesāliyā nagare licchavirājānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1409_8: abhisekamaṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā nhatvā pānīyaṃ pivitukāmāmhi, sāmī”ti. Senāpati
atk-s0513a4:1409_9: “sādhū”ti vatvā sahassathāmadhanuṃ gahetvā taṃ rathaṃ āropetvā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1410_0: Tasmiñca kāle kosalarañño bandhulasenāpatinā saddhiṃ ekācariyakule uggahitasippo
atk-s0513a4:1410_1: mahāli nāma licchavī andho licchavīnaṃ atthañca dhammañca anusāsanto dvārasamīpe
atk-s0513a4:1410_2: vasati. So rathassa ummāre paṭighaṭṭanasaddaṃ sutvā “bandhulamallassa rathapatanasaddo
atk-s0513a4:1410_3: eso, ajja licchavīnaṃ bhayaṃ uppajjissatī”ti āha. Pokkharaṇiyā anto ca bahi ca ārakkhā
atk-s0513a4:1410_4: balavā, upari lohajālaṃ patthaṭaṃ, sakuṇānampi okāso natthi. Senāpati pana rathā
atk-s0513a4:1410_5: otaritvā ārakkhake khaggena paharanto palāpetvā lohajālaṃ chinditvā antopokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1410_6: bhariyaṃ otāretvā nhāpetvā pāyetvā sayampi nhatvā mallikaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā nagarā
atk-s0513a4:1410_7: nikkhamitvā āgatamaggeneva pāyāsi. Ārakkhakā gantvā licchavīnaṃ ārocesuṃ. Licchavirājāno
atk-s0513a4:1410_8: kujjhitvā pañca rathasatāni āruyha “bandhulamallaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti nikkhamiṃsu. Taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1410_9: pavattiṃ mahālissa ārocesuṃ. Mahāli “mā gamittha, so hi vo sabbe ghātayissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1410_10: āha. Tepi “mayaṃ gamissāmayevā”ti vadiṃsu. Tena hi cakkassa yāva nābhito pathaviṃ
atk-s0513a4:1410_11: paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ disvā nivatteyyātha, tato anivattantā purato asanisaddaṃ viya suṇissatha,
atk-s0513a4:1410_12: tamhā ṭhānā nivatteyyātha, tato anivattantā tumhākaṃ rathadhuresu chiddaṃ passissatha,
atk-s0513a4:1410_13: tamhā ṭhānā nivatteyyātha, purato māgamitthāti. Te tassa vacanena anivattitvā taṃ anubandhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0513a4:1411_0: Mallikā disvā “rathā, sāmi, paññāyantī”ti āha. Tena hi ekassa rathassa viya paññāyanakāle
atk-s0513a4:1411_1: mama āroceyyāsīti. Sā yadā sabbe eko viya hutvā paññāyiṃsu, tadā “ekameva sāmi rathasīsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1411_2: paññāyatī”ti āha. Bandhulo “tena hi imā rasmiyo gaṇhāhī”ti tassā rasmiyo datvā rathe
atk-s0513a4:1411_3: ṭhitova dhanuṃ āropeti, rathacakkaṃ yāva nābhito pathaviṃ pāvisi, licchavino taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1411_4: ṭhānaṃ disvāpi na nivattiṃsu. Itaro thokaṃ gantvā jiyaṃ pothesi, asanisaddo viya
atk-s0513a4:1411_5: ahosi. Te tatopi na nivattiṃsu, anubandhantā gacchanteva. Bandhulo rathe ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a4:1411_6: ekaṃ saraṃ khipi. So pañcannaṃ rathasatānaṃ rathasīsaṃ chiddaṃ katvā pañca rājasatāni
atk-s0513a4:1411_7: parikarabandhanaṭṭhāne vijjhitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Te attano viddhabhāvaṃ ajānitvā
atk-s0513a4:1411_8: “tiṭṭha re, tiṭṭha re”ti vadantā anubandhiṃsuyeva. Bandhulo rathaṃ ṭhapetvā “tumhe
atk-s0513a4:1411_9: matakā, matakehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ yuddhaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha. Te “matakā nāma amhādisā
atk-s0513a4:1411_10: neva hontī”ti vadiṃsu. “Tena hi sabbapacchimassa parikaraṃ mocethā”ti. Te mocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1411_11: So muttamatteyeva maritvā patito. Atha ne “sabbepi tumhe evarūpā, attano gharāni
atk-s0513a4:1411_12: gantvā saṃvidhātabbaṃ saṃvidahitvā puttadāre anusāsitvā sannāhaṃ mocethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1411_13: Te tathā katvā sabbe jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a4:1412_0: Bandhulopi mallikaṃ sāvatthiṃ ānesi. Sā soḷasakkhattuṃ yamake putte vijāyi, sabbepi
atk-s0513a4:1412_1: sūrā thāmasampannā ahesuṃ, sabbasippe nipphattiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Ekekassapi purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0513a4:1412_2: ahosi. Pitarā saddhiṃ rājanivesanaṃ gacchantehi teheva rājaṅgaṇaṃ paripūri. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1412_3: vinicchaye kūṭaḍḍaparājitā manussā bandhulaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā mahāravaṃ viravantā
atk-s0513a4:1412_4: vinicchayaamaccānaṃ kūṭaḍḍakāraṇaṃ tassa ārocesuṃ. Sopi vinicchayaṃ gantvā taṃ aḍḍaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1412_5: tīretvā sāmikameva sāmikaṃ, assāmikameva assāmikaṃ akāsi. Mahājano mahāsaddena sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1412_6: pavattesi. Rājā “kimida”nti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā tussitvā sabbepi te amacce
atk-s0513a4:1412_7: hāretvā bandhulasseva vinicchayaṃ niyyādesi. So tato paṭṭhāya sammā vinicchini. Tato
atk-s0513a4:1412_8: porāṇakavinicchayikā lañjaṃ alabhantā appalābhā hutvā “bandhulo rajjaṃ patthetī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1412_9: rājakule paribhindiṃsu. Rājā taṃ kathaṃ gahetvā cittaṃ niggahetuṃ nāsakkhi, “imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1412_10: idheva ghātiyamāne garahā me uppajjissatī”ti puna cintetvā “payuttapurisehi paccantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1412_11: paharāpetvā te palāpetvā nivattakāle antarāmagge puttehi saddhiṃ māretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1412_12: bandhulaṃ pakkosāpetvā “paccanto kira kupito, tava puttehi saddhiṃ gantvā core gaṇhāhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1412_13: pahiṇitvā “etthevassa dvattiṃsāya puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā āharathā”ti tehi
atk-s0513a4:1412_14: saddhiṃ aññepi samatthe mahāyodhe pesesi. Tasmiṃ paccantaṃ gacchanteyeva “senāpati
atk-s0513a4:1412_15: kira āgacchatī”ti sutvāva payuttakacorā palāyiṃsu. So taṃ padesaṃ āvāsāpetvā janapadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1413_0: Athassa nagarato avidūre ṭhāne te yodhā puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chindiṃsu. Taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1413_1: mallikāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ dve aggasāvakā nimantitā honti. Athassā pubbaṇhasamaye
atk-s0513a4:1413_2: “sāmikassa te saddhiṃ puttehi sīsaṃ chindiṃsū”ti paṇṇaṃ āharitvā adaṃsu. Sā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1413_3: ñatvā kassaci kiñci avatvā paṇṇaṃ ucchaṅge katvā bhikkhusaṅghameva parivisi. Athassā
atk-s0513a4:1413_4: paricārikā bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sappicāṭiṃ āharantiyo therānaṃ purato cāṭiṃ bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1413_5: Dhammasenāpati “upāsike, bhedanadhammaṃ bhinnaṃ, na cintetabba”nti āha. Sā ucchaṅgato
atk-s0513a4:1413_6: paṇṇaṃ nīharitvā “dvattiṃsaputtehi saddhiṃ pitu sīsaṃ chinnanti me imaṃ paṇṇaṃ āhariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1413_7: ahaṃ idaṃ sutvāpi na cintemi, sappicāṭiyā bhinnāya kiṃ cintemi, bhante”ti āha. Dhammasenāpati
atk-s0513a4:1413_8: “animittamanaññāta”ntiādīni vatvā dhammaṃ desetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Sāpi
atk-s0513a4:1413_9: dvattiṃsa suṇisāyo pakkosāpetvā “tumhākaṃ sāmikā attano purimakammaphalaṃ labhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1413_10: tumhe mā socittha mā paridevittha, rañño upari manopadosaṃ mā karitthā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_0: Rañño carapurisā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tesaṃ niddosabhāvaṃ rañño kathayiṃsu. Rājā saṃvegappatto
atk-s0513a4:1414_1: tassā nivesanaṃ gantvā mallikañca suṇisāyo cassā khamāpetvā mallikāya varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_2: Sā “gahito me hotū”ti vatvā tasmiṃ gate matakabhattaṃ datvā nhatvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1414_3: vanditvā “deva, tumhehi me varo dinno, mayhañca aññena attho natthi, dvattiṃsāya
atk-s0513a4:1414_4: me suṇisānaṃ mama ca kulagharagamanaṃ anujānāthā”ti āha. Rājā sampaṭicchi. Sā dvattiṃsāya
atk-s0513a4:1414_5: suṇisānaṃ sakakulaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ kusināranagare attano kulagharaṃ agamāsi. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1414_6: bandhulasenāpatino bhāgineyyassa dīghakārāyanassa nāma senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. So
atk-s0513a4:1414_7: pana “mātulo me iminā mārito”ti rañño otāraṃ gavesanto vicarati. Rājāpi nipparādhassa
atk-s0513a4:1414_8: bandhulassa māritakālato paṭṭhāya vippaṭisārī cittassādaṃ na labhati, rajjasukhaṃ nānubhoti.
atk-s0513a4:1415_0: Tadā satthā sākiyānaṃ veḷuṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya viharati. Rājā tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a4:1415_1: ārāmato avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā “mahantena parivārena satthāraṃ vandissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1415_2: vihāraṃ gantvā pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni dīghakārāyanassa datvā ekakova gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1415_3: pāvisi. Sabbaṃ dhammacetiyasuttaniyāmeneva veditabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0513a4:1415_4: dīghakārāyano tāni pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni gahetvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ rājānaṃ katvā rañño
atk-s0513a4:1415_5: ekaṃ assaṃ ekañca upaṭṭhānakārikaṃ mātugāmaṃ nivattetvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Rājā satthārā
atk-s0513a4:1415_6: saddhiṃ piyakathaṃ kathetvā nikkhanto senaṃ adisvā taṃ mātugāmaṃ pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1415_7: sutvā “ahaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ ajātasattuṃ ādāya āgantvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ gahessāmī”ti rājagahanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1415_8: gacchanto vikāle dvāresu pihitesu nagaraṃ pavisitumasakkonto ekissāya sālāya nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a4:1415_9: vātātapena kilanto rattibhāge tattheva kālamakāsi. Vibhātāya rattiyā “deva kosalanarinda,
atk-s0513a4:1415_10: idāni anāthosi jāto”ti vilapantiyā tassā itthiyā saddaṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ. So
atk-s0513a4:1416_0: Viṭaṭūbhopi rajjaṃ labhitvā taṃ veraṃ saritvā “sabbepi sākiye māressāmī”ti mahatiyā
atk-s0513a4:1416_1: senāya nikkhami. Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento ñātisaṅghassa vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1416_2: disvā “ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0513a4:1416_3: gandhakuṭiyaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā sāyanhasamaye ākāsena gantvā kapilavatthusāmante
atk-s0513a4:1416_4: ekasmiṃ kabaracchāye rukkhamūle nisīdi. Tato avidūre viṭaṭūbhassa rajjasīmāya anto
atk-s0513a4:1416_5: sandacchāyo nigrodharukkho atthi, viṭaṭūbho satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:1416_6: “bhante, kiṃkāraṇā evarūpāya uṇhavelāya imasmiṃ kabaracchāye rukkhamūle nisīdatha,
atk-s0513a4:1416_7: etasmiṃ sandacchāye nigrodharukkhamūle nisīdatha, bhante”ti vatvā “hotu, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1416_8: ñātakānaṃ chāyā nāma sītalā”ti vutte “ñātakānaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya satthā āgato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1416_9: cintetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sāvatthimeva paccāgami. Satthāpi uppatitvā jetavanameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:1417_0: Rājā sākiyānaṃ dosaṃ saritvā dutiyaṃ nikkhamitvā tatheva satthāraṃ passitvā puna
atk-s0513a4:1417_1: nivattitvā tatiyavāre nikkhamitvā tattheva satthāraṃ passitvā nivatti. Catutthavāre
atk-s0513a4:1417_2: pana tasmiṃ nikkhante satthā sākiyānaṃ pubbakammaṃ oloketvā tesaṃ nadiyaṃ visapakkhipanapāpakammassa
atk-s0513a4:1417_3: appaṭibāhirabhāvaṃ ñatvā catutthavāre na agamāsi. Viṭaṭūbharājā khīrapāyake dārake
atk-s0513a4:1417_4: ādiṃ katvā sabbe sākiye ghātetvā galalohitena nisinnaphalakaṃ dhovitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0513a4:1417_5: Satthari tatiyavāre gamanato paccāgantvā punadivase piṇḍāya caritvā niṭṭhāpitabhattakicce
atk-s0513a4:1417_6: gandhakuṭiyaṃ pavisante disāhi sannipatitā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:1417_7: satthā attānaṃ dassetvā rājānaṃ nivattāpetvā ñātake maraṇabhayā mocesi, evaṃ ñātakānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1417_8: atthacaro satthā”ti bhagavato guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a4:1417_9: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:1417_10: idāneva tathāgato ñātakānaṃ atthaṃ carati, pubbepi cariyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1418_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1418_1: kārento ekadivasaṃ cintesi “jambudīpatale rājāno bahuthambhesu pāsādesu vasanti,
atk-s0513a4:1418_2: tasmā bahūhi thambhehi pāsādakaraṇaṃ nāma anacchariyaṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekathambhakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1418_3: pāsādaṃ kāreyyaṃ, evaṃ sabbarājūnaṃ aggarājā bhavissāmī”ti. So vaḍḍhakī pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1418_4: “mayhaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ ekathambhakaṃ pāsādaṃ karothā”ti āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a4:1418_5: araññaṃ pavisitvā ujū mahante ekathambhakapāsādārahe bahū rukkhe disvā “ime rukkhā
atk-s0513a4:1418_6: santi, maggo pana visamo, na sakkā otāretuṃ, rañño ācikkhissāmā”ti cintetvā tathā
atk-s0513a4:1418_7: akaṃsu. Rājā “kenaci upāyena saṇikaṃ otārethā”ti vatvā “deva, yena kenaci upāyena
atk-s0513a4:1418_8: na sakkā”ti vutte “tena hi mama uyyāne ekaṃ rukkhaṃ upadhārethā”ti āha. Vaḍḍhakī
atk-s0513a4:1418_9: uyyānaṃ gantvā ekaṃ sujātaṃ ujukaṃ gāmanigamapūjitaṃ rājakulatopi laddhabalikammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1418_10: maṅgalasālarukkhaṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā “uyyāne rukkho
atk-s0513a4:1418_11: nāma mama paṭibaddho, gacchatha bho taṃ chindathā”ti āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a4:1418_12: gandhamālādihatthā uyyānaṃ gantvā rukkhe gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā suttena parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:1418_13: pupphakaṇṇikaṃ bandhitvā dīpaṃ jāletvā balikammaṃ katvā “ito sattame divase āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:1418_14: rukkhaṃ chindissāma, rājā chindāpeti, imasmiṃ rukkhe nibbattadevatā aññattha gacchatu,
atk-s0513a4:1419_0: Atha tasmiṃ nibbatto devaputto taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ ime vaḍḍhakī imaṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_1: chindissanti, vimānaṃ me nassissati, vimānapariyantikameva kho pana mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1419_2: imañca rakkhaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu taruṇasālarukkhesu nibbattānaṃ mama ñātidevatānampi
atk-s0513a4:1419_3: bahūni vimānāni nassissanti. Vimānapariyantikameva mama ñātīnaṃ devatānampi jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1419_4: na kho pana maṃ tathā attano vināso bādhati, yathā ñātīnaṃ, tasmā nesaṃ mayā jīvitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_5: dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā aḍḍharattasamaye dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito rañño sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_6: pavisitvā sakalagabbhaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā ussisakapasse rodamāno aṭṭhāsi. Rājā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_7: disvā bhītatasito tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1421: “Kā tvaṃ suddhehi vatthehi, aghe vehāyasaṃ ṭhitā;
atk-s0513a4:1422: Kena tyāssūni vattanti, kuto taṃ bhayamāgata”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1423_0: Tattha kā tvanti nāgayakkhasupaṇṇasakkādīsu kā nāma tvanti pucchati. Vatthehīti vacanamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1423_1: sabbepi pana dibbālaṅkāre sandhāyevamāha. Agheti appaṭighe ākāse. Vehāyasanti tasseva
atk-s0513a4:1423_2: vevacanaṃ. Kena tyāssūni vattantīti kena kāraṇena tava assūni vattanti. Kutoti ñātiviyogadhanavināsādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1430: Vividhe cāpi pāsāde, na maṃ te accamaññisuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1431: Yatheva maṃ te pūjesuṃ, tatheva tvampi pūjayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1432_0: Tattha tiṭṭhatoti sakalabārāṇasinagarehi ceva gāmanigamehi ca tayā ca pūjitassa niccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1432_1: balikammañca sakkārañca labhantassa mayhaṃ imasmiṃ uyyāne tiṭṭhantassa ettako kālo
atk-s0513a4:1432_2: gatoti dasseti. Nagarānīti nagarapaṭisaṅkharaṇakammāni. Agārecāti bhūmigehāni. Disampatīti
atk-s0513a4:1432_3: disānaṃ pati, mahārāja. Na maṃ teti te nagarapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni karontā imasmiṃ nagare
atk-s0513a4:1432_4: porāṇakarājāno maṃ nātimaññisuṃ nātikkamiṃsu na viheṭhayiṃsu, mama nivāsarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1432_5: chinditvā attano kammaṃ na kariṃsu, mayhaṃ pana sakkārameva kariṃsūti avaca. Yathevāti
atk-s0513a4:1432_6: tasmā yatheva te porāṇakarājāno maṃ pūjayiṃsu, ekopi imaṃ rukkhaṃ na chindāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:1432_7: tvañcāpi maṃ tatheva pūjaya, mā me rukkhaṃ chedayīti.
atk-s0513a4:1435: “Taṃ ivāhaṃ na passāmi, thūlaṃ kāyena te dumaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1439: Tattha taṃ upanessāmi, ciraṃ te yakkha jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1440_0: Tattha kāyenāti pamāṇena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tava pamāṇena taṃ viya thūlaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1440_1: aññaṃ dumaṃ na passāmi, tvaññeva pana ārohapariṇāhena sujātasaṅkhātāya samasaṇṭhānaujubhāvappakārāya
atk-s0513a4:1440_2: jātiyā ca abhirūpo sobhaggappatto ekathambhapāsādārahoti. Pāsādanti tasmā taṃ chedāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1440_3: ahaṃ pāsādaṃ kārāpessāmeva. Tattha tanti taṃ panāhaṃ samma devarāja, tattha pāsāde
atk-s0513a4:1440_4: upanessāmi, so tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ ekato vasanto aggagandhamālādīni labhanto sakkārappatto
atk-s0513a4:1440_5: sukhaṃ jīvissasi, nivāsaṭṭhānābhāvena me vināso bhavissatīti mā cintayi, ciraṃ te
atk-s0513a4:1441: Taṃ sutvā devarājā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1446: “Agge ca chetvā majjhe ca, pacchā mūlamhi chindatha;
atk-s0513a4:1447: Evaṃ me chijjamānassa, na dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1448_0: Tattha evaṃ cittaṃ udapādīti yadi evaṃ cittaṃ tava uppannaṃ. Sarīrena vinābhāvoti
atk-s0513a4:1448_1: yadi te mama sarīrena bhaddasālarukkhena saddhiṃ mama vinābhāvo patthito. Puthusoti
atk-s0513a4:1448_2: bahudhā. Vikantitvāti chinditvā. Khaṇḍasoti khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā avakantatha. Agge
atk-s0513a4:1448_3: cāti avakantantā pana paṭhamaṃ agge, tato majjhe chetvā sabbapacchā mūle chindatha.
atk-s0513a4:1448_4: Evañhi me chijjamānassa na dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā, sukhaṃ nu khaṇḍaso bhaveyyāti yācati.
atk-s0513a4:1452: Tato pacchā siro chinde, taṃ dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā.
atk-s0513a4:1456_0: Tattha hatthapādanti hatthe ca pāde ca. Taṃ dukkhanti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā chijjantassa
atk-s0513a4:1456_1: corassa taṃ maraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ siyā. Sukhaṃ nūti samma bhaddasāla, vajjhappattā corā
atk-s0513a4:1456_2: sukhena maritukāmā sīsacchedaṃ yācanti, na khaṇḍaso chedanaṃ, tvaṃ pana evaṃ yācasi,
atk-s0513a4:1456_3: tena taṃ pucchāmi “sukhaṃ nu khaṇḍaso chinna”nti. Kiṃhetūti khaṇḍaso chinnaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a4:1456_4: na sukhaṃ, kāraṇena panettha bhavitabbanti taṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:1457: Athassa ācikkhanto bhaddasālo dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1464_0: Tattha hetuṃ dhammūpasaṃhitanti mahārāja, yaṃ hetusabhāvayuttameva, na hetupatirūpakaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1464_1: hetuṃ upādāya ārabbha sandhāyāhaṃ khaṇḍaso chinnamicchāmi, taṃ ohitasoto suṇohīti
atk-s0513a4:1464_2: attho. Ñātī meti mama bhaddasālarukkhassa chāyāya sukhasaṃvaddhā mama passe taruṇasālarukkhesu
atk-s0513a4:1464_3: nibbattā mayā katavātaparittāṇattā nivātajā mama ñātakā devasaṅghā atthi, te ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1464_4: visālasākhaviṭapo mūle chinditvā patanto upahiṃseyyaṃ, saṃbhaggavimāne karonto vināseyyanti
atk-s0513a4:1464_5: attho. Paresaṃ asukhocitanti evaṃ sante mayā tesaṃ paresaṃ ñātidevasaṅghānaṃ asukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1464_6: dukkhaṃ ocitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, na cāhaṃ tesaṃ dukkhakāmo, tasmā bhaddasālaṃ khaṇḍaso khaṇḍaso
atk-s0513a4:1465: Taṃ sutvā rājā “dhammiko vatāyaṃ, devaputto, attano vimānavināsatopi ñātīnaṃ vimānavināsaṃ na icchati, ñātīnaṃ atthacariyaṃ carati, abhayamassa dassāmī”ti tussitvā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1468: Hitakāmosi ñātīnaṃ, abhayaṃ samma dammi te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1469_0: Tattha ceteyyarūpaṃ cetesīti ñātīsu muducittatāya cintento cintetabbayuttakameva
atk-s0513a4:1469_1: cintesi. Chedeyyarūpaṃ chedesītipi pāṭho. Tassattho – khaṇḍaso chinnamicchanto chedetabbayuttakameva
atk-s0513a4:1469_2: chedesīti. Abhayanti etasmiṃ te samma, guṇe pasīditvā abhayaṃ dadāmi, na me pāsādenattho,
atk-s0513a4:1469_3: nāhaṃ taṃ chedāpessāmi, gaccha ñātisaṅghaparivuto sakkatagarukato sukhaṃ jīvāti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1470: Devarājā rañño dhammaṃ desetvā agamāsi. Rājā tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:1471_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbepi tathāgato ñātatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1471_1: acariyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, taruṇasālesu nibbattadevatā
atk-s0513a4:1475_0: Kasanti vapanti te janāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattassa pañca kulasatāni
atk-s0513a4:1475_1: gahetvā niraye patitabhāvaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So hi aggasāvakesu parisaṃ gahetvā pakkantesu
atk-s0513a4:1475_2: sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uṇhalohite mukhato nikkhante balavavedanāpīḷito tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:1475_3: guṇaṃ anussaritvā “ahameva nava māse tathāgatassa anatthaṃ cintesiṃ, satthu pana
atk-s0513a4:1475_4: mayi pāpacittaṃ nāma natthi, asītimahātherānampi mayi āghāto nāma natthi, mayā katakammena
atk-s0513a4:1475_5: ahameva idāni anātho jāto, satthārāpimhi vissaṭṭho mahātherehipi ñātiseṭṭhena rāhulattherenapi
atk-s0513a4:1475_6: sakyarājakulehipi, gantvā satthāraṃ khamāpessāmī”ti parisāya saññaṃ datvā attānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1475_7: pañcakena gāhāpetvā rattiṃ rattiṃ gacchanto kosalaraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇi. Ānandatthero
atk-s0513a4:1475_8: satthu ārocesi “devadatto kira, bhante, tumhākaṃ khamāpetuṃ āgacchatī”ti. “Ānanda,
atk-s0513a4:1476_0: Atha tasmiṃ sāvatthinagaradvāraṃ sampatte puna thero ārocesi, bhagavāpi tatheva avaca.
atk-s0513a4:1476_1: Tassa jetavane pokkharaṇiyā samīpaṃ āgatassa pāpaṃ matthakaṃ pāpuṇi, sarīre ḍāho
atk-s0513a4:1476_2: uppajji, nhatvā pānīyaṃ pivitukāmo hutvā “mañcakato maṃ āvuso otāretha, pānīyaṃ pivissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1476_3: āha. Tassa otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitamattassa cittassāde aladdheyeva mahāpathavī vivaramadāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1476_4: Tāvadeva taṃ avīcito aggijālā uṭṭhāya parikkhipitvā gaṇhi. So “pāpakammaṃ me matthakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1478: Samantacakkhuṃ satapuññalakkhaṇaṃ, pāṇehi buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upemī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1479_0: Imāya gāthāya saraṇe patiṭṭhahanto avīciparāyaṇo ahosi. Tassa pana pañca upaṭṭhākakulasatāni
atk-s0513a4:1479_1: ahesuṃ. Tānipi tappakkhikāni hutvā dasabalaṃ akkositvā avīcimhiyeva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1479_2: Evaṃ so tāni pañca kulasatāni gaṇhitvā avīcimhi patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:1480_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, devadatto pāpo
atk-s0513a4:1480_1: lābhasakkāragiddhatāya sammāsambuddhe aṭṭhāne kopaṃ bandhitvā anāgatabhayamanoloketvā
atk-s0513a4:1480_2: pañcahi kulasatehi saddhiṃ avīciparāyaṇo jāto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:1480_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na bhikkhave, idāneva
atk-s0513a4:1480_4: devadatto lābhasakkāragiddho hutvā anāgatabhayaṃ na olokesi, pubbepi anāgatabhayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1480_5: anoloketvā paccuppannasukhagiddhena saddhiṃ parisāya mahāvināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1481_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasito avidūre kulasahassanivāso
atk-s0513a4:1481_1: mahāvaḍḍhakīgāmo ahosi. Tattha vaḍḍhakī “tumhākaṃ mañcaṃ karissāma, pīṭhaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0513a4:1481_2: gehaṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā manussānaṃ hatthato bahuṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā kiñci kātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1481_3: Manussā diṭṭhadiṭṭhe vaḍḍhakī codenti palibuddhanti. Te iṇāyikehi upaddutā sukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1481_4: vasituṃ asakkontā “videsaṃ gantvā yattha katthaci vasissāmā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:1481_5: rukkhe chinditvā mahatiṃ nāvaṃ bandhitvā nadiṃ otāretvā āharitvā gāmato gāvutaḍḍhayojanamatte
atk-s0513a4:1481_6: ṭhāne ṭhapetvā aḍḍharattasamaye gāmaṃ āgantvā puttadāramādāya nāvaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:1481_7: nāvaṃ āruyha anukkamena mahāsamuddaṃ pavisitvā vātavegena vicarantā samuddamajjhe
atk-s0513a4:1481_8: ekaṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tasmiṃ pana dīpake sayaṃjātasāliucchukadaliambajambupanasatālanāḷikerādīni
atk-s0513a4:1481_9: vividhaphalāni atthi, aññataro pabhinnanāvo puriso paṭhamataraṃ taṃ dīpakaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a4:1481_10: sālibhattaṃ bhuñjamāno ucchuādīni khādamāno thūlasarīro naggo parūḷhakesamassu tasmiṃ dīpake paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a4:1482_0: Vaḍḍhakī cintayiṃsu “sace ayaṃ dīpako rakkhasapariggahito bhavissati, sabbepi amhe
atk-s0513a4:1482_1: vināsaṃ pāpuṇissāma, pariggaṇhissāma tāva na”nti. Atha sattaṭṭha purisā sūrā balavanto
atk-s0513a4:1482_2: sannaddhapañcāvudhā hutvā otaritvā dīpakaṃ pariggaṇhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so puriso
atk-s0513a4:1482_3: bhuttapātarāso ucchurasaṃ pivitvā sukhappatto ramaṇīye padese rajatapaṭṭasadise vālukatale
atk-s0513a4:1482_4: sītacchāyāya uttānako nipajjitvā “jambudīpavāsino kasantā vapantā evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1482_5: na labhanti, jambudīpato mayhaṃ ayameva dīpako vara”nti gāyamāno udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0513a4:1482_6: Atha satthā bhikkhū āmantetvā “so bhikkhave puriso imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti dassento
atk-s0513a4:1485: Nayimassa dīpakassa bhāgino, jambudīpā idameva no vara”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1486: Tattha te janāti te jambudīpavāsino janā. Kammaphalūpajīvinoti nānākammānaṃ phalūpajīvino sattā.
atk-s0513a4:1487_0: Atha te dīpakaṃ pariggaṇhantā purisā tassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā “manussasaddo viya suyyati,
atk-s0513a4:1487_1: jānissāma na”nti saddānusārena gantvā taṃ purisaṃ disvā “yakkho bhavissatī”ti bhītatasitā
atk-s0513a4:1487_2: sare sannahiṃsu. Sopi te disvā attano vadhabhayena “nāhaṃ, sāmi, yakkho, purisomhi,
atk-s0513a4:1487_3: jīvitaṃ me dethā”ti yācanto “purisā nāma tumhādisā naggā na hontī”ti vutte punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1487_4: yācitvā manussabhāvaṃ viññāpesi. Te taṃ purisaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1487_5: sutvā tassa tattha āgataniyāmaṃ pucchiṃsu. Sopi sabbaṃ tesaṃ kathetvā “tumhe attano
atk-s0513a4:1487_6: puññasampattiyā idhāgatā, ayaṃ uttamadīpo, na ettha sahatthena kammaṃ katvā jīvanti,
atk-s0513a4:1487_7: sayaṃjātasālīnañceva ucchuādīnañcettha anto natthīti anukkaṇṭhantā vasathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1487_8: Idha pana vasantānaṃ amhākaṃ añño paripantho natthi, aññaṃ bhayaṃ ettha natthi, ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1487_9: pana amanussapariggahito, amanussā tumhākaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ disvā kujjheyyuṃ, tasmā
atk-s0513a4:1487_10: taṃ karontā vālukaṃ viyūhitvā vālukāya paṭicchādeyyātha, ettakaṃ idha bhayaṃ, aññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1487_11: natthi, niccaṃ appamattā bhaveyyāthāti. Te tattha vāsaṃ upagacchiṃsu. Tasmiṃ pana
atk-s0513a4:1487_12: kulasahasse pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ jeṭṭhakā dve vaḍḍhakī ahesuṃ. Tesu eko
atk-s0513a4:1487_13: bālo ahosi rasagiddho, eko paṇḍito rasesu anallīno.
atk-s0513a4:1488_0: Aparabhāge sabbepi te tattha sukhaṃ vasantā thūlasarīrā hutvā cintayiṃsu “ciraṃ pītā
atk-s0513a4:1488_1: no surā, ucchurasena merayaṃ katvā pivissāmā”ti. Te merayaṃ kāretvā pivitvā madavasena
atk-s0513a4:1488_2: gāyantā naccantā kīḷantā pamattā tattha tattha uccārapassāvaṃ katvā appaṭicchādetvā
atk-s0513a4:1488_3: dīpakaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ kariṃsu. Devatā “ime amhākaṃ kīḷāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭikūlaṃ karontī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1488_4: kujjhitvā “mahāsamuddaṃ uttarāpetvā dīpakadhovanaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā “ayaṃ kāḷapakkho,
atk-s0513a4:1488_5: ajja amhākaṃ samāgamo ca bhinno, ito dāni pannarasame divase puṇṇamīuposathadivase
atk-s0513a4:1488_6: candassuggamanavelāya samuddaṃ ubbattetvā sabbepime ghātessāmā”ti divasaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1488_7: Atha nesaṃ antare eko dhammiko devaputto “mā ime mama passantassa nassiṃsū”ti anukampāya
atk-s0513a4:1488_8: tesu sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā gharadvāre sukhakathāya nisinnesu sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0513a4:1488_9: sakaladīpaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā uttarāya disāya ākāse ṭhatvā “ambho vaḍḍhakī, devatā
atk-s0513a4:1488_10: tumhākaṃ kuddhā. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne mā vasittha, ito aḍḍhamāsaccayena hi devatā samuddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1488_11: ubbattetvā sabbeva tumhe ghātessanti, ito nikkhamitvā palāyathā”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1491: Uplavissaṃ dīpamimaṃ uḷāraṃ, mā vo vadhī gacchatha leṇamañña”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1492: Tattha uplavissanti imaṃ dīpakaṃ uplavanto ajjhottharanto abhibhavissati. Mā vo vadhīti so sāgaravego tumhe mā vadhi.
atk-s0513a4:1493_0: Iti so tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā attano ṭhānameva gato. Tasmiṃ gate aparo sāhasiko kakkhaḷo
atk-s0513a4:1493_1: devaputto “ime imassa vacanaṃ gahetvā palāyeyyuṃ, ahaṃ nesaṃ gamanaṃ nivāretvā sabbepime
atk-s0513a4:1493_2: mahāvināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti cintetvā dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito sakaladīpaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karonto
atk-s0513a4:1493_3: āgantvā dakkhiṇāya disāya ākāse ṭhatvā “eko devaputto idhāgato, no”ti pucchitvā “āgato”ti
atk-s0513a4:1493_4: vutte “so vo kiṃ kathesī”ti vatvā “imaṃ nāma, sāmī”ti vutte “so tumhākaṃ idha nivāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1493_5: na icchati, dosena katheti, tumhe aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1496: Taṃ me nimittehi bahūhi diṭṭhaṃ, mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho.
atk-s0513a4:1499: Na vo bhayaṃ paṭipassāmi kiñci, āputtaputtehi pamodathavho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1500_0: Tattha na jātuyanti na jātu ayaṃ. Mā bhethāti mā bhāyittha. Modathavhoti pamoditā
atk-s0513a4:1500_1: pītisomanassajātā hotha. Āputtaputtehīti yāva puttānampi puttehi pamodatha, natthi
atk-s0513a4:1501_0: Evaṃ so imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi te assāsetvā pakkāmi. Tassa pakkantakāle dhammikadevaputtassa
atk-s0513a4:1501_1: vacanaṃ anādiyanto bālavaḍḍhakī “suṇantu me, bhonto, vacana”nti sesavaḍḍhakī āmantetvā
atk-s0513a4:1503: “Yo devoyaṃ dakkhiṇāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemanti pakkosati tassa saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1504: Na uttaro vedi bhayābhayassa, mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1505: Tattha dakkhiṇāyanti dakkhiṇāya, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:1506: Taṃ sutvā rasagiddhā pañcasatā vaḍḍhakī tassa bālassa vacanaṃ ādiyiṃsu. Itaro pana paṇḍitavaḍḍhakī tassa vacanaṃ anādiyanto te vaḍḍhakī āmantetvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1508: “Yathā ime vippavadanti yakkhā, eko bhayaṃ saṃsati khemameko;
atk-s0513a4:1509: Tadiṅgha mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇātha, khippaṃ lahuṃ mā vinassimha sabbe.
atk-s0513a4:1511: “Sabbe samāgamma karoma nāvaṃ, doṇiṃ daḷhaṃ sabbayantūpapannaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1512: Sace ayaṃ dakkhiṇo saccamāha, moghaṃ paṭikkosati uttaroyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1513: Sā ceva no hehiti āpadatthā, imañca dīpaṃ na pariccajema.
atk-s0513a4:1515: “Sace ca kho uttaro saccamāha, moghaṃ paṭikkosati dakkhiṇoyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1516: Tameva nāvaṃ abhiruyha sabbe, evaṃ mayaṃ sotthi taremu pāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1518: “Na ve sugaṇhaṃ paṭhamena seṭṭhaṃ, kaniṭṭhamāpāthagataṃ gahetvā;
atk-s0513a4:1519: Yo cīdha tacchaṃ paviceyya gaṇhati, sa ve naro seṭṭhamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1520_0: Tattha vippavadantīti aññamaññaṃ viruddhaṃ vadanti. Lahunti purimassa atthadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1520_1: Doṇinti gambhīraṃ mahānāvaṃ. Sabbayantūpapannanti sabbehi phiyārittādīhi yantehi
atk-s0513a4:1520_2: upapannaṃ. Sā ceva no hehiti āpadatthāti sā ca no nāvā pacchāpi uppannāya āpadāya
atk-s0513a4:1520_3: atthā bhavissati, imañca dīpaṃ na pariccajissāma. Taremūti tarissāma. Na ve sugaṇhanti
atk-s0513a4:1520_4: na ve sukhena gaṇhitabbaṃ. Seṭṭhanti uttamaṃ tathaṃ saccaṃ. Kaniṭṭhanti paṭhamavacanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1520_5: upādāya pacchimavacanaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ nāma. Idhāpi “na ve sugaṇha”nti anuvattateva. Idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1520_6: vuttaṃ hoti – ambho vaḍḍhakī, yena kenaci paṭhamena vuttavacanaṃ “idameva seṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1520_7: tathaṃ sacca”nti sukhaṃ na gaṇhitabbameva, yathā ca taṃ, evaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ gacchā vuttavacanampi
atk-s0513a4:1520_8: “idameva tathaṃ sacca”nti na gaṇhitabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana sotavisayaṃ āpāthagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a4:1520_9: taṃ āpāthagataṃ gahetvā yo idha paṇḍitapuriso purimavacanañca pacchimavacanañca paviceyya
atk-s0513a4:1520_10: vicinitvā tīretvā upaparikkhitvā tacchaṃ gaṇhāti, yaṃ tathaṃ saccaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1520_11: tadeva paccakkhaṃ katvā gaṇhāti. Sa ve naro seṭṭhamupeti ṭhānanti so uttamaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1521_0: So evañca pana vatvā āha – “ambho, mayaṃ dvinnampi devatānaṃ vacanaṃ karissāma, nāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1521_1: tāva sajjeyyāma. Sace paṭhamassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ bhavissati, taṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1521_2: palāyissāma, atha itarassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ bhavissati, nāvaṃ ekamante ṭhapetvā idheva
atk-s0513a4:1521_3: vasissāmā”ti. Evaṃ vutte bālavaḍḍhakī “ambho, tvaṃ udakapātiyaṃ susumāraṃ passasi,
atk-s0513a4:1521_4: atīva dīghaṃ passasi, paṭhamadevaputto amhesu dosavasena kathesi, pacchimo sineheneva,
atk-s0513a4:1521_5: imaṃ evarūpaṃ varadīpaṃ pahāya kuhiṃ gamissāma, sace pana tvaṃ gantukāmo, tava parisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1521_6: gaṇhitvā nāvaṃ karohi, amhākaṃ nāvāya kiccaṃ natthī”ti āha. Paṇḍito attano parisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1521_7: gahetvā nāvaṃ sajjetvā nāvāya sabbūpakaraṇāni āropetvā sapariso nāvāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1522_0: Tato puṇṇamadivase candassa uggamanavelāya samuddato ūmi uttaritvā jāṇukapamāṇā hutvā
atk-s0513a4:1522_1: dīpakaṃ dhovitvā gatā. Paṇḍito samuddassa uttaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā nāvaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:1522_2: Bālavaḍḍhakipakkhikāni pañca kulasatāni “samuddato ūmi dīpadhovanatthāya āgatā, ettakameva
atk-s0513a4:1522_3: eta”nti kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Tato paṭipāṭiyā kaṭippamāṇā purisappamāṇā tālappamāṇā
atk-s0513a4:1522_4: sattatālappamāṇā sāgaraūmi dīpakampi vuyhamānā āgañchi. Paṇḍito upāyakusalatāya rase
atk-s0513a4:1522_5: alaggo sotthinā gato, bālavaḍḍhakī rasagiddhena anāgatabhayaṃ anolokento pañcahi
atk-s0513a4:1523: Ito parā sānusāsanī tamatthaṃ dīpayamānā tisso abhisambuddhagāthā honti –
atk-s0513a4:1525: “Yathāpi te sāgaravārimajjhe, sakammunā sotthi vahiṃsu vāṇijā;
atk-s0513a4:1526: Anāgatatthaṃ paṭivijjhiyāna, appampi nācceti sa bhūripañño.
atk-s0513a4:1529: Paccuppanne sīdanti atthajāte, samuddamajjhe yathā te manussā.
atk-s0513a4:1531: “Anāgataṃ paṭikayirātha kiccaṃ, ‘mā maṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāle byadhesi’;
atk-s0513a4:1532: Taṃ tādisaṃ paṭikatakiccakāriṃ, na taṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāle byadhetī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1533_0: Tattha sakammunāti anāgatabhayaṃ disvā puretaraṃ katena attano kammena. Sotthi vahiṃsūti
atk-s0513a4:1533_1: khemena gamiṃsu. Vāṇijāti samudde vicaraṇabhāvena vaḍḍhakī vuttā. Paṭivijjhiyānāti
atk-s0513a4:1533_2: evaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamataraṃ kattabbaṃ anāgataṃ atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā idhaloke bhūripañño
atk-s0513a4:1533_3: kulaputto appamattakampi attano atthaṃ na acceti nātivattati, na hāpetīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1533_4: Appaṭivijjhiyatthanti appaṭivijjhitvā atthaṃ, paṭhamameva kattabbaṃ akatvāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1533_5: Paccuppanneti yadā taṃ anāgataṃ atthajātaṃ uppajjati, tadā tasmiṃ paccuppanne sīdanti,
atk-s0513a4:1533_6: atthe jāte attano patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti, samudde te bālavaḍḍhakī manussā viya vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0513a4:1534_0: Anāgatanti bhikkhave, paṇḍitapuriso anāgataṃ paṭhamataraṃ kattabbakiccaṃ samparāyikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1534_1: vā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vā paṭikayirātha, puretarameva kareyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Mā maṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1534_2: kiccakāle byadhesi, pure kattabbañhi pure akayiramānaṃ pacchā paccuppannabhāvappattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1534_3: attano kiccakāle kāyacittābādhena byadheti, taṃ maṃ mā byadhesīti paṭhamameva naṃ
atk-s0513a4:1534_4: paṇḍito kareyya. Taṃ tādisanti yathā paṇḍitaṃ purisaṃ. Paṭikatakiccakārinti paṭikacceva
atk-s0513a4:1534_5: kattabbakiccakārinaṃ. Taṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāleti anāgataṃ kiccaṃ kayiramānaṃ pacchā paccuppannabhāvappattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1534_6: attano kiccakāle kāyacittābādhakāle tādisaṃ purimaṃ na byadheti na bādhati. Kasmā? Pureyeva katattāti.
atk-s0513a4:1535_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto paccuppannasukhe
atk-s0513a4:1535_1: laggo anāgatabhayaṃ anoloketvā sapariso vināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a4:1535_2: – “tadā bālavaḍḍhakī devadatto ahosi, dakkhiṇadisāya ṭhito adhammikadevaputto kokāliko,
atk-s0513a4:1535_3: uttaradisāya ṭhito dhammikadevaputto sāriputto, paṇḍitavaḍḍhakī pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1539_0: Kāmaṃ kāmayamānassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:1539_1: kathesi. Eko kira sāvatthivāsī brāhmaṇo aciravatītīre khettakaraṇatthāya araññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1539_2: koṭesi. Satthā tassa upanissayaṃ disvā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto maggā okkamma
atk-s0513a4:1539_3: tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ karosi brāhmaṇā”ti vatvā “khettaṭṭhānaṃ koṭāpemi
atk-s0513a4:1539_4: bho, gotamā”ti vutte “sādhu, brāhmaṇa, kammaṃ karohī”ti vatvā agamāsi. Eteneva upāyena
atk-s0513a4:1539_5: chinnarukkhe hāretvā khettassa sodhanakāle kasanakāle kedārabandhanakāle vapanakāleti
atk-s0513a4:1539_6: punappunaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāramakāsi. Vapanadivase pana so brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a4:1539_7: “ajja, bho gotama, mayhaṃ vappamaṅgalaṃ, ahaṃ imasmiṃ sasse nipphanne buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a4:1539_8: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ dassāmī”ti āha. Satthā tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_9: Punekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo sassaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi. Satthāpi tattha gantvā “kiṃ karosi
atk-s0513a4:1539_10: brāhmaṇā”ti pucchitvā “sassaṃ olokemi bho gotamā”ti vutte “sādhu brāhmaṇā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:1539_11: pakkāmi. Tadā brāhmaṇo cintesi “samaṇo gotamo abhiṇhaṃ āgacchati, nissaṃsayaṃ bhattena
atk-s0513a4:1539_12: atthiko, dassāmahaṃ tassa bhatta”nti. Tassevaṃ cintetvā gehaṃ gatadivase satthāpi
atk-s0513a4:1539_13: tattha agamāsi. Atha brāhmaṇassa ativiya vissāso ahosi. Aparabhāge pariṇate sasse
atk-s0513a4:1539_14: “sve khettaṃ lāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā nipanne brāhmaṇe aciravatiyā upari sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1539_15: karakavassaṃ vassi. Mahogho āgantvā ekanāḷimattampi anavasesaṃ katvā sabbaṃ sassaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1539_16: samuddaṃ pavesesi. Brāhmaṇo oghamhi patite sassavināsaṃ oloketvā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ
atk-s0513a4:1539_17: nāhosi, balavasokābhibhūto hatthena uraṃ paharitvā paridevamāno rodanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:1540_0: Satthā paccūsasamaye sokābhibhūtaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “brāhmaṇassāvassayo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1540_1: punadivase sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhū vihāraṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a4:1540_2: pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṃ tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi. Brāhmaṇo satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a4:1540_3: “paṭisanthāratthāya me sahāyo āgato bhavissatī”ti paṭiladdhassāso āsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_4: Satthā pavisitvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “brāhmaṇa, kasmā tvaṃ dummanosi, kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti
atk-s0513a4:1540_5: pucchi. Bho gotama, aciravatītīre mayā rukkhacchedanato paṭṭhāya kataṃ kammaṃ tumhe
atk-s0513a4:1540_6: jānātha, ahaṃ “imasmiṃ sasse nipphanne tumhākaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti vicarāmi, idāni
atk-s0513a4:1540_7: me sabbaṃ taṃ sassaṃ mahogho samuddameva pavesesi, kiñci avasiṭṭhaṃ natthi, sakaṭasatamattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_8: dhaññaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ, tena me mahāsoko uppannoti. “Kiṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, socantassa naṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_9: punāgacchatī”ti. “No hetaṃ bho gotamā”ti. “Evaṃ sante kasmā socasi, imesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_10: dhanadhaññaṃ nāma uppajjanakāle uppajjati, nassanakāle nassati, kiñci saṅkhāragataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_11: anassanadhammaṃ nāma natthi, mā cintayī”ti. Iti naṃ satthā samassāsetvā tassa sappāyadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_12: desento kāmasuttaṃ kathesi. Suttapariyosāne socanto brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_13: Satthā taṃ nissokaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi. “Satthā asukaṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_14: sokasallasamappitaṃ nissokaṃ katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti sakalanagaraṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_15: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, dasabalo brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ mittaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_16: katvā vissāsiko hutvā upāyeneva tassa sokasallasamappitassa dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ nissokaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_17: katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a4:1540_18: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño dve puttā ahesuṃ. So jeṭṭhakassa uparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_1: adāsi, kaniṭṭhassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ. Aparabhāge brahmadatte kālakate amaccā jeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0513a4:1541_2: abhisekaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. So “na mayhaṃ rajjenattho, kaniṭṭhassa me dethā”ti vatvā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_3: yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipitvā kaniṭṭhassa abhiseke kate “na me issariyenattho”ti uparajjādīnipi
atk-s0513a4:1541_4: na icchi. “Tena hi sādūni bhojanāni bhuñjanto idheva vasāhī”ti vuttepi “na me imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_5: nagare kiccaṃ atthī”ti bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā paccantaṃ gantvā ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:1541_6: sahatthena kammaṃ karonto vasi. Te aparabhāge tassa rājakumārabhāvaṃ ñatvā kammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_7: kātuṃ nādaṃsu, kumāraparihāreneva taṃ parihariṃsu. Aparabhāge rājakammikā khettappamāṇaggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:1541_8: taṃ gāmaṃ agamaṃsu. Seṭṭhi rājakumāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “sāmi, mayaṃ tumhe posema, kaniṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0513a4:1541_9: paṇṇaṃ pesetvā amhākaṃ baliṃ hārethā”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “ahaṃ asukaseṭṭhikulaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1541_10: nāma upanissāya vasāmi, maṃ nissāya etesaṃ baliṃ vissajjehī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1542_0: Atha naṃ sakalagāmavāsinopi janapadavāsinopi upasaṅkamitvā “mayaṃ tumhākaññeva baliṃ
atk-s0513a4:1542_1: dassāma, amhākampi suṅkaṃ vissajjāpehī”ti āhaṃsu. So tesampi atthāya paṇṇaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a4:1542_2: vissajjāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya te tasseva baliṃ adaṃsu. Athassa mahālābhasakkāro ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:1542_3: tena saddhiññevassa taṇhāpi mahatī jātā. So aparabhāgepi sabbaṃ janapadaṃ yāci, upaḍḍharajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1542_4: yāci, kaniṭṭhopi tassa adāsiyeva. So taṇhāya vaḍḍhamānāya upaḍḍharajjenapi asantuṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:1542_5: “rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti janapadaparivuto taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā bahinagare ṭhatvā “rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1542_6: vā me detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti kaniṭṭhassa paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi. Kaniṭṭho cintesi “ayaṃ bālo pubbe
atk-s0513a4:1542_7: rajjampi uparajjādīnipi paṭikkhipitvā idāni ‘yuddhena gaṇhāmī’ti vadati, sace kho
atk-s0513a4:1542_8: panāhaṃ imaṃ yuddhena māressāmi, garahā me bhavissati, kiṃ me rajjenā”ti. Athassa
atk-s0513a4:1542_9: “alaṃ yuddhena, rajjaṃ gaṇhatū”ti pesesi. So rajjaṃ gaṇhitvā kaniṭṭhassa uparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1542_10: datvā tato paṭṭhāya rajjaṃ kārento taṇhāvasiko hutvā ekena rajjena asantuṭṭho dve
atk-s0513a4:1542_11: tīṇi rajjāni patthetvā taṇhāya koṭiṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0513a4:1543_0: Tadā sakko devarājā “ke nu kho loke mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanti, ke dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a4:1543_1: karonti, ke taṇhāvasikā”ti olokento tassa taṇhāvasikabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bālo bārāṇasirajjenapi
atk-s0513a4:1543_2: na tussati, ahaṃ sikkhāpessāmi na”nti māṇavakavesena rājadvāre ṭhatvā “eko upāyakusalo
atk-s0513a4:1543_3: māṇavo dvāre ṭhito”ti ārocāpetvā “pavisatū”ti vutte pavisitvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā “kiṃkāraṇā
atk-s0513a4:1543_4: āgatosī”ti vutte “mahārāja tumhākaṃ kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi, raho paccāsīsāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1543_5: Sakkānubhāvena tāvadeva manussā paṭikkamiṃsu. Atha naṃ māṇavo “ahaṃ, mahārāja, phītāni
atk-s0513a4:1543_6: ākiṇṇamanussāni sampannabalavāhanāni tīṇi nagarāni passāmi, ahaṃ te attano ānubhāvena
atk-s0513a4:1543_7: tesu rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmi, papañcaṃ akatvā sīghaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. So taṇhāvasiko
atk-s0513a4:1543_8: rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sakkānubhāvena “ko vā tvaṃ, kuto vā āgato, kiṃ vā te
atk-s0513a4:1543_9: laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti na pucchi. Sopi ettakaṃ vatvā tāvatiṃsabhavanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1544_0: Rājā amacce pakkosāpetvā “eko māṇavo ‘amhākaṃ tīṇi rajjāni gahetvā dassāmī’ti āha,
atk-s0513a4:1544_1: taṃ pakkosatha, nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā balakāyaṃ sannipātāpetha, papañcaṃ akatvā
atk-s0513a4:1544_2: tīṇi rajjāni gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā “kiṃ pana te, mahārāja, tassa māṇavassa sakkāro
atk-s0513a4:1544_3: vā kato, nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ vā pucchita”nti vutte “neva sakkāraṃ akāsiṃ, na nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1544_4: pucchiṃ, gacchatha naṃ upadhārethā”ti āha. Upadhārentā naṃ adisvā “mahārāja, sakalanagare
atk-s0513a4:1544_5: māṇavaṃ na passāmā”ti ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā rājā domanassajāto “tīsu nagaresu rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1544_6: naṭṭhaṃ, mahantenamhi yasena parihīno, ‘neva me paribbayaṃ adāsi, na ca pucchi nivāsaṭṭhāna’nti
atk-s0513a4:1544_7: mayhaṃ kujjhitvā māṇavo anāgato bhavissatī”ti punappunaṃ cintesi. Athassa taṇhāvasikassa
atk-s0513a4:1544_8: sarīre ḍāho uppajji, sarīre pariḍayhante udaraṃ khobhetvā lohitapakkhandikā udapādi.
atk-s0513a4:1544_9: Ekaṃ bhājanaṃ pavisati, ekaṃ nikkhamati, vejjā tikicchituṃ na sakkonti, rājā kilamati.
atk-s0513a4:1545_0: Tadā bodhisatto takkasilato sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasinagare mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1545_1: āgato taṃ rañño pavattiṃ sutvā “ahaṃ tikicchissāmī”ti rājadvāraṃ gantvā “eko kira
atk-s0513a4:1545_2: taruṇamāṇavo tumhe tikicchituṃ āgato”ti ārocāpesi. Rājā “mahantamahantā disāpāmokkhavejjāpi
atk-s0513a4:1545_3: maṃ tikicchituṃ na sakkonti, kiṃ taruṇamāṇavo sakkhissati, paribbayaṃ datvā vissajjetha
atk-s0513a4:1545_4: na”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “mayhaṃ vejjakammena vetanaṃ natthi, ahaṃ tikicchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1545_5: kevalaṃ bhesajjamūlamattaṃ detū”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā rājā “sādhū”ti pakkosāpesi. Māṇavo
atk-s0513a4:1545_6: rājānaṃ vanditvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, ahaṃ te tikicchāmi, apica kho pana me rogassa
atk-s0513a4:1545_7: samuṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhāhī”ti āha. Rājā harāyamāno “kiṃ te samuṭṭhānena, bhesajjaṃ eva
atk-s0513a4:1545_8: karohī”ti āha. Mahārāja, vejjā nāma “ayaṃ byādhi imaṃ nissāya samuṭṭhito”ti ñatvā
atk-s0513a4:1545_9: anucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontīti. Rājā “sādhu tātā”ti samuṭṭhānaṃ kathento “ekena
atk-s0513a4:1545_10: māṇavena āgantvā tīsu nagaresu rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmī”tiādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a4:1545_11: “iti me tāta, taṇhaṃ nissāya byādhi uppanno, sace tikicchituṃ sakkosi, tikicchāhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1545_12: āha. Kiṃ pana mahārāja, socanāya tāni nagarāni sakkā laddhunti? “Na sakkā tātā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1545_13: “Evaṃ sante kasmā socasi, mahārāja, sabbameva hi saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavatthuṃ attano
atk-s0513a4:1545_14: kāyaṃ ādiṃ katvā pahāya gamanīyaṃ, catūsu nagaresu rajjaṃ gahetvāpi tvaṃ ekappahāreneva
atk-s0513a4:1545_15: na catasso bhattapātiyo bhuñjissasi, na catūsu sayanesu sayissasi, na cattāri vatthayugāni
atk-s0513a4:1545_16: acchādessasi, taṇhāvasikena nāma bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati, ayañhi taṇhā nāma vaḍḍhamānā
atk-s0513a4:1546: Iti naṃ mahāsatto ovaditvā athassa dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1549: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchati.
atk-s0513a4:1552: Tato naṃ aparaṃ kāme, ghamme taṇhaṃva vindati.
atk-s0513a4:1556: Bhiyyo taṇhā pipāsā ca, vaḍḍhamānassa vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a4:1559: Datvā ca nālamekassa, iti vidvā samaṃ care.
atk-s0513a4:1562: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0513a4:1565: Tato nivattā paṭikkamma disvā, te ve sutittā ye paññāya tittā.
atk-s0513a4:1567: “Paññāya tittinaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, na so kāmehi tappati;
atk-s0513a4:1568: Paññāya tittaṃ purisaṃ, taṇhā na kurute vasaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1571: Samuddamatto puriso, na so kāmehi tappati.
atk-s0513a4:1574: Yaṃ yaṃ cajati kāmānaṃ, taṃ taṃ sampajjate sukhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1576_0: Tattha kāmanti vatthukāmampi kilesakāmampi. Kāmayamānassāti patthayamānassa. Tassa
atk-s0513a4:1576_1: ce taṃ samijjhatīti tassa puggalassa taṃ kāmitavatthu samijjhati ce, nipphajjati
atk-s0513a4:1576_2: ceti attho. Tato naṃ aparaṃ kāmeti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Aparanti parabhāgadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1576_3: Kāmeti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa taṃ kāmitavatthu
atk-s0513a4:1576_4: samijjhati, tasmiṃ samiddhe tato paraṃ so puggalo kāmayamāno yathā nāma ghamme gimhakāle
atk-s0513a4:1576_5: vātātapena kilanto taṇhaṃ vindati, pānīyapipāsaṃ paṭilabhati, evaṃ bhiyyo kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāte
atk-s0513a4:1576_6: kāme vindati paṭilabhati, rūpataṇhādikā taṇhā cassa vaḍḍhatiyevāti. Gavaṃvāti gorūpassa
atk-s0513a4:1576_7: viya. Siṅginoti matthakaṃ padāletvā uṭṭhitasiṅgassa. Mandassāti mandapaññassa. Bālassāti
atk-s0513a4:1576_8: bāladhamme yuttassa. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā vacchakassa vaḍḍhantassa sarīreneva
atk-s0513a4:1576_9: saddhiṃ siṅgaṃ vaḍḍhati, evaṃ andhabālassapi appattakāmataṇhā ca pattakāmapipāsā
atk-s0513a4:1577_0: Sāliyavakanti sālikhettayavakhettaṃ. Etena sāliyavādikaṃ sabbaṃ dhaññaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0513a4:1577_1: dutiyapadena sabbaṃ dvipadacatuppadaṃ dasseti. Paṭhamapadena vā sabbaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1577_2: itarena saviññāṇakaṃ. Datvā cāti datvāpi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tiṭṭhantu tīṇi rajjāni,
atk-s0513a4:1577_3: sace so māṇavo aññaṃ vā sakalampi pathaviṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakaratanapūraṃ kassaci
atk-s0513a4:1577_4: datvā gaccheyya, idampi ettakaṃ vatthu ekasseva apariyantaṃ, evaṃ duppūrā esā taṇhā
atk-s0513a4:1577_5: nāma. Iti vidvā samaṃ careti evaṃ jānanto puriso taṇhāvasiko ahutvā kāyasamācārādīni pūrento careyya.
atk-s0513a4:1578_0: Oranti orimakoṭṭhāsaṃ patvā tena atittarūpo puna samuddapārampi patthayetha. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1578_1: taṇhāvasikasattā nāma duppūrāti dasseti. Yāvāti aniyāmitaparicchedo. Anussaranti
atk-s0513a4:1578_2: anussaranto. Nājjhagāti na vindati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – mahārāja, puriso apariyantepi
atk-s0513a4:1578_3: kāme manasā anussaranto tittiṃ na vindati, pattukāmova hoti, evaṃ kāmesu sattānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1578_4: taṇhā vaḍḍhateva. Tato nivattāti tato pana vatthukāmakilesakāmato cittena nivattitvā
atk-s0513a4:1578_5: kāyena paṭikkamma ñāṇena ādīnavaṃ disvā ye paññāya tittā paripuṇṇā, te tittā nāma.
atk-s0513a4:1579_0: Paññāya tittinaṃ seṭṭhanti paññāya tittīnaṃ ayaṃ paripuṇṇaseṭṭho, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:1579_1: Na so kāmehi tappatīti “na hī”tipi pāṭho. Yasmā paññāya titto puriso kāmehi na pariḍayhatīti
atk-s0513a4:1579_2: attho. Na kurute vasanti tādisañhi purisaṃ taṇhā vase vattetuṃ na sakkoti, sveva
atk-s0513a4:1579_3: pana taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā sarabhaṅgamāṇavo viya ca aḍḍhamāsakarājā viya ca taṇhāvase
atk-s0513a4:1579_4: na pavattatīti attho. Apacinethevāti viddhaṃsetheva. Samuddamattoti mahatiyā paññāya
atk-s0513a4:1579_5: samannāgatattā samuddappamāṇo. So mahantena aggināpi samuddo viya kilesakāmehi na tappati na ḍayhati.
atk-s0513a4:1580_0: Rathakāroti cammakāro. Parikantanti parikantanto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā cammakāro
atk-s0513a4:1580_1: upāhanaṃ parikantanto yaṃ yaṃ cammassa agayhūpagaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ cajitvā upāhanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1580_2: katvā upāhanamūlaṃ labhitvā sukhito hoti, evameva paṇḍito cammakārasatthasadisāya
atk-s0513a4:1580_3: paññāya kantanto yaṃ yaṃ odhiṃ kāmānaṃ cajati, tena tenassa kāmodhinā rahitaṃ taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1580_4: taṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañca sukhaṃ sampajjati vigatadarathaṃ, sace pana
atk-s0513a4:1580_5: sabbampi kāyakammādisukhaṃ vigatapariḷāhameva iccheyya, kasiṇaṃ bhāvetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0513a4:1581_0: Bodhisattassa pana imaṃ gāthaṃ kathentassa rañño setacchattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā odātakasiṇajjhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1581_1: udapādi, rājāpi arogo ahosi. So tuṭṭho sayanā vuṭṭhahitvā “ettakā vejjā maṃ tikicchituṃ
atk-s0513a4:1581_2: nāsakkhiṃsu, paṇḍitamāṇavo pana attano ñāṇosadhena maṃ nirogaṃ akāsī”ti tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1583: “Aṭṭha te bhāsitā gāthā, sabbā honti sahassiyā;
atk-s0513a4:1585: Tattha aṭṭhāti dutiyagāthaṃ ādiṃ katvā kāmādīnavasaṃyuttā aṭṭha. Sahassiyāti sahassārahā. Paṭigaṇhāti aṭṭha sahassāni gaṇha. Sādhetaṃ tava bhāsitanti sādhu etaṃ tava vacanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1588: “Na me attho sahassehi, satehi nahutehi vā;
atk-s0513a4:1589: Pacchimaṃ bhāsato gāthaṃ, kāme me na rato mano”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1590_0: Tattha pacchimanti “rathakārova cammassā”ti gāthaṃ. Kāme me na rato manoti imaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1590_1: bhāsamānasseva mama vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi mano nābhiramāmi. Ahañhi imaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1590_2: bhāsamāno attanova dhammadesanāya jhānaṃ nibbattesiṃ, mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a4:1591: Rājā bhiyyosomattāya tussitvā mahāsattaṃ vaṇṇento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1594: Yo imaṃ taṇhaṃ dukkhajananiṃ, parijānāti paṇḍito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1595: Tattha dukkhajananinti sakalavaṭṭadukkhajananiṃ. Parijānātīti parijāni paricchindi, luñcitvā nīharīti bodhisattaṃ vaṇṇento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:1596_0: Bodhisattopi “mahārāja, appamatto hutvā dhammaṃ carā”ti rājānaṃ ovaditvā ākāsena
atk-s0513a4:1596_1: himavantaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0513a4:1597_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nissokamakāsi”nti
atk-s0513a4:1597_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā esa brāhmaṇo ahosi, paṇḍitamāṇavo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1601_0: Dasa khalūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño ovādatthāya kathesi. Ekasmiñhi
atk-s0513a4:1601_1: kāle rājā issariyamadamatto kilesasukhanissito vinicchayampi na paṭṭhapesi, buddhupaṭṭhānampi
atk-s0513a4:1601_2: pamajji. So ekadivase dasabalaṃ anussaritvā “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0513a4:1601_3: rathavaramāruyha vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ mahārāja
atk-s0513a4:1601_4: ciraṃ na paññāyasī”ti vatvā “bahukiccatāya no bhante buddhupaṭṭhānassa okāso na jāto”ti
atk-s0513a4:1601_5: vutte “mahārāja, mādise nāma ovādadāyake sabbaññubuddhe dhuravihāre viharante ayuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1601_6: tava pamajjituṃ, raññā nāma rājakiccesu appamattena bhavitabbaṃ, raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ mātāpitusamena
atk-s0513a4:1601_7: agatigamanaṃ pahāya dasa rājadhamme akopentena rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati, rañño hi dhammikabhāve
atk-s0513a4:1601_8: sati parisāpissa dhammikā honti, anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ, yaṃ mayi anusāsante tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1601_9: dhammena rajjaṃ kāreyyāsi, porāṇakapaṇḍitā anusāsakaācariye avijjamānepi attano matiyāva
atk-s0513a4:1601_10: tividhasucaritadhamme patiṭṭhāya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā saggapathaṃ pūrayamānā
atk-s0513a4:1601_11: agamaṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1602_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a4:1602_1: nibbatti, “janasandhakumāro”tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Athassa vayappattassa takkasilato
atk-s0513a4:1602_2: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā āgatakāle rājā sabbāni bandhanāgārāni sodhāpetvā uparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1602_3: adāsi. So aparabhāge pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe
atk-s0513a4:1602_4: rājadvāre cāti cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā divase divase cha satasahassāni pariccajitvā
atk-s0513a4:1602_5: sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhetvā mahādānaṃ pavattento bandhanāgārāni niccaṃ vivaṭāni
atk-s0513a4:1602_6: kārāpetvā dhammabhaṇḍikaṃ sodhāpetvā catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ saṅgaṇhanto pañca
atk-s0513a4:1602_7: sīlāni rakkhanto uposathavāsaṃ vasanto dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. Antarantarā ca raṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0513a4:1602_8: sannipātāpetvā “dānaṃ detha, sīlaṃ samādiyatha, bhāvanaṃ bhāvetha, dhammena kammante
atk-s0513a4:1602_9: ca vohāre ca payojetha, daharakāleyeva sippāni uggaṇhatha, dhanaṃ uppādetha, gāmakūṭakammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1602_10: vā pisuṇavācākammaṃ vā mā karittha, caṇḍā pharusā mā ahuvattha, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1602_11: pūretha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino bhavathā”ti dhammaṃ desetvā mahājane sucaritadhamme
atk-s0513a4:1602_12: patiṭṭhāpesi. So ekadivasaṃ pannarasīuposathe samādinnuposatho “mahājanassa bhiyyo
atk-s0513a4:1602_13: hitasukhatthāya appamādavihāratthāya dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti cintetvā nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0513a4:1602_14: carāpetvā attano orodhe ādiṃ katvā sabbanagarajanaṃ sannipātāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0513a4:1602_16: tumhākaṃ tapanīye ca atapanīye ca dhamme desessāmi, appamattā hutvā ohitasotā sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1603: Satthā saccaparibhāvitaṃ mukharatanaṃ vivaritvā taṃ dhammadesanaṃ madhurena sarena kosalarañño āvi karonto –
atk-s0513a4:1605: “Dasa khalu imāni ṭhānāni, yāni pubbe akaritvā;
atk-s0513a4:1611: “Sakyarūpaṃ pure santaṃ, mayā sippaṃ na sikkhitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1615: Caṇḍo ca pharuso cāpi, iti pacchānutappati.
atk-s0513a4:1624: Na pubbe adadaṃ dānaṃ, iti pacchānutappati.
atk-s0513a4:1627: Pahu santo na posissaṃ, iti pacchānutappati.
atk-s0513a4:1635: “Sādhu hoti tapo ciṇṇo, santo ca payirupāsito;
atk-s0513a4:1636: Na ca pubbe tapo ciṇṇo, iti pacchānutappati.
atk-s0513a4:1639: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, sa pacchā nānutappatī”ti. – imā gāthā āha;
atk-s0513a4:1640_0: Tattha ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni. Pubbeti paṭhamameva akaritvā. Sa pacchā manutappatīti
atk-s0513a4:1640_1: so paṭhamaṃ kattabbānaṃ akārako puggalo pacchā idhalokepi paralokepi tappati kilamati.
atk-s0513a4:1640_2: “Pacchā vā anutappatī”tipi pāṭho. Iccevāhāti iti evaṃ āhāti padacchedo, iti evaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1640_3: rājā janasandho avoca. Iccassuhātipi pāṭho. Tattha assu-kāro nipātamattaṃ iti assu
atk-s0513a4:1640_4: āhāti padacchedo. Idāni tāni dasa tapanīyakāraṇāni pakāsetuṃ bodhisattassa dhammakathā
atk-s0513a4:1640_5: hoti. Tattha pubbeti paṭhamameva taruṇakāle parakkamaṃ katvā asamudānitaṃ asambhataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1640_6: dhanaṃ mahallakakāle alabhitvā tappati socati, pare ca sukhite disvā sayaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1640_7: jīvanto “pubbe dhanaṃ na pariyesissa”nti evaṃ pacchā anutappati, tasmā mahallakakāle
atk-s0513a4:1640_8: sukhaṃ jīvitukāmā daharakāleyeva dhammikāni kasikammādīni katvā dhanaṃ pariyesathāti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:1641_0: Pure santanti pure daharakāle ācariye payirupāsitvā mayā kātuṃ sakyarūpaṃ samānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1641_1: hatthisippādikaṃ kiñci sippaṃ na sikkhitaṃ. Kicchāti mahallakakāle asippassa dukkhā
atk-s0513a4:1641_2: jīvitavutti, neva sakkā tadā sippaṃ sikkhituṃ, tasmā mahallakakāle sukhaṃ jīvitukāmā
atk-s0513a4:1641_3: taruṇakāleyeva sippaṃ sikkhathāti dasseti. Kuṭavedīti kūṭajānanako gāmakūṭako vā
atk-s0513a4:1641_4: lokassa anatthakārako vā tulākūṭādikārako vā kūṭaṭṭakārako vāti attho. Āsinti evarūpo
atk-s0513a4:1641_5: ahaṃ pubbe ahosiṃ. Pisuṇoti pesuññakāraṇo. Piṭṭhimaṃsikoti lañjaṃ gahetvā asāmike
atk-s0513a4:1641_6: sāmike karonto paresaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādako. Iti pacchāti evaṃ maraṇamañce nipanno
atk-s0513a4:1641_7: anutappati, tasmā sace niraye na vasitukāmāttha, mā evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ karitthāti ovadati.
atk-s0513a4:1642_0: Luddoti dāruṇo. Anāriyoti na ariyo nīcasamācāro. Nāpacāyissanti khantimettānuddayavasena
atk-s0513a4:1642_1: nīcavuttiko nāhosiṃ. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Anāpādāsūti āpādānaṃ āpādo,
atk-s0513a4:1642_2: pariggahoti attho. Natthi āpādo yāsaṃ tā anāpādā, aññehi akatapariggahāsūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1642_3: Upaṭṭhiteti paccupaṭṭhite. Na pubbeti ito pubbe dānaṃ na adadaṃ. Pahu santoti dhanabalenāpi
atk-s0513a4:1642_4: kāyabalenāpi posituṃ samattho paṭibalo samāno. Ācariyanti ācāre sikkhāpanato idha
atk-s0513a4:1642_5: pitā “ācariyo”ti adhippeto. Anusatthāranti anusāsakaṃ. Sabbakāmarasāharanti sabbe
atk-s0513a4:1642_6: vatthukāmarase āharitvā positāraṃ. Atimaññissanti tassa ovādaṃ agaṇhanto atikkamitvā maññissaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1643_0: Na pubbeti ito pubbe dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇepi gilānāgilānepi cīvarādīni datvā appaṭijagganena
atk-s0513a4:1643_1: na payirupāsissaṃ. Tapoti sucaritatapo. Santoti tīhi dvārehi upasanto sīlavā. Idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1643_2: vuttaṃ hoti – tividhasucaritasaṅkhāto tapo ciṇṇo evarūpo ca upasanto payirupāsito
atk-s0513a4:1643_3: nāma sādhu sundaro. Na pubbeti mayā daharakāle evarūpo tapo na ciṇṇo, iti pacchā
atk-s0513a4:1643_4: jarājiṇṇo maraṇabhayatajjito anutappati socati. Sace tumhe evaṃ na socitukāmā, tapokammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1643_5: karothāti vadati. Yo ca etānīti yo pana etāni dasa kāraṇāni paṭhamameva upāyena paṭipajjati
atk-s0513a4:1643_6: samādāya vattati, purisehi kattabbāni dhammikakiccāni karonto so appamādavihārī puriso
atk-s0513a4:1644: Iti mahāsatto anvaddhamāsaṃ iminā niyāmena mahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi. Mahājanopissa ovāde ṭhatvā tāni dasa ṭhānāni pūretvā saggaparāyaṇova ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1645_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, mahārāja, porāṇakapaṇḍitā anācariyakāpi
atk-s0513a4:1645_1: attano matiyāva dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ saggapathe patiṭṭhāpesu”nti vatvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1645_2: samodhānesi – “tadā parisā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, janasandharājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1649_0: Kaṇho kaṇho cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lokatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1649_1: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “yāvañcidaṃ, āvuso, satthā bahujanahitāya
atk-s0513a4:1649_2: paṭipanno attano phāsuvihāraṃ pahāya lokasseva atthaṃ carati, paramābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_3: patvā sayaṃ pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā pañcavaggiyattherānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_4: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pañcamiyā pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ kathetvā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_5: arahattaṃ adāsi. Uruvelaṃ gantvā tebhātikajaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
atk-s0513a4:1649_6: dassetvā pabbājetvā gayāsīse ādittapariyāyaṃ kathetvā jaṭilasahassānaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_7: adāsi, mahākassapassa tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ gantvā tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_8: adāsi. Eko pacchābhattaṃ pañcacattālīsayojanamaggaṃ gantvā pukkusātikulaputtaṃ anāgāmiphale
atk-s0513a4:1649_9: patiṭṭhāpesi, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1649_10: eko pacchābhattaṃ tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ gantvā tāva kakkhaḷaṃ pharusaṃ aṅgulimālaṃ arahatte
atk-s0513a4:1649_11: patiṭṭhāpesi, tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ gantvā āḷavakaṃ yakkhaṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1649_12: kumārassa sotthiṃ akāsi. Tāvatiṃsabhavane temāsaṃ vasanto asītiyā devatākoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_13: sampādesi, brahmalokaṃ gantvā bakabrahmuno diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā dasannaṃ brahmasahassānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_14: arahattaṃ adāsi, anusaṃvaccharaṃ tīsu maṇḍalesu cārikaṃ caramāno upanissayasampannānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_15: manussānaṃ saraṇāni ceva sīlānica maggaphalāni ca deti, nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1649_16: atthaṃ caratī”ti dasabalassa lokatthacariyaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0513a4:1649_17: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1649_18: bhikkhave, sohaṃ idāni abhisambodhiṃ patvā lokassa atthaṃ careyyaṃ, pubbe sarāgakālepi
atk-s0513a4:1649_19: lokassa atthaṃ acari”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1650_0: Atīte kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ usīnako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Kassapasammāsambuddhe
atk-s0513a4:1650_1: catusaccadesanāya mahājanaṃ kilesabandhanā mocetvā nibbānanagaraṃ pūretvā parinibbute
atk-s0513a4:1650_2: dīghassa addhuno accayena sāsanaṃ osakki. Bhikkhū ekavīsatiyā anesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappenti,
atk-s0513a4:1650_3: bhikkhū gihisaṃsaggaṃ karonti, puttadhītādīhi vaḍḍhanti. Bhikkhuniyopi gihisaṃsaggaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1650_4: karonti, puttadhītādīhi vaḍḍhanti. Bhikkhū bhikkhudhammaṃ, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunidhammaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1650_5: uposakā upāsakadhammaṃ, upāsikā upāsikadhammaṃ, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇadhammaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1650_6: Yebhuyyena manussā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattiṃsu, matamatā apāyesu paripūresuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1650_7: Tadā sakko devarājā nave nave deve apassanto manussalokaṃ oloketvā manussānaṃ apāyesu
atk-s0513a4:1650_8: nibbattitabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthu sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu karissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a4:1650_9: “attheko upāyo, mahājanaṃ tāsetvā bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā pacchā assāsetvā dhammaṃ desetvā
