atk-s0513a4:1650_10: osakkitaṃ sāsanaṃ paggayha aparampi vassasahassaṃ pavattanakāraṇaṃ karissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1650_11: katvā mātalidevaputtaṃ mocappamāṇadāṭhaṃ catūhi dāṭhāhi viniggatarasmiyā bhayānakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1650_12: katvā gabbhinīnaṃ dassaneneva gabbhapātanasamatthaṃ ghorarūpaṃ ājāneyyappamāṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1650_13: mahākaṇhasunakhaṃ māpetvā pañcabandhanena bandhitvā rattamālaṃ kaṇṭhe piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1650_14: rajjukoṭikaṃ ādāya sayaṃ dve kāsāyāni nivāsetvā pacchāmukhe pañcadhā kese bandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1650_15: rattamālaṃ piḷandhitvā āropitapavāḷavaṇṇajiyaṃ mahādhanuṃ gahetvā vajiragganārācaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1650_16: nakhena parivaṭṭento vanacarakavesaṃ gahetvā nagarato yojanamatte ṭhāne otaritvā
atk-s0513a4:1650_17: “nassati loko, nassati loko”ti tikkhattuṃ saddaṃ anusāvetvā manusse uttāsetvā nagarūpacāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1651_0: Manussā sunakhaṃ disvā utrastā nagaraṃ pavisitvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1651_1: sīghaṃ nagaradvārāni pidahāpesi. Sakkopi aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ ullaṅghitvā sunakhena
atk-s0513a4:1651_2: saddhiṃ antonagare patiṭṭhahi. Manussā bhītatasitā palāyitvā gehāni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1651_3: Mahākaṇhopi diṭṭhadiṭṭhe manusse upadhāvitvā santāsento rājanivesanaṃ agamāsi. Rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0513a4:1651_4: manussā bhayena palāyitvā rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidahiṃsu. Usīnakarājāpi
atk-s0513a4:1651_5: orodhe gahetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Mahākaṇho sunakho purimapāde ukkhipitvā vātapāne
atk-s0513a4:1651_6: ṭhatvā mahābhussitaṃ bhussi. Tassa saddo heṭṭhā avīciṃ, upari bhavaggaṃ patvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1651_7: ekaninnādaṃ ahosi. Vidhurajātake hi puṇṇakayakkharañño, kusajātake kusarañño, bhūridattajātake
atk-s0513a4:1651_8: sudassananāgarañño, imasmiṃ mahākaṇhajātake ayaṃ saddoti ime cattāro saddā jambudipe
atk-s0513a4:1652_0: Nagaravāsino bhītatasitā hutvā ekapurisopi sakkena saddhiṃ kathetuṃ nāsakkhi, rājāyeva
atk-s0513a4:1652_1: satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā vātapānaṃ nissāya sakkaṃ āmantetvā “ambho luddaka, kasmā te sunakho
atk-s0513a4:1652_2: bhussatī”ti āha. “Chātabhāvena, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi tassa bhattaṃ dāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1652_3: antojanassa ca attano ca pakkabhattaṃ sabbaṃ dāpesi. Taṃ sabbaṃ sunakho ekakabaḷaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1652_4: viya katvā puna saddamakāsi. Puna rājā pucchitvā “idānipi me sunakho chātoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1652_5: sutvā hatthiassādīnaṃ pakkabhattaṃ sabbaṃ āharāpetvā dāpesi. Tasmiṃ ekappahāreneva
atk-s0513a4:1652_6: niṭṭhāpite sakalanagarassa pakkabhattaṃ dāpesi. Tampi so tatheva bhuñjitvā puna saddamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1652_7: Rājā “na esa sunakho, nissaṃsayaṃ esa yakkho bhavissati, āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1654: “Kaṇho kaṇho ca ghoro ca, sukkadāṭho pabhāsavā;
atk-s0513a4:1655: Baddho pañcahi rajjūhi, kiṃ ravi sunakho tavā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1656_0: Tattha kaṇho kaṇhoti bhayavasena daḷhīvasena vā āmeḍitaṃ. Ghoroti passantānaṃ bhayajanako.
atk-s0513a4:1656_1: Pabhāsavāti dāṭhā nikkhantaraṃsipabhāsena pabhāsavā. Kiṃ ravīti kiṃ viravi. Tavesa
atk-s0513a4:1656_2: evarūpo kakkhaḷo sunakho kiṃ karoti, kiṃ mige gaṇhāti, udāhu te amitte, kiṃ te iminā,
atk-s0513a4:1660: Manussānaṃ anayo hutvā, tadā kaṇho pamokkhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1661_0: Tassattho – ayañhi “migamaṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti idha nāgato, tasmā migānaṃ attho na
atk-s0513a4:1661_1: bhavissati, manussamaṃsaṃ pana khādituṃ āgato, tasmā tesaṃ anayo mahāvināsakārako
atk-s0513a4:1661_2: hutvā yadā anena manussā vināsaṃ pāpitā bhavissanti, tadā ayaṃ kaṇho pamokkhati,
atk-s0513a4:1662_0: Atha naṃ rājā “kiṃ pana te bho luddaka-sunakho sabbesaṃyeva manussānaṃ maṃsaṃ khādissati,
atk-s0513a4:1662_1: udāhu tava amittānaññevā”ti pucchitvā “amittānaññeva me, mahārājā”ti vutte “ke pana
atk-s0513a4:1662_2: idha te amittā”ti pucchitvā “adhammābhiratā visamacārino, mahārājā”ti vutte “kathehi
atk-s0513a4:1662_3: tāva ne amhāka”nti pucchi. Athassa kathento devarājā dasa gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1668: Yadā loke gamissanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhati.
atk-s0513a4:1671: Iṇaṃ codāya gacchanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhati.
atk-s0513a4:1677: Pahū santo na bharanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhati.
atk-s0513a4:1680: Bālā tumheti vakkhanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhati.
atk-s0513a4:1683: Yadā loke gamissanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhati.
atk-s0513a4:1692: Yadā loke bhavissanti, tadā kaṇho pamokkhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1693_0: Tattha samaṇakāti “mayaṃ samaṇāmhā”ti paṭiññāmattakena hīḷitavohārenevamāha. Kasissantīti
atk-s0513a4:1693_1: te tadāpi kasantiyeva. Ayaṃ pana ajānanto viya evamāha. Ayañhissa adhippāyo – ete
atk-s0513a4:1693_2: evarūpā dussīlā mama amittā, yadā mama sunakhena ete māretvā maṃsaṃ khāditaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:1693_3: tadā esa kaṇho ito pañcarajjubandhanā pamokkhatīti. Iminā upāyena sabbagāthāsu adhippāyayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0513a4:1694_0: Pabbajitāti buddhasāsane pabbajitā. Gamissantīti agāramajjhe pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantiyo
atk-s0513a4:1694_1: vicarissanti. Dīghottaroṭṭhāti dāṭhikānaṃ vaḍḍhitattā dīghuttaroṭṭhā. Paṅkadantāti
atk-s0513a4:1694_2: paṅkena malena samannāgatadantā. Iṇaṃ codāyāti bhikkhācariyāya dhanaṃ saṃharitvā
atk-s0513a4:1694_3: vaḍḍhiyā iṇaṃ payojetvā taṃ codetvā tato laddhena jīvikaṃ kappentā yadā gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1695_0: Sāvittinti sāvittiñca adhiyitvā. Yaññatantañcāti yaññavidhāyakatantaṃ, yaññaṃ adhiyitvāti
atk-s0513a4:1695_1: attho. Bhatikāyāti te te rājarājamahāmatte upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ yaññaṃ yajissāma,
atk-s0513a4:1695_2: dhanaṃ dethā”ti evaṃ bhatiatthāya yadā yaññaṃ yajissanti. Pahū santoti bharituṃ posetuṃ
atk-s0513a4:1695_3: samatthā samānā. Bālā tumheti tumhe bālā na kiñci jānāthāti yadā vakkhanti. Gamissantīti
atk-s0513a4:1695_4: lokadhammasevanavasena gamissanti. Panthaghātanti panthe ṭhatvā manusse māretvā tesaṃ bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1696_1: apatikā, tāhi vidhavāhi veraṃ carantīti vedhaverā. Thūlabāhūti pādaparimaddanādīhi
atk-s0513a4:1696_2: samuṭṭhāpitamaṃsatāya mahābāhū. Apātubhāti apātubhāvā, dhanuppādarahitāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1696_3: Mittabhedanti mithubhedaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā evarūpā itthidhuttā
atk-s0513a4:1696_4: “imā amhe na jahissantī”ti sahiraññā vidhavā upagantvā saṃvāsaṃ kappetvā tāsaṃ santakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1696_5: khāditvā tāhi saddhiṃ mittabhedaṃ karissanti, vissāsaṃ bhinditvā aññaṃ sahiraññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1696_6: gamissanti, tadā esa te core sabbeva khāditvā muccissati. Asappurisacintakāti asappurisacittehi
atk-s0513a4:1696_7: paradukkhacintanasīlā. Tadāti tadā sabbepime ghātetvā khāditamaṃso kaṇho pamokkhatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1697_0: Evañca pana vatvā “ime mayhaṃ, mahārāja, amittā”ti te te adhammakārake pakkhanditvā
atk-s0513a4:1697_1: khāditukāmataṃ viya katvā dasseti. So tato mahājanassa utrastakāle sunakhaṃ rajjuyā
atk-s0513a4:1697_2: ākaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitaṃ viya katvā luddakavesaṃ vijahitvā attano ānubhāvena ākāse jalamāno
atk-s0513a4:1697_3: ṭhatvā “mahārāja, ahaṃ sakko devarājā, ‘ayaṃ loko vinassatī’ti āgato, pamattā hi
atk-s0513a4:1697_4: mahājanā, adhammaṃ vattitvā matamatā sampati apāye pūrenti, devaloko tuccho viya
atk-s0513a4:1697_5: vito, ito paṭṭhāya adhammikesu kattabbaṃ ahaṃ jānissāmi, tvaṃ appamatto hohi, mahārājā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1697_6: catūhi satārahagāthāhi dhammaṃ desetvā manussānaṃ dānasīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā osakkitasāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1697_7: aññaṃ vassasahassaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ katvā mātaliṃ ādāya sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Mahājanā
atk-s0513a4:1698: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhave pubbepāhaṃ lokassa atthameva carāmī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mātali ānando ahosi, sakko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1710_0: Nādaṭṭhā parato dosanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1710_1: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi dasabalassa puthubhūtesu sāvakesu aparimāṇesu devamanussesu ariyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1710_2: okkantesu patthaṭesu guṇasamudayesu mahālābhasakkāro udapādi. Titthiyā sūriyuggamane
atk-s0513a4:1710_3: khajjopanakasadisā ahesuṃ hatalābhasakkārā. Te antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā “kiṃ samaṇo
atk-s0513a4:1710_4: gotamova buddho, mayampi buddhā, kiṃ tasseva dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, amhākampi dinnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1710_5: mahapphalameva, amhākampi detha karothā”ti evaṃ manusse viññāpentāpi lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1710_6: alabhantā raho sannipatitvā “kena nu kho upāyena samaṇassa gotamassa manussānaṃ antare
atk-s0513a4:1710_7: avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā”ti mantayiṃsu. Tadā sāvatthiyaṃ ciñcamāṇavikā
atk-s0513a4:1710_8: nāmekā paribbājikā uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā devaccharā viya. Tassā sarīrato
atk-s0513a4:1710_9: rasmiyo niccharanti. Atheko kharamantī evamāha – “ciñcamāṇavikaṃ paṭicca samaṇassa
atk-s0513a4:1710_10: gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāsessāmā”ti. Te “attheso upāyo”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1710_11: Atha sā titthiyārāmaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi, titthiyā tāya saddhiṃ na kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1710_12: Sā “ko nu kho me doso”ti yāvatatiyaṃ “vandāmi ayyā”ti vatvā “ayyā, ko nu kho me doso,
atk-s0513a4:1710_13: kiṃ mayā saddhiṃ na kathethā”ti āha. “Bhagini, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhentaṃ hatalābhasakkāre
atk-s0513a4:1710_14: katvā vicarantaṃ na jānāsī”ti. “Nāhaṃ jānāmi ayyā, mayā kiṃ panettha kattabbanti.
atk-s0513a4:1710_15: Sace tvaṃ bhagini, amhākaṃ sukhamicchasi, attānaṃ paṭicca samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_0: Sā “sādhu ayyā, mayhameveso bhāro, mā cintayitthā”ti vatvā pakkamitvā itthimāyāsu
atk-s0513a4:1711_1: kusalatāya tato paṭṭhāya sāvatthivāsīnaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā jetavanā nikkhamanasamaye
atk-s0513a4:1711_2: indagopakavaṇṇaṃ paṭaṃ pārupitvā gandhamālādihatthā jetavanābhimukhī gacchantī “imāya
atk-s0513a4:1711_3: velāya kuhiṃ gacchasī”ti vutte “kiṃ tumhākaṃ mama gamanaṭṭhānenā”ti vatvā jetavanasamīpe
atk-s0513a4:1711_4: titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova “aggavandanaṃ vandissāmā”ti nagarā nikkhamante upāsakajane
atk-s0513a4:1711_5: jetavane vutthā viya hutvā nagaraṃ pavisati. “Kuhiṃ vutthāsī”ti vutte “kiṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_6: mama vutthaṭṭhānenā”ti vatvā māsaḍḍhamāsaccayena pucchiyamānā “jetavane samaṇena
atk-s0513a4:1711_7: gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyā vutthāmhī”ti āha. Puthujjanānaṃ “saccaṃ nu kho etaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1711_8: no”ti kaṅkhaṃ uppādetvā temāsacatumāsaccayena pilotikāhi udaraṃ veṭhetvā gabbhinivaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_9: dassetvā upari rattapaṭaṃ pārupitvā “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṭicca gabbho me laddho”ti
atk-s0513a4:1711_10: andhabāle gāhāpetvā aṭṭhanavamāsaccayena udare dārumaṇḍalikaṃ bandhitvā upari rattapaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_11: pārupitvā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo gohanukena koṭṭāpetvā ussade dassetvā kilantindriyā
atk-s0513a4:1711_12: hutvā sāyanhasamaye tathāgate alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desente dhammasabhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_13: gantvā tathāgatassa purato ṭhatvā “mahāsamaṇa, mahājanassa tāva dhammaṃ desesi, madhuro
atk-s0513a4:1711_14: te saddo, suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, ahaṃ pana taṃ paṭicca gabbhaṃ labhitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā
atk-s0513a4:1711_15: jātā, neva me sūtigharaṃ jānāsi, na sappitelādīni, sayaṃ akaronto upaṭṭhākānampi
atk-s0513a4:1711_16: aññataraṃ kosalarājānaṃ vā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ vā visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ vā “imissā ciñcamāṇavikāya
atk-s0513a4:1711_17: kattabbayuttaṃ karohī’ti na vadasi, abhiramituṃyeva jānāsi, gabbhaparihāraṃ na jānāsī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1711_18: gūthapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā candamaṇḍalaṃ dūsetuṃ vāyamantī viya parisamajjhe tathāgataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1711_19: akkosi. Tathāgato dhammakathaṃ ṭhapetvā sīho viya abhinadanto “bhagini, tayā kathitassa
atk-s0513a4:1711_20: tathabhāvaṃ vā atathabhāvaṃ vā ahañceva tvañca jānāmā”ti āha. Āma, samaṇa, tayā ca
atk-s0513a4:1712_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So āvajjamāno “ciñcamāṇavikā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_1: abhūtena akkosatī”ti ñatvā “imaṃ vatthuṃ sodhessāmī”ti catūhi devaputtehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_2: āgami. Devaputtā mūsikapotakā hutvā dārumaṇḍalikassa bandhanarajjuke ekappahāreneva
atk-s0513a4:1712_3: chindiṃsu, pārutapaṭaṃ vāto ukkhipi, dārumaṇḍalikaṃ patamānaṃ tassā pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_4: pati, ubho aggapādā chijjiṃsu. Manussā uṭṭhāya “kāḷakaṇṇi, sammāsambuddhaṃ akkosasī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1712_5: sīse kheḷaṃ pātetvā leḍḍudaṇḍādihatthā jetavanā nīhariṃsu. Athassā tathāgatassa cakkhupathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_6: atikkantakāle mahāpathavī bhijjitvā vivaramadāsi, avīcito aggijālā uṭṭhahi. Sā kuladattiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_7: kambalaṃ pārupamānā viya gantvā avīcimhi nibbatti. Aññatitthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi,
atk-s0513a4:1712_8: dasabalassa bhiyyosomattāya vaḍḍhi. Punadivase dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a4:1712_9: “āvuso, ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā
atk-s0513a4:1712_10: mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1712_11: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi esā maṃ abhūtena
atk-s0513a4:1712_12: akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1713_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a4:1713_2: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā āgami. Athassa mātā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1713_3: Rājā aññaṃ aggamahesiṃ katvā puttassa uparajjaṃ adāsi. Aparabhāge rājā paccantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1713_4: kupitaṃ vūpasametuṃ aggamahesiṃ āha “bhadde, idheva vasa, ahaṃ paccantaṃ kupitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1713_5: vūpasametuṃ gacchāmī”ti vatvā “nāhaṃ idheva vasissāmi, ahampi gamissāmī”ti vutte
atk-s0513a4:1713_6: yuddhabhūmiyā ādīnavaṃ dassetvā “yāva mamāgamanā anukkaṇṭhamānā vasa, ahaṃ padumakumāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1713_7: yathā tava kattabbakiccesu appamatto hoti, evaṃ āṇāpetvā gamissāmī”ti vatvā tathā
atk-s0513a4:1713_8: katvā gantvā paccāmitte palāpetvā janapadaṃ santappetvā paccāgantvā bahinagare khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1713_9: nivāsesi. Bodhisatto pitu āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā rājagehaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1714_0: Sā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā ahosi. Bodhisatto taṃ vanditvā “amma,
atk-s0513a4:1714_1: kiṃ amhākaṃ kattabba”nti pucchi. Atha naṃ “ammāti maṃ vadasī”ti uṭṭhāya hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:1714_2: “sayanaṃ abhiruhā”ti āha. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Yāva rājā na āgacchati, tāva ubhopi kilesaratiyā
atk-s0513a4:1714_3: ramissāmā”ti. “Amma, tvaṃ mama mātā ca sasāmikā ca, mayā sapariggaho mātugāmo nāma
atk-s0513a4:1714_4: kilesavasena indriyāni bhinditvā na olokitapubbo, kathaṃ tayā saddhiṃ evarūpaṃ kiliṭṭhakammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1714_5: karissāmī”ti. Sā dve tayo vāre kathetvā tasmiṃ anicchamāne “mama vacanaṃ na karosī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1714_6: āha. “Āma, na karomī”ti. “Tena hi rañño kathetvā sīsaṃ te chindāpessāmī”ti. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a4:1714_7: “tava ruciṃ karohī”ti vatvā taṃ lajjāpetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1715_0: Sā bhītatasitā cintesi “sace ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ pitu ārocessati, jīvitaṃ me natthi, ahameva
atk-s0513a4:1715_1: puretaraṃ kathessāmī”ti bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā kiliṭṭhalomavatthaṃ nivāsetvā sarīre nakharājiyo
atk-s0513a4:1715_2: dassetvā “kuhiṃ devīti rañño pucchanakāle “gilānā’ti katheyyāthā”ti paricārikānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1715_3: saññaṃ datvā gilānālayaṃ katvā nipajji. Rājāpi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1715_4: āruyha taṃ apassanto “kuhiṃ devī”ti pucchitvā “gilānā”ti sutvā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:1715_5: “kiṃ te devi, aphāsuka”nti pucchi. Sā tassa vacanaṃ asuṇantī viya hutvā dve tayo
atk-s0513a4:1715_6: vāre pucchitā “mahārāja, kasmā kathesi, tuṇhī hohi, sasāmikaitthiyo nāma mādisā na
atk-s0513a4:1715_7: hontī”ti vatvā “kena tvaṃ viheṭhitāsi, sīghaṃ me kathehi, sīsamassa chindissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1715_8: vutte “kaṃsi tvaṃ, mahārāja, nagare ṭhapetvā gato”ti vatvā “padumakumāra”nti vutte
atk-s0513a4:1715_9: “so mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā ‘tāta, mā evaṃ karohi, ahaṃ tava mātā’ti vuccamānopi
atk-s0513a4:1715_10: ‘ṭhapetvā maṃ añño rājā natthi, ahaṃ taṃ gehe karitvā kilesaratiyā ramissāmī’ti maṃ
atk-s0513a4:1715_11: kesesu gahetvā aparāparaṃ luñcitvā attano vacanaṃ akarontiṃ maṃ pātetvā koṭṭetvā gato”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1716_0: Rājā anupaparikkhitvāva āsīviso viya kuddho purise āṇāpesi “gacchatha, bhaṇe, padumakumāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1716_1: bandhitvā ānethā”ti. Te nagaraṃ avattharantā viya tassa gehaṃ gantvā taṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1716_2: paharitvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakaṇaveramālaṃ gīvāyaṃ paṭimuñcitvā
atk-s0513a4:1716_3: vajjhaṃ katvā ānayiṃsu. So “deviyā idaṃ kamma”nti ñatvā “bho purisā, nāhaṃ rañño
atk-s0513a4:1716_4: dosakārako, nipparādhohamasmī”ti vilapanto āgacchati. Sakalanagaraṃ saṃkhubbhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1716_5: “rājā kira mātugāmassa vacanaṃ gahetvā mahāpadumakumāraṃ ghātāpesī”ti sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a4:1716_6: rājakumārassa pādamūle nipatitvā “idaṃ te sāmi, ananucchavika”nti mahāsaddena paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:1716_7: Atha naṃ netvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā disvāva cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ asakkonto “ayaṃ arājāva
atk-s0513a4:1716_8: rājalīḷaṃ karoti, mama putto hutvā aggamahesiyā aparajjhati, gacchatha naṃ corapapāte
atk-s0513a4:1716_9: pātetvā vināsaṃ pāpethā”ti āha. Mahāsatto “na mayhaṃ, tāta, evarūpo aparādho atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1716_10: mātugāmassa vacanaṃ gahetvā mā maṃ nāsehī”ti pitaraṃ yāci. So tassa kathaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:1717_0: Tato soḷasasahassā antepurikā “tāta mahāpadumakumāra, attano ananucchavikaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1717_1: laddha”nti mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Sabbe khattiyamahāsālādayopi amaccaparijanāpi “deva,
atk-s0513a4:1717_2: kumāro sīlācāraguṇasampanno vaṃsānurakkhito rajjadāyādo, mā naṃ mātugāmassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1717_3: gahetvā anupaparikkhitvāva vināsehi, raññā nāma nisammakārinā bhavitabba”nti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:1726: Andhova visamaṃ maggaṃ, na jānāti samāsamaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1728: “Yo ca etāni ṭhānāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0513a4:1739_0: Tattha nādaṭṭhāti na adisvā. Paratoti parassa. Sabbasoti sabbāni. Aṇuṃthūlānīti khuddakamahantāni
atk-s0513a4:1739_1: vajjāni. Sāmaṃ appaṭivekkhiyāti parassa vacanaṃ gahetvā attano paccakkhaṃ akatvā
atk-s0513a4:1739_2: pathavissaro rājā daṇḍaṃ na paṇaye na paṭṭhapeyya. Mahāsammatarājakālasmiñhi satato
atk-s0513a4:1739_3: uttari daṇḍo nāma natthi, tāḷanagarahaṇapabbājanato uddhaṃ hatthapādacchedanaghātanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1739_4: nāma natthi, pacchā kakkhaḷarājūnaṃyeva kāle etaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ sandhāya te amaccā
atk-s0513a4:1739_5: “ekanteneva parassa dosaṃ sāmaṃ adisvā kātuṃ na yutta”nti kathentā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1740_0: Yo ca appaṭivekkhitvāti mahārāja, evaṃ appaṭivekkhitvā dosānucchavike daṇḍe paṇetabbe
atk-s0513a4:1740_1: yo rājā agatigamane ṭhito taṃ dosaṃ appaṭivekkhitvā hatthacchedādidaṇḍaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:1740_2: so attano dukkhakāraṇaṃ karonto sakaṇṭakaṃ bhojanaṃ gilati nāma, jaccandho viya ca
atk-s0513a4:1740_3: samakkhikaṃ bhuñjati nāma. Adaṇḍiyanti yo adaṇḍiyaṃ adaṇḍapaṇetabbañca daṇḍetvā daṇḍiyañca
atk-s0513a4:1740_4: daṇḍapaṇetabbaṃ adaṇḍetvā attano rucimeva karoti, so andho viya visamaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno,
atk-s0513a4:1740_5: na jānāti samāsamaṃ, tato pāsāṇādīsu pakkhalanto andho viya catūsu apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1740_6: pāpuṇātīti attho. Etāni ṭhānānīti etāni daṇḍiyādaṇḍiyakāraṇāni ceva daṇḍiyakāraṇesupi
atk-s0513a4:1740_7: aṇuṃthūlāni ca sabbāni sudiṭṭhaṃ disvā anusāseyya, sa ve voharituṃ rajjamanusāsituṃ arahatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1741_0: Attaṃ mahante ṭhapetunti evarūpo anuppanne bhoge uppādetvā uppanne thāvare katvā
atk-s0513a4:1741_1: attānaṃ mahante uḷāre issariye ṭhapetuṃ na sakkotīti attho. Mudūti mudurājā raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1741_2: paribhūto hoti avaññāto, so rajjaṃ niccoraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Veravāti atitikkhassa
atk-s0513a4:1741_3: pana sabbepi raṭṭhavāsino verino hontīti so veravā nāma hoti. Anumajjhanti anubhūtaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1741_4: mudutikhiṇabhāvānaṃ majjhaṃ samācare, amudu atikkho hutvā rajjaṃ kāreyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1741_5: Na itthikāraṇāti pāpaṃ lāmakaṃ mātugāmaṃ nissāya vaṃsānurakkhakaṃ chattadāyādaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1742_0: Evaṃ nānākāraṇehi kathentāpi amaccā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a4:1742_1: yācanto attano kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. Andhabālo pana rājā “gacchatha naṃ corapapāte
atk-s0513a4:1746_0: Tattha tenāhanti yena kāraṇena sabbo loko ekato kumārasseva pakkho hutvā ṭhito, ayañca
atk-s0513a4:1746_1: itthī ekikāva, tena kāraṇena ahaṃ imissā vacanaṃ paṭipajjissaṃ, gacchatha taṃ pabbataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1747_0: Evaṃ vutte soḷasasahassāsu rājaitthīsu ekāpi sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, sakalanagaravāsino
atk-s0513a4:1747_1: bāhā paggayha kanditvā kese vikirayamānā vilapiṃsu. Rājā “ime imassa papāte khipanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1747_2: paṭibāheyyu”nti saparivāro gantvā mahājanassa paridevantasseva naṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ avaṃsiraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1747_3: katvā gāhāpetvā papāte khipāpesi. Athassa mettānubhāvena pabbate adhivatthā devatā
atk-s0513a4:1747_4: “mā bhāyi mahāpadumā”ti taṃ samassāsetvā ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā hadaye ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:1747_5: dibbasamphassaṃ pharāpetvā otaritvā pabbatapāde patiṭṭhitanāgarājassa phaṇagabbhe
atk-s0513a4:1747_6: ṭhapesi. Nāgarājā bodhisattaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ netvā attano yasaṃ majjhe bhinditvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1747_7: So tattha ekasaṃvaccharaṃ vasitvā “manussapathaṃ gamissāmī”ti vatvā “kataraṃ ṭhāna”nti
atk-s0513a4:1747_8: vutte “himavantaṃ gantvā pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Nāgarājā “sādhū”ti taṃ gahetvā manussapathe
atk-s0513a4:1747_9: patiṭṭhāpetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre datvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Sopi himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:1747_10: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññaṃ nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro tattha paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a4:1748_0: Atheko bārāṇasivāsī vanacarako taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto mahāsattaṃ sañjānitvā “nanu tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1748_1: deva, mahāpadumakumāro”ti vatvā “āma, sammā”ti vutte taṃ vanditvā katipāhaṃ tattha
atk-s0513a4:1748_2: vasitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rañño ārocesi “deva, putto te himavantapadese isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1748_3: pabbajitvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati, ahaṃ tassa santike vasitvā āgato”ti. “Paccakkhato
atk-s0513a4:1748_4: te diṭṭho”ti? “Āma devā”ti. Rājā mahābalakāyaparivuto tattha gantvā vanapariyante
atk-s0513a4:1748_5: khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā amaccagaṇaparivuto paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā kañcanarūpasadisaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0513a4:1748_6: nisinnaṃ mahāsattaṃ disvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Amaccāpi vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1748_7: katvā nisīdiṃsu. Bodhisattopi rājānaṃ paṭipucchitvā paṭisanthāramakāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a4:1748_8: rājā “tāta, mayā tvaṃ gambhīre papāte khipāpito, kathaṃ sajīvitosī”ti pucchanto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1751: Pātito giriduggasmiṃ, kena tvaṃ tattha nāmarī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1752: Tattha anekatāleti anekatālappamāṇe. Nāmarīti na amari.
atk-s0513a4:1756: Paccaggahi maṃ bhogehi, tenāhaṃ tattha nāmariṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1759: Rajjaṃ kārehi bhaddante, kiṃ araññe karissasi.
atk-s0513a4:1762: Uddharitvā sukhī assa, evaṃ passāmi attanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1764: “Kiṃ nu tvaṃ baḷisaṃ brūsi, kiṃ tvaṃ brūsi salohitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1765: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ ubbhataṃ brūsi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
atk-s0513a4:1768: Cattāhaṃ ubbhataṃ brūmi, evaṃ jānāhi khattiyā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1769: Imāsu pañcasu ekantarikā tisso gāthā bodhisattassa, dve rañño.
atk-s0513a4:1770_0: Tattha paccaggahi manti pabbatapatanakāle devatāya pariggahetvā dibbasamphassena
atk-s0513a4:1770_1: samassāsetvā upanītaṃ maṃ paṭiggaṇhi, gahetvā ca pana nāgabhavanaṃ ānetvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1770_2: yasaṃ datvā “manussapathaṃ maṃ nehī”ti vutto maṃ manussapathaṃ ānesi. Ahaṃ idhāgantvā
atk-s0513a4:1770_3: pabbajito, iti tena devatāya ca nāgarājassa ca ānubhāvena ahaṃ tattha nāmarinti sabbaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:1771_0: Ehīti rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā somanassappatto hutvā “tāta, ahaṃ bālabhāvena itthiyā
atk-s0513a4:1771_1: vacanaṃ gahetvā evaṃ sīlācārasampanne tayi aparajjhiṃ, khamāhi me dosa”nti pādesu
atk-s0513a4:1771_2: nipatitvā “uṭṭhehi, mahārāja, khamāma te dosaṃ, ito paraṃ puna mā evaṃ anisammakārī
atk-s0513a4:1771_3: bhaveyyāsī”ti vutte “tāta, tvaṃ attano kulasantakaṃ setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1772_0: Uddharitvāti hadayavakkādīni asampattameva taṃ uddharitvā sukhī assa. Evaṃ passāmi
atk-s0513a4:1772_1: attananti attānaṃ mahārāja, evaṃ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṃ gilitabaḷisaṃ purisamiva
atk-s0513a4:1772_2: attānaṃ passāmīti. “Kiṃ nu tva”nti idaṃ rājā tamatthaṃ vitthārato sotuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:1772_3: Kāmāhanti pañca kāmaguṇe ahaṃ. Hatthiassaṃ salohitanti evaṃ hatthiassarathavāhanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1772_4: sattaratanādivibhavaṃ “salohita”nti brūmi. Cattāhanti cattaṃ ahaṃ, yadā taṃ sabbampi
atk-s0513a4:1772_5: cattaṃ hoti pariccattaṃ, taṃ dānāhaṃ “ubbhata”nti brūmi.
atk-s0513a4:1773_0: “Iti kho, mahārāja, mayhaṃ rajjena kiccaṃ natthi, tvaṃ pana dasa rājadhamme akopetvā
atk-s0513a4:1773_1: agatigamanaṃ pahāya dhammena rajjaṃ kārehī”ti mahāsatto pitu ovādaṃ adāsi. So rājā
atk-s0513a4:1773_2: roditvā paridevitvā nagaraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge amacce pucchi. “Ahaṃ kaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:1773_3: evarūpena ācāraguṇasampannena puttena viyogaṃ patto”ti? “Aggamahesiṃ, devā”ti. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1773_4: taṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ gāhāpetvā corapapāte khipāpetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:1774: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbepesā maṃ akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0513a4:1777: Ānando paṇḍito nāgo, sāriputto ca devatā;
atk-s0513a4:1778: Rājaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1783_0: Kāni kammānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño atthacarakaṃ amaccaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:1783_1: kathesi. So kira rañño bahūpakāro ahosi. Athassa rājā atirekasammānaṃ kāresi. Avasesā
atk-s0513a4:1783_2: naṃ asahamānā “deva, asuko nāma amacco tumhākaṃ anatthakārako”ti paribhindiṃsu. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1783_3: taṃ pariggaṇhanto kiñci dosaṃ adisvā “ahaṃ imassa kiñci dosaṃ na passāmi, kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1783_4: nu kho sakkā mayā imassa mittabhāvaṃ vā amittabhāvaṃ vā jānitu”nti cintetvā “imaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1783_5: pañhaṃ ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ añño jānituṃ na sakkhissati, gantvā pucchissāmī”ti bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0513a4:1783_6: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, kathaṃ nu kho sakkā purisena attano mittabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1783_7: vā amittabhāvaṃ vā jānitu”nti pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā “pubbepi mahārāja, paṇḍitā
atk-s0513a4:1783_8: imaṃ pañhaṃ cintetvā paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi kathitavasena ñatvā amitte vajjetvā mitte
atk-s0513a4:1783_9: seviṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1784_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammānusāsako
atk-s0513a4:1784_1: amacco ahosi. Tadā bārāṇasirañño ekaṃ atthacarakaṃ amaccaṃ sesā paribhindiṃsu. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1784_2: tassa dosaṃ apassanto “kathaṃ nu kho sakkā mittaṃ vā amittaṃ vā ñātu”nti mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1787: Amittaṃ jāneyya medhāvī, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1788: Tassattho – kāni kammāni karontaṃ medhāvī paṇḍito puriso cakkhunā disvā vā sotena sutvā vā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ amitto”ti jāneyya, tassa jānanatthāya kathaṃ viññū parakkameyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:1791: “Na naṃ umhayate disvā, na ca naṃ paṭinandati;
atk-s0513a4:1792: Cakkhūni cassa na dadāti, paṭilomañca vattati.
atk-s0513a4:1794: “Amitte tassa bhajati, mitte tassa na sevati;
atk-s0513a4:1797: “Guyhañca tassa nakkhāti, tassa guyhaṃ na gūhati;
atk-s0513a4:1798: Kammaṃ tassa na vaṇṇeti, paññassa nappasaṃsati.
atk-s0513a4:1800: “Abhave nandati tassa, bhave tassa na nandati;
atk-s0513a4:1801: Accheraṃ bhojanaṃ laddhā, tassa nuppajjate sati;
atk-s0513a4:1802: Tato naṃ nānukampati, aho sopi labheyyito.
atk-s0513a4:1805: Yehi amittaṃ jāneyya, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1806: Mahāsatto imā pañca gāthā vatvāna puna –
atk-s0513a4:1809: Mittaṃ jāneyya medhāvī, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1810: Imāya gāthāya mittalakkhaṇaṃ puṭṭho sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1815: “Mitte tasseva bhajati, amitte tassa na sevati;
atk-s0513a4:1819: Kammañca tassa vaṇṇeti, paññaṃ tassa pasaṃsati.
atk-s0513a4:1821: “Bhave ca nandati tassa, abhave tassa na nandati;
atk-s0513a4:1822: Accheraṃ bhojanaṃ laddhā, tassa uppajjate sati;
atk-s0513a4:1823: Tato naṃ anukampati, aho sopi labheyyito.
atk-s0513a4:1826: Yehi mittañca jāneyya, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1827_0: Tattha na naṃ umhayate disvāti taṃ mittaṃ mittapatirūpako disvā sitaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0513a4:1827_1: pahaṭṭhākāraṃ na dasseti. Na ca naṃ paṭinandatīti tassa kathaṃ paggaṇhanto na paṭinandati
atk-s0513a4:1827_2: na tussati. Cakkhūni cassa na dadātīti olokentaṃ na oloketi. Paṭilomañcāti tassa
atk-s0513a4:1827_3: kathaṃ paṭippharati paṭisattu hoti. Vaṇṇakāmeti tassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇante. Nakkhātīti
atk-s0513a4:1827_4: attano guyhaṃ tassa na ācikkhati. Kammaṃ tassāti tena katakammaṃ na vaṇṇayati. Paññassāti
atk-s0513a4:1827_5: assa paññaṃ nappasaṃsati, ñāṇasampadaṃ na pasaṃsati. Abhaveti avaḍḍhiyaṃ. Tassa nuppajjate
atk-s0513a4:1827_6: satīti tassa mittapatirūpakassa “mama mittassapi ito dassāmī”ti sati na uppajjati.
atk-s0513a4:1827_7: Nānukampatīti muducittena na cinteti. Labheyyitoti labheyya ito. Ākārāti kāraṇāni.
atk-s0513a4:1827_8: Pavutthanti videsagataṃ. Kelāyitoti kelāyati mamāyati pattheti piheti icchatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1827_9: Vācāyāti madhuravacanena taṃ samudācaranto paṭinandati tussati. Sesaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhanayena
atk-s0513a4:1827_10: veditabbaṃ. Rājā mahāsattassa kathāya attamano hutvā tassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1828_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, mahārāja, pubbepesa pañho samuṭṭhahi, paṇḍitāva
atk-s0513a4:1828_1: naṃ kathayiṃsu, imehi dvattiṃsāya ākārehi mittāmitto jānitabbo”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a4:1828_2: – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1839_0: Ahāsi me ambaphalāni pubbeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1839_1: Devadatto hi “ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, mayhaṃ samaṇo gotamo neva ācariyo na upajjhāyo”ti
atk-s0513a4:1839_2: ācariyaṃ paccakkhāya jhānaparihīno saṅghaṃ bhinditvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgacchanto
atk-s0513a4:1839_3: bahijetavane pathaviyā vivare dinne avīciṃ pāvisi. Tadā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1839_4: samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, devadatto ācariyaṃ paccakkhāya mahāvināsaṃ patto, avīcimahāniraye
atk-s0513a4:1839_5: nibbatto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1839_6: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1839_7: paccakkhāya mahāvināsaṃ pattoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1840_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa purohitakulaṃ ahivātarogena vinassi.
atk-s0513a4:1840_1: Ekova putto bhittiṃ bhinditvā palāto. So takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassācariyassa
atk-s0513a4:1840_2: santike tayo vede ca avasesasippāni ca uggahetvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā nikkhanto “desacārittaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1840_3: jānissāmī”ti caranto ekaṃ paccantanagaraṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ nissāya mahācaṇḍālagāmako ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1840_4: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ gāme paṭivasati, paṇḍito byatto akāle phalaṃ gaṇhāpanamantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1840_5: jānāti. So pātova vuṭṭhāya kājaṃ ādāya tato gāmā nikkhimitvā araññe ekaṃ ambarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1840_6: upasaṅkamitvā sattapadamatthake ṭhito taṃ mantaṃ parivattetvā ambarukkhaṃ ekena udakapasatena
atk-s0513a4:1840_7: paharati. Rukkhato taṅkhaṇaññeva purāṇapaṇṇāni patanti, navāni uṭṭhahanti, pupphāni
atk-s0513a4:1840_8: pupphitvā patanti, ambaphalāni uṭṭhāya muhutteneva paccitvā madhurāni ojavantāni
atk-s0513a4:1840_9: dibbarasasadisāni hutvā rukkhato patanti. Mahāsatto tāni uccinitvā yāvadatthaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0513a4:1840_10: kājaṃ pūrāpetvā gehaṃ gantvā tāni vikkiṇitvā puttadāraṃ posesi.
atk-s0513a4:1841_0: So brāhmaṇakumāro mahāsattaṃ akāle ambapakkāni āharitvā vikkiṇantaṃ disvā “nissaṃsayena
atk-s0513a4:1841_1: tehi mantabalena uppannehi bhavitabbaṃ, imaṃ purisaṃ nissāya idaṃ anagghamantaṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1841_2: cintetvā mahāsattassa ambāni āharaṇaniyāmaṃ pariggaṇhanto tathato ñatvā tasmiṃ araññato
atk-s0513a4:1841_3: anāgateyeva tassa gehaṃ gantvā ajānanto viya hutvā tassa bhariyaṃ “kuhiṃ ayyo, ācariyo”ti
atk-s0513a4:1841_4: pucchitvā “araññaṃ gato”ti vutte taṃ āgataṃ āgamayamānova ṭhatvā āgacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:1841_5: hatthato pacchiṃ gahetvā āharitvā gehe ṭhapesi. Mahāsatto taṃ oloketvā bhariyaṃ āha
atk-s0513a4:1841_6: – “bhadde, ayaṃ māṇavo mantatthāya āgato, tassa hatthe manto nassati, asappuriso
atk-s0513a4:1841_7: eso”ti. Māṇavopi “ahaṃ imaṃ mantaṃ ācariyassa upakārako hutvā labhissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a4:1841_8: tato paṭṭhāya tassa gehe sabbakiccāni karoti. Dārūni āharati, vīhiṃ koṭṭeti, bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1842_0: Ekadivasaṃ mahāsattena “tāta māṇava, mañcapādānaṃ me upadhānaṃ dehī”ti vutte aññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1842_1: apassitvā sabbarattiṃ ūrumhi ṭhapetvā nisīdi. Aparabhāge mahāsattassa bhariyā puttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1842_2: vijāyi. Tassā pasūtikāle parikammaṃ sabbamakāsi. Sā ekadivasaṃ mahāsattaṃ āha “sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1842_3: ayaṃ māṇavo jātisampanno hutvā mantatthāya amhākaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti, etassa hatthe
atk-s0513a4:1842_4: manto tiṭṭhatu vā mā vā, detha tassa manta”nti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tassa
atk-s0513a4:1842_5: mantaṃ datvā evamāha – “tāta, anagghoyaṃ manto, tava imaṃ nissāya mahālābhasakkāro
atk-s0513a4:1842_6: bhavissati, raññā vā rājamahāmattena vā ‘ko te ācariyo’ti puṭṭhakāle mā maṃ nigūhittho,
atk-s0513a4:1842_7: sace hi ‘caṇḍālassa me santikā manto gahito’ti lajjanto ‘brāhmaṇamahāsālo me ācariyo’ti
atk-s0513a4:1842_8: kathessasi, imassa mantassa phalaṃ na labhissasī”ti. So “kiṃ kāraṇā taṃ nigūhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1842_9: kenaci puṭṭhakāle tumheyeva kathessāmī”ti vatvā taṃ vanditvā caṇḍālagāmato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1842_10: mantaṃ vīmaṃsitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā ambāni vikkiṇitvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a4:1843_0: Athekadivasaṃ uyyānapālo tassa hatthato ambaṃ kiṇitvā rañño adāsi. Rājā taṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a4:1843_1: “kuto samma, tayā evarūpaṃ ambaṃ laddha”nti pucchi. Deva, eko māṇavo akālaambaphalāni
atk-s0513a4:1843_2: ānetvā vikkiṇāti, tato me gahitanti. Tena hi “ito paṭṭhāya idheva ambāni āharatū”ti
atk-s0513a4:1843_3: naṃ vadehīti. So tathā akāsi. Māṇavopi tato paṭṭhāya ambāni rājakulaṃ harati. Atha
atk-s0513a4:1843_4: raññā “upaṭṭhaha ma”nti vutte rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanto bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhitvā anukkamena
atk-s0513a4:1843_5: vissāsiko jāto. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ rājā pucchi “māṇava, kuto akāle evaṃ vaṇṇagandharasasampannāni
atk-s0513a4:1843_6: ambāni labhasi, kiṃ te nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā devo vā koci deti, udāhu mantabalaṃ eta”nti?
atk-s0513a4:1843_7: “Na me mahārāja, koci deti, anaggho pana me manto atthi, tasseva bala”nti. “Tena
atk-s0513a4:1843_8: hi mayampi te ekadivasaṃ mantabalaṃ daṭṭhukāmā”ti. “Sādhu, deva, dassessāmī”ti. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1843_9: punadivase tena saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā “dassehī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti ambarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1843_10: upagantvā sattapadamatthake ṭhito mantaṃ parivattetvā rukkhaṃ udakena pahari. Taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a4:1843_11: ambarukkho heṭṭhā vuttaniyāmeneva phalaṃ gahetvā mahāmegho viya ambavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0513a4:1844_0: Rājā ambaphalāni khāditvā tassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “māṇavaka, evarūpo te acchariyamanto
atk-s0513a4:1844_1: kassa santike gahito”ti pucchi. Māṇavo “sacāhaṃ ‘caṇḍālassa santike’ti vakkhāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1844_2: lajjitabbakaṃ bhavissati, mañca garahissanti, manto kho pana me paguṇo, idāni na
atk-s0513a4:1844_3: nassissati, disāpāmokkhaṃ ācariyaṃ apadisāmī”ti cintetvā musāvādaṃ katvā “takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1844_4: disāpāmokkhācariyassa santike gahito me”ti vadanto ācariyaṃ paccakkhāsi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a4:1844_5: manto antaradhāyi. Rājā somanassajāto taṃ ādāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā punadivase “ambāni
atk-s0513a4:1844_6: khādissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīditvā māṇava, ambāni āharāti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1844_7: So “sādhū”ti ambaṃ upagantvā sattapadamatthake ṭhito “mantaṃ parivattessāmī”ti mante
atk-s0513a4:1844_8: anupaṭṭhahante antarahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā lajjito aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “ayaṃ pubbe parisamajjheyeva
atk-s0513a4:1844_9: ambāni āharitvā amhākaṃ deti, ghanameghavassaṃ viya ambavassaṃ vassāpeti, idāni thaddho
atk-s0513a4:1844_10: viya ṭhito, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā taṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1846: “Ahāsi me ambaphalāni pubbe, aṇūni thūlāni ca brahmacāri;
atk-s0513a4:1847: Teheva mantehi na dāni tuyhaṃ, dumapphalā pātubhavanti brahme”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1849: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “sace ‘ajja ambaphalaṃ na gaṇhāmī’ti vakkhāmi, rājā me kujjhissati, musāvādena naṃ vañcessāmī”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1851: “Nakkhattayogaṃ paṭimānayāmi, khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1852: Nakkhattayogañca khaṇañca laddhā, addhā harissambaphalaṃ pahūta”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1854: Rājā “ayaṃ aññadā nakkhattayogaṃ na vadati, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti pucchanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1856: “Nakkhattayogaṃ na pure abhāṇi, khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na pure asaṃsi;
atk-s0513a4:1857: Sayaṃ harī ambaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1859: “Mantābhijappena pure hi tuyhaṃ, dumapphalā pātubhavanti brahme;
atk-s0513a4:1860: Svājja na pāresi jappampi mantaṃ, ayaṃ so ko nāma tavajja dhammo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1861: Tattha na pāresīti na sakkosi. Jappampīti jappantopi parivattentopi. Ayaṃ soti ayameva so tava sabhāvo ajja ko nāma jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:1862: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “na sakkā rājānaṃ musāvādena vañcetuṃ, sacepi me sabhāve kathite āṇaṃ kareyya, karotu, sabhāvameva kathessāmī”ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1864: “Caṇḍālaputto mama sampadāsi, dhammena mante pakatiñca saṃsi;
atk-s0513a4:1865: Mā cassu me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, guyhittho atthaṃ vijaheyya manto.
atk-s0513a4:1867: “Sohaṃ janindena janamhi puṭṭho, makkhābhibhūto alikaṃ abhāṇiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1868: ‘Mantā ime brāhmaṇassā’ti micchā, pahīnamanto kapaṇo rudāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1869_0: Tattha dhammenāti samena kāraṇena appaṭicchādetvāva adāsi. Pakatiñca saṃsīti “mā
atk-s0513a4:1869_1: me pucchito nāmagottaṃ guyhittho, sace gūhasi, mantā te nassissantī”ti tesaṃ nassanapakatiñca
atk-s0513a4:1869_2: mayhaṃ saṃsi. Brāhmaṇassāti micchāti “brāhmaṇassa santike mayā ime mantā gahitā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1869_3: micchāya abhaṇiṃ, tena me te mantā naṭṭhā, svāhaṃ pahīnamanto idāni kapaṇo rudāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:1870: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ pāpadhammo evarūpaṃ ratanamantaṃ na olokesi, evarūpasmiñhi uttamaratanamante laddhe jāti kiṃ karissatī”ti kujjhitvā tassa garahanto –
atk-s0513a4:1873: Madhuṃ madhutthiko vinde, so hi tassa dumuttamo.
atk-s0513a4:1876: Yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya, so hi tassa naruttamo.
atk-s0513a4:1878: “Imassa daṇḍañca vadhañca datvā, gale gahetvā khalayātha jammaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1879: Yo uttamatthaṃ kasirena laddhaṃ, mānātimānena vināsayitthā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1881_0: Tattha madhutthikoti madhuatthiko puriso araññe madhuṃ olokento etesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1881_1: yato madhuṃ labhati, sova dumo tassa dumuttamo nāma. Tatheva khattiyādīsu yamhā purisā
atk-s0513a4:1881_2: dhammaṃ kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ atthaṃ vijāneyya, sova tassa uttamo naro nāma. Imassa daṇḍañcāti
atk-s0513a4:1881_3: imassa pāpadhammassa sabbassaharaṇadaṇḍañca veḷupesikādīhi piṭṭhicammaṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:1881_4: vadhañca datvā imaṃ jammaṃ gale gahetvā khalayātha, khalikārattaṃ pāpetvā niddhamatha
atk-s0513a4:1882_0: Rājapurisā tathā katvā “tavācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ ārādhetvāva sace puna mante
atk-s0513a4:1882_1: labhissasi, idha āgaccheyyāsi, no ce, imaṃ disaṃ mā olokeyyāsī”ti taṃ nibbisayamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1882_2: So anātho hutvā “ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ na me aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi, tasseva santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1882_3: gantvā taṃ ārādhetvā puna mantaṃ yācissāmī”ti rodanto taṃ gāmaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a4:1882_4: āgacchantaṃ disvā mahāsatto bhariyaṃ āmantetvā “bhadde, passa taṃ pāpadhammaṃ parihīnamantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1882_5: puna āgacchanta”nti āha. So mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kiṃkāraṇā
atk-s0513a4:1882_6: āgatosī”ti puṭṭho “ācariya, musāvādaṃ katvā ācariyaṃ paccakkhitvā mahāvināsaṃ pattomhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1882_7: vatvā accayaṃ dassetvā puna mante yācanto –
atk-s0513a4:1884: “Yathā samaṃ maññamāno pateyya, sobbhaṃ guhaṃ narakaṃ pūtipādaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1885: Rajjūti vā akkame kaṇhasappaṃ, andho yathā jotimadhiṭṭhaheyya;
atk-s0513a4:1886: Evampi maṃ taṃ khalitaṃ sapañña, pahīnamantassa punappadāhī”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0513a4:1887_0: Tattha yathā samanti yathā puriso idaṃ samaṃ ṭhānanti maññamāno sobbhaṃ vā guhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1887_1: vā bhūmiyā phalitaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ narakaṃ vā pūtipādaṃ vā pateyya. Pūtipādoti himavantapadese
atk-s0513a4:1887_2: mahārukkhe sussitvā mate tassa mūlesu pūtikesu jātesu tasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāāvāṭo hoti,
atk-s0513a4:1887_3: tassa nāmaṃ. Jotimadhiṭṭhaheyyāti aggiṃ akkameyya. Evampīti evaṃ ahampi paññācakkhuno
atk-s0513a4:1887_4: abhāvā andho tumhākaṃ visesaṃ ajānanto tumhesu khalito, taṃ maṃ khalitaṃ viditvā
atk-s0513a4:1887_5: sapañña ñāṇasampanna pahīnamantassa mama punapi dethāti.
atk-s0513a4:1888: Atha naṃ ācariyo “tāta, kiṃ kathesi, andho hi saññāya dinnāya sobbhādīni pariharati, mayā paṭhamameva tava kathitaṃ, idāni kimatthaṃ mama santikaṃ āgatosī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0513a4:1890: “Dhammena mantaṃ tava sampadāsiṃ, tuvampi dhammena paṭiggahesi;
atk-s0513a4:1891: Pakatimpi te attamano asaṃsiṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ taṃ na jaheyya manto.
atk-s0513a4:1893: “Yo bāla-mantaṃ kasirena laddhaṃ, yaṃ dullabhaṃ ajja manussaloke;
atk-s0513a4:1894: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṃ appapañño, vināsayī alikaṃ bhāsamāno.
atk-s0513a4:1896: “Bālassa mūḷhassa akataññuno ca, musā bhaṇantassa asaññatassa;
atk-s0513a4:1897: Mante mayaṃ tādisake na dema, kuto mantā gaccha na mayhaṃ ruccasī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1899_0: Tattha dhammenāti ahampi tava ācariyabhāgaṃ hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā aggahetvā dhammeneva
atk-s0513a4:1899_1: mantaṃ sampadāsiṃ, tvampi kiñci adatvā dhammena sameneva paṭiggahesi. Dhamme ṭhitanti
atk-s0513a4:1899_2: ācariyapūjakadhamme ṭhitaṃ. Tādisaketi tathārūpe akālaphalagaṇhāpake mante na dema,
atk-s0513a4:1900: So evaṃ ācariyena uyyojito “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitenā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā anāthamaraṇaṃ mari.
atk-s0513a4:1901_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1901_1: paccakkhāya mahāvināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā akataññū māṇavo
atk-s0513a4:1901_2: devadatto ahosi, rājā ānando, caṇḍālaputto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1905_0: Kuṭhārihattho purisoti idaṃ satthā rohiṇīnadītīre viharanto ñātakānaṃ kalahaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:1905_1: kathesi. Vatthu pana kuṇālajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana satthā ñātake āmantetvā
atk-s0513a4:1905_2: – mahārājā, atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bahinagare vaḍḍhakigāmo
atk-s0513a4:1905_3: ahosi. Tatreko brāhmaṇavaḍḍhakī araññato dārūni āharitvā rathaṃ katvā jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:1905_4: Tadā himavantapadese mahāphandanarukkho ahosi. Eko kāḷasīho gocaraṃ pariyesitvā āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:1905_5: tassa mūle nipajji. Athassa ekadivasaṃ vāte paharante eko sukkhadaṇḍako patitvā khandhe
atk-s0513a4:1905_6: avatthāsi. So thokaṃ khandhena rujantena bhītatasito uṭṭhāya pakkhanditvā puna nivatto
atk-s0513a4:1905_7: āgatamaggaṃ olokento kiñci adisvā “añño maṃ sīho vā byaggho vā anubandhanto natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1905_8: imasmiṃ pana rukkhe nibbattadevatā maṃ ettha nipajjantaṃ na sahati maññe, hotu jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1905_9: aṭṭhāne kopaṃ bandhitvā rukkhaṃ paharitvā “neva tava rukkhassa pattaṃ khādāmi, na
atk-s0513a4:1905_10: sākhaṃ bhañjāmi, idha aññe mige vasante sahasi, maṃ na sahasi, ko mayhaṃ doso atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1905_11: katipāhaṃ āgamehi, samūlaṃ te rukkhaṃ uppāṭetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chedāpessāmī”ti rukkhadevataṃ
atk-s0513a4:1905_12: tajjetvā ekaṃ purisaṃ upadhārento vicari. Tadā so brāhmaṇavaḍḍhakī dve tayo manusse
atk-s0513a4:1905_13: ādāya rathadārūnaṃ atthāya yānakena taṃ padesaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne yānakaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:1905_14: vāsipharasuhattho rukkhe upadhārento phandanasamīpaṃ agamāsi. Kāḷasīho taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:1905_15: “ajja, mayā paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gantvā rukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. Vaḍḍhakī
atk-s0513a4:1905_16: ca ito cito oloketvā phandanasamīpena pāyāsi. So “yāva eso nātikkamati, tāvadevassa
atk-s0513a4:1908: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ dāruṃ chetumicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1909: Tattha purisoti tvaṃ kuṭhārihattho eko puriso imaṃ vanaṃ ogayha tiṭṭhasīti.
atk-s0513a4:1910_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “acchariyaṃ vata bho, na vata me ito pubbe migo manussavācaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1910_1: bhāsanto diṭṭhapubbo, esa rathānucchavikaṃ dāruṃ jānissati, pucchissāmi na”nti cintetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1913: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ dāruṃ nemiyā daḷha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1914: Tattha issoti tvampi eko kāḷasīho vanāni carasi, tvaṃ rathānucchavikaṃ dāruṃ jānissasīti.
atk-s0513a4:1915: Taṃ sutvā kāḷasīho “idāni me manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti cintetvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1917: “Neva sālo na khadiro, nāssakaṇṇo kuto dhavo;
atk-s0513a4:1918: Rukkho ca phandano nāma, taṃ dāruṃ nemiyā daḷha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1919: So taṃ sutvā somanassajāto “sudivasena vatamhi ajja araññaṃ paviṭṭho, tiracchānagato me rathānucchavikaṃ dāruṃ ācikkhati, aho sādhū”ti pucchanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1922: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, yathā jānemu phandana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1923: Athassa so ācikkhanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1925: “Yassa sākhā palambanti, namanti na ca bhañjare;
atk-s0513a4:1926: So rukkho phandano nāma, yassa mūle ahaṃ ṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:1929: Sabbassa te kammaniyo, ayaṃ hessati phandano”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1930_0: Tattha “arāna”nti idaṃ so “kadācesa imaṃ rukkhaṃ na gaṇheyya, guṇampissa kathessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1930_1: cintetvā evamāha. Tattha īsānemirathassa cāti īsāya ca nemiyā ca sesassa ca rathassa
atk-s0513a4:1930_2: sabbassa te esa kammaniyo kammakkhamo bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1931_0: So evaṃ ācikkhitvā tuṭṭhamānaso ekamante vicari, vaḍḍhakīpi rukkhaṃ chindituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:1931_1: Rukkhadevatā cintesi “mayā etassa upari na kiñci pātitaṃ, ayaṃ aṭṭhāne āghātaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:1931_2: mama vimānaṃ nāseti, ahañca vinassissāmi, ekenupāyena imañca issaṃ vināsessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1931_3: Sā vanakammikapuriso viya hutvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā pucchi “bho purisa manāpo
atk-s0513a4:1931_4: te rukkho laddho, imaṃ chinditvā kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Rathanemiṃ karissāmī”ti. “Iminā
atk-s0513a4:1931_5: rukkhena ratho bhavissatī”ti kena te akkhātanti. “Ekena kāḷasīhenā”ti. “Sādhu suṭṭhu
atk-s0513a4:1931_6: tena akkhātaṃ, iminā rukkhena ratho sundaro bhavissati, kāḷasīhassa galacammaṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:1931_7: caturaṅgulamatte ṭhāne ayapaṭṭena viya nemimaṇḍale parikkhitte nemi ca thirā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:1931_8: bahuñca dhanaṃ labhissasī”ti. “Kāḷasīhacammaṃ kuto lacchāmī”ti? “Tvaṃ bālakosi, ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1931_9: tava rukkho vane ṭhito na palāyati, tvaṃ yena te rukkho akkhāto, tassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:1931_10: ‘sāmi tayā dassitarukkhaṃ kataraṭṭhāne chindāmī’ti vañcetvā ānehi, atha naṃ nirāsaṅkaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1931_11: ‘idha ca ettha ca chindā’ti mukhatuṇḍaṃ pasāretvā ācikkhantaṃ tikhiṇena mahāpharasunā
atk-s0513a4:1931_12: koṭṭetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā cammaṃ ādāya varamaṃsaṃ khāditvā rukkhaṃ chindā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1931_13: veraṃ appesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:1934: Mayhampi vacanaṃ atthi, bhāradvāja suṇohi me.
atk-s0513a4:1937: Tena nemiṃ pasāresi, evaṃ daḷhataraṃ siyā.
atk-s0513a4:1941: Tattha bhāradvājāti taṃ gottena ālapati. Upakkhandhamhāti khandhato. Ukkaccāti ukkantitvā.
atk-s0513a4:1942: Vaḍḍhakī rukkhadevatāya vacanaṃ sutvā “aho ajja mayhaṃ maṅgaladivaso”ti kāḷasīhaṃ ghātetvā rukkhaṃ chetvā pakkāmi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:1944: “Iccevaṃ phandano issaṃ, isso ca pana phandanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1950: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0513a4:1951: Sammodatha mā vivadatha, mā hotha issaphandanā.
atk-s0513a4:1955_0: Tattha aghātayunti ghātāpesuṃ. Mayūranaccaṃ naccantīti mahārājā yattha hi manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1955_1: vivādo hoti, tattha yathā nāma mayūrā naccantā paṭicchādetabbaṃ rahassaṅgaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1955_2: karonti, evaṃ manussā aññamaññassa randhaṃ pakāsentā mayūranaccaṃ naccanti nāma.
atk-s0513a4:1955_3: Yathā te issaphandanā aññamaññassa randhaṃ pakāsentā nacciṃsu nāma. Taṃ voti tena
atk-s0513a4:1955_4: kāraṇena tumhe vadāmi. Bhaddaṃ voti bhaddaṃ tumhākaṃ hotu. Yāvantetthāti yāvanto
atk-s0513a4:1955_5: ettha issaphandanasadisā mā ahuvattha. Sāmaggimeva sikkhethāti samaggabhāvameva tumhe
atk-s0513a4:1955_6: sikkhatha, idaṃ paññāvuddhehi paṇḍitehi pasaṃsitaṃ. Dhammaṭṭhoti sucaritadhamme ṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:1955_7: Yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatīti yogehi khemā nibbānā na parihāyatīti nibbānena desanākūṭaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1955_8: gaṇhi. Sakyarājāno dhammakathaṃ sutvā samaggā jātā.
atk-s0513a4:1956: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā taṃ kāraṇaṃ viditvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nivutthadevatā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1960: Idheva haṃsa nipatāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto daḷhadhammadhanuggahasuttantadesanaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Bhagavatā hi –
atk-s0513a4:1961_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā
atk-s0513a4:1961_1: catuddisā ṭhitā assu, atha puriso āgaccheyya ‘ahaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ daḷhadhammānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1961_2: dhanuggahānaṃ susikkhitānaṃ katahatthānaṃ katūpāsanānaṃ catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte apatiṭṭhite
atk-s0513a4:1961_3: pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, ‘javano puriso paramena
atk-s0513a4:1961_4: javena samannāgato’ti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti? “Evaṃ bhante”ti. Yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa
atk-s0513a4:1961_5: purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, tato sīghataro. Yathā ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:1961_6: tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1961_7: purato dhāvanti, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ javo, tato sīghataraṃ āyusaṅkhārā khīyanti, tasmātiha,
atk-s0513a4:1961_8: bhikkhave, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘appamattā viharissāmā’ti. Evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba”nti –
atk-s0513a4:1962_0: Imassa suttassa kathitadivasato dutiyadivase bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a4:1962_1: “āvuso, satthā attano buddhavisaye ṭhatvā imesaṃ sattānaṃ āyusaṅkhāre ittare dubbale
atk-s0513a4:1962_2: katvā paridīpento puthujjanabhikkhū ativiya santāsaṃ pāpesi, aho buddhabalaṃ nāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1962_3: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a4:1962_4: nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto āyusaṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1962_5: ittarabhāvaṃ dassetvā bhikkhū saṃvejetvā dhammaṃ desemi, mayā hi pubbe ahetukahaṃsayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1962_6: nibbattenapi āyusaṅkhārānaṃ ittarabhāvaṃ dassetvā bārāṇasirājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sakalarājaparisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1962_7: saṃvejetvā dhammo desito”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1963_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto javanahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a4:1963_1: navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto cittakūṭe paṭivasati. So ekadivasaṃ jambudīpatale ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1963_2: sare saparivāro sayaṃjātasāliṃ khāditvā ākāse suvaṇṇakilañjaṃ pattharanto viya mahantena
atk-s0513a4:1963_3: parivārena bārāṇasinagarassa matthakena mandamandāya vilāsagatiyā cittakūṭaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:1963_4: Atha naṃ bārāṇasirājā disvā “imināpi mādisena raññā bhavitabba”nti amaccānaṃ vatvā
atk-s0513a4:1963_5: tasmiṃ sinehaṃ uppādetvā mālāgandhavilepanaṃ gahetvā mahāsattaṃ oloketvā sabbatūriyāni
atk-s0513a4:1963_6: paggaṇhāpesi. Mahāsatto attano sakkāraṃ karontaṃ disvā haṃse pucchi “rājā, mama evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1963_7: sakkāraṃ karonto kiṃ paccāsīsatī”ti? “Tumhehi saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ devā”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a4:1963_8: hi rañño amhehi saddhiṃ mittabhāvo hotū”ti raññā saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1963_9: Athekadivasaṃ rañño uyyānaṃ gatakāle anotattadahaṃ gantvā ekena pakkhena udakaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1963_10: ekena candanacuṇṇaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ tena udakena nhāpetvā candanacuṇṇena okiritvā
atk-s0513a4:1963_11: mahājanassa passantasseva saparivāro cittakūṭaṃ agamāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya rājā mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1963_12: daṭṭhukāmo hutvā “sahāyo me ajja āgamissati, sahāyo me ajja āgamissatī”ti āgamanamaggaṃ olokento acchati.
atk-s0513a4:1964_0: Tadā mahāsattassa kaniṭṭhā dve haṃsapotakā “sūriyena saddhiṃ javissāmā”ti mantetvā
atk-s0513a4:1964_1: mahāsattassa ārocesuṃ “mayaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ javissāmā”ti. “Tātā, sūriyajavo nāma
atk-s0513a4:1964_2: sīgho, sūriyena saddhiṃ javituṃ na sakkhissatha, antarāva vinassissatha, mā gamitthā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1964_3: Te dutiyampi tatiyampi yāciṃsu, bodhisattopi te yāvatatiyaṃ vāresiyeva. Te mānathaddhā
atk-s0513a4:1964_4: attano balaṃ ajānantā mahāsattassa anācikkhitvāva “sūriyena saddhiṃ javissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1964_5: sūriye anuggateyeva gantvā yugandharamatthake nisīdiṃsu. Mahāsatto te adisvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1964_6: nu kho gatā”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā cintesi “te sūriyena saddhiṃ javituṃ
atk-s0513a4:1964_7: na sakkhissanti, antarāva vinassissanti, jīvitaṃ tesaṃ dassāmī”ti. Sopi gantvā yugandharamatthakeyeva
atk-s0513a4:1964_8: nisīdi. Atha uggate sūriyamaṇḍale haṃsapotakā uppatitvā sūriyena saddhiṃ pakkhandiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1964_9: mahāsattopi tehi saddhiṃ pakkhandi. Kaniṭṭhabhātiko yāva pubbaṇhasamayā javitvā kilami,
atk-s0513a4:1964_10: pakkhasandhīsu aggiuṭṭhānakālo viya ahosi. So bodhisattassa saññaṃ adāsi “bhātika,
atk-s0513a4:1964_11: na sakkomī”ti. Atha naṃ mahāsatto “mā bhāyi, jīvitaṃ te dassāmī”ti pakkhapañjarena
atk-s0513a4:1964_12: parikkhipitvā assāsetvā cittakūṭapabbataṃ netvā haṃsānaṃ majjhe ṭhapetvā puna pakkhanditvā
atk-s0513a4:1964_13: sūriyaṃ patvā itarena saddhiṃ pāyāsi. Sopi yāva upakaṭṭhamajjhanhikā sūriyena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1964_14: javitvā kilami, pakkhasandhīsu aggiuṭṭhānakālo viya ahosi. Tadā bodhisattassa saññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1964_15: adāsi “bhātika, na sakkomī”ti. Tampi mahāsatto tatheva samassāsetvā pakkhapañjarenādāya
atk-s0513a4:1964_16: cittakūṭameva agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sūriyo nabhamajjhaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:1965_0: Atha mahāsatto “mama ajja sarīrabalaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti cintetvā ekavegena pakkhanditvā
atk-s0513a4:1965_1: yugandharamatthake nisīditvā tato uppatitvā ekavegena sūriyaṃ pāpuṇitvā kālena purato,
atk-s0513a4:1965_2: kālena pacchato javitvā cintesi “mayhaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ javanaṃ nāma niratthakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1965_3: ayonisomanasikārasambhūtaṃ, kiṃ me iminā, bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mama sahāyakassa rañño
atk-s0513a4:1965_4: atthayuttaṃ dhammayuttaṃ kathaṃ kathessāmī”ti. So nivattitvā sūriye nabhamajjhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1965_5: anatikkanteyeva sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ antantena anusaṃyāyitvā vegaṃ parihāpento
atk-s0513a4:1965_6: sakalajambudīpaṃ antantena anusaṃyāyitvā bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇi. Dvādasayojanikaṃ sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1965_7: haṃsacchannaṃ viya ahosi, chiddaṃ nāma na paññāyi, anukkamena vege parihāyante ākāse
atk-s0513a4:1965_8: chiddāni paññāyiṃsu. Mahāsatto vegaṃ parihāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā sīhapañjarassa
atk-s0513a4:1965_9: abhimukhaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “āgato me sahāyo”ti somanassappatto tassa nisīdanatthāya
atk-s0513a4:1965_10: kañcanapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā “samma, pavisa, idha nisīdā”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1967: “Idheva haṃsa nipata, piyaṃ me tava dassanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1969_0: Tattha “idhā”ti kañcanapīṭhaṃ sandhāyāha. Nipatāti nisīda. Issarosīti tvaṃ imassa
atk-s0513a4:1969_1: ṭhānassa issaro sāmi hutvā āgatosīti vadati. Yamidhatthi pavedayāti yaṃ imasmiṃ nivesane
atk-s0513a4:1970_0: Mahāsatto kañcanapīṭhe nisīdi. Rājā satapākasahassapākehi telehi tassa pakkhantarāni
atk-s0513a4:1970_1: makkhetvā kañcanataṭṭake madhulāje ca madhurodakañca sakkharodakañca dāpetvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1970_2: katvā “samma, tvaṃ ekakova āgatosi, kuhiṃ agamitthā”ti pucchi. So taṃ pavattiṃ vitthārena
atk-s0513a4:1970_3: kathesi. Atha naṃ rājā āha “samma, mamapi sūriyena saddhiṃ javitavegaṃ dassehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1970_4: Mahārāja, na sakkā so vego dassetunti. Tena hi me sarikkhakamattaṃ dassehīti. Sādhu,
atk-s0513a4:1970_5: mahārāja, sarikkhakamattaṃ dassessāmi, akkhaṇavedhī dhanuggahe sannipātehīti. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:1970_6: sannipātesi. Mahāsatto cattāro dhanuggahe gahetvā nivesanā oruyha rājaṅgaṇe silāthambhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1970_7: nikhaṇāpetvā attano gīvāyaṃ ghaṇṭaṃ bandhāpetvā silāthambhamatthake nisīditvā cattāro
atk-s0513a4:1970_8: dhanuggahe thambhaṃ nissāya catuddisābhimukhe ṭhapetvā “mahārāja, ime cattāro janā
atk-s0513a4:1970_9: ekappahāreneva catuddisābhimukhā cattāri kaṇḍāni khipantu, tāni ahaṃ pathaviṃ appattāneva
atk-s0513a4:1970_10: āharitvā etesaṃ pādamūle pātessāmi. Mama kaṇḍagahaṇatthāya gatabhāvaṃ ghaṇṭasaddasaññāya
atk-s0513a4:1970_11: jāneyyāsi, maṃ pana na passissasī”ti vatvā tehi ekappahāreneva khittakaṇḍāni āharitvā
atk-s0513a4:1970_12: tesaṃ pādamūle pātetvā silāthambhamatthake nisinnameva attānaṃ dassetvā “diṭṭho te,
atk-s0513a4:1970_13: mahārāja, mayhaṃ vego”ti vatvā “mahārāja, ayaṃ vego mayhaṃ neva uttamo, majjhimo,
atk-s0513a4:1970_14: paritto lāmakavego esa, evaṃ sīgho, mahārāja, amhākaṃ vego”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1971_0: Atha naṃ rājā pucchi “samma, atthi pana tumhākaṃ vegato añño sīghataro vego”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0513a4:1971_1: mahārāja, amhākaṃ uttamavegatopi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena imesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1971_2: sattānaṃ āyusaṅkhārā sīghataraṃ khīyanti bhijjanti, khayaṃ gacchantī”ti khaṇikanirodhavasena
atk-s0513a4:1971_3: rūpadhammānaṃ nirodhaṃ dasseti, tato nāmadhammānaṃ. Rājā mahāsattassa kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a4:1971_4: maraṇabhayabhīto satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto bhūmiyaṃ pati, mahājano utrāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1971_5: patto ahosi. Rañño mukhaṃ udakena siñcitvā satiṃ labhāpesi. Atha naṃ mahāsatto “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1971_6: mā bhāyi, maraṇassatiṃ bhāvehi, dhammaṃ carāhi, dānādīni puññāni karohi, appamatto
atk-s0513a4:1971_7: hohi, devā”ti ovadi. Atha rājā “sāmi, mayaṃ tumhādisena ñāṇabalasampannena ācariyena
atk-s0513a4:1971_8: vinā vasituṃ na sakkhissāma, cittakūṭaṃ agantvā mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desento mayhaṃ ovādācariyo
atk-s0513a4:1971_9: hutvā idheva vasāhī”ti yācanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1973: “Savanena ekassa piyā bhavanti, disvā panekassa viyeti chando;
atk-s0513a4:1974: Disvā ca sutvā ca piyā bhavanti, kaccinnu me pīyasi dassanena.
atk-s0513a4:1977: Evaṃ piyadassano me, vasa haṃsa mamantike”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1978_0: Tāsaṃ attho – samma haṃsarāja savanena ekassa ekacce piyā honti, “evaṃ guṇo nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1978_1: sutvā savanena piyāyati, ekassa pana ekacce disvāva chando vigacchati, pemaṃ antaradhāyati,
atk-s0513a4:1978_2: khādituṃ āgatā yakkhā viya upaṭṭhahanti, ekassa ekacce disvā ca sutvā cāti ubhayathāpi
atk-s0513a4:1978_3: piyā honti, tena taṃ pucchāmi. Kaccinnu me pīyasi dassanenāti kacci nu tvaṃ maṃ piyāyasi,
atk-s0513a4:1978_4: mayhaṃ pana tvaṃ savanena piyova, dassanaṃ panāgamma atipiyova. Evaṃ mama piyadassano
atk-s0513a4:1978_5: samāno cittakūṭaṃ agantvā idha mama santike vasāti.
atk-s0513a4:1982: Matto ca ekadā vajje, haṃsarājaṃ pacantu me”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1983_0: Tattha matto ca ekadāti mahārāja, mayaṃ tava ghare niccaṃ pūjitā vaseyyāma, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1983_1: pana kadāci surāmadamatto maṃsakhādanatthaṃ “haṃsarājaṃ pacantu me”ti vadeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1983_2: atha evaṃ tava anujīvino maṃ māretvā paceyyuṃ, tadāhaṃ kiṃ karissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:1984: Athassa rājā “tena hi majjameva na pivissāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ dātuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1986: “Dhiratthu taṃ majjapānaṃ, yaṃ me piyataraṃ tayā;
atk-s0513a4:1987: Na cāpi majjaṃ pissāmi, yāva me vacchasī ghare”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1988: Tato paraṃ bodhisatto cha gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:1993: “Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:1994: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso.
atk-s0513a4:1997: Santikepi hi so dūre, yasmiṃ nāvisate mano.
atk-s0513a4:1999: “Antopi so hoti pasannacitto, pāraṃ samuddassa pasannacitto;
atk-s0513a4:2000: Antopi so hoti paduṭṭhacitto, pāraṃ samuddassa paduṭṭhacitto.
atk-s0513a4:2006: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāma, purā te homa appiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2007_0: Tattha vassitanti mahārāja, tiracchānagatā ujuhadayā, tena tesaṃ vassitaṃ suvijānaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2007_1: manussā pana kakkhaḷā, tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ dubbijānataranti attho. Yo pubbeti yo
atk-s0513a4:2007_2: puggalo paṭhamameva attamano hutvā “tvaṃ mayhaṃ ñātako mitto pāṇasamo sakhā”ti api
atk-s0513a4:2007_3: evaṃ maññati, sveva pacchā diso verī sampajjati, evaṃ dubbijānaṃ nāma manussahadayanti.
atk-s0513a4:2007_4: Nivisatīti mahārāja, yasmiṃ puggale pemavasena mano nivisati, so dūre vasantopi avidūre
atk-s0513a4:2007_5: sahāpi vasatiyeva nāma. Yasmiṃ pana puggale mano na nivisati apeti, so santike vasantopi dūreyeva.
atk-s0513a4:2008_0: Antopi so hotīti mahārāja, yo sahāyo pasannacitto, so cittena allīnattā pāraṃ samuddassa
atk-s0513a4:2008_1: vasantopi antoyeva hoti. Yo pana paduṭṭhacitto, so cittena anallīnattā anto vasantopi
atk-s0513a4:2008_2: pāraṃ samuddassa nāma. Ye disā teti ye verino paccatthikā, te ekato vasantāpi dūre
atk-s0513a4:2008_3: vasantiyeva nāma. Santo pana paṇḍitā ārā ṭhitāpi mettābhāvitena manasā āvajjentā
atk-s0513a4:2008_4: saṃvasantiyeva. Purā te homāti yāva tava appiyā na homa, tāvadeva taṃ āmantetvā gacchāmāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2012: Paricārakānaṃ sataṃ, vacanaṃ na karosi no;
atk-s0513a4:2013: Evaṃ taṃ abhiyācāma, puna kayirāsi pariyāya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2014_0: Tattha evaṃ ceti sace haṃsarāja, evaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yācamānānaṃ amhākaṃ imaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0513a4:2014_1: nāvabujjhasi, tava paricārakānaṃ samānānaṃ vacanaṃ na karosi, atha naṃ evaṃ yācāma.
atk-s0513a4:2014_2: Puna kayirāsi pariyāyanti kālena kālaṃ idha āgamanāya vāraṃ kareyyāsīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2017: “Evaṃ ce no viharataṃ, antarāyo na hessati;
atk-s0513a4:2020_0: Tattha evaṃ ce noti mahārāja, mā cintayittha, sace amhākampi evaṃ viharantānaṃ jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0513a4:2020_1: na bhavissati, appeva nāma ubho aññamaññaṃ passissāma, apica tvaṃ mayā dinnaṃ ovādameva
atk-s0513a4:2020_2: mama ṭhāne ṭhapetvā evaṃ ittarajīvite lokasannivāse appamatto hutvā dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a4:2020_3: karonto dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārehi, evañhi me ovādaṃ karonto
atk-s0513a4:2020_4: maṃ passissatiyevāti. Evaṃ mahāsatto rājānaṃ ovaditvā cittakūṭapabbatameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:2021_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattenapi
atk-s0513a4:2021_1: mayā āyusaṅkhārānaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ dassetvā dhammo desito”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a4:2021_2: – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, kaniṭṭho moggallāno, majjhimo sāriputto, sesahaṃsagaṇā
atk-s0513a4:2025_0: Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2025_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthivāsino kirekassa kulassa pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā dhītā
atk-s0513a4:2025_2: ahosi sobhaggappattā, na ca naṃ koci vāresi. Athassā mātā cintesi “mama dhītā vayappattā,
atk-s0513a4:2025_3: na ca naṃ koci vāreti, āmisena macchaṃ viya etāya ekaṃ sākiyabhikkhuṃ palobhetvā
atk-s0513a4:2025_4: uppabbājetvā taṃ nissāya jīvissāmī”ti. Tadā ca sāvatthivāsī eko kulaputto sāsane
atk-s0513a4:2025_5: uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya sikkhākāmataṃ pahāya ālasiyo sarīramaṇḍanamanuyutto
atk-s0513a4:2025_6: vihāsi. Mahāupāsikā gehe yāgukhādanīyabhojanīyāni sampādetvā dvāre ṭhatvā antaravīthiyā
atk-s0513a4:2025_7: gacchantesu bhikkhūsu ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ rasataṇhāya bandhitvā gahetuṃ sakkuṇeyyarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2025_9: antare kañci gayhupagaṃ adisvā tesaṃ pacchato gacchantānaṃ madhuradhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2025_10: acchinnavalāhakasadisānaṃ piṇḍapātikānampi antare kañci adisvāva ekaṃ yāva bahi apaṅgā
atk-s0513a4:2025_11: akkhīni añjetvā kese osaṇhetvā dukūlantaravāsakaṃ nivāsetvā ghaṭitamaṭṭhaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2025_12: pārupitvā maṇivaṇṇapattaṃ ādāya manoramaṃ chattaṃ dhārayamānaṃ vissaṭṭhindriyaṃ kāyadaḷhibahulaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2025_13: āgacchantaṃ disvā “imaṃ sakkā gaṇhitu”nti gantvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā “etha, bhante”ti
atk-s0513a4:2025_14: gharaṃ ānetvā nisīdāpetvā yāguādīhi parivisitvā katabhattakiccaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2025_15: ito paṭṭhāya idhevāgaccheyyāthā”ti āha. Sopi tato paṭṭhāya tattheva gantvā aparabhāge vissāsiko ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2026_0: Athekadivasaṃ mahāupāsikā tassa savanapathe ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ gehe upabhogaparibhogamattā
atk-s0513a4:2026_1: atthi, tathārūpo pana me putto vā jāmātā vā gehaṃ vicārituṃ samattho natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2026_2: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “kimatthaṃ nu kho kathetī”ti thokaṃ hadaye viddho viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2026_3: Sā dhītaraṃ āha “imaṃ palobhetvā tava vase vattāpehī”ti. Sā tato paṭṭhāya maṇḍitapasādhitā
atk-s0513a4:2026_4: itthikuttavilāsehi taṃ palobhesi. Thullakumārikāti na ca thūlasarīrā daṭṭhabbā, thūlā
atk-s0513a4:2026_5: vā hotu kisā vā, pañcakāmaguṇikarāgena pana thūlatāya “thullakumārikā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0513a4:2026_6: So daharo kilesavasiko hutvā “na dānāhaṃ buddhasāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2026_7: cintetvā “vihāraṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ niyyādetvā asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gamissāmi, tatra
atk-s0513a4:2026_8: me vatthāni pesethā”ti vatvā vihāraṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ niyyādetvā “ukkaṇṭhitosmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2026_9: ācariyupajjhāye āha. Te taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti
atk-s0513a4:2026_10: ārocesuṃ. Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0513a4:2026_11: vutte “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti vatvā “thullakumārikāya, bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu pubbepesā
atk-s0513a4:2026_12: tava araññe vasantassa brahmacariyantarāyaṃ katvā mahantaṃ anatthamakāsi, puna tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2026_13: etameva nissāya kasmā ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2027_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe mahābhoge brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a4:2027_1: nibbattitvā uggahitasippo kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapesi, athassa bhariyā ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyitvā
atk-s0513a4:2027_2: kālamakāsi. So “yatheva me piyabhariyāya, evaṃ mayipi maraṇaṃ āgamissati, kiṃ me
atk-s0513a4:2027_3: gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā kāme pahāya puttaṃ ādāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:2027_4: tena saddhiṃ isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro araññe
atk-s0513a4:2027_5: vihāsi. Tadā paccantavāsino corā janapadaṃ pavisitvā gāmaṃ paharitvā karamare gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:2027_6: bhaṇḍikaṃ ukkhipāpetvā puna paccantaṃ pāpayiṃsu. Tesaṃ antare ekā abhirūpā kumārikā
atk-s0513a4:2027_7: kerāṭikapaññāya samannāgatā cintesi “ime amhe gahetvā dāsibhogena paribhuñjissanti,
atk-s0513a4:2027_8: ekena upāyena palāyituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sā “sāmi, sarīrakiccaṃ kātukāmāmhi, thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:2027_9: tiṭṭhathā”ti vatvā core vañcetvā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisantī bodhisattassa puttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2027_10: assame ṭhapetvā phalāphalatthāya gatakāle pubbaṇhasamaye taṃ assamaṃ pāpuṇitvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2027_11: tāpasakumāraṃ kāmaratiyā palobhetvā sīlamassa bhinditvā attano vase vattetvā “kiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2027_12: te araññavāsena, ehi gāmaṃ gantvā vasissāma, tatra hi rūpādayo kāmaguṇā sulabhā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2027_13: āha. Sopi “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “pitā tāva me araññato phalāphalaṃ āharituṃ gato,
atk-s0513a4:2027_14: taṃ disvā ubhopi ekatova gamissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2028_0: Sā cintesi – “ayaṃ taruṇadārako na kiñci jānāti, pitarā panassa mahallakakāle pabbajitena
atk-s0513a4:2028_1: bhavitabbaṃ, so āgantvā ‘idha kiṃ karosī’ti maṃ pothetvā pāde gahetvā kaḍḍhetvā araññe
atk-s0513a4:2028_2: khipissati, tasmiṃ anāgateyeva palāyissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ “ahaṃ purato gacchāmi, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2028_3: pacchā āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā maggasaññaṃ ācikkhitvā pakkāmi. So tassā gatakālato
atk-s0513a4:2028_4: paṭṭhāya uppannadomanasso yathā pure kiñci vattaṃ akatvā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā antopaṇṇasālāya
atk-s0513a4:2028_5: pajjhāyanto nipajji. Mahāsatto phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgantvā tassā padavalañjaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:2028_6: “ayaṃ mātugāmassa padavalañjo, “puttassa mama sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintento
atk-s0513a4:2028_7: paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā phalāphalaṃ otāretvā puttaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2030: “Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2031: Aggīpi te na hāpito, kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2032: Tattha aggīpi te na hāpitoti aggipi te na jālito. Mandovāti nippañño andhabālo viya.
atk-s0513a4:2033: So pitu kathaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāya pitaraṃ vanditvā gāraveneva araññavāse anussāhaṃ pavedento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2036: Dukkho vāso araññamhi, raṭṭhaṃ icchāmi gantave.
atk-s0513a4:2038: “Yathā ahaṃ ito gantvā, yasmiṃ janapade vasaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2039: Ācāraṃ brahme sikkheyyaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ anusāsa ma”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2040_0: Tattha kassapāmantayāmi tanti kassapa āmantayāmi taṃ. Gantaveti gantuṃ. Ācāranti
atk-s0513a4:2040_1: yasmiṃ janapade vasāmi, tattha vasanto yathā ācāraṃ janapadacārittaṃ sikkheyyaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2041: Mahāsatto “sādhu, tāta, desacārittaṃ te kathessāmī”ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2044: Raṭṭhe rocayase vāsaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ nisāmehi me.
atk-s0513a4:2047: Paṅke ca mā visīdittho, yatto cāsīvise care”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2048_0: Tattha dhammanti sace raṭṭhavāsaṃ rocesi, tena hi tvaṃ janapadacārittaṃ dhammaṃ nisāmehi.
atk-s0513a4:2048_1: Yatto cāsīviseti āsīvisassa santike yatto paṭiyatto careyyāsi, sakkonto āsīvisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2049: Tāpasakumāro saṃkhittena bhāsitassa atthaṃ ajānanto pucchi –
atk-s0513a4:2051: “Kiṃ nu visaṃ papāto vā, paṅko vā brahmacārinaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2052: Kaṃ tvaṃ āsīvisaṃ brūsi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2057: Visaṃ tadāhu ariyā se, brahmacariyassa nārada.
atk-s0513a4:2060: Haranti yuvino cittaṃ, tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto;
atk-s0513a4:2064: Paṅko eso ca akkhāto, brahmacariyassa nārada.
atk-s0513a4:2067: Te tādise manussinde, mahante tāta nārada.
atk-s0513a4:2073: Yadettha kusalaṃ jaññā, tattha ghāsesanaṃ care.
atk-s0513a4:2076: Mitaṃ khāde mitaṃ bhuñje, na ca rūpe manaṃ kare.
atk-s0513a4:2080_0: Tattha āsavoti pupphāsavādi. Visaṃ tadāhūti taṃ āsavasaṅkhātaṃ suraṃ ariyā “brahmacariyassa
atk-s0513a4:2080_1: visa”nti vadanti. Pamattanti muṭṭhassatiṃ. Tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃvāti rukkhā bhassitvā patitatūlaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2080_2: viya. Akkhātoti buddhādīhi kathito. Silokoti kittivaṇṇo. Sakkāroti añjalikammādi.
atk-s0513a4:2080_3: Pūjāti gandhamālādīhi pūjā. Paṅkoti esa osīdāpanaṭṭhena “paṅko”ti akkhāto. Mahanteti
atk-s0513a4:2080_4: mahantabhāvappatte. Na tesaṃ pādato careti tesaṃ santike na care, rājakulūpako na
atk-s0513a4:2080_5: bhaveyyāsīti attho. Rājāno hi āsīvisā viya muhutteneva kujjhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:2081_0: Bhattatthoti bhattena atthiko hutvā. Yadettha kusalanti yaṃ tesu upasaṅkamitabbesu
atk-s0513a4:2081_1: gehesu kusalaṃ anavajjaṃ pañcaagocararahitaṃ jāneyyāsi, tattha ghāsesanaṃ careyyāsīti
atk-s0513a4:2081_2: attho. Na ca rūpe manaṃ kareti parakule mattaññū hutvā bhojanaṃ bhuñjantopi tattha
atk-s0513a4:2081_3: itthirūpe manaṃ mā kareyyāsi, mā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā itthirūpe nimittaṃ gaṇheyyāsīti
atk-s0513a4:2081_4: vadati. Goṭṭhaṃ majjaṃ kirāṭanti ayaṃ potthakesu pāṭho, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “goṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2081_5: majjaṃ kirāsañcā”ti vatvā “goṭṭhanti gunnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. Majjanti pānāgāraṃ. Kirāsanti
atk-s0513a4:2081_6: dhuttakerāṭikajana”nti vuttaṃ. Sabhā nikiraṇāni cāti sabhāyo ca hiraññasuvaṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2081_7: nikiraṇaṭṭhānāni ca. Ārakāti etāni sabbāni dūrato parivajjeyyāsi. Yānīvāti sappitelayānena
atk-s0513a4:2082_0: Māṇavo pitu kathentasseva satiṃ paṭilabhitvā “tāta, alaṃ me manussapathenā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2082_1: Athassa pitā mettādibhāvanaṃ ācikkhi. So tassovāde ṭhatvā na cirasseva jhānābhiññā
atk-s0513a4:2082_2: nibbattesi. Ubhopi pitāputtā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2083: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sā kumārikā ayaṃ kumārikā ahosi, tāpasakumāro ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, pitā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2087_0: Dūte te brahme pāhesinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpasaṃsanaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:2087_1: kathesi. Dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “passatha, āvuso, dasabalassa
atk-s0513a4:2087_2: upāyakosallaṃ, nandassa sakyaputtassa accharāgaṇaṃ dassetvā arahattaṃ adāsi, cūḷapanthakassa
atk-s0513a4:2087_3: pilotikaṃ datvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi, kammāraputtassa padumaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0513a4:2087_4: arahattaṃ adāsi, evaṃ nānāupāyehi satte vinetī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:2087_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato
atk-s0513a4:2087_6: idāneva ‘iminā idaṃ hotī’ti upāyakusalo, pubbepi upāyakusaloyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2088_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente janapado ahirañño ahosi. So hi janapadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2088_1: pīḷetvā dhanameva saṃkaḍḍhi. Tadā bodhisatto kāsigāme brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a4:2088_2: takkasilaṃ gantvā “pacchā dhammena bhikkhaṃ caritvā ācariyadhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:2088_3: sippaṃ paṭṭhapetvā niṭṭhitasippo anuyogaṃ datvā “ācariya, tumhākaṃ dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2088_4: āpucchitvā nikkhamma janapade caranto dhammena samena pariyesitvā satta nikkhe labhitvā
atk-s0513a4:2088_5: “ācariyassa dassāmī”ti gacchanto antarāmagge gaṅgaṃ otarituṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhi. Tassa
atk-s0513a4:2088_6: tattha nāvāya viparivattamānāya taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ udake pati. So cintesi “dullabhaṃ hiraññaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2088_7: janapade puna ācariyadhane pariyesiyamāne papañco bhavissati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ gaṅgātīreyeva
atk-s0513a4:2088_8: nirāhāro nisīdeyyaṃ, tassa me nisinnabhāvaṃ anupubbena rājā jānissati, tato amacce
atk-s0513a4:2088_9: pesessati, ahaṃ tehi saddhiṃ na mantessāmi, tato rājā sayaṃ āgamissati, iminā upāyena
atk-s0513a4:2088_10: tassa santike ācariyadhanaṃ labhissāmī”ti. So gaṅgātīre uttarisāṭakaṃ pārupitvā yaññasuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2088_11: bahi ṭhapetvā rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇe vālukatale suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya nisīdi. Taṃ nirāhāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2088_12: nisinnaṃ disvā mahājano “kasmā nisinnosī”ti pucchi, kassaci na kathesi. Punadivase
atk-s0513a4:2088_13: dvāragāmavāsino tassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā āgantvā pucchiṃsu, tesampi na kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2088_14: Te tassa kilamathaṃ disvā paridevantā pakkamiṃsu. Tatiyadivase nagaravāsino āgamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:2088_15: catutthadivase nagarato issarajanā, pañcamadivase rājapurisā. Chaṭṭhadivase rājā
atk-s0513a4:2088_16: amacce pesesi, tehipi saddhiṃ na kathesi. Sattamadivase rājā bhayaṭṭito hutvā tassa
atk-s0513a4:2091: Tesaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi, dukkhaṃ guyhamataṃ nu te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2092: Tattha dukkhaṃ guyhamataṃ nu teti kiṃ nu kho, brāhmaṇa, yaṃ tava dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ te guyhameva mataṃ, na aññassa ācikkhitabbanti.
atk-s0513a4:2093: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “mahārāja, dukkhaṃ nāma harituṃ samatthasseva ācikkhitabbaṃ, na aññassā”ti vatvā satta gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2096: Mā kho naṃ tassa akkhāhi, yo taṃ dukkhā na mocaye.
atk-s0513a4:2104: “Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:2105: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso.
atk-s0513a4:2108: Ānandino tassa bhavanti mittā, hitesino tassa dukhī bhavanti.
atk-s0513a4:2111: Akkheyya tibbāni parassa dhīro, saṇhaṃ giraṃ atthavatiṃ pamuñce.
atk-s0513a4:2113: “Sace ca jaññā avisayhamattano, na te hi mayhaṃ sukhāgamāya;
atk-s0513a4:2114: Ekova tibbāni saheyya dhīro, saccaṃ hirottappamapekkhamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2115_0: Tattha uppajjeti sace tava uppajjeyya. Mā akkhāhīti mā kathehi. Dubbijānataraṃ tatoti
atk-s0513a4:2115_1: tato tiracchānagatavassitatopi dubbijānataraṃ, tasmā tathato ajānitvā harituṃ asamatthassa
atk-s0513a4:2115_2: attano dukkhaṃ na kathetabbamevāti. Api ceti gāthā vuttatthāva. Anānupuṭṭhoti punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2115_3: puṭṭho. Pavedayeti katheti. Akālarūpeti akāle. Kālanti attano guyhassa kathanakālaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2115_4: Tathāvidhassāti paṇḍitapurisaṃ attanā saddhiṃ ekamanaṃ viditvā tathāvidhassa ācikkheyya. Tibbānīti dukkhāni.
atk-s0513a4:2116_0: Saceti yadi attano dukkhaṃ avisayhaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā purisakārena atekicchaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2116_1: jāneyya. Te hīti te eva lokapaveṇikā, aṭṭhalokadhammāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0513a4:2116_2: atha ayaṃ lokapaveṇī na mayhaṃ eva sukhāgamāya uppannā, aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi parimutto
atk-s0513a4:2116_3: nāma natthi, evaṃ sante sukhameva patthentena parassa dukkhāropanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2116_4: netaṃ hirottappasampannena kattabbaṃ, atthi ca me hirī ottappanti saccaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2116_5: attani hirottappaṃ apekkhamānova aññassa anārocetvā ekova tibbāni saheyya dhīroti.
atk-s0513a4:2117: Evaṃ mahāsatto sattahi gāthāhi rañño dhammaṃ desetvā attano ācariyadhanassa pariyesitabhāvaṃ dassento catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2124: Te me naṭṭhā mahārāja, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2127: Nālaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, tasmā tesaṃ na byāhariṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2130: Alaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, tasmā tuyhaṃ pavedayi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2131_0: Tattha bhikkhamānoti ete gahapatiādayo yācamāno. Te meti te satta nikkhā mama gaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2131_1: tarantassa naṭṭhā, gaṅgāyaṃ patitā. Purisā teti mahārāja, tava dūtapurisā. Anuvicintitāti
atk-s0513a4:2131_2: “nālaṃ ime maṃ dukkhā mocetu”nti mayā ñātā. Tasmāti tena kāraṇena tesaṃ attano dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2132: Rājā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā “mā cintayi, brāhmaṇa, ahaṃ te ācariyadhanaṃ dassāmī”ti dviguṇadhanamadāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2136: Tattha jātarūpamayeti te suvaṇṇassa catuddasa nikkhe jātarūpamayeyeva adāsi, na yassa vā tassa vā suvaṇṇassāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2137: Mahāsatto rañño ovādaṃ datvā ācariyassa dhanaṃ datvā dānādīni puññāni katvā rājāpi tassovāde ṭhito dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā ubhopi yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:2138_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi tathāgato upāyakusaloyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2138_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, ācariyo sāriputto, brāhmaṇamāṇavo
atk-s0513a4:2142_0: Rājā kāliṅgo cakkavattīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherena kataṃ mahābodhipūjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2142_1: ārabbha kathesi. Veneyyasaṅgahatthāya hi tathāgate janapadacārikaṃ pakkante sāvatthivāsino
atk-s0513a4:2142_2: gandhamālādihatthā jetavanaṃ gantvā aññaṃ pūjanīyaṭṭhānaṃ alabhitvā gandhakuṭidvāre
atk-s0513a4:2142_3: pātetvā gacchanti, te uḷārapāmojjā na honti. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā anāthapiṇḍiko tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:2142_4: jetavanaṃ āgatakāle ānandattherassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante, ayaṃ vihāro tathāgate
atk-s0513a4:2142_5: cārikaṃ pakkante nipaccayo hoti, manussānaṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjanīyaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0513a4:2142_6: sādhu, bhante, tathāgatassa imamatthaṃ ārocetvā ekassa pūjanīyaṭṭhānassa sakkuṇeyyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2142_7: jānāthā”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tathāgataṃ pucchi “kati nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2142_9: uddissaka”nti. “Sakkā pana, bhante, tumhesu dharantesuyeva cetiyaṃ kātu”nti. “Ānanda,
atk-s0513a4:2142_10: sārīrikaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ. Tañhi buddhānaṃ parinibbānakāle hoti, uddissakaṃ avatthukaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2142_11: mamāyanamattameva hoti, buddhehi paribhutto mahābodhirukkho buddhesu dharantesupi
atk-s0513a4:2142_12: cetiyamevā”ti. “Bhante, tumhesu pakkantesu jetavanavihāro appaṭisaraṇo hoti, mahājano
atk-s0513a4:2142_13: pūjanīyaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati, mahābodhito bījaṃ āharitvā jetavanadvāre ropessāmi, bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2142_14: “Sādhu, ānanda, ropehi, evaṃ sante jetavane mama nibaddhavāso viya bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2143_0: Thero kosalanarindassa anāthapiṇḍikassa visākhādīnañca ārocetvā jetavanadvāre bodhiropanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:2143_1: āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āha – “bhante, ahaṃ jetavanadvāre bodhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2143_2: ropessāmi, mahābodhito me bodhipakkaṃ āharathā”ti. Thero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a4:2143_3: ākāsena bodhimaṇḍaṃ gantvā vaṇṭā parigalantaṃ pakkaṃ bhūmiṃ asampattameva cīvarena
atk-s0513a4:2143_4: sampaṭicchitvā gahetvā ānandattherassa adāsi. Ānandatthero “ajja bodhiṃ ropessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2143_5: kosalarājādīnaṃ ārocesi. Rājā sāyanhasamaye mahantena parivārena sabbūpakaraṇāni
atk-s0513a4:2143_6: gāhāpetvā āgami, tathā anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā ca añño ca saddho jano. Thero mahābodhiropanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:2143_7: mahantaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhā chiddaṃ kāretvā gandhakalalassa pūretvā “idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2143_8: bodhipakkaṃ ropehi, mahārājā”ti rañño adāsi. So cintesi “rajjaṃ nāma na sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2143_9: amhākaṃ hatthe tiṭṭhati, idaṃ mayā anāthapiṇḍikena ropāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So taṃ bodhipakkaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2143_10: mahāseṭṭhissa hatthe ṭhapesi. Anāthapiṇḍiko gandhakalalaṃ viyūhitvā tattha pātesi.
