atk-s0513a4:2143_11: Tasmiṃ tassa hatthato muttamatteyeva sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva naṅgalasīsappamāṇo
atk-s0513a4:2143_12: bodhikhandho paṇṇāsahatthubbedho uṭṭhahi, catūsu disāsu uddhañcāti pañca mahāsākhā
atk-s0513a4:2143_13: paṇṇāsahatthāva nikkhamiṃsu. Iti so taṅkhaṇaññeva vanappatijeṭṭhako hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2143_14: Rājā aṭṭhārasamatte suvaṇṇarajataghaṭe gandhodakena pūretvā nīluppalahatthakādipaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0513a4:2143_15: mahābodhiṃ parikkhipitvā puṇṇaghaṭe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapesi, sattaratanamayaṃ vedikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2143_16: kāresi, suvaṇṇamissakaṃ vālukaṃ okiri, pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi, sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2144_0: Thero tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, tumhehi mahābodhimūle samāpannasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2144_1: mayā ropitabodhimūle nisīditvā mahājanassa hitatthāya samāpajjathā”ti āha. “Ānanda,
atk-s0513a4:2144_2: kiṃ kathesi, mayi mahābodhimūle samāpannasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne añño padeso
atk-s0513a4:2144_3: dhāretuṃ na sakkotī”ti. “Bhante, mahājanassa hitatthāya imassa bhūmippadesassa dhuvaniyāmena
atk-s0513a4:2144_4: samāpattisukhena taṃ bodhimūlaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti. Satthā ekarattiṃ samāpattisukhena
atk-s0513a4:2144_5: paribhuñji. Thero kosalarājādīnaṃ kathetvā bodhimahaṃ nāma kāresi. Sopi kho bodhirukkho
atk-s0513a4:2144_6: ānandattherena ropitattā ānandabodhiyevāti paññāyittha. Tadā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2144_7: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso āyasmā ānando dharanteyeva tathāgate bodhiṃ ropetvā mahāpūjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2144_8: kāresi, aho mahāguṇo thero”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0513a4:2144_9: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ānando
atk-s0513a4:2144_10: saparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu manusse gahetvā bahugandhamālādīni āharitvā mahābodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0513a4:2145_0: Atīte kaliṅgaraṭṭhe dantapuranagare kāliṅgo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa mahākāliṅgo,
atk-s0513a4:2145_1: cūḷakāliṅgoti dve puttā ahesuṃ. Nemittakā “jeṭṭhaputto pitu accayena rajjaṃ kāressati,
atk-s0513a4:2145_2: kaniṭṭho pana isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā bhikkhāya carissati, putto panassa cakkavattī
atk-s0513a4:2145_3: bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Aparabhāge jeṭṭhaputto pitu accayena rājā ahosi, kaniṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:2145_4: pana uparājā. So “putto kira me cakkavattī bhavissatī”ti puttaṃ nissāya mānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2145_5: Rājā asahanto “cūḷakāliṅgaṃ gaṇhā”ti ekaṃ atthacarakaṃ āṇāpesi. So gantvā “kumāra,
atk-s0513a4:2145_6: rājā taṃ gaṇhāpetukāmo, tava jīvitaṃ rakkhāhī”ti āha. So attano lañjanamuddikañca
atk-s0513a4:2145_7: sukhumakambalañca khaggañcāti imāni tīṇi atthacarakāmaccassa dassetvā “imāya saññāya
atk-s0513a4:2145_8: mama puttassa rajjaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti vatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge assamaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2145_9: katvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nadītīre vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:2146_0: Maddaraṭṭhepi sāgalanagare maddarañño aggamahesī dhītaraṃ vijāyi. Taṃ nemittakā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2146_1: bhikkhaṃ caritvā jīvikaṃ kappessati, putto panassā cakkavattī bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2146_2: Sakalajambudīpe rājāno taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ekappahāreneva āgantvā sāgalanagaraṃ rundhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2146_3: Maddarājā cintesi “sacāhaṃ imaṃ ekassa dassāmi, sesarājāno kujjhissanti, mama dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2146_4: rakkhissāmī”ti dhītarañca bhariyañca gahetvā aññātakavesena palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:2146_5: cūḷakāliṅgakumārassa assamapadato uparibhāge assamaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya
atk-s0513a4:2146_6: jīvikaṃ kappento tattha paṭivasati. Mātāpitaro “dhītaraṃ rakkhissāmā”ti taṃ assamapade
atk-s0513a4:2146_7: katvā phalāphalatthāya gacchanti. Sā tesaṃ gatakāle nānāpupphāni gahetvā pupphacumbaṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2146_8: katvā gaṅgātīre ṭhapitasopānapanti viya jāto eko supupphito ambarukkho atthi, taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2146_9: abhiruhitvā kīḷitvā pupphacumbaṭakaṃ udake khipi. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ gaṅgāyaṃ nhāyantassa
atk-s0513a4:2146_10: cūḷakāliṅgakumārassa sīse laggi. So taṃ oloketvā “idaṃ ekāya itthiyā kataṃ, no ca
atk-s0513a4:2146_11: kho mahallikāya, taruṇakumārikāya katakammaṃ, vīmaṃsissāmi tāva na”nti kilesavasena
atk-s0513a4:2146_12: uparigaṅgaṃ gantvā tassā ambarukkhe nisīditvā madhurena sarena gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a4:2146_13: rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā taṃ disvā “bhadde, kā nāma tva”nti āha. “Manussitthīhamasmi sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2146_14: “Tena hi otarāhī”ti. “Na sakkā sāmi, ahaṃ khattiyā”ti. “Bhadde, ahampi khattiyoyeva,
atk-s0513a4:2146_15: otarāhī”ti. Sāmi, na vacanamatteneva khattiyo hoti, yadisi khattiyo, khattiyamāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2146_16: kathehī”ti. Te ubhopi aññamaññaṃ khattiyamāyaṃ kathayiṃsu. Rājadhītā otari.
atk-s0513a4:2147_0: Te aññamaññaṃ ajjhācāraṃ cariṃsu. Sā mātāpitūsu āgatesu tassa kāliṅgarājaputtabhāvañceva
atk-s0513a4:2147_1: araññaṃ paviṭṭhakāraṇañca vitthārena tesaṃ kathesi. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2147_2: tassa adaṃsu. Tesaṃ piyasaṃvāsena vasantānaṃ rājadhītā gabbhaṃ labhitvā dasamāsaccayena
atk-s0513a4:2147_3: dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi, “kāliṅgo”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0513a4:2147_4: pitu ceva ayyakassa ca santike sabbasippānaṃ nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa pitā nakkhattayogavasena
atk-s0513a4:2147_5: bhātu matabhāvaṃ ñatvā “tāta, mā tvaṃ araññe vasa, petteyyo te mahākāliṅgo kālakato,
atk-s0513a4:2147_6: tvaṃ dantapuranagaraṃ gantvā kulasantakaṃ sakalarajjaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā attanā ānītaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2147_7: muddikañca kambalañca khaggañca datvā “tāta, dantapuranagare asukavīthiyaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2147_8: atthacarako amacco atthi, tassa gehe sayanamajjhe otaritvā imāni tīṇi ratanāni tassa
atk-s0513a4:2147_9: dassetvā mama puttabhāvaṃ ācikkha, so taṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpessatī”ti uyyojesi. So mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a4:2147_10: ca ayyakāyyike ca vanditvā puññamahiddhiyā ākāsena gantvā amaccassa sayanapiṭṭheyeva
atk-s0513a4:2147_11: otaritvā “kosi tva”nti puṭṭho “cūḷakāliṅgassa puttomhī”ti ācikkhitvā tāni ratanāni
atk-s0513a4:2147_12: dassesi. Amacco rājaparisāya ārocesi. Amaccā nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā tassa setacchattaṃ ussāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2148_0: Athassa kāliṅgabhāradvājo nāma purohito tassa dasa cakkavattivattāni ācikkhi. So
atk-s0513a4:2148_1: taṃ vattaṃ pūresi. Athassa pannarasauposathadivase cakkadahato cakkaratanaṃ, uposathakulato
atk-s0513a4:2148_2: hatthiratanaṃ, valāhakakulato assaratanaṃ, vepullapabbatato maṇiratanaṃ āgami, itthiratanagahapatiratanapariṇāyakaratanāni
atk-s0513a4:2148_3: pātubhavanti. So sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe rajjaṃ gaṇhitvā ekadivasañca chattiṃsayojanāya
atk-s0513a4:2148_4: parisāya parivuto sabbasetaṃ kelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṃ hatthiṃ āruyha mahantena sirivilāsena
atk-s0513a4:2148_5: mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ pāyāsi. Athassa sabbabuddhānaṃ jayapallaṅkassa pathavīnābhibhūtassa
atk-s0513a4:2148_6: mahābodhimaṇḍassa uparibhāge nāgo gantuṃ nāsakkhi. Rājā punappunaṃ codesi, so nāsakkhiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:2152_0: Atha rañño purohito raññā saddhiṃ gacchanto “ākāse āvaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0513a4:2152_1: rājā hatthiṃ pesetuṃ na sakkoti, vīmaṃsissāmī”ti ākāsato oruyha sabbabuddhānaṃyeva
atk-s0513a4:2152_2: jayapallaṅkaṃ pathavīnābhimaṇḍalabhūtaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ passi. Tadā kira tattha aṭṭharājakarīsamatte
atk-s0513a4:2152_3: ṭhāne kesamassumattampi tiṇaṃ nāma natthi, rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālukā vippakiṇṇā honti,
atk-s0513a4:2152_4: samantā tiṇalatāvanappatiyo bodhimaṇḍaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āvaṭṭetvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukhāva
atk-s0513a4:2152_5: aṭṭhaṃsu. Brāhmaṇo taṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ oloketvā “idañhi sabbabuddhānaṃ sabbakilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2152_6: imassa uparibhāge sakkādīhipi na sakkā gantu”nti cintetvā kāliṅgarañño santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:2152_7: bodhimaṇḍassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ “otarā”ti āha. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:2161: Pathaviyā nābhiyaṃ maṇḍo, iti no sutaṃ mante mahārāja.
atk-s0513a4:2164: Pathaviyā ayaṃ maṇḍo, orohitvā namo karohi.
atk-s0513a4:2166: “Ye te bhavanti nāgā ca, abhijātā ca kuñjarā;
atk-s0513a4:2167: Ettāvatā padesaṃ te, nāgā neva mupayanti.
atk-s0513a4:2173: Sampesesi nāgaṃ ñassāma, mayaṃ yathimassidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2177_0: Tattha samaṇakolaññanti tāpasānaṃ puttaṃ. Cakkaṃ vattayatoti cakkaṃ vattayamānaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2177_1: cakkavattinti attho. Pariggahetvāti bhūmibhāgaṃ vīmaṃsitvā. Samaṇuggatoti sabbabuddhehi
atk-s0513a4:2177_2: vaṇṇito. Anadhivarāti atulyā appameyyā. Virocantīti vihatasabbakilesandhakārā taruṇasūriyā
atk-s0513a4:2177_3: viya idha nisinnā virocanti. Tiṇalatāti tiṇāni ca latāyo ca. Maṇḍoti catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalāya
atk-s0513a4:2177_4: pathaviyā maṇḍo sāro nābhibhūto acalaṭṭhānaṃ, kappe saṇṭhahante paṭhamaṃ saṇṭhahati,
atk-s0513a4:2177_5: vinassante pacchā vinassati. Iti no sutanti evaṃ amhehi lakkhaṇamantavasena sutaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2177_6: Orohitvāti ākāsato otaritvā imassa sabbabuddhānaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhānassa namo
atk-s0513a4:2178_0: Ye teti ye cakkavattirañño hatthiratanasaṅkhātā uposathakule nibbattanāgā. Ettāvatāti
atk-s0513a4:2178_1: sabbepi te ettakaṃ padesaṃ neva upayanti, koṭṭiyamānāpi na upagacchantiyeva. Abhijātoti
atk-s0513a4:2178_2: gocariyādīni aṭṭha hatthikulāni abhibhavitvā atikkamitvā uposathakule jāto. Kuñjaranti
atk-s0513a4:2178_3: uttamaṃ. Ettāvatāti ettako padeso sakkā etena nāgena upagantuṃ, ito uttari na sakkā,
atk-s0513a4:2178_4: abhikaṅkhanto vajiraṅkusena saññaṃ datvā pesehīti. Veyyañjanikavaco nisāmetvāti bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:2178_5: so rājā tassa lakkhaṇapāṭhakassa veyyañjanikassa kāliṅgabhāradvājassa vaco nisāmetvā
atk-s0513a4:2178_6: upadhāretvā “ñassāma mayaṃ yathā imassa vacanaṃ yadi vā saccaṃ yadi vā alika”nti
atk-s0513a4:2178_7: vīmaṃsanto nāgaṃ pesesīti attho. Koñcova abhinaditvānāti bhikkhave, so nāgo tena
atk-s0513a4:2178_8: raññā vajiraṅkusena codetvā pesito koñcasakuṇo viya naditvā paṭisakkitvā soṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:2178_9: gīvaṃ unnāmetvā garuṃ bhāraṃ vahituṃ asakkonto viya ākāseyeva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2179_0: So tena punappunaṃ vijjhiyamāno vedanaṃ sahituṃ asakkonto kālamakāsi. Rājā panassa
atk-s0513a4:2179_1: matabhāvaṃ ajānanto piṭṭhe nisinnova ahosi. Kāliṅgabhāradvājo “mahārāja, tava nāgo
atk-s0513a4:2179_2: niruddho, aññaṃ hatthiṃ saṅkamā”ti āha. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2183: Aññaṃ saṅkama nāgaṃ, nāgo khīṇāyuko mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2184_0: Tattha nāgo khīṇāyukoti nāgo te jīvitakkhayaṃ patto, yaṃ kiñci karontena na sakkā
atk-s0513a4:2184_1: piṭṭhe nisinnena bodhimaṇḍamatthakena gantuṃ. Aññaṃ nāgaṃ saṅkamāti rañño puññiddhibalena
atk-s0513a4:2184_2: añño nāgo uposathakulato āgantvā piṭṭhiṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0513a4:2185: Rājā tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe matahatthī bhūmiyaṃ pati. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2188: Saṅkanteva raññe nāgo, tattheva pati bhumyā;
atk-s0513a4:2190: Atha rājā ākāsato oruyha bodhimaṇḍaṃ oloketvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā bhāradvājassa thutiṃ karonto āha –
atk-s0513a4:2194: Brāhmaṇo taṃ anadhivāsento attānaṃ nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā buddheyeva ukkhipitvā vaṇṇesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2197: Veyyañjanikā hi mayaṃ, buddhā sabbaññuno mahārāja.
atk-s0513a4:2199: “Sabbaññū sabbavidū ca, buddhā na lakkhaṇena jānanti;
atk-s0513a4:2200: Āgamabalasā hi mayaṃ, buddhā sabbaṃ pajānantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2201_0: Tattha veyyañjanikāti mahārāja, mayaṃ byañjanaṃ disvā byākaraṇasamatthā sutabuddhā
atk-s0513a4:2201_1: nāma, buddhā pana sabbaññū sabbavidū. Buddhā hi atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānanti ceva
atk-s0513a4:2201_2: passanti ca, sabbaññutaññāṇena te sabbaṃ jānanti, na lakkhaṇena. Mayaṃ pana āgamabalasā
atk-s0513a4:2201_3: attano sippabaleneva jānāma, tañca ekadesameva, buddhā pana sabbaṃ pajānantīti.
atk-s0513a4:2202_0: Rājā buddhaguṇe sutvā somanassappatto hutvā sakalacakkavāḷavāsikehi bahugandhamālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2202_1: āharāpetvā mahābodhimaṇḍe sattāhaṃ vasitvā mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0513a4:2209_0: Tattha manupāyāsīti mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. So mahābodhimaṇḍe aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2209_1: suvaṇṇatthambhaṃ ussāpesi. Tassa sattaratanamayā vedikā kāresi, ratanamissakaṃ vālukaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2209_2: okirāpetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ kāresi, sattaratanamayaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ kāresi, devasikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2209_3: pupphānaṃ saṭṭhivāhasahassāni sannipātayi, evaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ pūjesi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana
atk-s0513a4:2210: Evaṃ mahābodhipūjaṃ katvā mātāpitaro ayyakāyyike ca ādāya dantapurameva ānetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:2211_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ānando bodhipūjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2211_1: kāresiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā māṇavakakāliṅgo ānando ahosi, kāliṅgabhāradvājo
atk-s0513a4:2215_0: Akittiṃ disvā sammantanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthivāsiṃ dānapatiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2215_1: upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a4:2215_2: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā pariyosānadivase ariyasaṅghassa sabbaparikkhāre
atk-s0513a4:2215_3: adāsi. Athassa satthā parisamajjheyeva anumodanaṃ karonto “upāsaka, mahā te pariccāgo,
atk-s0513a4:2215_4: aho dukkaraṃ tayā kataṃ, ayañhi dānavaṃso nāma porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ vaṃso, dānaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a4:2215_5: gihināpi pabbajitenāpi dātabbameva. Porāṇakapaṇḍitā pana pabbajitvā araññe vasantāpi
atk-s0513a4:2215_6: aloṇakaṃ vidhūpanaṃ udakamattasittaṃ kārapaṇṇaṃ khādamānāpi sampattayācakānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2215_7: datvā sayaṃ pītisukhena yāpayiṃsū”ti vatvā “bhante, idaṃ tāva sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2215_8: mahājanassa pākaṭaṃ, tumhehi vuttaṃ apākaṭaṃ, taṃ no kathethā”ti tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2216_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa
atk-s0513a4:2216_1: kule nibbatti, “akittī”tissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tassa padasā gamanakāle bhaginīpi jāyi,
atk-s0513a4:2216_2: “yasavatī”tissā nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Mahāsatto soḷasavassakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni
atk-s0513a4:2216_3: uggaṇhitvā paccāgami. Athassa mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. So tesaṃ petakiccāni kāretvā
atk-s0513a4:2216_4: dhanavilokanaṃ karonto “asuko nāma ettakaṃ dhanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā atīto, asuko ettaka”nti
atk-s0513a4:2216_5: vacanaṃ sutvā saṃviggamānaso hutvā “idaṃ dhanameva paññāyati, na dhanassa saṃhārakā,
atk-s0513a4:2216_6: sabbe imaṃ dhanaṃ pahāyeva gatā, ahaṃ pana taṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti bhaginiṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:2216_7: “tvaṃ imaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha. “Tumhākaṃ pana ko ajjhāsayo”ti? “Pabbajitukāmomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2216_8: “Bhātika, ahaṃ tumhehi chaḍḍitaṃ kheḷaṃ na sirasā sampaṭicchāmi, na me iminā attho,
atk-s0513a4:2216_9: ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti. So rājānaṃ āpucchitvā bheriṃ carāpesi “dhanena atthikā akittipaṇḍitassa
atk-s0513a4:2217_0: So sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā dhane akhīyamāne cintesi “ime saṅkhārā khīyanti,
atk-s0513a4:2217_1: kiṃ me dhanakīḷāya, atthikā taṃ gaṇhissantī”ti nivesanadvāraṃ vivaritvā “dinnaññeva
atk-s0513a4:2217_2: harantū”ti sahiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gehaṃ pahāya ñātimaṇḍalassa paridevantassa bhaginiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2217_3: gahetvā bārāṇasito nikkhami. Yena dvārena nikkhami, taṃ akittidvāraṃ nāma jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2217_4: yena titthena nadiṃ otiṇṇo, tampi akittititthaṃ nāma jātaṃ. So dve tīṇi yojanāni
atk-s0513a4:2217_5: gantvā ramaṇīye ṭhāne paṇṇasālaṃ katvā bhaginiyā saddhiṃ pabbaji. Tassa pabbajitakālato
atk-s0513a4:2217_6: paṭṭhāya bahugāmanigamarājadhānivāsino pabbajiṃsu. Mahāparivāro ahosi, mahālābhasakkāro
atk-s0513a4:2217_7: nibbatti, buddhuppādakālo viya pavatti. Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ lābhasakkāro mahā, parivāropi
atk-s0513a4:2217_8: mahanto, mayā ekakeneva viharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā avelāya antamaso bhaginimpi
atk-s0513a4:2217_9: ajānāpetvā ekakova nikkhamitvā anupubbena damiḷaraṭṭhaṃ patvā kāvīrapaṭṭanasamīpe
atk-s0513a4:2217_10: uyyāne viharanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattesi. Tatrāpissa mahālābhasakkāro uppajji. So
atk-s0513a4:2217_11: taṃ jigucchitvā chaḍḍetvā ākāsena gantvā nāgadīpasamīpe kāradīpe otari. Tadā kāradīpo
atk-s0513a4:2217_12: ahidīpo nāma ahosi. So tattha mahantaṃ kārarukkhaṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0513a4:2217_13: vāsaṃ kappesi. Tattha tassa vasanabhāvaṃ na koci jānāti. Athassa bhaginī bhātaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2217_14: gavesamānā anupubbena damiḷaraṭṭhaṃ patvā taṃ adisvā tena vasitaṭṭhāneyeva vasi,
atk-s0513a4:2218_0: Mahāsatto appicchatāya katthaci agantvā tassa rukkhassa phalakāle phalāni khādati,
atk-s0513a4:2218_1: pattakāle pattāni udakasittāni khādati. Tassa sīlatejena sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2218_2: uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti āvajjento akittipaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2218_3: disvā “kimatthaṃ esa tāpaso sīlāni rakkhati, sakkattaṃ nu kho pattheti, udāhu aññaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2218_4: vīmiṃsissāmi naṃ. Ayañhi dukkhena jīvikaṃ kappesi, udakasittāni kārapaṇṇāni khādati,
atk-s0513a4:2218_5: sace sakkattaṃ pattheti, attano sittapattāni mayhaṃ dassati, no ce, na dassatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2218_6: brāhmaṇavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisatto kārapaṇṇāni sedetvā otāretvā “sītalabhūtāni
atk-s0513a4:2218_7: khādissāmī”ti paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi. Athassa purato sakko bhikkhāya aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a4:2218_8: taṃ disvā somanassappatto hutvā “lābhā vata me, yohaṃ yācakaṃ passāmi, ajja me manorathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2218_9: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dānaṃ dassāmī”ti pakkabhājaneneva ādāya gantvā “idaṃ me dānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇassa
atk-s0513a4:2218_10: paccayo hotū”ti attano asesetvāva tassa bhājane pakkhipi. Brāhmaṇo taṃ gahetvā thokaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2218_11: gantvā antaradhāyi. Mahāsattopi tassa datvā puna apacitvā pītisukheneva vītināmetvā
atk-s0513a4:2219_0: Sakko puna brāhmaṇavesena agamāsi. Punapissa datvā mahāsatto tatheva vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a4:2219_1: Tatiyadivasepi tatheva datvā “aho me lābhā vata, kārapaṇṇāni nissāya mahantaṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2219_2: pasuta”nti somanassappatto tayo divase anāhāratāya dubbalopi samāno majjhanhikasamaye
atk-s0513a4:2219_3: paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā dānaṃ āvajjento paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi. Sakkopi cintesi “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2219_4: brāhmaṇo tayo divase nirāhāro hutvā evaṃ dubbalopi dānaṃ dento tuṭṭhacittova deti,
atk-s0513a4:2219_5: cittassa aññathattampi natthi, ahaṃ imaṃ ‘idaṃ nāma patthetvā detī’ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2219_6: pucchitvā ajjhāsayamassa sutvā dānakāraṇaṃ jānissāmī”ti. So majjhanhike vītivatte
atk-s0513a4:2219_7: mahantena sirisobhaggena gaganatale taruṇasūriyo viya jalamāno āgantvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0513a4:2219_8: puratova ṭhatvā “ambho tāpasa, evaṃ uṇhavāte paharante evarūpe loṇajalaparikkhitte
atk-s0513a4:2219_9: araññe kimatthaṃ tapokammaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2222: Kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammanī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2223: Tattha kiṃ patthayanti kiṃ manussasampattiṃ patthento, udāhu sakkasampattiādīnaṃ aññataranti.
atk-s0513a4:2224: Mahāsatto taṃ sutvā sakkabhāvañcassa ñatvā “nāhaṃ etā sampattiyo patthemi, sabbaññutaṃ pana patthento tapokammaṃ karomī”ti pakāsetuṃ dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2228_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā punappunaṃ jāti khandhānaṃ bhedanaṃ sammohamaraṇañca dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2228_1: tasmā yatthetāni natthi, taṃ nibbānaṃ patthento idha sammāmīti evaṃ attano nibbānajjhāsayataṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:2229: Taṃ sutvā sakko tuṭṭhamānaso “sabbabhavesu kirāyaṃ ukkaṇṭhito nibbānatthāya araññe viharati, varamassa dassāmī”ti varena nimantento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2232: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2233: Tattha yaṃ kiñci manasicchasīti yaṃ manasā icchasi, taṃ dammi, varaṃ gaṇhāhīti.
atk-s0513a4:2237: Yena putte ca dāre ca, dhanadhaññaṃ piyāni ca;
atk-s0513a4:2238: Laddhā narā na tappanti, so lobho na mayī vase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2239_0: Tattha varañce me adoti sace varaṃ mayhaṃ desi. Piyāni cāti aññāni ca yāni piyabhaṇḍāni.
atk-s0513a4:2239_1: Na tappantīti punappunaṃ puttādayo patthentiyeva, na tittiṃ upagacchanti. Na mayī
atk-s0513a4:2239_2: vaseti mayi mā vasatu mā uppajjatu.
atk-s0513a4:2240: Athassa sakko tussitvā uttarimpi varaṃ dento mahāsatto ca varaṃ gaṇhanto imā gāthā abhāsiṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:2243: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2247: Yena jātena jīyanti, so doso na mayī vase.
atk-s0513a4:2250: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2253: Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
atk-s0513a4:2254: Bālenallāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:2256: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2260: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
atk-s0513a4:2261: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2264: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2267: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
atk-s0513a4:2270: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2274: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
atk-s0513a4:2275: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
atk-s0513a4:2278: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2282: Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, sīlavanto ca yācakā.
atk-s0513a4:2285: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0513a4:2288: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2291: Na maṃ puna upeyyāsi, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0513a4:2294: Dassanaṃ abhikaṅkhanti, kiṃ nu me dassane bhayaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2297: Disvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃ, etaṃ te dassane bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2298_0: Tattha yena jātenāti yena cittena jātena kuddhā sattā pāṇavadhādīnaṃ katattā rājadaṇḍavasena
atk-s0513a4:2298_1: visakhādanādīhi vā attano maraṇavasena etāni khettādīni jīyanti, so doso mayi na
atk-s0513a4:2298_2: vaseyyāti yācati. Na suṇeti asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatītipi imehi kāraṇehi na suṇeyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2298_3: Kiṃ nu te akaranti kiṃ nu tava bālena mātā māritā, udāhu tava pitā, aññaṃ vā pana
atk-s0513a4:2298_4: te kiṃ nāma anatthaṃ bālo akaraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2299_0: Anayaṃ nayatīti akāraṇaṃ “kāraṇa”nti gaṇhāti, pāṇātipātādīni katvā jīvikaṃ kappessāmīti
atk-s0513a4:2299_1: evarūpāni anatthakammāni cinteti. Adhurāyanti saddhādhurasīladhurapaññādhuresu ayojetvā
atk-s0513a4:2299_2: ayoge niyuñjati. Dunnayo seyyaso hotīti dunnayova tassa seyyo hoti. Pañca dussīlakammāni
atk-s0513a4:2299_3: samādāya vattanameva seyyoti gaṇhāti, hitapaṭipattiyā vā dunnayo hoti netuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0513a4:2299_4: Sammā vuttoti hetunā kāraṇena vutto kuppati. Vinayanti “evaṃ abhikkamitabba”ntiādikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2299_5: ācāravinayaṃ na jānāti, ovādañca na sampaṭicchati. Sādhu tassāti etehi kāraṇehi tassa adassanameva sādhu.
atk-s0513a4:2300_0: Sūriyuggamanaṃ patīti sūriyuggamanavelāya. Dibbā bhakkhāti dibbabhojanaṃ yācakāti
atk-s0513a4:2300_1: tassa dibbabhojanassa paṭiggāhakā. Vatacariyāhīti dānasīlauposathakammehi. Dassanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2300_2: abhikaṅkhantīti dassanaṃ mama abhikaṅkhanti. Taṃ tādisanti evarūpaṃ dibbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2300_3: Pamajjeyyanti pamādaṃ āpajjeyyaṃ. Tava sirisampattiṃ pattheyyaṃ, evaṃ nibbānatthāya
atk-s0513a4:2300_4: pavattite tapokamme sakkaṭṭhānaṃ patthento pamatto nāma bhaveyyaṃ, etaṃ tava dassane mayhaṃ bhayanti.
atk-s0513a4:2301: Sakko “sādhu, bhante, ito paṭṭhāya na te santikaṃ āgamissāmā”ti taṃ vanditvā khamāpetvā pakkāmi. Mahāsatto yāvajīvaṃ tattheva vasanto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:2302: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sakko anuruddho ahosi, akittipaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2306_0: Ahameva dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsi bāloti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:2306_1: kathesi. Ekasmiñhi antovasse dve aggasāvakā gaṇaṃ pahāya vivittāvāsaṃ vasitukāmā
atk-s0513a4:2306_2: satthāraṃ āpucchitvā kokālikaraṭṭhe kokālikassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ evamāhaṃsu
atk-s0513a4:2306_3: “āvuso kokālika, taṃ nissāya amhākaṃ, amhe ca nissāya tava phāsuvihāro bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:2306_4: imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vaseyyāmā”ti. “Ko panāvuso, maṃ nissāya tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2306_5: Sace tvaṃ āvuso “dve aggasāvakā idha viharantī”ti kassaci nāroceyyāsi, mayaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2306_6: vihareyyāma, ayaṃ taṃ nissāya amhākaṃ phāsuvihāroti. “Atha tumhe nissāya mayhaṃ ko
atk-s0513a4:2306_7: phāsuvihāro”ti? “Mayaṃ tuyhaṃ antotemāsaṃ dhammaṃ vācessāma, dhammakathaṃ kathessāma,
atk-s0513a4:2306_8: esa tuyhaṃ amhe nissāya phāsuvihāro”ti. “Vasathāvuso, yathājjhāsayenā”ti. So tesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2306_9: patirūpaṃ senāsanaṃ adāsi. Te phalasamāpattisukhena sukhaṃ vasiṃsu. Koci nesaṃ tattha
atk-s0513a4:2307_0: Te vutthavassā pavāretvā “āvuso, taṃ nissāya sukhaṃ vutthāmha, satthāraṃ vandituṃ
atk-s0513a4:2307_1: gacchāmā”ti taṃ āpucchiṃsu. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā te ādāya dhuragāme piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a4:2307_2: cari. Therā katabhattakiccā gāmato nikkhamiṃsu. Kokāliko te uyyojetvā nivattitvā
atk-s0513a4:2307_3: manussānaṃ ārocesi “upāsakā, tumhe tiracchānasadisā, dve aggasāvake temāsaṃ dhuravihāre
atk-s0513a4:2307_4: vasante na jānittha, idāni te gatā”ti. Manussā “kasmā pana, bhante, amhākaṃ nārocitthā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2307_5: vatvā bahuṃ sappitelādibhesajjañceva vatthacchādanañca gahetvā there upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:2307_6: vanditvā “khamatha no, bhante, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ aggasāvakabhāvaṃ na jānāma, ajja no
atk-s0513a4:2307_7: kokālikabhadantassa vacanena ñātā, amhākaṃ anukampāya imāni bhesajjavatthacchādanāni gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2308_0: Kokāliko “therā appicchā santuṭṭhā, imāni vatthāni attanā aggahetvā mayhaṃ dassantī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2308_1: cintetvā upāsakehi saddhiṃyeva therānaṃ santikaṃ gato. Therā bhikkhuparipācitattā
atk-s0513a4:2308_2: tato kiñci neva attanā gaṇhiṃsu, na kokālikassa dāpesuṃ. Upāsakā “bhante, idāni agaṇhantā
atk-s0513a4:2308_3: puna amhākaṃ anukampāya idha āgaccheyyāthā”ti yāciṃsu. Therā anadhivāsetvā satthu
atk-s0513a4:2308_4: santikaṃ agamiṃsu. Kokāliko “ime therā attanā agaṇhantā mayhaṃ na dāpesu”nti āghātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2308_5: bandhi. Therāpi satthu santike thokaṃ vasitvā attano parivāre pañcabhikkhusate ca
atk-s0513a4:2308_6: ādāya bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caramānā kokālikaraṭṭhaṃ pattā. Te upāsakā
atk-s0513a4:2308_7: paccuggamanaṃ katvā there ādāya tameva vihāraṃ netvā devasikaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2308_8: Pahutaṃ bhesajjavatthacchādanaṃ uppajji, therehi saddhiṃ āgatabhikkhū cīvarāni vicārentā
atk-s0513a4:2308_9: saddhiṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaññeva denti, kokālikassa na denti, therāpi tassa na dāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:2308_10: Kokāliko cīvaraṃ alabhitvā “pāpicchā sāriputtamoggallānā, pubbe dīyamānaṃ lābhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2308_11: aggahetvā idāni gaṇhanti, pūretuṃ na sakkā, aññe na olokentī”ti there akkosati paribhāsati.
atk-s0513a4:2308_12: Therā “ayaṃ amhe nissāya akusalaṃ pasavatī”ti saparivārā nikkhamitvā “aññaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2308_13: katipāhaṃ vasathā”ti manussehi yāciyamānāpi nivattituṃ na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2309_0: Atheko daharo bhikkhu āha – “upāsakā, kathaṃ therā vasissanti, tumhākaṃ kulūpako
atk-s0513a4:2309_1: thero idha imesaṃ vāsaṃ na sahatī”ti. Te tassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante, tumhe kira
atk-s0513a4:2309_2: therānaṃ idha vāsaṃ na sahatha, gacchatha ne khamāpetvā nivattetha, sace na nivattetha,
atk-s0513a4:2309_3: palāyitvā aññattha vasathā”ti āhaṃsu. So upāsakānaṃ bhayena gantvā there yāci. Therā
atk-s0513a4:2309_4: “gacchāvuso, na mayaṃ nivattāmā”ti pakkamiṃsu. So there nivattetuṃ asakkonto vihārameva
atk-s0513a4:2309_5: paccāgato. Atha naṃ upāsakā pucchiṃsu “nivattitā te, bhante, therā”ti. “Nivattetuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2309_6: nāsakkhiṃ āvuso”ti. Atha naṃ “imasmiṃ pāpadhamme vasante idha pesalā bhikkhū na vasissanti,
atk-s0513a4:2309_7: nikkaḍḍhāma na”nti cintetvā “bhante, mā tvaṃ idha vasi, amhe nissāya tuyhaṃ kiñci
atk-s0513a4:2309_8: natthī”ti āhaṃsu. So tehi nikkaḍḍhito pattacīvaramādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2309_9: upasaṅkamitvā “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2309_10: āha. Atha naṃ satthā “mā hevaṃ kokālika, avaca, mā hevaṃ kokālika avaca, pasādehi
atk-s0513a4:2309_11: kokālika, sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ, te pesalā bhikkhū”ti vāreti. Vāritopi kokāliko
atk-s0513a4:2309_12: “tumhe, bhante, tumhākaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ saddahatha, ahaṃ paccakkhato addasaṃ, pāpicchā
atk-s0513a4:2309_13: ete paṭicchannakammantā dussīlā”ti vatvā yāvatatiyaṃ satthārā vāritopi tatheva vatvā
atk-s0513a4:2309_14: uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Tassa pakkantamattasseva sakalasarīre sāsapamattā piḷakā uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0513a4:2309_15: anupubbena vaḍḍhitvā beḷuvapakkamattā hutvā bhijjitvā pubbalohitāni pagghariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2309_16: So nitthunanto vedanāppatto jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake nipajji. “Kokālikena dve aggasāvakā
atk-s0513a4:2310_0: Athassa upajjhāyo turū nāma brahmā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “there khamāpessāmī”ti āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:2310_1: ākāse ṭhatvā “kokālika, pharusaṃ te kammaṃ kataṃ, aggasāvake pasādehī”ti āha. “Ko
atk-s0513a4:2310_2: pana tvaṃ āvuso”ti? “Turū brahmā nāmāha”nti. “Nanu tvaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā anāgāmīti
atk-s0513a4:2310_3: byākato, anāgāmī ca anāvattidhammo asmā lokāti vuttaṃ, tvaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne yakkho
atk-s0513a4:2310_4: bhavissasī”ti mahābrahmaṃ apasādesi. So taṃ attano vacanaṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkonto “tava
atk-s0513a4:2310_5: vācāya tvaññeva paññāyissasī”ti vatvā suddhāvāsameva gato. Kokālikopi kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:2310_6: padumaniraye uppajji. Tassa tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sahampatibrahmā tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:2310_7: ārocesi, satthā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi. Bhikkhū tassa aguṇaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2310_8: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, kokāliko kira sāriputtamoggallāne akkositvā attano mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2310_9: nissāya padumaniraye uppanno”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a4:2310_10: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva kokāliko
atk-s0513a4:2310_11: vacanena hato attano mukhaṃ nissāya dukkhaṃ anubhoti, pubbepi esa attano mukhaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:2311_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa purohito piṅgalo nikkhantadāṭho
atk-s0513a4:2311_1: ahosi. Tassa brāhmaṇī aññena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ aticari, sopi tādisova. Purohito
atk-s0513a4:2311_2: brāhmaṇiṃ punappunaṃ vārentopi vāretuṃ asakkonto cintesi “imaṃ mama veriṃ sahatthā
atk-s0513a4:2311_3: māretuṃ na sakkā, upāyena naṃ māressāmī”ti. So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:2311_4: tava nagaraṃ sakalajambudīpe agganagaraṃ, tvaṃ aggarājā, evaṃ aggarañño nāma tava
atk-s0513a4:2311_5: dakkhiṇadvāraṃ duyuttaṃ avamaṅgala”nti. “Ācariya, idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2311_6: katvā yojetabba”nti. “Kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Purāṇadvāraṃ hāretvā maṅgalayuttāni
atk-s0513a4:2311_7: dārūni gahetvā nagarapariggāhakānaṃ bhūtānaṃ baliṃ datvā maṅgalanakkhattena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2311_8: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Tena hi evaṃ karothā”ti. Tadā bodhisatto takkāriyo nāma māṇavo hutvā
atk-s0513a4:2311_9: tassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhāti. Purohito purāṇadvāraṃ hāretvā navaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2311_10: āha – “niṭṭhitaṃ, deva, dvāraṃ, sve bhaddakaṃ nakkhattaṃ, taṃ anatikkamitvā baliṃ
atk-s0513a4:2311_11: katvā dvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Ācariya, balikammatthāya kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:2311_12: “Deva, mahesakkhaṃ dvāraṃ mahesakkhāhi devatāhi pariggahitaṃ, ekaṃ piṅgalaṃ nikkhantadāṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2311_13: ubhatovisuddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ māretvā tassa maṃsalohitena baliṃ katvā sarīraṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0513a4:2311_14: khipitvā dvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, evaṃ tumhākañca nagarassa ca vuḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2311_15: “Sādhu ācariya, evarūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ māretvā dvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2312_0: So tuṭṭhamānaso “sve paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmī”ti ussāhajāto attano gehaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2312_1: gantvā mukhaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto turitaturito bhariyaṃ āha – “pāpe caṇḍāli ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:2312_2: kena saddhiṃ abhiramissasi, sve te jāraṃ māretvā balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti. “Niraparādhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2312_3: kiṃkāraṇā māressasī”ti? Rājā “kaḷārapiṅgalassa brāhmaṇassa maṃsalohitena balikammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2312_4: katvā nagaradvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti āha, “jāro ca te kaḷārapiṅgalo, taṃ māretvā balikammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2312_5: karissāmī”ti. Sā jārassa santikaṃ sāsanaṃ pāhesi “rājā kira kaḷārapiṅgalaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2312_6: māretvā baliṃ kātukāmo, sace jīvitukāmo, aññepi tayā sadise brāhmaṇe gahetvā kālasseva
atk-s0513a4:2312_7: palāyassū”ti. So tathā akāsi. Taṃ nagare pākaṭaṃ ahosi, sakalanagarato sabbe kaḷārapiṅgalā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2313_0: Purohito paccāmittassa palātabhāvaṃ ajānitvā pātova rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva,
atk-s0513a4:2313_1: asukaṭṭhāne kaḷārapiṅgalo brāhmaṇo atthi, taṃ gaṇhāpethā”ti āha. Rājā amacce pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:2313_2: Te taṃ apassantā āgantvā “palāto kirā”ti ārocesuṃ. “Aññattha upadhārethā”ti sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2313_3: upadhārentāpi na passiṃsu. Tato “aññaṃ upadhārethā”ti vutte “deva, ṭhapetvā purohitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2313_4: añño evarūpo natthī”ti vadiṃsu. Purohitaṃ na sakkā māretunti. “Deva, kiṃ kathetha,
atk-s0513a4:2313_5: purohitassa kāraṇā ajja dvāre appatiṭṭhāpite nagaraṃ aguttaṃ bhavissati, ācariyo
atk-s0513a4:2313_6: kathento “ajja nakkhattaṃ atikkamitvā ito saṃvaccharaccayena nakkhattaṃ labhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2313_7: kathesi, saṃvaccharaṃ nagare advārake paccatthikānaṃ okāso bhavissati, imaṃ māretvā
atk-s0513a4:2313_8: aññena byattena brāhmaṇena balikammaṃ kāretvā dvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmā”ti. “Atthi pana
atk-s0513a4:2313_9: añño ācariyasadiso paṇḍito brāhmaṇo”ti? “Atthi deva, tassa antevāsī takkāriyamāṇavo
atk-s0513a4:2313_10: nāma, tassa purohitaṭṭhānaṃ datvā maṅgalaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2314_0: Rājā taṃ pakkosāpetvā sammānaṃ kāretvā purohitaṭṭhānaṃ datvā tathā kātuṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2314_1: So mahantena parivārena nagaradvāraṃ agamāsi. Purohitaṃ rājānubhāvena bandhitvā ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2314_2: Mahāsatto dvāraṭṭhapanaṭṭhāne āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā ācariyena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2314_3: antosāṇiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ācariyo āvāṭaṃ oloketvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ alabhanto “attho tāva
atk-s0513a4:2314_4: me nipphādito ahosi, bālattā pana mukhaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto vegena pāpitthiyā kathesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2314_5: attanāva attano vadho ābhato”ti mahāsattaṃ ālapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2317: Takkāriye sobbhamimaṃ patāmi, na kireva sādhu ativelabhāṇī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2318_0: Tattha dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsīti dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsiṃ. Bhekovāti yathā araññe maṇḍūko vassanto
atk-s0513a4:2318_1: attano khādakaṃ ahiṃ avhāyamāno dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsati nāma, evaṃ ahameva dubbhāsitaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2318_2: bhāsiṃ. Takkāriyeti tassa nāmaṃ, takkāriyāti itthiliṅgaṃ nāmaṃ, teneva taṃ ālapanto evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2322: Attānameva garahāsi ettha, ācera yaṃ taṃ nikhaṇanti sobbhe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2323_0: Tattha ativelabhāṇīti velātikkantaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ katvā kathanaṃ nāma na sādhu,
atk-s0513a4:2323_1: ativelabhāṇī puriso na sādhūti attho. Sokapariddavañcāti ācariya, evameva ativelabhāṇī
atk-s0513a4:2323_2: puriso vadhaṃ bandhañca sokañca mahantena saddena paridevañca pappoti. Garahāsīti
atk-s0513a4:2323_3: paraṃ agarahitvā attānaṃyeva garaheyyāsi. Etthāti etasmiṃ kāraṇe. Ācera yaṃ tanti
atk-s0513a4:2323_4: ācariya, yena kāraṇena taṃ nikhaṇanti sobbhe, taṃ tayāva kataṃ, tasmā attānameva
atk-s0513a4:2324: Evañca pana vatvā “ācariya, vācaṃ arakkhitvā na kevalaṃ tvameva dukkhappatto, aññopi dukkhappattoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:2325_0: Pubbe kira bārāṇasiyaṃ kāḷī nāma gaṇikā ahosi, tassā tuṇḍilo nāma bhātā. Kāḷī ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2325_1: sahassaṃ gaṇhāti. Tuṇḍilo pana itthidhutto surādhutto akkhadhutto ahosi. Sā tassa
atk-s0513a4:2325_2: dhanaṃ deti, so laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināseti. Sā taṃ vārentīpi vāretuṃ nāsakkhi. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2325_3: jūtaparājito nivatthavatthāni datvā kaṭasārakakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā tassā gehaṃ āgami.
atk-s0513a4:2325_4: Tāya ca dāsiyo āṇattā honti “tuṇḍilassa āgatakāle kiñci adatvā gīvāyaṃ naṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:2325_5: nīhareyyāthā”ti. Tā tathā kariṃsu. So dvāramūle rodanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2326_0: Atheko seṭṭhiputto niccakālaṃ kāḷiyā sahassaṃ āharāpento disvā “kasmā tuṇḍila rodasī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2326_1: pucchi. “Sāmi, jūtaparājito mama bhaginiyā santikaṃ āgatomhi, taṃ maṃ dāsiyo gīvāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2326_2: gahetvā nīhariṃsū”ti. “Tena hi tiṭṭha, bhaginiyā te kathessāmī”ti so gantvā “bhātā
atk-s0513a4:2326_3: te kaṭasārakakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā dvāramūle ṭhito, vatthānissa kimatthaṃ na desī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2326_4: āha. “Ahaṃ tāva na demi, sace pana te sineho atthi, tvaṃ dehī”ti. Tasmiṃ pana gaṇikāya
atk-s0513a4:2326_5: ghare idaṃcārittaṃ – ābhatasahassato pañcasatāni gaṇikāya honti, pañcasatāni vatthagandhamālamūlāni
atk-s0513a4:2326_6: honti. Āgatapurisā tasmiṃ ghare laddhavatthāni nivāsetvā rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0513a4:2326_7: gacchantā ābhatavatthāneva nivāsetvā gacchanti. Tasmā so seṭṭhiputto tāya dinnavatthāni
atk-s0513a4:2326_8: nivāsetvā attano sāṭake tuṇḍilassa dāpesi. So nivāsetvā nadanto gajjanto gantvā surāgehaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2326_9: pāvisi. Kāḷīpi dāsiyo āṇāpesi “sve etassa gamanakāle vatthāni acchindeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2326_10: Tā tassa nikkhamanakāle ito cito ca upadhāvitvā vilumpamānā sāṭake gahetvā “idāni
atk-s0513a4:2326_11: yāhi kumārā”ti naggaṃ katvā vissajjesuṃ. So naggova nikkhami. Jano parihāsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:2326_12: So lajjitvā “mayāvetaṃ kataṃ, ahameva attano mukhaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi”nti paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:2329: Naggovahaṃ vatthayugañca jīno, ayampi attho bahutādisovā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2330: Tattha bahutādisovāti seṭṭhiputto hi attanā katena dukkhaṃ patto, tvampi tasmā ayampi tuyhaṃ dukkhappatti attho. Bahūhi kāraṇehi tādisova.
atk-s0513a4:2331_0: Aparopi bārāṇasiyaṃ ajapālānaṃ pamādena gocarabhūmiyaṃ dvīsu meṇḍesu yujjhantesu
atk-s0513a4:2331_1: eko kuliṅgasakuṇo “ime dāni bhinnehi sīsehi marissanti, vāressāmi teti mātulā mā
atk-s0513a4:2331_2: yujjhathā”ti vāretvā tesaṃ kathaṃ aggahetvā yujjhantānaññeva piṭṭhiyampi sīsepi nisīditvā
atk-s0513a4:2331_3: yācitvā vāretuṃ asakkonto “tena hi maṃ māretvā yujjhathā”ti ubhinnampi sīsantaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2331_4: pāvisi. Te aññamaññaṃ yujjhiṃsuyeva. So saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ pisito viya attanā kateneva
atk-s0513a4:2331_5: vināsaṃ patto. Idampi aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2334: So piṃsito meṇḍasirehi tattha, ayampi attho bahutādisovā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2335: Tattha meṇḍantaranti meṇḍānaṃ antaraṃ. Accupatīti atigantvā uppati, ākāse sīsānaṃ vemajjhe aṭṭhāsīti attho. Piṃsitoti pīḷito.
atk-s0513a4:2336_0: Aparepi bārāṇasivāsino gopālakā phalitaṃ tālarukkhaṃ disvā ekaṃ tālaphalatthāya rukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2336_1: āropesuṃ. Tasmiṃ phalāni pātente eko kaṇhasappo vammikā nikkhamitvā tālarukkhaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0513a4:2336_2: Heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitā daṇḍehi paharantā nivāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Te “sappo tālaṃ abhiruhatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2336_3: itarassa ācikkhiṃsu. So bhīto mahāviravaṃ viravi. Heṭṭhā ṭhitā ekaṃ thirasāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2336_4: catūsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā “imasmiṃ sāṭake patā”ti āhaṃsu. So patanto catunnampi antare
atk-s0513a4:2336_5: sāṭakamajjhe pati. Tassa pana pātanavegena te sandhāretuṃ asakkontā aññamaññaṃ sīsehi
atk-s0513a4:2336_6: paharitvā bhinnehi sīsehi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā. Idampi kāraṇaṃ dassento pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2339: Sabbeva te bhinnasirā sayiṃsu, ayampi attho bahutādisovā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2340: Tattha potthakanti sāṇasāṭakaṃ. Sabbeva teti tepi cattāro janā attanā kateneva bhinnasīsā sayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2341_0: Aparepi bārāṇasivāsino eḷakacorā rattiṃ ekaṃ ajaṃ thenetvā “divā araññe khādissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2341_1: tassā avassanatthāya mukhaṃ bandhitvā veḷugumbe ṭhapesuṃ. Punadivase taṃ khādituṃ
atk-s0513a4:2341_2: gacchantā āvudhaṃ pamussitvā agamaṃsu. Te “ajaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāma,
atk-s0513a4:2341_3: āharathāvudha”nti ekassapi hatthe āvudhaṃ adisvā “vinā āvudhena etaṃ māretvāpi maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2341_4: gahetuṃ na sakkā, vissajjetha naṃ, puññamassa atthī”ti vissajjesuṃ. Tadā eko naḷakāro
atk-s0513a4:2341_5: veḷuṃ gahetvā “punapi āgantvā gahessāmī”ti naḷakārasatthaṃ veḷugumbantare ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:2341_6: pakkāmi. Ajā “muttāmhī”ti tussitvā veḷumūle kīḷamānā pacchimapādehi paharitvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2341_7: satthaṃ pātesi. Corā satthasaddaṃ sutvā upadhārentā taṃ disvā tuṭṭhamānasā ajaṃ māretvā
atk-s0513a4:2341_8: maṃsaṃ khādiṃsu. Iti “sāpi ajā attanā kateneva matā”ti dassetuṃ chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2344: Teneva tassā galakāvakantaṃ, ayampi attho bahutādisovā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2346: Evañca pana vatvā “attano vacanaṃ rakkhitvā mitabhāṇino nāma maraṇadukkhā muccantī”ti dassetvā kinnaravatthuṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2347_0: Bārāṇasivāsī kireko luddako himavantaṃ gantvā ekenupāyena jayampatike dve kinnare
atk-s0513a4:2347_1: gahetvā ānetvā rañño adāsi. Rājā adiṭṭhapubbe kinnare disvā tussitvā “ludda, imesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2347_2: ko guṇo”ti pucchi. “Deva, ete madhurena saddena gāyanti, manuññaṃ naccanti, manussā
atk-s0513a4:2347_3: evaṃ gāyituñca naccituñca na jānantī”ti. Rājā luddassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā kinnare
atk-s0513a4:2347_4: “gāyatha naccathā”ti āha. Kinnarā “sace mayaṃ gāyantā byañjanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2347_5: na sakkhissāma, duggītaṃ hoti, amhe garahissanti vadhissanti, bahuṃ kathentānañca
atk-s0513a4:2347_6: pana musāvādopi hotī”ti musāvādabhayena raññā punappunaṃ vuttāpi na gāyiṃsu na nacciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2347_7: Rājā kujjhitvā “ime māretvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā āharathā”ti āṇāpento sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2349: “Ime na devā na gandhabbaputtā, migā ime atthavasaṃ gatā me;
atk-s0513a4:2350: Ekañca naṃ sāyamāse pacantu, ekaṃ punappātarāse pacantū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2351_0: Tattha migā imeti ime sace devā gandhabbā vā bhaveyyuṃ, nacceyyuñceva gāyeyyuñca,
atk-s0513a4:2351_1: ime pana migā tiracchānagatā. Atthavasaṃ gatā meti atthaṃ paccāsīsantena luddena
atk-s0513a4:2351_2: ānītattā atthavasena mama hatthaṃ gatā. Etesu ekaṃ sāyamāse, ekaṃ pātarāse pacantūti.
atk-s0513a4:2352: Kinnarī cintesi “rājā kuddho nissaṃsayaṃ māressati, idāni kathetuṃ kālo”ti aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2355: Dubbhāsitaṃ saṅkamāno kileso, tasmā tuṇhī kimpurisā na bālyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2356: Tattha saṅkamāno kilesoti kadāci ahaṃ bhāsamāno dubbhāsitaṃ bhāseyyaṃ, evaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ saṅkamāno kilissati kilamati. Tasmāti tena kāraṇena tumhākaṃ na gāyiṃ, na bālabhāvenāti.
atk-s0513a4:2359: “Yā mesā byāhāsi pamuñcathetaṃ, giriñca naṃ himavantaṃ nayantu;
atk-s0513a4:2360: Imañca kho dentu mahānasāya, pātova naṃ pātarāse pacantū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2361: Tattha yā mesāti yā me esā. Dentūti mahānasatthāya dentu.
atk-s0513a4:2362: Kinnaro rañño vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ maṃ akathentaṃ avassaṃ māressati, idāni kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2365: Tvaṃ nāthosi mahārāja, nāthohaṃ bhariyāya me;
atk-s0513a4:2367_0: Tattha pajjunnanāthā pasavoti tiṇabhakkhā pasavo meghanāthā nāma. Pasunāthā ayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2367_1: pajāti ayaṃ pana manussapajā pañcagorasena upajīvantī pasunāthā pasupatiṭṭhā. Tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2367_2: nāthosīti tvaṃ mama patiṭṭhā asi. Nāthohanti mama bhariyāya ahaṃ nātho, ahamassā
atk-s0513a4:2367_3: patiṭṭhā. Dvinnamaññataraṃ ñatvā, mutto gaccheyya pabbatanti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ antare
atk-s0513a4:2367_4: eko ekaṃ mataṃ ñatvā sayaṃ maraṇato mutto himavantaṃ gaccheyya, jīvamānā pana mayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2367_5: aññamaññaṃ na jahāma, tasmā sacepi imaṃ himavantaṃ pesetukāmo, maṃ paṭhamaṃ māretvā pacchā pesehīti.
atk-s0513a4:2368: Evañca pana vatvā “mahārāja, na mayaṃ tava vacanaṃ akātukāmatāya tuṇhī ahumha, mayaṃ kathāya pana dosaṃ disvā na kathayimhā”ti dīpento imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2370: “Na ve nindā suparivajjayetha, nānā janā sevitabbā janinda;
atk-s0513a4:2371: Yeneva eko labhate pasaṃsaṃ, teneva añño labhate ninditāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2373: “Sabbo loko paricitto aticitto, sabbo loko cittavā samhi citte;
atk-s0513a4:2374: Paccekacittā puthu sabbasattā, kassīdha cittassa vasena vatte”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2375_0: Tattha suparivajjayethāti mahārāja, nindā nāma sukhena parivajjetuṃ na sakkā. Nānā
atk-s0513a4:2375_1: janāti nānāchandā janā. Yenevāti yena sīlādiguṇena eko pasaṃsaṃ labhati, teneva añño
atk-s0513a4:2375_2: ninditāraṃ labhati. Amhākañhi kinnarānaṃ antare kathanena pasaṃsaṃ labhati, manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2375_3: antare nindaṃ, iti nindā nāma dupparivajjiyā, svāhaṃ kathaṃ tava santikā pasaṃsaṃ labhissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:2376_0: Sabbo loko paricittoti mahārāja, asappuriso nāma pāṇātipātādicittena, sappuriso pāṇātipātā
atk-s0513a4:2376_1: veramaṇi ādicittena aticittoti, evaṃ sabbo loko paricitto aticittoti attho. Cittavā
atk-s0513a4:2376_2: samhi citteti sabbo pana loko attano hīnena vā paṇītena vā cittena cittavā nāma.
atk-s0513a4:2376_3: Paccekacittāti pāṭiyekkacittā puthuppabhedā sabbe sattā. Tesu kassekassa tava vā
atk-s0513a4:2376_4: aññassa vā cittena kinnarī vā mādiso vā añño vā vatteyya, tasmā “ayaṃ mama cittavasena
atk-s0513a4:2376_5: na vattatī”ti, mā mayhaṃ kujjhi. Sabbasattā hi attano cittavasena gacchanti, devāti.
atk-s0513a4:2377: Rājā “sabhāvameva katheti paṇḍito kinnaro”ti somanassappatto hutvā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2379: “Tuṇhī ahū kimpuriso sabhariyo, yo dāni byāhāsi bhayassa bhīto;
atk-s0513a4:2380: So dāni mutto sukhito arogo, vācākirevatthavatī narāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2381: Tattha vācākirevatthavatī narānanti vācāgirā eva imesaṃ sattānaṃ atthavatī hitāvahā hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2382_0: Rājā kinnare suvaṇṇapañjare nisīdāpetvā tameva luddaṃ pakkosāpetvā “gaccha bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a4:2382_1: gahitaṭṭhāneyeva vissajjehī”ti vissajjāpesi. Mahāsattopi “ācariya, evaṃ kinnarā vācaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2382_2: rakkhitvā pattakāle kathitena subhāsiteneva muttā, tvaṃ pana dukkathitena mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2382_3: patto”ti idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ dassetvā “ācariya, mā bhāyi, jīvitaṃ te ahaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2382_4: assāsesi, “apica kho pana tumhe maṃ rakkheyyāthā”tivutte “na tāva nakkhattayogo labbhatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2382_5: divasaṃ vītināmetvā majjhimayāmasamanantare mataṃ eḷakaṃ āharāpetvā “brāhmaṇa, yattha
atk-s0513a4:2382_6: katthaci gantvā jīvāhī”ti kañci ajānāpetvā uyyojetvā eḷakamaṃsena baliṃ katvā dvāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2383_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi kokāliko vācāya
atk-s0513a4:2383_1: hatoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kaḷārapiṅgalo kokāliko ahosi, takkāriyapaṇḍito
atk-s0513a4:2387_0: Tassa gāmavaraṃ dammīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2387_1: So kira bhikkhūhi “bahūpakāro te āvuso, devadattasatthā, tvaṃ tathāgataṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:2387_2: pabbajjaṃ labhi, tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhi, lābhasakkāraṃ pāpuṇī”ti vutto “āvuso, satthārā
atk-s0513a4:2387_3: mama tiṇaggamattopi upakāro na kato, ahaṃ sayameva pabbajiṃ, sayaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni
atk-s0513a4:2387_4: uggaṇhiṃ, sayaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pāpuṇi”nti kathesi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2387_5: “akataññū āvuso, devadatto akatavedī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:2387_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, devadatto
atk-s0513a4:2387_7: idāneva akataññū, pubbepi akataññūyeva, pubbepesa mayā jīvite dinnepi mama guṇamattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2388_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko asītikoṭivibhavo seṭṭhi puttaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a4:2388_1: “mahādhanako”tissa, nāmaṃ katvā “sippaṃ uggaṇhanto mama putto kilamissatī”ti na kiñci
atk-s0513a4:2388_2: sippaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So gītanaccavāditakhādanabhojanato uddhaṃ na kiñci aññāsi. Taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2388_3: vayappattaṃ patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. So tesaṃ accayena
atk-s0513a4:2388_4: itthidhuttasurādhuttādīhi parivuto nānābyasanamukhehi iṇaṃ ādāya taṃ dātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a4:2388_5: iṇāyikehi codiyamāno cintesi “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, ekenamhi attabhāvena añño viya
atk-s0513a4:2388_6: jāto, mataṃ me seyyo”ti. So iṇāyike āha – “tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇāni gahetvā āgacchatha,
atk-s0513a4:2388_7: gaṅgātīre me nidahitaṃ kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ vo dassāmī”ti. Te tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2388_8: agamaṃsu. So “idha dhana”nti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto viya “gaṅgāyaṃ patitvā marissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2388_9: palāyitvā gaṅgāyaṃ pati. So caṇḍasotena vuyhanto kāruññaravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a4:2389_0: Tadā mahāsatto rurumigayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā parivāraṃ chaḍḍetvā ekakova gaṅgānivattane
atk-s0513a4:2389_1: ramaṇīye sālamissake supupphitaambavane vasati uposathaṃ upavutthāya. Tassa sarīracchavi
atk-s0513a4:2389_2: sumajjitakañcanapaṭṭavaṇṇā ahosi, hatthapādā lākhārasaparikammakatā viya, naṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2389_3: cāmarīnaṅguṭṭhaṃ viya, siṅgāni rajatadāmasadisāni, akkhīni sumajjitamaṇiguḷikā viya,
atk-s0513a4:2389_4: mukhaṃ odahitvā ṭhapitarattakambalageṇḍukaṃ viya. Evarūpaṃ tassa rūpaṃ ahosi. So
atk-s0513a4:2389_5: aḍḍharattasamaye tassa kāruññasaddaṃ sutvā “manussasaddo sūyati, mā mayi dharante
atk-s0513a4:2389_6: maratu, jīvitamassa dassāmī”ti cintetvā sayanagumbā uṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā “ambho
atk-s0513a4:2389_7: purisa, mā bhāyi, jīvitaṃ te dassāmī”ti assāsetvā sotaṃ chindanto gantvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2389_8: āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena
atk-s0513a4:2389_9: “bho purisa, ahaṃ taṃ ito araññato nīharitvā bārāṇasimagge ṭhapessāmi, tvaṃ sotthinā
atk-s0513a4:2389_10: gamissasi, apica kho pana tvaṃ ‘asukaṭṭhāne nāma kañcanamigo vasatī’ti dhanakāraṇā
atk-s0513a4:2389_11: maṃ rañño ceva rājamahāmattassa ca mā ācikkhāhī”ti āha. So “sādhu sāmī”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a4:2390_0: Mahāsatto tassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā taṃ attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā bārāṇasimagge otāretvā
atk-s0513a4:2390_1: nivatti. Tassa bārāṇasipavisanadivaseyeva khemā nāma rañño aggamahesī paccūsakāle
atk-s0513a4:2390_2: supinante suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ migaṃ attano dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā cintesi “sace evarūpo
atk-s0513a4:2390_3: migo na bhaveyya, nāhaṃ supine passeyyaṃ, addhā bhavissati, rañño ārocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2390_4: Sā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja, ahaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ migaṃ passituṃ icchāmi, suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigassa
atk-s0513a4:2390_5: dhammaṃ sotukāmāmhi, labhissāmi ce, jīveyyaṃ, no ce, natthi me jīvita”nti āha. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:2390_6: taṃ assāsetvā “sace manussaloke atthi, labhissasī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:2390_7: “suvaṇṇavaṇṇā migā nāma hontī”ti pucchitvā “āma, deva, hontī”ti sutvā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhe
atk-s0513a4:2390_8: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake sahassathavikaṃ ṭhapetvā yo suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ migaṃ ācikkhissati, tassa
atk-s0513a4:2390_9: saddhiṃ sahassathavikasuvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena tañca hatthiṃ tato ca uttari dātukāmo hutvā
atk-s0513a4:2390_10: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe gāthaṃ likhāpetvā ekaṃ amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ehi tāta, mama vacanena
atk-s0513a4:2390_11: imaṃ gāthaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ kathehī”ti imasmiṃ jātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2393: Yo me taṃ migamakkhāti, migānaṃ migamuttama”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2394_0: Amacco suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā sakalanagare vācāpesi. Atha so seṭṭhiputto bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2394_1: pavisantova taṃ kathaṃ sutvā amaccassa santikaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ rañño evarūpaṃ migaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2394_2: ācikkhissāmi, maṃ rañño dassehī”ti āha. Amacco hatthikkhandhato otaritvā taṃ rañño
atk-s0513a4:2394_3: santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ kira, deva, taṃ migaṃ ācikkhissatī”ti dassesi. Rājā “saccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2394_4: ambho purisā”ti pucchi. So “saccaṃ mahārāja, tvaṃ etaṃ yasaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti vadanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2398_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa mittadubbhissa tussitvā “abbho kuhiṃ so migo vasatī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a4:2398_1: “asukaṭṭhāne nāma devā”ti vutte tameva maggadesakaṃ katvā mahantena parivārena taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2398_2: ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ so mittadubbhī “senaṃ, deva, sannisīdāpehī”ti vatvā sannisinnāya
atk-s0513a4:2398_3: senāya eso, deva, suvaṇṇamigo etasmiṃ vane vasatī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā ācikkhanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2402_0: Tattha indagopakasañchannāti etassa vanasaṇḍassa bhūmi indagopakavaṇṇāya rattāya
atk-s0513a4:2402_1: sukhasamphassāya tiṇajātiyā sañchannā, sasakucchi viya mudukā, ettha etasmiṃ ramaṇīye
atk-s0513a4:2403_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā amacce āṇāpesi “tassa migassa palāyituṃ adatvā khippaṃ āvudhahatthehi
atk-s0513a4:2403_1: purisehi saddhiṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ parivārethā”ti. Te tathā katvā unnadiṃsu. Rājā katipayehi
atk-s0513a4:2403_2: janehi saddhiṃ ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi, sopissa avidūre aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a4:2403_3: cintesi “mahanto balakāyasaddo, tamhā me purisā bhayena uppannena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2403_4: So uṭṭhāya sakalaparisaṃ oloketvā rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā “rañño ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0513a4:2403_5: me sotthi bhavissati, ettheva mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā rājābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2403_6: Rājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “nāgabalo migo avattharanto viya āgaccheyya, saraṃ sannayhitvā
atk-s0513a4:2403_7: imaṃ migaṃ santāsetvā sace palāyati, vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmī”ti dhanuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2403_8: āropetvā bodhisattābhimukho ahosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2406: Migo ca disvā rājānaṃ, dūrato ajjhabhāsatha.
atk-s0513a4:2409: Ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2410_0: Tattha advejjhaṃ katvānāti jiyāya ca sarena ca saddhiṃ ekameva katvā. Sannayhāti
atk-s0513a4:2410_1: sannayhitvā. Āgamehīti “tiṭṭha, mahārāja, mā maṃ vijjhi, jīvaggāhameva gaṇhāhī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2411_0: Rājā tassa madhurakathāya bandhitvā dhanuṃ otāretvā gāravena aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsattopi
atk-s0513a4:2411_1: rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Mahājanopi sabbāvudhāni
atk-s0513a4:2411_2: chaḍḍetvā āgantvā rājānaṃ parivāresi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ cālento
atk-s0513a4:2411_3: viya madhurena sarena rājānaṃ pucchi “ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti?
atk-s0513a4:2411_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pāpapuriso thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā sotapatheva aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “iminā me dassito”ti
atk-s0513a4:2414: Soyaṃ me idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2416: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto taṃ mittadubbhiṃ garahitvā raññā saddhiṃ sallapanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2419: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2420_0: Tattha niplavitanti uttāritaṃ. Ekacciyoti ekacco pana mittadubbhī pāpapuggalo udake
atk-s0513a4:2420_1: patantopi uttārito na tveva seyyo. Kaṭṭhañhi nānappakārena upakārāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0513a4:2420_2: mittadubbhī pana pāpapuggalo vināsāya, tasmā tato kaṭṭhameva varataranti porāṇakapaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a4:2420_3: kathayiṃsu, mayā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ na katanti.
atk-s0513a4:2423: “Kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2424: Bhayaṃ hi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2425_0: Tattha migānanti migānamaññataraṃ garahasi, udāhu pakkhīnaṃ, mānusānanti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:2425_1: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatīti bhayaṃ maṃ paṭilabhati, ahaṃ attani anissaro bhayasantako
atk-s0513a4:2426: Tato mahāsatto “mahārāja, na migaṃ, na pakkhiṃ garahāmi, manussaṃ pana garahāmī”ti dassento navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2429: Tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2430_0: Tattha vāhaneti patitapatite vahituṃ samatthe gaṅgāvahe. Mahodake salileti mahāudake
atk-s0513a4:2430_1: mahāsalileti attho. Ubhayenāpi gaṅgāvahasseva bahuudakataṃ dasseti. Tatonidānanti
atk-s0513a4:2430_2: mahārāja, yo mayhaṃ tayā dassito puriso, eso mayā gaṅgāya vuyhamāno aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0513a4:2430_3: kāruññaravaṃ viravanto uddharito, tatonidānaṃ me idamajja bhayaṃ āgataṃ, asappurisehi
atk-s0513a4:2431: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kujjhitvā “evaṃ bahūpakārassa nāma guṇaṃ na jānāti, vijjhitvā naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2434: Hanāmi taṃ mittadubbhiṃ akiccakāriṃ, yo tādisaṃ kammakataṃ na jāne”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2435: Tattha catuppattanti catūhi vājapattehi samannāgataṃ. Vihaṅgamanti ākāsagāmiṃ. Tanucchidanti sarīrachindanaṃ. Ossajāmīti etassa hadaye vissajjemi.
atk-s0513a4:2436: Tato mahāsatto “mā esa maṃ nissāya nassatū”ti cintetvā ekādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2438: “Dhīrassa bālassa have janinda, santo vadhaṃ nappasaṃsanti jātu;
atk-s0513a4:2439: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dehi;
atk-s0513a4:2441_0: Tattha kāmanti kāmena yathāruciyā attano gharaṃ gacchatu. Yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa
atk-s0513a4:2441_1: dehīti yañca tassa “idaṃ nāma te dassāmī”ti tayā kathitaṃ, taṃ tassa dehi. Kāmakaroti
atk-s0513a4:2441_2: icchākaro, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ karohi, maṃsaṃ vā me khāda, kīḷāmigaṃ vā karohi, sabbattha
atk-s0513a4:2442: Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso mahāsattassa thutiṃ karonto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2444: “Addhā rurū aññataro sataṃ so, yo dubbhato mānusassa na dubbhi;
atk-s0513a4:2445: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dammi;
atk-s0513a4:2447_0: Tattha sataṃ soti addhā tvaṃ sataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ aññataro. Kāmacāranti ahaṃ tava dhammakathāya
atk-s0513a4:2447_1: pasīditvā tuyhaṃ kāmacāraṃ abhayaṃ dadāmi, ito paṭṭhāya tumhe nibbhayā yathāruciyā
atk-s0513a4:2448: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “mahārāja, manussā nāma aññaṃ mukhena bhāsanti, aññaṃ kāyena karontī”ti pariggaṇhanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2453: “Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:2454: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2455_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “migarāja, mā maṃ evaṃ maññi, ahañhi rajjaṃ jahantopi na tuyhaṃ dinnavaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2455_1: jahissaṃ, saddahatha, mayha”nti varaṃ adāsi. Mahāsatto tassa santike varaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0513a4:2455_2: attānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ varaṃ gaṇhi. Rājāpi taṃ varaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a4:2455_3: bodhisattaṃ nagaraṃ netvā mahāsattañca nagarañca alaṅkārāpetvā deviyā dhammaṃ desāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_4: Mahāsatto deviṃ ādiṃ katvā rañño ca rājaparisāya ca madhurāya manussabhāsāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2455_5: desetvā rājānaṃ dasahi rājadhammehi ovaditvā mahājanaṃ anusāsitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:2455_6: migagaṇaparivuto vāsaṃ kappesi. Rājā “sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ dammī”ti nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0513a4:2455_7: carāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya migapakkhīnaṃ koci hatthaṃ pasāretuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_8: Migagaṇo manussānaṃ sassāni khādati, koci vāretuṃ na sakkoti. Mahājano rājaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2455_9: gantvā upakkosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2458: Migā sassāni khādanti, taṃ devo paṭisedhatū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2459: Tattha taṃ devoti taṃ migagaṇaṃ devo paṭisedhatūti.
atk-s0513a4:2463: Na tvevāhaṃ ruruṃ dubbhe, datvā abhayadakkhiṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2466: Na tvevāhaṃ migarājassa, varaṃ datvā musā bhaṇe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2467: Tattha māsīti kāmaṃ mayhaṃ janapado mā hotu. Rurunti na tveva ahaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa rurumigarājassa abhayadakkhiṇaṃ datvā dubbhissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:2468_0: Mahājano rañño vacanaṃ sutvā kiñci vattuṃ avisahanto paṭikkami. Sā kathā vitthārikā
atk-s0513a4:2468_1: ahosi. Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto migagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ sassāni
atk-s0513a4:2468_2: mā khādathā”ti ovaditvā “attano khettesu paṇṇasaññaṃ bandhantū”ti manussānaṃ ghosāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2468_3: Te tathā bandhiṃsu, tāya saññāya migā yāvajjatanā sassāni na khādanti.
atk-s0513a4:2469_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto akataññūyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2469_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā seṭṭhiputto devadatto ahosi, rājā ānando, rurumigarājā
atk-s0513a4:2473_0: Āsīsetheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attanā saṃkhittena pucchitapañhassa
atk-s0513a4:2473_1: dhammasenāpatino vitthārena byākaraṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Kadā pana satthā theraṃ saṃkhittena
atk-s0513a4:2473_2: pañhaṃ pucchīti? Devorohane. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepato anupubbikathā. Rājagahaseṭṭhino
atk-s0513a4:2473_3: hi santake candanapatte āyasmatā piṇḍolabhāradvājena iddhiyā gahite satthā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2473_4: iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tadā titthiyā “paṭikkhittaṃ samaṇena gotamena
atk-s0513a4:2473_5: iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ, idāni sayampi na karissatī”ti cintetvā maṅkubhūtehi attano
atk-s0513a4:2473_6: sāvakehi “kiṃ, bhante, iddhiyā pattaṃ na gaṇhathā”ti vuccamānā “netaṃ āvuso, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2473_7: dukkaraṃ, chavassa pana dārupattassatthāya attano saṇhasukhumaguṇaṃ ko gihīnaṃ pakāsessatīti
atk-s0513a4:2473_8: na gaṇhimha, samaṇā pana sakyaputtiyā lolatāya iddhiṃ dassetvā gaṇhiṃsu. Mā ‘amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2473_9: iddhikaraṇaṃ bhāro’ti cintayittha, mayañhi tiṭṭhantu samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā,
atk-s0513a4:2473_10: ākaṅkhamānā pana samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ iddhiṃ dassessāma, sace hi samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0513a4:2473_11: ekaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, mayaṃ dviguṇaṃ karissāmā”ti kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2474_0: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ “bhante, titthiyā kira pāṭihāriyaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2474_1: Satthā “bhikkhave, karontu, ahampi karissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā bimbisāro āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:2474_2: bhagavantaṃ pucchi “bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ kira karissathā”ti? “Āma, mahārājā”ti. “Nanu,
atk-s0513a4:2474_3: bhante, sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti. “Mahārāja, taṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ paññattaṃ, buddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2474_4: pana sikkhāpadaṃ nāma natthi. “Yathā hi, mahārāja, tava uyyāne pupphaphalaṃ aññesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2474_5: vāritaṃ, na tava, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti. “Kattha pana, bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2474_7: “Natthi kiñci mahārājā”ti. Punadivase satthā katabhattakicco cārikaṃ pakkāmi. Manussā
atk-s0513a4:2474_9: titthiyamaddanaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ kātu”nti tesaṃ bhikkhū kathayanti. Mahājano “acchariyarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2474_10: kira pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissati, passissāma na”nti gharadvārāni chaḍḍetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2475_0: Aññatitthiyā “mayampi samaṇassa gotamassa pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṭṭhāne pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2475_1: upaṭṭhākehi saddhiṃ satthārameva anubandhiṃsu. Satthā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:2475_2: raññā “pāṭihāriyaṃ kira, bhante, karissathā”ti pucchito “karissāmī”ti vatvā “kadā,
atk-s0513a4:2475_3: bhante”ti vutte “ito sattame divase āsāḷhipuṇṇamāsiya”nti āha. “Maṇḍapaṃ karomi bhante”ti?
atk-s0513a4:2475_4: “Alaṃ mahārāja, mama pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṭṭhāne sakko devarājā dvādasayojanikaṃ ratanamaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2475_5: karissatī”ti. “Etaṃ kāraṇaṃ nagare ugghosāpemi, bhante”ti? “Ugghosāpehi mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2475_6: Rājā dhammaghosakaṃ alaṅkatahatthipiṭṭhiṃ āropetvā “bhagavā kira sāvatthinagaradvāre
atk-s0513a4:2475_7: kaṇḍambarukkhamūle titthiyamaddanaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati ito sattame divase”ti yāva
atk-s0513a4:2475_8: chaṭṭhadivasā devasikaṃ ghosanaṃ kāresi. Titthiyā “kaṇḍambarukkhamūle kira karissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2475_9: sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā sāvatthisāmante ambarukkhe chindāpayiṃsu. Dhammaghosako puṇṇamīdivase
atk-s0513a4:2475_10: pātova “ajja, bhagavato pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissatī”ti ugghosesi. Devatānubhāvena sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0513a4:2475_11: dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositaṃ viya ahosi. Ye ye gantuṃ cittaṃ uppādenti, te te sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2475_12: pattameva attānaṃ passiṃsu, dvādasayojanikā parisā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2476_0: Satthā pātova sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ nikkhami. Kaṇḍo nāma uyyānapālo piṇḍipakkameva
atk-s0513a4:2476_1: kumbhapamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ ambapakkaṃ rañño haranto satthāraṃ nagaradvāre disvā “idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2476_2: tathāgatasseva anucchavika”nti adāsi. Satthā paṭiggahetvā tattheva ekamantaṃ nisinno
atk-s0513a4:2476_3: paribhuñjitvā “ānanda, imaṃ ambaṭṭhiṃ uyyānapālakassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne ropanatthāya
atk-s0513a4:2476_4: dehi, esa kaṇḍambo nāma bhavissatī”ti āha. Thero tathā akāsi. Uyyānapālo paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā
atk-s0513a4:2476_5: ropesi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva aṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā mūlāni otariṃsu, naṅgalasīsapamāṇo rattaṅkuro
atk-s0513a4:2476_6: uṭṭhahi, mahājanassa olokentasseva paṇṇāsahatthakkhandho paṇṇāsahatthasākho ubbedhato
atk-s0513a4:2476_7: ca hatthasatiko ambarukkho sampajji, tāvadevassa pupphāni ca phalāni ca uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2476_8: So madhukaraparivuto suvaṇṇavaṇṇaphalabharito nabhaṃ pūretvā aṭṭhāsi, vātappaharaṇakāle
atk-s0513a4:2476_9: madhurapakkāni patiṃsu. Pacchā āgacchantā bhikkhū paribhuñjitvāva āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2477_0: Sāyanhasamaye sakko devarājā āvajjento “satthu ratanamaṇḍapakaraṇaṃ amhākaṃ bhāro”ti
atk-s0513a4:2477_1: ñatvā vissakammadevaputtaṃ pesetvā dvādasayojanikaṃ nīluppalasañchannaṃ sattaratanamaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2477_2: kāresi. Evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatiṃsu. Satthā titthiyamaddanaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2477_3: sāvakehi yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā bahujanassa pasannabhāvaṃ ñatvā oruyha buddhāsane
atk-s0513a4:2477_4: nisinno dhammaṃ desesi. Vīsati pāṇakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Tato “purimabuddhā
atk-s0513a4:2477_5: pana pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā kattha gacchantī”ti āvajjento “tāvatiṃsabhavana”nti ñatvā
atk-s0513a4:2477_6: buddhāsanā uṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapādaṃ yugandharamuddhani ṭhapetvā vāmapādena sinerumatthakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2477_7: akkamitvā pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā antotemāsaṃ devānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2477_8: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathesi. Parisā satthu gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānantī “disvāva gamissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:2477_9: tattheva temāsaṃ vasi. Upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya mahāmoggallānatthero gantvā bhagavato
atk-s0513a4:2477_10: ārocesi. Atha naṃ satthā pucchi “kahaṃ pana etarahi sāriputto”ti? “Eso, bhante, pāṭihāriye
atk-s0513a4:2477_11: pasīditvā pabbajitehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre vasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2477_12: “Moggallāna, ahaṃ ito sattame divase saṅkassanagaradvāre otarissāmi, tathāgataṃ daṭṭhukāmā
atk-s0513a4:2477_13: saṅkassanagare ekato sannipatantū”ti. Thero “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā āgantvā parisāya
atk-s0513a4:2477_14: ārocetvā sakalaparisaṃ sāvatthito tiṃsayojanaṃ saṅkassanagaraṃ ekamuhutteneva pāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2478_0: Satthā vutthavasso pavāretvā “mahārāja, manussalokaṃ gamissāmī”ti sakkassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:2478_1: Sakko vissakammaṃ āmantetvā “dasabalassa manussalokagamanatthāya tīṇi sopānāni karohī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2478_2: āha. So sinerumatthake sopānasīsaṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre dhurasopānaṃ katvā majjhe
atk-s0513a4:2478_3: maṇimayaṃ, ekasmiṃ passe rajatamayaṃ, ekasmiṃ passe suvaṇṇamayanti tīṇi sopānāni
atk-s0513a4:2478_4: māpesi, sattaratanamayā vedikāparikkhepā. Satthā lokavivaraṇaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:2478_5: majjhe maṇimayena sopānena otari. Sakko pattacīvaraṃ aggahesi, suyāmo vālabījaniṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2478_6: sahampati mahābrahmā chattaṃ dhāresi, dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā dibbagandhamālādīhi
atk-s0513a4:2478_7: pūjayiṃsu. Satthāraṃ dhurasopāne patiṭṭhitaṃ paṭhamameva sāriputtatthero vandi, pacchā
atk-s0513a4:2478_8: sesaparisā. Tasmiṃ samāgame satthā cintesi “moggallāno “iddhimā’ti pākaṭo, upāli
atk-s0513a4:2478_9: ‘vinayadharo’ti. Sāriputtassa pana mahāpaññaguṇo apākaṭo, ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etena
atk-s0513a4:2478_10: sadiso samapañño nāma natthi, paññāguṇamassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ tāva puthujjanānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2478_11: visaye pañhaṃ pucchi, taṃ puthujjanāva kathayiṃsu tato sotāpannānaṃ visaye pañhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2478_12: pucchi, tampi sotāpannāva kathayiṃsu, puthujjanā na jāniṃsu. Evaṃ sakadāgāmivisaye
atk-s0513a4:2478_13: anāgāmivisaye khīṇāsavavisaye mahāsāvakavisaye ca pañhaṃ pucchi, tampi heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā
atk-s0513a4:2478_14: na jāniṃsu, uparimā uparimāva kathayiṃsu. Aggasāvakavisaye puṭṭhapañhampi aggasāvakāva
atk-s0513a4:2478_15: kathayiṃsu, aññe na jāniṃsu. Tato sāriputtattherassa visaye pañhaṃ pucchi, taṃ therova
atk-s0513a4:2479_0: Manussā “ko nāma esa thero satthārā saddhiṃ kathesī”ti pucchitvā “dhammasenāpati
atk-s0513a4:2479_1: sāriputtatthero nāmā”ti sutvā “aho mahāpañño”ti vadiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2479_2: antare therassa mahāpaññaguṇo pākaṭo jāto. Atha naṃ satthā –
atk-s0513a4:2480: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha;
atk-s0513a4:2481: Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:2482_0: Buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imassa nu kho sāriputta, saṃkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2482_1: vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti āha. Thero pañhaṃ oloketvā “satthā maṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2482_2: bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ pucchatī”ti pañhe nikkaṅkho hutvā “āgamanapaṭipadā nāma
atk-s0513a4:2482_3: khandhādivasena bahūhi mukhehi sakkā kathetuṃ, kataṃ nu kho kathento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2482_4: gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ajjhāsaye kaṅkhi. Satthā “sāriputto pañhe nikkaṅkho, ajjhāsaye
atk-s0513a4:2482_5: pana me kaṅkhati, mayā naye adinne kathetuṃ na sakkhissati, nayamassa dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2482_6: nayaṃ dadanto “bhūtamidaṃ sāriputta samanupassā”ti āha. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sāriputto
atk-s0513a4:2482_7: mama ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathento khandhavasena kathessatī”ti. Therassa saha nayadānena
atk-s0513a4:2482_8: so pañho nayasatena nayasahassena upaṭṭhāsi. So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2483_0: Satthā dvādasayojanikāya parisāya dhammaṃ desesi. Tiṃsa pāṇakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2483_1: Satthā parisaṃ uyyojetvā cārikaṃ caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā punadivase sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2483_2: piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhūhi vatte dassite gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a4:2483_3: bhikkhū therassa guṇakathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu “mahāpañño, āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:2483_4: sāriputto puthupañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño dasabalena saṃkhittena
atk-s0513a4:2483_5: pucchitapañhaṃ vitthārena kathesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a4:2483_6: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi
atk-s0513a4:2483_7: esa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ kathesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2484_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sarabhamigayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a4:2484_1: araññe vasati. Rājā migavittako ahosi thāmasampanno, aññaṃ manussaṃ “manusso”tipi
atk-s0513a4:2484_2: na gaṇeti. So ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gantvā amacce āha – “yassa passena migo palāyati,
atk-s0513a4:2484_3: tena so daṇḍo dātabbo”ti. Te cintayiṃsu “kadāci vemajjhe ṭhitamigaṃ vijjhanti, kadāci
atk-s0513a4:2484_4: uṭṭhitaṃ, kadāci palāyantampi, ajja pana yena kenaci upāyena rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānaññeva
atk-s0513a4:2484_5: āropessāmā”ti. Cintetvā ca pana katikaṃ katvā rañño dhuramaggaṃ adaṃsu. Te mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2484_6: gumbaṃ parikkhipitvā muggarādīhi bhūmiṃ pothayiṃsu. Paṭhamameva sarabhamigo uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:2484_7: tikkhattuṃ gubbhaṃ anuparigantvā palāyanokāsaṃ olokento sesadisāsu manusse bāhāya
atk-s0513a4:2484_8: bāhaṃ dhanunā dhanuṃ āhacca nirantare ṭhite disvā rañño ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva okāsaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:2484_9: So ummīlitesu akkhīsu vālukaṃ khipamāno viya rājānaṃ abhimukho agamāsi. Rājā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:2484_10: lahusampattaṃ disvā saraṃ ukkhipitvā vijjhi. Sarabhamigā nāma saraṃ vañcetuṃ chekā
atk-s0513a4:2484_11: honti, sare abhimukhaṃ āgacchante vegaṃ hāpetvā tiṭṭhanti, pacchato āgacchante vegena
atk-s0513a4:2484_12: purato javanti, uparibhāgenāgacchante piṭṭhiṃ nāmenti, passenāgacchante thokaṃ apagacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:2484_13: kucchiṃ sandhāyāgacchante parivattitvā patanti, sare atikkante vātacchinnavalāhakavegena palāyanti.
atk-s0513a4:2485_0: Sopi rājā tasmiṃ parivattitvā patite “sarabhamigo me viddho”ti nādaṃ muñci. Sarabho
atk-s0513a4:2485_1: uṭṭhāya vātavegena palāyi. Balamaṇḍalaṃ bhijjitvā ubhosu passesu ṭhitaamaccā sarabhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2485_2: palāyamānaṃ disvā ekato hutvā pucchiṃsu “migo kassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhī”ti? “Rañño
atk-s0513a4:2485_3: ṭhitaṭṭhāna”nti. “Rājā ‘viddho me’ti vadati, konena viddho, nibbirajjho bho amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2485_4: rājā, bhūminena viddhā”ti te nānappakārena raññā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ kariṃsu. Rājā cintesi
atk-s0513a4:2485_5: “ime maṃ parihasanti, na mama pamāṇaṃ jānantī”ti gāḷhaṃ nivāsetvā pattikova khaggaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2485_6: ādāya “sarabhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vegena pakkhandi. Atha naṃ disvā tīṇi yojanāni anubandhi.
atk-s0513a4:2485_7: Sarabho araññaṃ pāvisi, rājāpi pāvisi. Tattha sarabhamigassa gamanamagge saṭṭhihatthamatto
atk-s0513a4:2485_8: mahāpūtipādanarakāvāṭo atthi, so tiṃsahatthamattaṃ udakena puṇṇo tiṇehi ca paṭicchanno.
atk-s0513a4:2485_9: Sarabho udakagandhaṃ ghāyitvāva āvāṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā thokaṃ osakkitvā gato. Rājā pana
atk-s0513a4:2486_0: Sarabho tassa padasaddaṃ asuṇanto nivattitvā taṃ apassanto “narakāvāṭe patito bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2486_1: ñatvā āgantvā olokento taṃ gambhīraudake apatiṭṭhaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā tena kataṃ aparādhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2486_2: hadaye akatvā sañjātakāruñño “mā mayi passanteva rājā nassatu, imamhā dukkhā naṃ
atk-s0513a4:2486_3: mocessāmī”ti āvāṭatīre ṭhito “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, mahantā dukkhā taṃ mocessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2486_4: vatvā attano piyaputtaṃ uddharituṃ ussāhaṃ karonto viya tassuddharaṇatthāya silāya
atk-s0513a4:2486_5: yoggaṃ katvāva “vijjhissāmī”ti āgataṃ rājānaṃ saṭṭhihatthā narakā uddharitvā assāsetvā
atk-s0513a4:2486_6: piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā araññā nīharitvā senāya avidūre otāretvā ovādamassa datvā pañcasu
atk-s0513a4:2486_7: sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Rājā mahāsattaṃ vinā vasituṃ asakkonto āha “sāmi sarabhamigarāja,
atk-s0513a4:2486_8: mayā saddhiṃ bārāṇasiṃ ehi, dvādasayojanikāya te bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ dammi, taṃ kārehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2486_9: “Mahārāja, mayaṃ tiracchānagatā, na me rajjenattho, sace te mayi sineho atthi, mayā
atk-s0513a4:2486_10: dinnāni sīlāni rakkhanto raṭṭhavāsinopi sīlaṃ rakkhāpehī”ti taṃ ovaditvā araññameva pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:2487_0: So assupuṇṇehi nettehi tassa guṇaṃ sarantova senaṃ pāpuṇitvā senaṅgaparivuto nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:2487_1: gantvā “ito paṭṭhāya sakalanagaravāsino pañca sīlāni rakkhantū”ti dhammabheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2487_2: Mahāsattena pana attano kataguṇaṃ kassaci akathetvā sāyanhe nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a4:2487_3: alaṅkatasayane sayitvā paccūsakāle mahāsattassa guṇaṃ saritvā uṭṭhāya sayanapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a4:2487_4: pallaṅkena nisīditvā pītipuṇṇena hadayena chahi gāthāhi udānesi –
atk-s0513a4:2490: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0513a4:2496: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0513a4:2501: “Dukkhūpanītopi naro sapañño, āsaṃ na chindeyya sukhāgamāya;
atk-s0513a4:2502: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca, avitakkitā maccumupabbajanti.
atk-s0513a4:2505: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2506_0: Tattha āsīsetheva purisoti āsacchedakakammaṃ akatvā attano kammesu āsaṃ karotheva
atk-s0513a4:2506_1: na ukkaṇṭheyya. Yathā icchinti ahañhi saṭṭhihatthā narakā uṭṭhānaṃ icchiṃ, somhi
atk-s0513a4:2506_2: tatheva jāto, tato uṭṭhitoyevāti dīpeti. Ahitā hitā cāti dukkhaphassā ca sukhaphassā
atk-s0513a4:2506_3: ca, “maraṇaphassā jīvitaphassā cā”tipi attho, sattānañhi maraṇaphasso ahito jīvitaphasso
atk-s0513a4:2506_4: hito, tesaṃ avitakkito acintitopi maraṇaphasso āgacchatīti dasseti. Acinti tampīti
atk-s0513a4:2506_5: mayā “āvāṭe patissāmī”ti na cintitaṃ, “sarabhaṃ māressāmī”ti cintitaṃ, idāni pana
atk-s0513a4:2506_6: me cintitaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acintitameva jātaṃ. Bhogāti yasaparivārā. Ete cintāmayā na honti,
atk-s0513a4:2506_7: tasmā ñāṇavatā vīriyameva kātabbaṃ. Vīriyavato hi acintitampi hotiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:2507_0: Tassevaṃ udānaṃ udānentasseva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahi. Purohito ca pātova sukhaseyyapucchanatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2507_1: āgantvā rājadvāre ṭhito tassa udānagītasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “rājā hiyyo migavaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2507_2: tattha sarabhamigaṃ viraddho bhavissati, tato amaccehi avahasiyamāno ‘māretvā naṃ
atk-s0513a4:2507_3: āharissāmī’ti khattiyamānena taṃ anubandhanto saṭṭhihatthe narake patito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:2507_4: dayālunā sarabharājena rañño dosaṃ acintetvā rājā uddharito bhavissati, tena maññe
atk-s0513a4:2507_5: udānaṃ udānetī”ti. Evaṃ brāhmaṇassa rañño paripuṇṇabyañjanaṃ udānaṃ sutvā sumajjite
atk-s0513a4:2507_6: ādāse mukhaṃ olokentassa chāyā viya raññā ca sarabhena ca katakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2507_7: So nakhaggena dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Rājā “ko eso”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ deva purohito”ti. Athassa
atk-s0513a4:2507_8: dvāraṃ vivaritvā “ito ehācariyā”ti āha. So pavisitvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2507_9: ṭhito “ahaṃ, mahārāja, tayā araññe katakāraṇaṃ jānāmi, tvaṃ ekaṃ sarabhamigaṃ anubandhanto
atk-s0513a4:2507_10: narake patito, atha naṃ so sarabho silāya yoggaṃ katvā narakato uddhari, so tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2507_11: tassa guṇaṃ anussaritvā udānaṃ udānesī”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2512: “Yo taṃ viduggā narakā samuddhari, silāya yoggaṃ sarabho karitvā;
atk-s0513a4:2513: Dukkhūpanītaṃ maccumukhā pamocayi, alīnacittaṃ ta migaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2514_0: Tattha anusarīti anubandhi. Vikkantanti uddharaṇatthāya kataparakkamaṃ. Anujīvasīti
atk-s0513a4:2514_1: upajīvasi, tassānubhāvena tayā jīvitaṃ laddhanti attho. Samuddharīti uddhari. Ta
atk-s0513a4:2514_2: migaṃ vadesīti taṃ suvaṇṇasarabhamigaṃ idha sirisayane nisinno vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a4:2515: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ na migavaṃ gato, sabbaṃ pavattiṃ jānāti, kathaṃ nu kho jānāti, pucchissāmi na”nti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2517: “Kiṃ tvaṃ nu tattheva tadā ahosi, udāhu te koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:2518: Vivaṭacchaddo nusi sabbadassī, ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2519: Tattha bhiṃsarūpanti kiṃ nu te ñāṇaṃ balavajātikaṃ, tenetaṃ jānāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:2520: Brāhmaṇo “nāhaṃ sabbaññubuddho, byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā tayā kathitagāthānaṃ pana mayhaṃ attho upaṭṭhātī”ti dīpento dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2522: “Na cevahaṃ tattha tadā ahosiṃ, na cāpi me koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:2523: Gāthāpadānañca subhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ tadānenti janinda dhīrā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2524: Tattha subhāsitānanti byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā suṭṭhu bhāsitānaṃ. Atthaṃ tadānentīti yo tesaṃ attho, taṃ ānenti upadhārentīti.
atk-s0513a4:2525_0: Rājā tassa tussitvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya dānādipuññābhirato ahosi, manussāpi
atk-s0513a4:2525_1: puññābhiratā hutvā matamatā saggameva pūrayiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ rājā “lakkhaṃ vijjhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2525_2: purohitamādāya uyyānaṃ gato. Tadā sakko devarājā bahū nave deve ca devakaññāyo ca
atk-s0513a4:2525_3: disvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjento sarabhamigena narakā uddharitvā rañño sīlesu
atk-s0513a4:2525_4: patiṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “rañño ānubhāvena mahājano puññāni karoti, tena devaloko
atk-s0513a4:2525_5: paripūrati, idāni kho pana rājā lakkhaṃ vijjhituṃ uyyānaṃ gato, taṃ vīmaṃsitvā sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2525_6: nadāpetvā sarabhamigassa guṇaṃ kathāpetvā attano ca sakkabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā ākāse ṭhito
atk-s0513a4:2525_7: dhammaṃ desetvā mettāya ceva pañcannaṃ sīlānañca guṇaṃ kathetvā āgamissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a4:2525_8: uyyānaṃ agamāsi. Rājāpi “lakkhaṃ vijjhissāmī”ti dhanuṃ āropetvā saraṃ sannayhi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2525_9: khaṇe sakko rañño ca lakkhassa ca antare attano ānubhāvena sarabhaṃ dassesi. Rājā
atk-s0513a4:2525_10: taṃ disvā saraṃ na muñci. Atha naṃ sakko purohitassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2527: “Ādāya pattiṃ paraviriyaghātiṃ, cāpe saraṃ kiṃ vicikicchase tuvaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2528: Nunno saro sarabhaṃ hantu khippaṃ, annañhi etaṃ varapañña rañño”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2529_0: Tattha pattinti vājapattehi samannāgataṃ. Paraviriyaghātinti paresaṃ vīriyaghātakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2529_1: Cāpe saranti etaṃ pattasahitaṃ saraṃ cāpe ādāya sannayhitvā idāni tvaṃ kiṃ vicikicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2529_2: Hantūti tayā vissaṭṭho hutvā esa saro khippaṃ imaṃ sarabhaṃ hanatu. Annañhi etanti
atk-s0513a4:2529_3: varapañña, mahārāja, sarabho nāma rañño āhāro bhakkhoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2532: “Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, annaṃ migo brāhmaṇa khattiyassa;
atk-s0513a4:2533: Pubbe katañca apacāyamāno, tasmā migaṃ sarabhaṃ no hanāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2534: Tattha pubbe katañcāti brāhmaṇa, ahametaṃ ekaṃsena jānāmi yathā migo khattiyassa annaṃ, pubbe pana iminā mayhaṃ kataguṇaṃ pūjemi, tasmā taṃ na hanāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:2540: “Sace ca rājā vicikicchase tuvaṃ, hantuṃ migaṃ sarabhaṃ sahāyakaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2541: Saputtadāro naravīraseṭṭha, gantā tuvaṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2542_0: Tattha asuresoti asuro eso, asurajeṭṭhako sakko esoti adhippāyena vadati. Amarādhipoti
atk-s0513a4:2542_1: tvaṃ etaṃ sakkaṃ māretvā sayaṃ sakko devarājā hohīti vadati. Vetaraṇiṃ yamassāti
atk-s0513a4:2542_2: “sace etaṃ ‘sahāyo me’ti cintetvā na māressasi, saputtadāro yamassa vetaraṇinirayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2545: “Kāmaṃ ahaṃ jānapadā ca sabbe, puttā ca dārā ca sahāyasaṅghā;
atk-s0513a4:2546: Gacchemu taṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassa, na tveva hañño mama pāṇado yo.
atk-s0513a4:2548: “Ayaṃ migo kicchagatassa mayhaṃ, ekassa kattā vivanasmi ghore;
atk-s0513a4:2549: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, jānaṃ mahābrahme kathaṃ haneyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2550_0: Tattha mama pāṇado yoti brāhmaṇa, yo mama pāṇadado yena me piyaṃ jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ,
