atk-s0513a4:3119_3: vaḍḍhakīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “tumhe pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā ethā”ti te pesetvā daṇḍakena
atk-s0513a4:3119_4: bhūmiṃ pahari, tāvadeva vuttappakāro sattabhūmiko pāsādo uṭṭhahi. Mahāpanādassa pāsādamaṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3119_5: chattamaṅgalaṃ, āvāhamaṅgalanti tīṇi maṅgalāni ekatova ahesuṃ. Maṅgalaṭṭhāne ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0513a4:3119_6: sannipatitvā maṅgalacchaṇena satta vassāni vītināmesuṃ. Neva ne rājā uyyojesi, tesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3119_7: vatthālaṅkārakhādanīyabhojanīyādi sabbaṃ rājakulasantakameva ahosi. Te sattasaṃvaccharaccayena
atk-s0513a4:3119_8: upakkositvā surucimahārājena “kimeta”nti puṭṭhā “mahārāja, amhākaṃ maṅgalaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3119_9: satta vassāni gatāni, kadā maṅgalassa osānaṃ bhavissatī”ti āhaṃsu. Tato rājā “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:3119_10: puttena me ettakaṃ kālaṃ na hasitapubbaṃ, yadā so hasissati, tadā gamissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3119_11: Atha mahājano bheriṃ carāpetvā naṭe sannipātesi. Cha naṭasahassāni sannipatitvā satta
atk-s0513a4:3119_12: koṭṭhāsā hutvā naccantā rājānaṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tassa kira dīgharattaṃ dibbanāṭakānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3120_0: Tadā bhaṇḍukaṇḍo ca paṇḍukaṇḍo cāti dve nāṭakajeṭṭhakā “mayaṃ rājānaṃ hasāpessāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3120_1: rājaṅgaṇaṃ pavisiṃsu. Tesu bhaṇḍukaṇḍo tāva rājadvāre mahantaṃ atulaṃ nāma ambaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3120_2: māpetvā suttaguḷaṃ khipitvā tassa sākhāya laggāpetvā suttena atulambaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_3: Atulamboti kira vessavaṇassa ambo. Atha tampi vessavaṇassa dāsā gahetvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni
atk-s0513a4:3120_4: chinditvā pātesuṃ, sesanāṭakā tāni samodhānetvā udakena abhisiñciṃsu. So pupphapaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3120_5: nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca naccantova uṭṭhahi. Mahāpanādo tampi disvā neva hasi. Paṇḍukaṇḍo
atk-s0513a4:3120_6: naṭo rājaṅgaṇe dārucitakaṃ kāretvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ aggiṃ pāvisi. Tasmiṃ nibbute
atk-s0513a4:3120_7: citakaṃ udakena abhisiñciṃsu. So sapariso pupphapaṭaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca naccantova
atk-s0513a4:3120_8: uṭṭhahi. Tampi disvā rājā neva hasi. Iti taṃ hasāpetuṃ asakkontā manussā upaddutā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3121_0: Sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “gaccha, tāta, mahāpanādaṃ hasāpetvā ehī”ti devanaṭaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:3121_1: So āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe ākāse ṭhatvā upaḍḍhaaṅgaṃ nāma dassesi, ekova hattho, ekova
atk-s0513a4:3121_2: pādo, ekaṃ akkhi, ekā dāṭhā naccati calati phandati, sesaṃ niccalamahosi. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:3121_3: mahāpanādo thokaṃ hasitaṃ akāsi. Mahājano pana hasanto hasanto hāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ
atk-s0513a4:3121_4: satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto aṅgāni vissajjetvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva pati, tasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0513a4:3121_5: maṅgalaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ. Sesamettha “panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo”ti mahāpanādajātakena
atk-s0513a4:3121_6: vaṇṇetabbaṃ. Rājā mahāpanādo dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3122_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, visākhā pubbepi mama santikā
atk-s0513a4:3122_1: varaṃ labhiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahāpanādo bhaddaji ahosi, sumedhādevī
atk-s0513a4:3122_2: visākhā, vissakammo ānando, sakko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3126_0: Appossukko dāni tuvaṃ kapotāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathike pañcasate
atk-s0513a4:3126_1: upāsake ārabbha kathesi. Tadā hi satthā dhammasabhāyaṃ catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatabuddhāsane
atk-s0513a4:3126_2: nisīditvā muducittena parisaṃ oloketvā “ajja upāsakānaṃ kathaṃ paṭicca desanā samuṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3126_3: ñatvā upāsake āmantetvā “uposathikattha upāsakā”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante”ti vutte
atk-s0513a4:3126_4: “sādhu vo kataṃ, uposatho nāmesa porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ vaṃso, porāṇakapaṇḍitā hi rāgādikilesaniggahatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3126_5: uposathavāsaṃ vasiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3127_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ raṭṭhānaṃ antare aṭavī ahosi. Bodhisatto magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0513a4:3127_1: brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya nikkhamitvā taṃ aṭaviṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:3127_2: assamaṃ katvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassa pana assamassa avidūre
atk-s0513a4:3127_3: ekasmiṃ veḷugahane attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ kapotasakuṇo vasati, ekasmiṃ vammike
atk-s0513a4:3127_4: ahi, ekasmiṃ vanagumbe siṅgālo, ekasmiṃ vanagumbe accho. Te cattāropi kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3128_0: Athekadivasaṃ kapoto bhariyāya saddhiṃ kulāvakā nikkhamitvā gocarāya pakkāmi. Tassa
atk-s0513a4:3128_1: pacchato gacchantiṃ kapotiṃ eko seno gahetvā palāyi. Tassā viravasaddaṃ sutvā kapoto
atk-s0513a4:3128_2: nivattitvā olokento taṃ tena hariyamānaṃ passi. Senopi naṃ viravantiṃyeva māretvā
atk-s0513a4:3128_3: khādi. Kapoto tāya viyogena rāgapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno cintesi “ayaṃ rāgo maṃ ativiya
atk-s0513a4:3128_4: kilameti, na idāni imaṃ aniggahetvā gocarāya pakkamissāmī”ti. So gocarapathaṃ pacchinditvā
atk-s0513a4:3128_5: tāpasassa santikaṃ gantvā rāganiggahāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3129_0: Sappopi “gocaraṃ pariyesissāmī”ti vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamitvā paccantagāme gāvīnaṃ vicaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:3129_1: gocaraṃ pariyesati. Tadā gāmabhojakassa sabbaseto maṅgalausabho gocaraṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3129_2: vammikapāde jaṇṇunā patiṭṭhāya siṅgehi mattikaṃ gaṇhanto kīḷati, sappo gāvīnaṃ padasaddena
atk-s0513a4:3129_3: bhīto taṃ vammikaṃ pavisituṃ pakkanto. Atha naṃ usabho pādena akkami. So taṃ kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:3129_4: ḍaṃsi, usabho tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto. Gāmavāsino “usabho kira mato”ti sutvā
atk-s0513a4:3129_5: sabbe ekato āgantvā roditvā kanditvā taṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā āvāṭe nikhaṇitvā
atk-s0513a4:3129_6: pakkamiṃsu. Sappo tesaṃ gatakāle nikkhamitvā “ahaṃ kodhaṃ nissāya imaṃ jīvitā voropetvā
atk-s0513a4:3129_7: mahājanassa hadaye sokaṃ pavesesiṃ, na dāni imaṃ kodhaṃ aniggahetvā gocarāya pakkamissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3129_8: cintetvā nivattitvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā kodhaniggahāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3130_0: Siṅgālopi gocaraṃ pariyesanto ekaṃ matahatthiṃ disvā “mahā me gocaro laddho”ti tuṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:3130_1: gantvā soṇḍāyaṃ ḍaṃsi, thambhe daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Tattha assādaṃ alabhitvā dante
atk-s0513a4:3130_2: ḍaṃsi, pāsāṇe daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Kucchiyaṃ ḍaṃsi, kusule daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3130_3: Naṅguṭṭhe ḍaṃsi, ayasalāke daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Vaccamagge ḍaṃsi, ghatapūve daṭṭhakālo
atk-s0513a4:3130_4: viya ahosi. So lobhavasena khādanto antokucchiyaṃ pāvisi, tattha chātakāle maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3130_5: khādati, pipāsitakāle lohitaṃ pivati, nipajjanakāle antāni ca papphāsañca avattharitvā
atk-s0513a4:3130_6: nipajji. So “idheva me annapānañca sayanañca nipphannaṃ, aññattha kiṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3130_7: cintetvā tattheva abhirato bahi anikkhamitvā antokucchiyaṃyeva vasi. Aparabhāge vātātapena
atk-s0513a4:3130_8: hatthikuṇape sukkhante karīsamaggo pihito, siṅgālo antokucchiyaṃ nipajjamāno appamaṃsalohito
atk-s0513a4:3130_9: paṇḍusarīro hutvā nikkhamanamaggaṃ na passi. Athekadivasaṃ akālamegho vassi, karīsamaggo
atk-s0513a4:3130_10: temiyamāno mudu hutvā vivaraṃ dassesi. Siṅgālo chiddaṃ disvā “aticiramhi kilanto,
atk-s0513a4:3130_11: iminā chiddena palāyissāmī”ti karīsamaggaṃ sīsena pahari. Tassa sambādhaṭṭhānena
atk-s0513a4:3130_12: vegena nikkhantassa sinnasarīrassa sabbāni lomāni karīsamagge laggāni, tālakando
atk-s0513a4:3130_13: viya nillomasarīro hutvā nikkhami. So “lobhaṃ nissāya mayā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3130_14: na dāni imaṃ aniggahetvā gocaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā lobhaniggahatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3131_0: Acchopi araññā nikkhamitvā atricchābhibhūto mallaraṭṭhe paccantagāmaṃ gato. Gāmavāsino
atk-s0513a4:3131_1: “accho kira āgato”ti dhanudaṇḍādihatthā nikkhamitvā tena paviṭṭhaṃ gumbaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3131_2: So mahājanena parivāritabhāvaṃ ñatvā nikkhamitvā palāyi, palāyantameva taṃ dhanūhi
atk-s0513a4:3131_3: ceva daṇḍādīhi ca pothesuṃ. So bhinnena sīsena lohitena galantena attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3131_4: gantvā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ mama atricchālobhavasena uppannaṃ, na dāni imaṃ aniggahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3131_5: gocaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā atricchāniggahāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3132_0: Tāpasopi attano jātiṃ nissāya mānavasiko hutvā jhānaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti. Atheko
atk-s0513a4:3132_1: paccekabuddho tassa mānanissitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ na lāmakasatto, buddhaṅkuro esa,
atk-s0513a4:3132_2: imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇissati, imassa mānaniggahaṃ katvā samāpattinibbattanākāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3132_3: karissāmī”ti tasmiṃ paṇṇasālāya nisinneyeva uttarahimavantato āgantvā tassa pāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0513a4:3132_4: nisīdi. So nikkhamitvā taṃ attano āsane nisinnaṃ disvā mānanissitabhāvena anattamano
atk-s0513a4:3132_5: hutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā accharaṃ paharitvā “nassa, vasala, kāḷakaṇṇi, muṇḍaka, samaṇaka,
atk-s0513a4:3132_6: kimatthaṃ mama nisinnaphalake nisinnosī”ti āha. Atha naṃ so “sappurisa, kasmā mānanissitosi,
atk-s0513a4:3132_7: ahaṃ paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo, tvaṃ imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe sabbaññubuddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a4:3132_8: buddhaṅkurosi, pāramiyo pūretvā āgato aññaṃ ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ atikkamitvā buddho
atk-s0513a4:3132_9: bhavissasi, buddhattabhāve ṭhito siddhattho nāma bhavissasī”ti nāmañca gottañca kulañca
atk-s0513a4:3132_10: aggasāvakādayo ca sabbe ācikkhitvā “kimatthaṃ tvaṃ mānanissito hutvā pharuso hosi,
atk-s0513a4:3132_11: nayidaṃ tava anucchavika”nti ovādamadāsi. So tena evaṃ vuttopi neva naṃ vandi, na
atk-s0513a4:3132_12: ca “kadāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmī”tiādīni pucchi. Atha naṃ paccekabuddho “tava jātiyā
atk-s0513a4:3132_13: mama guṇānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ jāna, sace sakkosi, ahaṃ viya ākāse vicarāhī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:3132_14: ākāse uppatitvā attano pādapaṃsuṃ tassa jaṭāmaṇḍale vikiranto uttarahimavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3133_0: Tāpaso tassa gatakāle saṃvegappatto hutvā “ayaṃ samaṇo evaṃ garusarīro vātamukhe
atk-s0513a4:3133_1: khittatūlapicu viya ākāse pakkhando, ahaṃ jātimānena evarūpassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0513a4:3133_2: neva pāde vandiṃ, na ca “kadāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmī’ti pucchiṃ, jāti nāmesā kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:3133_3: imasmiṃ loke sīlacaraṇameva mahantaṃ, ayaṃ kho pana me māno vaḍḍhanto nirayaṃ upanessati,
atk-s0513a4:3133_4: na idāni imaṃ mānaṃ aniggahetvā phalāphalatthāya gamissāmī”ti paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:3133_5: mānaniggahāya uposathaṃ samādāya kaṭṭhattharikāya nisinno mahāñāṇo kulaputto mānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3133_6: niggahetvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā nikkhamitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3133_7: pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi. Atha naṃ kapotādayo upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3133_8: Mahāsatto kapotaṃ pucchi “tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na imāya velāya āgacchasi, gocaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3133_9: pariyesasi, kiṃ nu kho ajja uposathiko jātosī”ti? “Āma bhante”ti. Atha naṃ “kena
atk-s0513a4:3135: “Appossukko dāni tuvaṃ kapota, vihaṅgama na tava bhojanattho;
atk-s0513a4:3136: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko kapotā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3137: Tattha appossukkoti nirālayo. Na tava bhojanatthoti kiṃ ajja tava bhojanena attho natthi.
atk-s0513a4:3138: Taṃ sutvā kapoto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3140: “Ahaṃ pure giddhigato kapotiyā, asmiṃ padesasmimubho ramāma;
atk-s0513a4:3141: Athaggahī sākuṇiko kapotiṃ, akāmako tāya vinā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3144: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, rāgo mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3145: Tattha ramāmāti imasmiṃ bhūmibhāge kāmaratiyā ramāma. Sākuṇikoti senasakuṇo.
atk-s0513a4:3146: Kapotena attano uposathakamme vaṇṇite mahāsatto sappādīsu ekekaṃ pucchi. Tepi yathābhūtaṃ byākariṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3149: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu dīgha.
atk-s0513a4:3152: So maṃ akkami taṃ kupito aḍaṃsiṃ, dukkhābhituṇṇo maraṇaṃ upāgā.
atk-s0513a4:3154: “Tato janā nikkhamitvāna gāmā, kanditvā roditvā apakkamiṃsu;
atk-s0513a4:3155: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, kodho mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3157: “Matāna maṃsāni bahū susāne, manuññarūpaṃ tava bhojane taṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3158: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko siṅgāla.
atk-s0513a4:3160: “Pavisi kucchiṃ mahato gajassa, kuṇape rato hatthimaṃsesu giddho;
atk-s0513a4:3161: Uṇho ca vāto tikhiṇā ca rasmiyo, te sosayuṃ tassa karīsamaggaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3163: “Kiso ca paṇḍū ca ahaṃ bhadante, na me ahū nikkhamanāya maggo;
atk-s0513a4:3164: Mahā ca megho sahasā pavassi, so temayī tassa karīsamaggaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3166: “Tato ahaṃ nikkhamisaṃ bhadante, cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto;
atk-s0513a4:3167: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, lobho mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3170: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu accha.
atk-s0513a4:3173: Tato janā nikkhamitvāna gāmā, kodaṇḍakena paripothayiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3176: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, atricchatā mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3177_0: Tattha anujjugāmītiādīhi taṃ ālapati. Calakkakūti calamānakakudho. Dukkhābhituṇṇoti
atk-s0513a4:3177_1: so usabho dukkhena abhituṇṇo āturo hutvā. Bahūti bahūni. Pavisīti pāvisiṃ. Rasmiyoti
atk-s0513a4:3177_2: sūriyarasmiyo. Nikkhamisanti nikkhamiṃ. Kipillikānīti upacikāyo. Nippothayantoti
atk-s0513a4:3177_3: khādamāno. Atihīḷayānoti atimaññanto nindanto garahanto. Kodaṇḍakenāti dhanudaṇḍakehi ceva muggarehi ca.
atk-s0513a4:3178_0: Evaṃ te cattāropi attano uposathakammaṃ vaṇṇetvā uṭṭhāya mahāsattaṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:3178_1: tumhe aññesu divasesu imāya velāya phalāphalatthāya gacchatha, ajja agantvā kasmā
atk-s0513a4:3180: “Yaṃ no apucchittha tuvaṃ bhadante, sabbeva byākarimha yathāpajānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3181: Mayampi pucchāma tuvaṃ bhadante, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu brahme”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3185: So maṃ avedī gatimāgatiñca, nāmañca gottaṃ caraṇañca sabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3187: “Evampahaṃ na vandi tassa pāde, na cāpi naṃ mānagatena pucchiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3188: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, māno mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3189_0: Tattha yaṃ noti yaṃ atthaṃ tvaṃ amhe apucchi. Yathāpajānanti attano pajānananiyāmena
atk-s0513a4:3189_1: taṃ mayaṃ byākarimha. Anūpalittoti sabbakilesehi alitto. So maṃ avedīti so mama idāni
atk-s0513a4:3189_2: gantabbaṭṭhānañca gataṭṭhānañca “anāgate tvaṃ evaṃnāmo buddho bhavissasi evaṃgotto,
atk-s0513a4:3189_3: evarūpaṃ te sīlacaraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ nāmañca gottañca caraṇañca sabbaṃ maṃ
atk-s0513a4:3189_4: avedi jānāpesi, kathesīti attho. Evampahaṃ na vandīti evaṃ kathentassapi tassa ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3189_5: attano mānaṃ nissāya pāde na vandinti.
atk-s0513a4:3190_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto attano uposathakāraṇaṃ kathetvā te ovaditvā uyyojetvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0513a4:3190_1: itarepi yathāṭṭhānāni agamaṃsu. Mahāsatto aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:3190_2: itare ca tassovāde ṭhatvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3191_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ upāsakā, uposatho nāmesa porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3191_1: vaṃso, upavasitabbo uposathavāso”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kapoto anuruddho
atk-s0513a4:3191_2: ahosi, accho kassapo, siṅgālo moggallāno, sappo sāriputto, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3195_0: Sace hi tyāhaṃ dhanahetu gāhitoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a4:3195_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a4:3195_2: “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu ayaṃ nandīrāgo tādisaṃ kiṃ nāma nālolessati, na
atk-s0513a4:3195_3: hi sineruubbāhanakavāto sāmante purāṇapaṇṇassa lajjati, pubbe satta vassasatāni antokilesasamudācāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3195_4: vāretvā viharante visuddhasattepesa ālolesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3196_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto paccantapadese morasakuṇiyā
atk-s0513a4:3196_1: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Gabbhe paripākagate mātā gocarabhūmiyaṃ aṇḍaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0513a4:3196_2: pakkāmi. Aṇḍañca nāma mātu arogabhāve sati aññasmiṃ dīghajātikādiparipanthe ca avijjamāne
atk-s0513a4:3196_3: na nassati. Tasmā taṃ aṇḍaṃ kaṇikāramakulaṃ viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hutvā pariṇatakāle
atk-s0513a4:3196_4: attano dhammatāya bhijji, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moracchāpo nikkhami. Tassa dve akkhīni jiñjukāphalasadisāni,
atk-s0513a4:3196_5: tuṇḍaṃ pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ, tisso rattarājiyo gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā piṭṭhimajjhena agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3196_6: So vayappatto bhaṇḍasakaṭamattasarīro abhirūpo ahosi. Taṃ sabbe nīlamorā sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a4:3197_0: So ekadivasaṃ udakasoṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto attano rūpasampattiṃ disvā cintesi “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3197_1: sabbamorehi atirekarūpasobho, sacāhaṃ imehi saddhiṃ manussapathe vasissāmi, paripantho
atk-s0513a4:3197_2: me uppajjissati, himavantaṃ gantvā ekakova phāsukaṭṭhāne vasissāmī”ti. So rattibhāge
atk-s0513a4:3197_3: moresu paṭisallīnesu kañci ajānāpetvā uppatitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā tisso pabbatarājiyo
atk-s0513a4:3197_4: atikkamma catutthāya pabbatarājiyā ekasmiṃ araññe padumasañchanno jātassaro atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3197_5: tassa avidūre ekaṃ pabbataṃ nissāya ṭhito mahānigrodharukkho atthi, tassa sākhāya
atk-s0513a4:3197_6: nilīyi. Tassa pana pabbatassa vemajjhe manāpā guhā atthi. So tattha vasitukāmo hutvā
atk-s0513a4:3197_7: tassā pamukhe pabbatatale nilīyi. Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ neva heṭṭhābhāgena abhiruhituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3197_8: na uparibhāgena otarituṃ sakkā, biḷāladīghajātikamanussabhayehi vimuttaṃ. So “idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3197_9: me phāsukaṭṭhāna”nti taṃ divasaṃ tattheva vasitvā punadivase pabbataguhāto uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:3197_10: pabbatamatthake puratthābhimukho nisinno udentaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ disvā attano divārakkhāvaraṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3197_11: “udetayaṃ cakkhumā ekarājā”ti parittaṃ katvā gocarabhūmiyaṃ otaritvā gocaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3197_12: sāyaṃ āgantvā pabbatamatthake pacchābhimukho nisinno atthaṅgataṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:3197_13: attano rattirakkhāvaraṇatthāya “apetayaṃ cakkhumā ekarājā”ti parittaṃ katvā etenupāyena vasati.
atk-s0513a4:3198_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ eko luddaputto araññe vicaranto pabbatamatthake nisinnaṃ moraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3198_1: disvā attano nivesanaṃ āgantvā maraṇāsannakāle puttaṃ āha – “tāta, catutthāya pabbatarājiyā
atk-s0513a4:3198_2: araññe suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro atthi, sace rājā pucchati, ācikkheyyāsī”ti. Athekasmiṃ divase
atk-s0513a4:3198_3: bārāṇasirañño khemā nāma aggamahesī paccūsakāle supinaṃ passi. Evarūpo supino ahosi
atk-s0513a4:3198_4: – “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro dhammaṃ deseti, sā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇāti, moro dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3198_5: desetvā uṭṭhāya pakkāmi”. Sā “morarājā gacchati, gaṇhatha na”nti vadantīyeva pabujjhi,
atk-s0513a4:3198_6: pabujjhitvā ca pana supinabhāvaṃ ñatvā “supinoti vutte rājā na ādaraṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:3198_7: ‘dohaḷo me’ti vutte karissatī”ti cintetvā dohaḷinī viya hutvā nipajji. Atha naṃ rājā
atk-s0513a4:3198_8: upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “bhadde, kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti. “Dohaḷo me uppanno”ti. “Kiṃ icchasi
atk-s0513a4:3198_9: bhadde”ti? “Suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa morassa dhammaṃ sotuṃ devā”ti. “Bhadde, kuto evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3198_10: moraṃ lacchāmī”ti? “Deva, sace na labhāmi, jīvitaṃ me natthī”ti. “Bhadde, mā cintayi,
atk-s0513a4:3198_11: sace katthaci atthi, labhissasī”ti rājā naṃ assāsetvā gantvā rājāsane nisinno amacce
atk-s0513a4:3198_12: pucchi “ambho, devī suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa morassa dhammaṃ sotukāmā, morā nāma suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
atk-s0513a4:3199_0: Rājā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā pucchi. Brāhmaṇā evamāhaṃsu “mahārāja jalajesu macchakacchapakakkaṭakā,
atk-s0513a4:3199_1: thalajesu migā haṃsā morā tittirā ete tiracchānagatā ca manussā ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontīti
atk-s0513a4:3199_2: amhākaṃ lakkhaṇamantesu āgata”nti. Rājā attano vijite luddaputte sannipātetvā “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a4:3199_3: moro vo diṭṭhapubbo”ti pucchi. Sesā “na diṭṭhapubbo”ti āhaṃsu. Yassa pana pitarā
atk-s0513a4:3199_4: ācikkhitaṃ, so āha – “mayāpi na diṭṭhapubbo, pitā pana me ‘asukaṭṭhāne nāma suvaṇṇavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a4:3199_5: moro atthī’ti kathesī”ti. Atha naṃ rājā “samma, mayhañca deviyā ca jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3199_6: bhavissati, gantvā taṃ bandhitvā ānehī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā uyyojesi. So puttadārassa
atk-s0513a4:3199_7: dhanaṃ datvā tattha gantvā mahāsattaṃ disvā pāse oḍḍetvā “ajja bajjhissati, ajja
atk-s0513a4:3199_8: bajjhissatī”ti abajjhitvāva mato, devīpi patthanaṃ alabhantī matā. Rājā “taṃ moraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3199_9: nissāya piyabhariyā me matā”ti kujjhitvā kodhavasiko hutvā “himavante catutthāya
atk-s0513a4:3199_10: pabbatarājiyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro carati, tassa maṃsaṃ khāditvā ajarā amarā hontī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3199_11: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā taṃ paṭṭaṃ sāramañjūsāyaṃ ṭhapetvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3200_0: Atha añño rājā ahosi. So suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni disvā “ajaro amaro bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3200_1: tassa gahaṇatthāya ekaṃ luddaputtaṃ pesesi. Sopi tattheva mato. Evaṃ cha rājaparivaṭṭā
atk-s0513a4:3200_2: gatā, cha luddaputtā himavanteyeva matā. Sattamena pana raññā pesito sattamo luddo
atk-s0513a4:3200_3: “ajja ajjevā”ti satta saṃvaccharāni bajjhituṃ asakkonto cintesi “kiṃ nu kho imassa
atk-s0513a4:3200_4: morarājassa pāde pāsassa asañcaraṇakāraṇa”nti? Atha naṃ pariggaṇhanto sāyaṃpātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3200_5: parittaṃ karontaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne añño moro natthi, iminā brahmacārinā bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3200_6: brahmacariyānubhāvena ceva parittānubhāvena cassa pādo pāse na bajjhatī”ti nayato
atk-s0513a4:3200_7: pariggahetvā paccantajanapadaṃ gantvā ekaṃ moriṃ bandhitvā yathā sā accharāya pahaṭāya
atk-s0513a4:3200_8: vassati, pāṇimhi pahaṭe naccati, evaṃ sikkhāpetvā ādāya gantvā bodhisattassa parittakaraṇato
atk-s0513a4:3200_9: puretarameva pāsaṃ oḍḍetvā accharaṃ paharitvā moriṃ vassāpesi. Moro tassā saddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3200_10: suṇi, tāvadevassa satta vassasatāni sannisinnakileso phaṇaṃ karitvā daṇḍena pahaṭāsīviso
atk-s0513a4:3200_11: viya uṭṭhahi. So kilesāturo hutvā parittaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇitvāva vegena tassā santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3200_12: gantvā pāse pādaṃ pavesentoyeva ākāsā otari. Satta vassasatāni asañcaraṇakapāso taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a4:3201_0: Atha naṃ luddaputto yaṭṭhiagge olambantaṃ disvā cintesi “imaṃ morarājaṃ cha luddaputtā
atk-s0513a4:3201_1: bandhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, ahampi satta vassāni nāsakkhiṃ, ajja panesa imaṃ moriṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:3201_2: kilesāturo hutvā parittaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇitvā āgamma pāse baddho heṭṭhāsīsako olambati,
atk-s0513a4:3201_3: evarūpo me sīlavā kilamito, evarūpaṃ rañño paṇṇākāratthāya netuṃ ayuttaṃ, kiṃ me
atk-s0513a4:3201_4: raññā dinnena sakkārena, vissajjessāmi na”nti. Puna cintesi “ayaṃ nāgabalo thāmasampanno
atk-s0513a4:3201_5: mayi upasaṅkamante ‘esa maṃ māretuṃ āgacchatī’ti maraṇabhayatajjito phandamāno pādaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3201_6: vā pakkhaṃ vā bhindeyya, anupagantvā pana paṭicchanne ṭhatvā khurappenassa pāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3201_7: chindissāmi, tato sayameva yathāruciyā gamissatī”ti. So paṭicchanne ṭhatvā dhanuṃ
atk-s0513a4:3201_8: āropetvā khurappaṃ sannayhitvā ākaḍḍhi. Moropi “ayaṃ luddako maṃ kilesāturaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:3201_9: baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nirāsaṅko āgacchissati, kahaṃ nu kho so”ti cintetvā ito cito ca
atk-s0513a4:3201_10: viloketvā dhanuṃ āropetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā “māretvā maṃ ādāya gantukāmo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3201_11: maññamāno maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā jīvitaṃ yācanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3203: “Sace hi tyāhaṃ dhanahetu gāhito, mā maṃ vadhī jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā;
atk-s0513a4:3204: Rañño ca maṃ samma upantikaṃ nehi, maññe dhanaṃ lacchasinapparūpa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3205: Tattha sace hi tyāhanti sace hi te ahaṃ. Upantikaṃ nehīti upasantikaṃ nehi. Lacchasinapparūpanti lacchasi anappakarūpaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3206: Taṃ sutvā luddaputto cintesi – “morarājā, ‘ayaṃ maṃ vijjhitukāmatāya khurappaṃ sannayhī’ti maññati, assāsessāmi na”nti. So assāsento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3208: “Na me ayaṃ tuyha vadhāya ajja, samāhito cāpadhure khurappo;
atk-s0513a4:3209: Pāsañca tyāhaṃ adhipātayissaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ gacchatu morarājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3213: “Yaṃ satta vassāni mamānubandhi, rattindivaṃ khuppipāsaṃ sahanto;
atk-s0513a4:3214: Atha kissa maṃ pāsavasūpanītaṃ, pamuttave icchasi bandhanasmā.
atk-s0513a4:3216: “Pāṇātipātā virato nusajja, abhayaṃ nu te sabbabhūtesu dinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3217: Yaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ pāsavasūpanītaṃ, pamuttave icchasi bandhanasmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3218_0: Tattha yanti yasmā maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tvaṃ anubandhi, tasmā taṃ pucchāmi, atha kissa
atk-s0513a4:3218_1: maṃ pāsavasaṃ upanītaṃ bandhanasmā pamocetuṃ icchasīti attho. Virato nusajjāti virato
atk-s0513a4:3221: “Pāṇātipātā viratassa brūhi, abhayañca yo sabbabhūtesu deti;
atk-s0513a4:3222: Pucchāmi taṃ morarājetamatthaṃ, ito cuto kiṃ labhate sukhaṃ so.
atk-s0513a4:3224: “Pāṇātipātā viratassa brūmi, abhayañca yo sabbabhūtesu deti;
atk-s0513a4:3225: Diṭṭheva dhamme labhate pasaṃsaṃ, saggañca so yāti sarīrabhedā.
atk-s0513a4:3227: “Na santi devā iti āhu eke, idheva jīvo vibhavaṃ upeti;
atk-s0513a4:3228: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattañca vadanti dānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3229: Tesaṃ vaco arahataṃ saddahāno, tasmā ahaṃ sakuṇe bādhayāmī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:3231_0: Tattha iti āhu eketi ekacce samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃ kathenti. Tesaṃ vaco arahataṃ saddahānoti
atk-s0513a4:3231_1: tassa kira kulūpakā ucchedavādino naggasamaṇakā. Te taṃ paccekabodhiñāṇassa upanissayasampannampi
atk-s0513a4:3231_2: sattaṃ ucchedavādaṃ gaṇhāpesuṃ. So tehi saṃsaggena “kusalākusalaṃ natthī”ti gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3231_3: sakuṇe māreti. Evaṃ mahāsāvajjā esā asappurisasevanā nāma. Teyeva ayaṃ “arahanto”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:3232: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “tasseva paralokassa atthibhāvaṃ kathessāmī”ti pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ adhosiro olambamānova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3234: “Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā, gacchanti obhāsayamantalikkhe;
atk-s0513a4:3235: Imassa lokassa parassa vā te, kathaṃ nu te āhu manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3236_0: Tattha imassāti kiṃ nu te imassa lokassa santi, udāhu paralokassāti. Bhummatthe vā
atk-s0513a4:3236_1: etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Kathaṃ nu teti etesu vimānesu candimasūriyadevaputte kathaṃ nu
atk-s0513a4:3236_2: kathenti, kiṃ atthīti kathenti, udāhu natthīti, kiṃ vā devā, udāhu manussāti?
atk-s0513a4:3239: “Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā, gacchanti obhāsayamantalikkhe;
atk-s0513a4:3240: Parassa lokassa na te imassa, devāti te āhu manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3243: “Ettheva te nīhatā hīnavādā, ahetukā ye na vadanti kammaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3244: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattaṃ ye ca vadanti dāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3245_0: Tattha ettheva te nihatā hīnavādāti sace candimasūriyā devaloke ṭhitā, na manussaloke,
atk-s0513a4:3245_1: sace ca te devā, na manussā, ettheva ettake byākaraṇe te tava kulūpakā hīnavādā nīhatā
atk-s0513a4:3245_2: honti. Ahetukā “visuddhiyā vā saṃkilesassa vā hetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ natthī”ti evaṃvādā.
atk-s0513a4:3245_3: Dattupaññattanti ye ca dānaṃ “bālakehi paññatta”nti vadanti.
atk-s0513a4:3248: “Addhā hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ tavedaṃ, kathañhi dānaṃ aphalaṃ bhaveyya;
atk-s0513a4:3249: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattañca kathaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a4:3251: “Kathaṃkaro kintikaro kimācaraṃ, kiṃ sevamāno kena tapoguṇena;
atk-s0513a4:3252: Akkhāhi me morarājetamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3253_0: Tattha dattupaññattañcāti dānañca dattupaññattaṃ nāma kathaṃ bhaveyyāti attho. Kathaṃkaroti
atk-s0513a4:3253_1: katarakammaṃ karonto. Kintikaroti kena kāraṇena karonto ahaṃ nirayaṃ na gaccheyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3254_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “sacāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ na kathessāmi, manussaloko tuccho viya kato
atk-s0513a4:3254_1: bhavissati, tathevassa dhammikānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ kathessāmī”ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3256: “Ye keci atthi samaṇā pathabyā, kāsāyavatthā anagāriyā te;
atk-s0513a4:3257: Pātova piṇḍāya caranti kāle, vikālacariyā viratā hi santo.
atk-s0513a4:3259: “Te tattha kālenupasaṅkamitvā, pucchāhi yaṃ te manaso piyaṃ siyā;
atk-s0513a4:3260: Te te pavakkhanti yathāpajānaṃ, imassa lokassa parassa cattha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3261_0: Tattha santoti santapāpā paṇḍitā paccekabuddhā. Yathāpajānanti te tuyhaṃ attano pajānananiyāmena
atk-s0513a4:3261_1: vakkhanti, kaṅkhaṃ te chinditvā kathessanti. Imassa lokassa parassa catthanti iminā
atk-s0513a4:3261_2: nāma kammena manussaloke nibbattanti, iminā devaloke, iminā nirayādīsūti evaṃ imassa
atk-s0513a4:3261_3: ca parassa ca lokassa atthaṃ ācikkhissanti, te pucchāti.
atk-s0513a4:3262_0: Evañca pana vatvā nirayabhayena tajjesi. So pana pūritapāramī paccekabodhisatto sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3262_1: oloketvā ṭhitaṃ pariṇatapadumaṃ viya paripākagatañāṇo vicarati. So tassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3262_2: suṇanto ṭhitapadeneva ṭhito saṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā tilakkhaṇaṃ sammasanto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3262_3: paṭivijjhi. Tassa paṭivedho ca mahāsattassa pāsato mokkho ca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3262_4: Paccekabuddho sabbakilese padāletvā bhavapariyante ṭhitova udānaṃ udānanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3264: “Tacaṃva jiṇṇaṃ urago purāṇaṃ, paṇḍūpalāsaṃ harito dumova;
atk-s0513a4:3266_0: Tassattho – yathā jiṇṇaṃ purāṇaṃ tacaṃ urago jahati, yathā ca harito sampajjamānanīlapatto
atk-s0513a4:3266_1: dumo katthaci ṭhitaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ jahati, evaṃ ahampi ajja luddabhāvaṃ dāruṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3266_2: jahitvā ṭhito, so dāni esa pahīno mama luddabhāvo, sādhu vata jahāmahaṃ luddakabhāvamajjāti.
atk-s0513a4:3267_0: So imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā “ahaṃ tāva sabbakilesabandhanehi mutto, nivesane pana me
atk-s0513a4:3267_1: bandhitvā ṭhapitā bahū sakuṇā atthi, te kathaṃ mocessāmī”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ pucchi
atk-s0513a4:3267_2: – “morarāja, nivesane me bahū sakuṇā baddhā atthi, te kathaṃ mocessāmī”ti? Paccekabuddhatopi
atk-s0513a4:3267_3: sabbaññubodhisattānaññeva upāyapariggahañāṇaṃ mahantataraṃ hoti, tena naṃ āha “yaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3267_4: vo maggena kilese khaṇḍetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, taṃ ārabbha saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3267_5: karotha, sakalajambudīpe bandhanagato satto nāma na bhavissatī”ti. So bodhisattena
atk-s0513a4:3269: “Ye cāpi me sakuṇā atthi baddhā, satāninekāni nivesanasmiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3270: Tesampahaṃ jīvitamajja dammi, mokkhañca te pattā sakaṃ niketa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3271_0: Tattha mokkhañca te pattāti svāhaṃ mokkhaṃ patto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:3271_1: ṭhito, te satte jīvitadānena anukampāmi, etena saccena. Sakaṃ niketanti sabbepi te
atk-s0513a4:3271_2: sattā attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantūti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:3272_0: Athassa saccakiriyāsamakālameva sabbe bandhanā muccitvā tuṭṭhiravaṃ ravantā sakaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0513a4:3272_1: agamiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ tesaṃ gehesu biḷāle ādiṃ katvā sakalajambudīpe bandhanagato
atk-s0513a4:3272_2: satto nāma nāhosi. Paccekabuddho hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā sīsaṃ parāmasi. Tāvadeva gihiliṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3272_3: antaradhāyi, pabbajitaliṅgaṃ pāturahosi. So saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ākappasampanno
atk-s0513a4:3272_4: aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo hutvā “tvameva mama patiṭṭhā ahosī”ti morarājassa añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0513a4:3272_5: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ākāse uppatitvā nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi. Morarājāpi yaṭṭhiaggato
atk-s0513a4:3272_6: uppatitvā gocaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Idāni luddassa satta vassāni
atk-s0513a4:3272_7: pāsahatthassa caritvāpi morarājānaṃ nissāya dukkhā muttabhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3274: “Luddo carī pāsahattho araññe, bādhetu morādhipatiṃ yasassiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3275: Bandhitvā morādhipatiṃ yasassiṃ, dukkhā sa pamucci yathāhaṃ pamutto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3276_0: Tattha bādhetūti māretuṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Bandhitvāti bandhitvā ṭhitassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3276_1: sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego hutvāti attho. Yathāhanti yathā ahaṃ sayambhuñāṇena mutto,
atk-s0513a4:3277: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tadā morarājā ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:3281_0: Yadesamānā vicarimhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve mahallakatthere ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:3281_1: kathesi. Mahākosalo kira rañño bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dento dhītu nhānīyamūlatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3281_2: kāsigāmaṃ adāsi. Pasenadi rājā ajātasattunā pitari mārite taṃ gāmaṃ acchindi. Tesu
atk-s0513a4:3281_3: tassatthāya yujjhantesu paṭhamaṃ ajātasattussa jayo ahosi. Kosalarājā parājayappatto
atk-s0513a4:3281_4: amacce pucchi “kena nu kho upāyena ajātasattuṃ gaṇheyyāmā”ti. Mahārāja, bhikkhū nāma
atk-s0513a4:3281_5: mantakusalā honti, carapurise pesetvā vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0513a4:3281_6: Rājā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā “etha, tumhe vihāraṃ gantvā paṭicchannā hutvā bhadantānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3281_7: kathaṃ pariggaṇhathā”ti carapurise payojesi. Jetavanepi bahū rājapurisā pabbajitā
atk-s0513a4:3281_8: honti. Tesu dve mahallakattherā vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasanti, eko dhanuggahatissatthero
atk-s0513a4:3281_9: nāma, eko mantidattatthero nāma. Te sabbarattiṃ supitvā paccūsakāle pabujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3282_0: Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero aggiṃ jāletvā āha “bhante, mantidattattherā”ti. “Kiṃ bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3282_1: “Niddāyatha tumhe”ti. “Na niddāyāmi, kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Bhante, lālako vatāyaṃ kosalarājā
atk-s0513a4:3282_2: cāṭimattabhojanameva bhuñjituṃ jānātī”ti. “Atha kiṃ bhante”ti. “Attano kucchimhi
atk-s0513a4:3282_3: pāṇakamattena ajātasattunā parājito rājā”ti. “Kinti pana bhante kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:3282_5: Tesu bhāgineyyaṃ ajātasattuṃ gaṇhantena sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, asukasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3282_6: nāma pabbatakaṇṇe dvīsu passesu sūrapurise ṭhapetvā purato balaṃ dassetvā anto paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3282_7: ñatvā naditvā vaggitvā kumine paviṭṭhamacchaṃ viya antomuṭṭhiyaṃ katvāva naṃ gahetuṃ sakkā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3283_0: Payojitapurisā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā mahatiyā senāya gantvā tathā
atk-s0513a4:3283_1: katvā ajātasattuṃ gahetvā saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhitvā katipāhaṃ nimmadaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:3283_2: “puna evarūpaṃ mā karī”ti assāsetvā mocetvā dhītaraṃ vajirakumāriṃ nāma tassa datvā
atk-s0513a4:3283_4: ajātasattu gahito”ti bhikkhūnaṃ antare kathā samuṭṭhahi, dhammasabhāyampi tameva
atk-s0513a4:3283_5: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3283_6: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi dhanuggahatisso yuddhasaṃvidhāne
atk-s0513a4:3284_0: Atīte bārāṇasinagarassa dvāragāmavāsī eko vaḍḍhakī dāruatthāya araññaṃ gantvā āvāṭe
atk-s0513a4:3284_1: patitaṃ ekaṃ sūkarapotakaṃ disvā ānetvā “tacchasūkaro”tissa nāmaṃ katvā posesi. So
atk-s0513a4:3284_2: tassa upakārako ahosi. Tuṇḍena rukkhe parivattetvā deti, dāṭhāya veṭhetvā kāḷasuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3284_3: kaḍḍhati, mukhena ḍaṃsitvā vāsinikhādanamuggare āharati. So vuḍḍhippatto mahābalo
atk-s0513a4:3284_4: mahāsarīro ahosi. Atha vaḍḍhakī tasmiṃ puttapemaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā “imaṃ idha vasantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3284_5: kocideva hiṃseyyā”ti araññe vissajjesi. So cintesi “ahaṃ imasmiṃ araññe ekakova vasituṃ
atk-s0513a4:3284_6: na sakkhissāmi, ñātake pariyesitvā tehi parivuto vasissāmī”ti. So vanaghaṭāya sūkare
atk-s0513a4:3284_7: pariyesanto bahū sūkare disvā tussitvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3287: Anvesaṃ vicariṃ ñātī, teme adhigatā mayā.
atk-s0513a4:3294_0: Tattha yadesamānāti yaṃ ñātigaṇaṃ pariyesantā mayaṃ vicarimha. Anvesanti ciraṃ vata
atk-s0513a4:3294_1: anvesanto vicariṃ. Temeti te ime. Bhakkhoti sveva vanamūlaphalasaṅkhāto bhakkho.
atk-s0513a4:3295: Sūkarā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā catutthaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3297: “Aññampi leṇaṃ pariyesa, sattu no idha vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:3298: So taccha sūkare hanti, idhāgantvā varaṃ vara”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3299: Tattha tacchāti taṃ nāmenālapanti. Varaṃ varanti sūkare hananto thūlamaṃsaṃ varaṃ varaññeva hanati.
atk-s0513a4:3302: “Ko numhākaṃ idha sattu, ko ñātī susamāgate;
atk-s0513a4:3303: Duppadhaṃse padhaṃseti, taṃ me akkhātha pucchitā.
atk-s0513a4:3306: So taccha sūkare hanti, idhāgantvā varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3308: “Na no dāṭhā na vijjanti, balaṃ kāye samohitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3309: Sabbe samaggā hutvāna, vasaṃ kāhāma ekakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3312: Yopi yuddhe palāyeyya, tampi pacchā hanāmase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3313_0: Tattha ko numhākanti ahaṃ tumhe disvāva “ime sūkarā appamaṃsalohitā, bhayena nesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3313_1: bhavitabba”nti cintesiṃ, tasmā me ācikkhatha, ko nu amhākaṃ idha sattu. Uddhaggarājīti
atk-s0513a4:3313_2: uddhaggāhi sarīrarājīhi samannāgato. Byagghaṃ sandhāyevamāhaṃsu. Yopīti yo amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3313_3: antare ekopi palāyissati, tampi mayaṃ pacchā hanissāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:3314_0: Tacchasūkaro sabbe sūkare ekacitte katvā pucchi “kāya velāya byaggho āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3314_1: Ajja pātova ekaṃ gahetvā gato, sve pātova āgamissatīti. So yuddhakusalo “imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3314_2: ṭhāne ṭhitena sakkā jetu”nti bhūmisīsaṃ pajānāti, tasmā ekaṃ padesaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a4:3314_3: rattimeva sūkare gocaraṃ gāhāpetvā balavapaccūsato paṭṭhāya “yuddhaṃ nāma sakaṭabyūhādivasena
atk-s0513a4:3314_4: tividhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā padumabyūhaṃ saṃvidahati. Majjhe ṭhāne khīrapivake sūkarapotake
atk-s0513a4:3314_5: ṭhapesi. Te parivāretvā tesaṃ mātaro, tā parivāretvā vañjhā sūkariyo, tāsaṃ anantarā
atk-s0513a4:3314_6: sūkarapotake, tesaṃ anantarā makuladāṭhe taruṇasūkare, tesaṃ anantarā mahādāṭhe,
atk-s0513a4:3314_7: tesaṃ anantarā jiṇṇasūkare, tato tattha tattha dasavaggaṃ vīsativaggaṃ tiṃsavaggañca
atk-s0513a4:3314_8: katvā balagumbaṃ ṭhapesi. Attano atthāya ekaṃ āvāṭaṃ, byagghassa patanatthāya ekaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3314_9: suppasaṇṭhānaṃ pabbhāraṃ katvā khaṇāpesi. Dvinnaṃ āvāṭānaṃ antare attano vasanatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3314_10: pīṭhakaṃ kāresi. So thāmasampanne yodhasūkare gahetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sūkare
atk-s0513a4:3314_11: assāsento vicari. Tassevaṃ karontasseva sūriyo uggacchati.
atk-s0513a4:3315_0: Atha byaggharājā kūṭajaṭilassa assamapadā nikkhamitvā pabbatatale aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:3315_1: sūkarā “āgato no bhante verī”ti vadiṃsu. Mā bhāyatha, yaṃ yaṃ esa karoti, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3315_2: sarikkhā hutvā karothāti. Byaggho sarīraṃ vidhunitvā osakkanto viya passāvamakāsi,
atk-s0513a4:3315_3: sūkarāpi tatheva kariṃsu. Byaggho sūkare oloketvā mahānadaṃ nadi, tepi tatheva kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3315_4: So tesaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā cintesi “na ime pubbasadisā, ajja mayhaṃ paṭisattuno hutvā
atk-s0513a4:3315_5: vaggavaggā ṭhitā, saṃvidahako nesaṃ senānāyakopi atthi, ajja mayā etesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3315_6: gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti maraṇabhayatajjito nivattitvā kūṭajaṭilassa santikaṃ gato. Atha
atk-s0513a4:3315_7: naṃ so tucchahatthaṃ disvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3317: “Pāṇātipātā virato nu ajja, abhayaṃ nu te sabbabhūtesu dinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3318: Dāṭhā nu te migavadhāya na santi, yo saṅghapatto kapaṇova jhāyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3319: Tattha saṅghapattoti yo tvaṃ sūkarasaṅghapatto hutvā kiñci gocaraṃ alabhitvā kapaṇo viya jhāyasīti.
atk-s0513a4:3322: “Na me dāṭhā na vijjanti, balaṃ kāye samohitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3323: Ñātī ca disvāna sāmaggī ekato, tasmā ca jhāyāmi vanamhi ekako.
atk-s0513a4:3325: “Imassudaṃ yanti disodisaṃ pure, bhayaṭṭitā leṇagavesino puthu;
atk-s0513a4:3326: Te dāni saṅgamma vasanti ekato, yatthaṭṭhitā duppasahajja te mayā.
atk-s0513a4:3329: Te maṃ samaggā hiṃseyyuṃ, tasmā nesaṃ na patthaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3330_0: Tattha sāmaggī ekatoti sahitā hutvā ekato ṭhite. Imassudanti ime sudaṃ mayā akkhīni
atk-s0513a4:3330_1: ummīletvā olokitamattāva pubbe disodisaṃ gacchanti. Puthūti visuṃ visuṃ. Yatthaṭṭhitāti
atk-s0513a4:3330_2: yasmiṃ bhūmibhāge ṭhitā. Pariṇāyakasampannāti senānāyakena sampannā. Tasmā nesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3330_3: na patthayeti tena kāraṇena etesaṃ na patthemi.
atk-s0513a4:3331: Taṃ sutvā kūṭajaṭilo tassa ussāhaṃ janayanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3333: “Ekova indo asure jināti, ekova seno hanti dije pasayha;
atk-s0513a4:3334: Ekova byaggho migasaṅghapatto, varaṃ varaṃ hanti balañhi tādisa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3335: Tattha migasaṅghapattoti migagaṇapatto hutvā varaṃ varaṃ migaṃ hanti. Balañhi tādisanti tādisañhi tassa balaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3338: “Na heva indo na seno, napi byaggho migādhipo;
atk-s0513a4:3339: Samagge sahite ñātī, na byagghe kurute vase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3340: Tattha byaggheti byagghasadise hutvā sarīravidhūnanādīni katvā ṭhite vase na kurute, attano vase vattāpetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3341: Puna jaṭilo taṃ ussāhento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3347: Tañca seno nitāḷeti, veyyagghiyeva sā gatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3348_0: Tattha kumbhīlakāti evaṃnāmakā khuddakasakuṇā. Uppatantīti gocaraṃ carantā uppatanti.
atk-s0513a4:3348_1: Ḍayanti cāti gocaraṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanti. Ekettha apasakkatīti eko etesu osakkitvā
atk-s0513a4:3348_2: vā ekapassena vā visuṃ gacchati. Nitāḷetīti paharitvā gaṇhāti. Veyyagghiyeva sā gatīti
atk-s0513a4:3348_3: byagghānaṃ esāti veyyagghi, samaggānaṃ gacchantānampi esā evarūpā gati byagghānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3348_4: gatiyeva nāma hoti. Na hi sakkā sabbehi ekatova gantuṃ, tasmā yo evaṃ tattha eko
atk-s0513a4:3349_0: Evañca pana vatvā “byaggharāja tvaṃ attano balaṃ na jānāsi, mā bhāyi, kevalaṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3349_1: naditvā pakkhanda, dve ekato gacchantā nāma na bhavissantī”ti ussāhesi. So tathā
atk-s0513a4:3352: Dāṭhī dāṭhīsu pakkhanti, maññamāno yathā pure”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3353: Tattha dāṭhīti sayaṃ dāṭhāvudho itaresu dāṭhāvudhesu pakkhandi. Yathā pureti yathā pubbe maññati, tatheva maññamāno.
atk-s0513a4:3354_0: So kira gantvā pabbatatale tāva aṭṭhāsi. Sūkarā “punāgato sāmi, coro”ti tacchassa
atk-s0513a4:3354_1: ārocesuṃ. So “mā bhāyathā”ti te assāsetvā uṭṭhāya dvinnaṃ āvāṭānaṃ antare pīṭhakāya
atk-s0513a4:3354_2: aṭṭhāsi. Byaggho vegaṃ janetvā tacchasūkaraṃ sandhāya pakkhandi. Tacchasūkaro parivattitvā
atk-s0513a4:3354_3: pacchāmukho purimaāvāṭe pati. Byaggho ca vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto gantvā suppapabbhāre
atk-s0513a4:3354_4: āvāṭe patitvā puñjakitova aṭṭhāsi. Tacchasūkaro vegena uṭṭhāya tassa antarasatthimhi
atk-s0513a4:3354_5: dāṭhaṃ otāretvā yāva hadayā phāletvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā mukhena ḍaṃsitvā bahiāvāṭe pātetvā
atk-s0513a4:3354_6: “gaṇhathimaṃ dāsa”nti āha. Paṭhamāgatā ekavārameva tuṇḍotāraṇamattaṃ labhiṃsu, pacchā
atk-s0513a4:3354_7: āgatā alabhitvā “byagghamaṃsaṃ nāma kīdisa”nti vadiṃsu. Tacchasūkaro āvāṭā uttaritvā
atk-s0513a4:3354_8: sūkare oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho na tussathā”ti āha. “Sāmi, eko tāva byaggho gahito, añño
atk-s0513a4:3354_10: khādako kūṭajaṭilo”ti. “Tena hi etha, gaṇhissāma na”nti tehi saddhiṃ vegena pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:3355_0: Jaṭilo “byaggho cirāyatī”ti tassa āgamanamaggaṃ olokento bahū sūkare āgacchante disvā
atk-s0513a4:3355_1: “ime byagghaṃ māretvā mama māraṇatthāya āgacchanti maññe”ti palāyitvā ekaṃ udumbararukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3355_2: abhiruhi. Sūkarā “esa rukkhaṃ āruḷho”ti vadiṃsu. “Kiṃ rukkha”nti. “Udumbararukkha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3355_3: “Tena hi mā cintayittha, idāni naṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti taruṇasūkare pakkositvā rukkhamūlatā
atk-s0513a4:3355_4: paṃsuṃ apabyūhāpesi, sūkarīhi mukhapūraṃ udakaṃ āharāpesi, mahādāṭhasūkarehi samantā
atk-s0513a4:3355_5: mūlāni chindāpesi. Ekaṃ ujukaṃ otiṇṇamūlameva aṭṭhāsi. Tato sesasūkare “tumhe apethā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3355_6: ussāretvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā dāṭhāya mūlaṃ pahari, pharasunā pahaṭaṃ viya chijjitvā
atk-s0513a4:3355_7: gataṃ. Rukkho parivattitvā pati. Taṃ kūṭajaṭilaṃ patantameva sampaṭicchitvā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3355_8: bhakkhesuṃ. Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā rukkhadevatā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3360: Ubhinnaṃ pana nesaṃ hatabhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3364_0: Puna tacchasūkaro te pucchi “aññepi vo amittā atthī”ti? Sūkarā “natthi, sāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:3364_1: “taṃ abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ karissāmā”ti udakaṃ pariyesantā jaṭilassa pānīyasaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3364_2: disvā taṃ dakkhiṇāvaṭṭaṃ saṅkharatanaṃ pūretvā udakaṃ abhiharitvā tacchasūkaraṃ udumbararukkhamūleyeva
atk-s0513a4:3364_3: abhisiñciṃsu. Abhisekaudakaṃ āsittaṃ, sūkarimevassa aggamahesiṃ kariṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:3364_4: udumbarabhaddapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhena abhisekakaraṇaṃ pavattaṃ. Tampi
atk-s0513a4:3367: Tacchakaṃ abhisiñciṃsu, tvaṃ no rājāsi issaro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3368: Tattha te sūti te sūkarā, su-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Udumbaramūlasminti udumbarassa mūle.
atk-s0513a4:3369_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi dhanuggahatissatthero
atk-s0513a4:3369_1: yuddhasaṃvidahane chekoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kūṭajaṭilo devadatto
atk-s0513a4:3369_2: ahosi, tacchasūkaro dhanuggahatisso, rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3373_0: Vāṇijā samitiṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāvatthivāsino vāṇije ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:3373_1: kathesi. Te kira vohāratthāya gacchantā satthu mahādānaṃ datvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu
atk-s0513a4:3373_2: ca patiṭṭhāya “bhante, sace arogā āgamissāma, puna tumhākaṃ pāde vandissāmā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_3: pañcamattehi sakaṭasatehi nikkhamitvā kantāraṃ patvā maggaṃ asallakkhetvā maggamūḷhā
atk-s0513a4:3373_4: nirudake nirāhāre araññe vicarantā ekaṃ nāgapariggahitaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a4:3373_5: mocetvā rukkhamūle nisīdiṃsu. Te tassa udakatintāni viya nīlāni siniddhāni pattāni
atk-s0513a4:3373_6: udakapuṇṇā viya ca sākhā disvā cintayiṃsu “imasmiṃ rukkhe udakaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya
atk-s0513a4:3373_7: paññāyati, imassa purimasākhaṃ chindāma, pānīyaṃ no dassatī”ti. Atheko rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_8: sākhaṃ chindi, tato tālakkhandhappamāṇā udakadhārā pavatti. Te tattha nhatvā pivitvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_9: ca dakkhiṇasākhaṃ chindiṃsu, tato nānaggarasabhojanaṃ nikkhami. Taṃ bhuñjitvā pacchimasākhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_10: chindiṃsu, tato alaṅkataitthiyo nikkhamiṃsu. Tāhi saddhiṃ abhiramitvā uttarasākhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_11: chindiṃsu, tato satta ratanāni nikkhamiṃsu. Tāni gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_12: sāvatthiṃ paccāgantvā dhanaṃ gopetvā gandhamālādihatthā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_13: vanditvā pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammakathaṃ sutvā nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_14: datvā “bhante, imasmiṃ dāne amhākaṃ dhanadāyikāya rukkhadevatāya pattiṃ demā”ti pattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_15: adaṃsu. Satthā niṭṭhitabhattakicco “katararukkhadevatāya pattiṃ dethā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3373_16: Vāṇijā nigrodharukkhe dhanassa laddhākāraṃ tathāgatassārocesuṃ. Satthā “tumhe tāva
atk-s0513a4:3373_17: mattaññutāya taṇhāvasikā ahutvā dhanaṃ labhittha, pubbe pana amattaññutāya taṇhāvasikā
atk-s0513a4:3373_18: dhanañca jīvitañca vijahiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3374: Atīte bārāṇasinagare tadeva pana kantāraṃ sveva nigrodho. Vāṇijā maggamūḷhā hutvā tameva nigrodhaṃ passiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ satthā abhisambuddho hutvā kathento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:3382: “Te ca tattha nisīditvā, tassa rukkhassa chāyayā;
atk-s0513a4:3386: Iṅghassa purimaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3388: “Sā ca chinnāva pagghari, acchaṃ vāriṃ anāvilaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3389: Te tattha nhatvā pivitvā, yāvaticchiṃsu vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3392: Iṅghassa dakkhiṇaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3399: Iṅghassa pacchimaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3409: Iṅghassa uttaraṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3411: “Sā ca chinnāva pagghari, muttā veḷuriyā bahū;
atk-s0513a4:3415: Te tattha bhāre bandhitvā, yāvaticchiṃsu vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3418: Iṅghassa mūlaṃ chindāma, api bhiyyo labhāmase.
atk-s0513a4:3421: Nigrodho kiṃ parajjhati, vāṇijā bhaddamatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3424: Nāridā pacchimā sākhā, sabbakāme ca uttarā;
atk-s0513a4:3425: Nigrodho kiṃ parajjhati, vāṇijā bhaddamatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3428: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0513a4:3432_0: Tattha samitiṃ katvāti bārāṇasiyaṃ samāgamaṃ katvā, bahū ekato hutvāti attho. Pakkamiṃsūti
atk-s0513a4:3432_1: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bārāṇaseyyakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya pakkamiṃsu. Gāmaṇinti ekaṃ paññavantataraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3432_2: satthavāhaṃ katvā. Chāyayāti chāyāya. Allāyateti udakabharito viya allo hutvā paññāyati.
atk-s0513a4:3432_3: Chinnāva paggharīti eko rukkhārohanakusalo abhiruhitvā taṃ chindi, sā chinnamattāva
atk-s0513a4:3433_0: Appodavaṇṇe kummāseti appodakapāyāsasadise kummāse. Siṅginti siṅgiverādikaṃ uttaribhaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3433_1: Vidalasūpiyoti muggasūpādayo. Vāṇijā ekāti ekekassa vāṇijassa yattakā vāṇijā, tesu
atk-s0513a4:3433_2: ekekassa ekekāva, satthavāhassa pana santike pañcavīsatīti attho. Parivāriṃsūti parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3433_3: Tāhi pana saddhiṃyeva nāgānubhāvena sāṇivitānasayanādīni pagghariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3434_1: vadantiyeva. Uddiyāni ca kambalāti uddiyāni nāma kambalā atthi. Te tattha bhāre bandhitvāti
atk-s0513a4:3434_2: yāvatakaṃ icchiṃsu, tāvatakaṃ gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvāti attho. Vāṇijā
atk-s0513a4:3434_3: bhaddamatthu teti ekekaṃ vāṇijaṃ ālapanto “bhaddaṃ te atthū”ti āha. Annapānañcāti
atk-s0513a4:3434_4: annañca pānañca adāsi. Sabbakāme cāti sabbakāme ca adāsi. Mittadubbho hīti mittānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3434_5: dubbhanapuriso hi pāpako lāmako nāma. Anādiyitvāti tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā. Upakkamunti
atk-s0513a4:3435_0: Atha ne chindanatthāya rukkhaṃ upagate disvā nāgarājā cintesi “ahaṃ etesaṃ pipāsitānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3435_1: pānīyaṃ dāpesiṃ, tato dibbabhojanaṃ, tato sayanādīni ceva paricārikā ca nāriyo, tato
atk-s0513a4:3435_2: pañcasatasakaṭapūraṃ ratanaṃ, idāni panime “rukkhaṃ mūlato chindissāmā’ti vadanti,
atk-s0513a4:3435_3: ativiya luddhā ime, ṭhapetvā satthavāhaṃ avasese māretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So “ettakā sannaddhayodhā
atk-s0513a4:3435_4: nikkhamantu, ettakā dhanuggahā, ettakā vammino”ti senaṃ vicāresi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3439: Tattha sannaddhāti suvaṇṇarajatādivammakavacikā. Dhanuggahānaṃ tisatāti meṇḍavisāṇadhanuggahānaṃ tīṇi satāni. vamminoti kheṭakaphalakahatthā chasahassā.
atk-s0513a4:3441: “Ete hanatha bandhatha, mā vo muñcittha jīvitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3442: Ṭhapetvā satthavāhaṃva, sabbe bhasmaṃ karotha ne”ti. – ayaṃ nāgarājena vuttagāthā;
atk-s0513a4:3443: Tattha mā vo muñcittha jīvitanti kassaci ekassapi jīvitaṃ mā muñcittha.
atk-s0513a4:3444_0: Nāgā tathā katvā attharaṇādīni pañcasu sakaṭasatesu āropetvā satthavāhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3444_1: sayaṃ tāni sakaṭāni pājentā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ tassa gehe paṭisāmetvā
atk-s0513a4:3444_2: taṃ āpucchitvā attano nāgabhavanameva gatā. Tamatthaṃ viditvā satthā ovādavasena gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3447: Lobhassa na vasaṃ gacche, haneyyārisakaṃ manaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3451_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā lobhavasikā mahāvināsaṃ pattā, satthavāho uttamasampattiṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0513a4:3451_1: Haneyyārisakaṃ mananti anto uppajjamānānaṃ nānāvidhānaṃ lobhasattūnaṃ santakaṃ manaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3451_2: lobhasampayuttacittaṃ haneyyāti attho. Evamādīnavanti evaṃ lobhe ādīnavaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0513a4:3451_3: Taṇhā dukkhassa sambhavanti jātiādidukkhassa taṇhā sambhavo, tato etaṃ dukkhaṃ nibbattati,
atk-s0513a4:3451_4: evaṃ taṇhāva dukkhassa sambhavaṃ ñatvā vītataṇho taṇhāādānena anādāno maggena āgatāya
atk-s0513a4:3451_5: satiyā sato hutvā bhikkhu paribbaje iriyetha vattethāti arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:3452_0: Imañca pana dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ upāsakā pubbe lobhavasikā vāṇijā mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3452_1: pattā, tasmā lobhavasikena na bhavitabba”nti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:3452_2: saccapariyosāne te vāṇijā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā. Tadā nāgarājā sāriputto ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:3456_0: Abbhuto vata lokasminti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathike upāsake ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:3456_1: kathesi. Tadā hi satthā “upāsakā porāṇakapaṇḍitā attano uposathakammaṃ nissāya manussasarīreneva
atk-s0513a4:3456_2: devalokaṃ gantvā ciraṃ vasiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3457_0: Atīte mithilāyaṃ sādhino nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. So catūsu nagaradvāresu
atk-s0513a4:3457_1: nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3457_2: katvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi, devasikaṃ cha satasahassāni vayakaraṇaṃ gacchanti, pañca
atk-s0513a4:3457_3: sīlāni rakkhati, uposathaṃ upavasati. Raṭṭhavāsinopi tassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni
atk-s0513a4:3457_4: puññāni katvā matamatā devanagareyeva nibbattiṃsu. Sudhammadevasabhaṃ pūretvā nisinnā
atk-s0513a4:3457_5: devā rañño sīlādiguṇameva vaṇṇayanti. Taṃ sutvā sesadevāpi rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3457_6: Sakko devarājā tesaṃ manaṃ viditvā āha – “sādhinarājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmatthā”ti. “Āma
atk-s0513a4:3457_7: devā”ti. So mātaliṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha tvaṃ vejayantarathaṃ yojetvā sādhinarājānaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3457_8: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rathaṃ yojetvā videharaṭṭhaṃ agamāsi, tadā puṇṇamadivaso
atk-s0513a4:3457_9: hoti. Mātali manussānaṃ sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā gharadvāresu sukhakathāya nisinnakāle
atk-s0513a4:3457_10: candamaṇḍalena saddhiṃ rathaṃ pesesi. Manussā “dve candā uṭṭhitā”ti vadantā puna
atk-s0513a4:3457_11: candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya rathaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “nāyaṃ cando, ratho eso, devaputto paññāyati,
atk-s0513a4:3457_12: kassesa etaṃ manomayasindhavayuttaṃ dibbarathaṃ āneti, na aññassa, amhākaṃ rañño
atk-s0513a4:3457_13: bhavissati, rājā hi no dhammiko dhammarājā”ti somanassajātā hutvā añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0513a4:3461: Tassattho – abbhuto vatesa amhākaṃ rājā, lokasmiṃ lomahaṃsano uppajji, yassa dibbo ratho pāturahosi vedehassa yasassinoti.
atk-s0513a4:3462_0: Mātalipi taṃ rathaṃ ānetvā manussesu gandhamālādīhi pūjentesu tikkhattuṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3462_1: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rañño nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā rathaṃ nivattetvā pacchābhāgena sīhapañjaraummāre
atk-s0513a4:3462_2: ṭhapetvā ārohaṇasajjaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ divasaṃ rājāpi dānasālāyo oloketvā “iminā
atk-s0513a4:3462_3: niyāmena dānaṃ dethā”ti āṇāpetvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā divasaṃ vītināmetvā amaccagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:3462_4: alaṅkatamahātale pācīnasīhapañjarābhimukho dhammayuttaṃ kathento nisinno hoti. Atha
atk-s0513a4:3462_5: naṃ mātali rathābhiruhanatthaṃ nimantetvā ādāya agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3469: Saramānā hi te devā, sudhammāyaṃ samacchare.
atk-s0513a4:3484_0: Tattha samacchareti acchanti. Agā devāna santiketi devānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Tasmiñhi
atk-s0513a4:3484_1: rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhite ratho ākāsaṃ pakkhandi, so mahājanassa olokentasseva antaradhāyi.
atk-s0513a4:3484_2: Mātali rājānaṃ devalokaṃ nesi. Taṃ disvā devatā ca sakko ca haṭṭhatuṭṭhā paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3484_3: katvā paṭisanthāraṃ kariṃsu. Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ devā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭinandiṃsūti
atk-s0513a4:3484_4: punappunaṃ nandiṃsu. Āsanena cāti rājānaṃ āliṅgitvā “idha nisīdā”ti attano paṇḍukambalasilāsanena
atk-s0513a4:3484_5: ca kāmehi ca nimantesi, upaḍḍharajjaṃ datvā ekāsane nisīdāpesīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3485_0: Tattha sakkena devaraññā dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ aḍḍhatiyā ca accharākoṭiyo
atk-s0513a4:3485_1: vejayantapāsādañca majjhe bhinditvā dinnaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantassa manussagaṇanāya
atk-s0513a4:3485_2: satta vassasatāni atikkantāni. Tenattabhāvena devaloke vasanakaṃ puññaṃ khīṇaṃ, anabhirati
atk-s0513a4:3485_3: uppannā, tasmā sakkena saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3487: “Ahaṃ pure saggagato ramāmi, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
atk-s0513a4:3488: So dāni ajja na ramāmi sagge, āyuṃ nu khīṇo maraṇaṃ nu santike;
atk-s0513a4:3490: Tattha āyuṃ nu khīṇoti kiṃ nu mama sarasena jīvitindriyaṃ khīṇaṃ, udāhu upacchedakakammavasena maraṇaṃ santike jātanti pucchati. Janindaseṭṭhāti janindānaṃ devānaṃ seṭṭha.
atk-s0513a4:3493: “Na tāyu khīṇaṃ maraṇañca dūre, na cāpi mūḷho naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0513a4:3494: Tuyhañca puññāni parittakāni, yesaṃ vipākaṃ idha vedayittho.
atk-s0513a4:3498_0: Tattha “parittakānī”ti idaṃ tena attabhāvena devaloke vipākadāyakāni puññāni sandhāya
atk-s0513a4:3498_1: vuttaṃ, itarāni panassa puññāni pathaviyaṃ paṃsu viya appamāṇāni. Vasa devānubhāvenāti
atk-s0513a4:3498_2: ahaṃ te attano puññāni majjhe bhinditvā dassāmi, mamānubhāvena vasāti taṃ samassāsento āha.
atk-s0513a4:3505: Sayaṃkatāni puññāni, taṃ me āveṇikaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3509: Yaṃ katvā sukhito hoti, na ca pacchānutappatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3510_0: Tattha yaṃ parato dānapaccayāti yaṃ parena dinnattā labbhati, taṃ yācitakasadisameva
atk-s0513a4:3510_1: hoti. Yācitakañhi tuṭṭhakāle denti, atuṭṭhakāle acchinditvā gaṇhantīti vadati. Samacariyāyāti
atk-s0513a4:3510_2: kāyādīhi pāpassa akaraṇena. Saṃyamenāti sīlasaṃyamena. Damenāti indriyadamanena.
atk-s0513a4:3510_3: Yaṃ katvāti yaṃ karitvā sukhito ceva hoti na ca pacchānutappati, tathārūpameva kammaṃ karissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:3511_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā sakko mātaliṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha, tāta, sādhinarājānaṃ mithilaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3511_1: netvā uyyāne otārehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Rājā uyyāne caṅkamati. Atha naṃ uyyānapālo
atk-s0513a4:3511_2: disvā pucchitvā gantvā nāradarañño ārocesi. So rañño āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ purato
atk-s0513a4:3511_3: gantvā uyyānaṃ sajjetvā tassa ca mayhañca dve āsanāni paññāpehī”ti uyyānapālaṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_4: So tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ rājā pucchi “kassa dve āsanāni paññāpesī”ti? “Ekaṃ tumhākaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3511_5: ekaṃ amhākaṃ rañño”ti. Atha naṃ rājā “ko añño satto mama santike āsane nisīdissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3511_6: vatvā ekasmiṃ nisīditvā ekasmiṃ pāde ṭhapesi. Nāradarājā āgantvā tassa pāde vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:3511_7: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. So kirassa sattamo panattā. Tadā kira vassasatāyukakālova hoti.
atk-s0513a4:3511_8: Mahāsatto pana attano puññabalena ettakaṃ kālaṃ vītināmesi. So nāradaṃ hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3514: Imā tā haritānūpā, imā najjo savantiyo.
atk-s0513a4:3518: Yassimāni mamāyiṃsu, kiṃ nu te disataṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:3521: Tameva mayhaṃ janataṃ apassato, suññaṃva me nārada khāyate disā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3522_0: Tattha khettānīti bhūmibhāge sandhāyāha. Imaṃ nikkhanti imaṃ tādisameva udakaniddhamanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3522_1: Sukuṇḍalanti sobhanena musalapavesanakuṇḍalena samannāgataṃ. Haritānūpāti udakaniddhamanassa
atk-s0513a4:3522_2: ubhosu passesu haritatiṇasañchannā anūpabhūmiyo. Yassimāni mamāyiṃsūti tāta nārada,
atk-s0513a4:3522_3: ye mama upaṭṭhākā ca orodhā ca imasmiṃ uyyāne mahantena yasena mayā saddhiṃ vicarantā
atk-s0513a4:3522_4: imāni ṭhānāni mamāyiṃsu piyāyiṃsu, kataraṃ nu te disataṃ gatā, kattha te pesitā.
atk-s0513a4:3522_5: Tānīdha khettānīti imasmiṃ uyyāne tāneva etāni uparopanakaviruhanaṭṭhānāni. Teyeva
atk-s0513a4:3522_6: ārāmavanūpacārāti ime teyeva ārāmavanūpacārā, vihārabhūmiyoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3523_0: Atha naṃ nārado āha – “deva, tumhākaṃ devalokagatānaṃ idāni satta vassasatāni, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3523_1: vo sattamo panattā, tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākā ca orodhā ca maraṇamukhaṃ pattā, idaṃ vo attano
atk-s0513a4:3523_2: santakaṃ rajjaṃ, anubhavatha na”nti. Rājā “tāta nārada, nāhaṃ idhāgacchanto rajjatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3523_3: āgato, puññakaraṇatthāyamhi āgato, ahaṃ puññameva karissāmī”ti vatvā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:3528: “Vutthaṃ me bhavanaṃ dibyaṃ, bhuttā kāmā amānusā;
atk-s0513a4:3535: Taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjissaṃ, yena gacchanti subbatā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3536_0: Tattha vutthaṃ me bhavanaṃ dibyanti vejayantaṃ sandhāya āha. Sohaṃ etādisanti tāta
atk-s0513a4:3536_1: nārada, sohaṃ buddhañāṇena aparicchindanīyaṃ evarūpaṃ kāmaguṇasampattiṃ pahāya puññakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3536_2: idhāgato. Adaṇḍāvacaranti adaṇḍehi nikkhittadaṇḍahatthehi avacaritabbaṃ sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3536_3: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ. Subbatāti yena maggena subbatā sabbaññubuddhā gacchanti, ahampi
atk-s0513a4:3536_4: agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gantuṃ bodhitale nisīditvā tameva maggaṃ paṭipajjissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:3537_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imā gāthāyo sabbaññutaññāṇena saṅkhipitvā kathesi. Nārado punapi
atk-s0513a4:3537_1: āha – “rajjaṃ, deva, anusāsā”ti. “Tāta, na me rajjenattho, satta vassasatāni vigataṃ
atk-s0513a4:3537_2: dānaṃ sattāheneva dātukāmamhī”ti. Nārado “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3537_3: paṭiyādesi. Rājā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā sattame divase kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavaneyeva nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:3538_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ vasitabbayuttakaṃ uposathakammaṃ nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3538_1: dassetvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne uposathikesu upāsakesu
atk-s0513a4:3538_2: keci sotāpattiphale, keci sakadāgāmiphale, keci anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tadā
atk-s0513a4:3538_3: nāradarājā sāriputto ahosi, mātali ānando, sakko anuruddho, sādhinarājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:3542_0: Rājā avoca vidhuranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto asadisadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3542_1: Taṃ aṭṭhakanipāte ādittajātake vitthāritameva. Rājā kira taṃ dānaṃ dadanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3542_2: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pañca bhikkhusatāni vicinitvā gaṇhitvā mahākhīṇāsavānaṃyeva adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3542_3: Athassa guṇakathaṃ kathentā “āvuso, rājā asadisadānaṃ dadanto vicinitvā mahapphalaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:3542_4: adāsī”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:3542_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:3542_6: yaṃ kosalarājā mādisassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko hutvā viceyyadānaṃ deti, porāṇakapaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a4:3542_7: anuppanne buddhepi viceyyadānaṃ adaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3543_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare yudhiṭṭhilagotto korabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3543_1: Tassa vidhuro nāma amacco atthañca dhammañca anusāsati. Rājā sakalajambudīpaṃ khobhetvā
atk-s0513a4:3543_2: mahādānaṃ deti. Taṃ gahetvā bhuñjantesu ekopi pañcasīlamattaṃ rakkhanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3543_3: sabbe dussīlāva, dānaṃ rājānaṃ na toseti. Rājā “viceyyadānaṃ mahapphala”nti sīlavantānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3543_4: dātukāmo hutvā cintesi “vidhurapaṇḍitena saddhiṃ mantayissāmī”ti. So taṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3543_5: āgataṃ āsane nisīdāpetvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3546: Parato rañño ca vidhurassa ca vacanapaṭivacanaṃ hoti –
atk-s0513a4:3549: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3550: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3553: Viratā methunā dhammā, ye te bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3556: Tesaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ vicayaṃ, vitthārena suṇohi me.
atk-s0513a4:3568: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3569: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3581: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3582: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3586: Nādinne vuṭṭhahissāma, gāmamhi vā vanamhi vā.
atk-s0513a4:3595: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3596: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3608: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3609: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3624: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3625: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3637: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3638: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3651: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3652: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3664: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3665: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3677: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3678: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3690: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3691: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3692_0: Tattha sīlavanteti maggenāgatasīle. Bahussuteti paṭivedhabahussute. Dakkhiṇanti dānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3692_1: Ye teti ye dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā tava dānaṃ bhuñjeyyuṃ, te dullabhā. Brāhmaṇajātiyoti
atk-s0513a4:3692_2: brāhmaṇakulāni. Tesaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ vicayanti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ mama paññāya
atk-s0513a4:3692_3: vicitabhāvaṃ vitthārena suṇohi. Saṃvuteti baddhamukhe. Osadhikāyo ganthentīti “idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3692_4: imassa rogassa bhesajjaṃ, idaṃ imassa rogassa bhesajja”nti evaṃ siloke bandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:3692_5: manussānaṃ denti. Nhāpayantīti nahāpanaṃ nāma karonti. Japanti cāti bhūtavijjaṃ parivattenti.
atk-s0513a4:3692_6: Tikicchakasamāti vejjasadisā. Tepi vuccantīti tepi “brāhmaṇā vā mayaṃ, abrāhmaṇā
atk-s0513a4:3692_7: vā”ti ajānitvā vejjakammena jīvikaṃ kappentā vohārena “brāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti. Akkhātā
atk-s0513a4:3692_8: teti ime te mayā vejjabrāhmaṇā nāma akkhātā. Nipatāmaseti vadehi dāni, kiṃ tādise
atk-s0513a4:3692_9: brāhmaṇe nipatāma, nimantanatthāya upasaṅkamāma, atthi te etehi atthoti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:3692_10: Brahmaññāti brāhmaṇadhammato. Na te vuccantīti te bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇā nāma na vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_0: Kiṅkiṇikāyoti mahārāja, aparepi brāhmaṇā attano brāhmaṇadhammaṃ chaḍḍetvā jīvikatthāya
atk-s0513a4:3693_1: rājarājamahāmattānaṃ purato kaṃsatāḷe gahetvā vādentā gāyantā gacchanti. Pesanānipīti
atk-s0513a4:3693_2: dāsakammakarā viya pesanānipi gacchanti. Rathacariyāsūti rathasippaṃ sikkhanti. Paricārakasamāti
atk-s0513a4:3693_3: dāsakammakarasadisā. Vaṅkadaṇḍanti vaṅkadaṇḍakaṭṭhaṃ. Paccupessanti rājānoti rājarājamahāmatte
atk-s0513a4:3693_4: paṭicca āgamma sandhāya upasevanti. Gāmesu nigamesu cāti tesaṃ nivesanadvāre nisīdanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_5: Niggāhakasamāti niggahakārakehi balisādhakarājapurisehi samā. Yathā te purisā “aggahetvā
atk-s0513a4:3693_6: na gamissāmā”ti niggahaṃ katvā gaṇhantiyeva, tathā “gāme vā vane vā aladdhā marantāpi
atk-s0513a4:3693_7: na vuṭṭhahissāmā”ti upavasanti. Tepīti tepi balisādhakasadisā pāpadhammā.
atk-s0513a4:3694_0: Rajareṇūhīti rajehi ca paṃsūhi ca okiṇṇā. Yācakāti dhanayācakā. Khāṇughātasamāti
atk-s0513a4:3694_1: malīnasarīratāya jhāmakhette khāṇughātakehi bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā jhāmakhāṇukauddharaṇakamanussehi
atk-s0513a4:3694_2: samānā, “aggahetvā na gamissāmā”ti niccalabhāvena ṭhitattā nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitavatikhāṇukā
atk-s0513a4:3694_3: viyātipi attho. Tepīti tepi tathā laddhaṃ dhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā payojetvā puna tatheva
atk-s0513a4:3695_0: Ucchupuṭanti ucchuñceva phāṇitapuṭañca. Madhuañjananti madhuñceva añjanañca. Uccāvacānīti
atk-s0513a4:3695_1: mahagghaappagghāni. Paṇiyānīti bhaṇḍāni. Vipaṇentīti vikkiṇanti. Tepīti tepi imāni
atk-s0513a4:3695_2: ettakāni vikkiṇitvā jīvikakappakā vāṇijakabrāhmaṇā. Posayantīti gorasavikkayena jīvikakappanatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3695_3: posenti. Pavecchantīti attano dhītaro hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā paresaṃ denti. Te evaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3695_4: paresaṃ dadamānā vivāhanti nāma, attano puttānaṃ atthāya gaṇhamānā āvāhanti nāma.
atk-s0513a4:3695_5: Ambaṭṭhavessehīti kuṭumbikehi ceva gahapatīhi ca samā, tepi vohāravasena “brāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3696_0: Nikkhittabhikkhanti gāmapurohitā hutvā attano atthāya nibaddhabhikkhaṃ. Bahū teti
atk-s0513a4:3696_1: bahū janā ete gāmapurohite nakkhattamuhuttamaṅgalāni pucchanti. Aṇḍacchedā nilañchakāti
atk-s0513a4:3696_2: bhatiṃ gahetvā balibaddānaṃ aṇḍacchedakā ceva tisūlādiaṅkakaraṇena lañchakā ca, lakkhaṇakārakāti
atk-s0513a4:3696_3: attho. Tatthāti tesaṃ gāmapurohitānaṃ gehesu maṃsavikkiṇanatthaṃ ete pasuādayopi
atk-s0513a4:3696_4: haññanti. Tepīti tepi goghātakasamā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3697_0: Asicammanti asilaṭṭhiñceva kaṇḍavāraṇañca. Vessapathesūti vāṇijānaṃ gamanamaggesu.
atk-s0513a4:3697_1: Satthaṃ abbāhayantīti satthavāhānaṃ hatthato satampi sahassampi gahetvā satthe corāṭaviṃ
atk-s0513a4:3697_2: atibāhenti. Gopanisādehīti gopālakehi ceva nisādehi ca gāmaghātakacorehi samāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3697_3: Tepīti tepi evarūpā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti. Kuṭāni kārayanti teti kūṭapāsādīni ropenti.
atk-s0513a4:3697_4: Sasabiḷāreti sase ceva biḷāre ca. Etena thalacare mige dasseti. Āgodhā macchakacchapanti
atk-s0513a4:3697_5: thalajesu tāva āgodhato mahante ca khuddake ca pāṇayo bādhenti mārenti, jalajesu
atk-s0513a4:3697_6: macchakacchape. Tepīti tepi luddakasamā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_0: Aññe dhanassa kāmā hīti apare brāhmaṇā dhanaṃ patthentā. Heṭṭhāmañce pasakkitāti
atk-s0513a4:3698_1: “kalipavāhakammaṃ kāressāmā”ti ratanamayaṃ mañcaṃ kāretvā tassa heṭṭhā nipannā acchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_2: Atha nesaṃ somayāge upaṭṭhite rājāno upari nahāyanti, te kira somayāge niṭṭhite āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:3698_3: tasmiṃ mañce nisīdanti. Atha ne aññe brāhmaṇā “kaliṃ pavāhessāmā”ti nahāpenti. Ratanamañco
atk-s0513a4:3698_4: ceva rañño rājālaṅkāro ca sabbo heṭṭhāmañce nipannasseva hoti. Tepīti tepi malamajjakehi
atk-s0513a4:3699: Evañcime vohāramattabrāhmaṇe dassetvā idāni paramatthabrāhmaṇe dassento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3702: Viratā methunā dhammā, ye te bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3704: “Ekañca bhattaṃ bhuñjanti, na ca majjaṃ pivanti te;
atk-s0513a4:3706: Tattha sīlavantoti ariyasīlena samannāgatā. Bahussutāti paṭivedhabāhusaccena samannāgatā. Tādiseti evarūpe bāhitapāpe paccekabuddhabrāhmaṇe nimantanatthāya upasaṅkamāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:3707_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā pucchi “samma vidhura, evarūpā aggadakkhiṇeyyā brāhmaṇā kahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3707_1: vasantī”ti? Uttarahimavante nandamūlakapabbhāre, mahārājāti. “Tena hi, paṇḍita, tava
atk-s0513a4:3707_2: balena mayhaṃ te brāhmaṇe pariyesā”ti tuṭṭhamānaso gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3710: Ete vidhura pariyesa, khippañca ne nimantayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3711_0: Mahāsatto “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi, mahārāja, nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:3711_1: sabbe nagaravāsino dānaṃ datvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlā hontū”ti bheriṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_2: carāpetvā “tumhepi saddhiṃ parijanena uposathaṃ samādiyathā”ti vatvā sayaṃ pātova
atk-s0513a4:3711_3: bhuñjitvā uposathaṃ samādāya sāyanhasamaye jātipupphapuṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇasamuggaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:3711_4: raññā saddhiṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā paccekabuddhānaṃ guṇe anussaritvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:3711_5: “uttarahimavante nandamūlakapabbhāravāsino pañcasatā paccekabuddhā sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_6: gaṇhantū”ti nimantetvā ākāse aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi. Tadā tattha pañcasatā
atk-s0513a4:3711_7: paccekabuddhā vasanti, pupphāni gantvā tesaṃ upari patiṃsu. Te āvajjentā taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_8: ñatvā “mārisā, vidhurapaṇḍitena nimantitamha, na kho panesa ittarasatto, buddhaṅkuro
atk-s0513a4:3711_9: esa, imasmiṃyeva kappe buddho bhavissati, karissāmassa saṅgaha”nti nimantanaṃ adhivāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3711_10: Mahāsatto pupphānaṃ anāgamanasaññāya adhivāsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mahārāja, sve paccekabuddhā
atk-s0513a4:3711_11: āgamissanti, sakkārasammānaṃ karohī”ti āha. Rājā punadivase mahāsakkāraṃ katvā mahātale
atk-s0513a4:3711_12: mahārahāni āsanāni paññapesi. Paccekabuddhā anotattadahe katasarīrapaṭijagganā velaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_13: sallakkhetvā ākāsenāgantvā rājaṅgaṇe otariṃsu. Rājā ca bodhisatto ca pasannamānasā
atk-s0513a4:3711_14: tesaṃ hatthato pattāni gahetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā paṇītena
atk-s0513a4:3711_15: khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisiṃsu. Bhattakiccapariyosāne ca punadivasatthāyāti
atk-s0513a4:3711_16: evaṃ satta divase nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase sabbaparikkhāre adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3711_17: Te anumodanaṃ katvā ākāsena tattheva gatā, parikkhārāpi tehi saddhiṃyeva gatā.
atk-s0513a4:3712_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, kosalarañño mama upaṭṭhākassa
atk-s0513a4:3712_1: sato viceyyadānaṃ dātuṃ, porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppannepi buddhe dānaṃ adaṃsuyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:3712_2: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, vidhurapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3716_0: Sukhumālarūpaṃ disvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:3716_1: kathesi. So kira saddho ahosi pasanno, tathāgatassa ceva saṅghassa ca nibaddhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:3716_2: karoti. Athekadivasaṃ cintesi “ahaṃ buddharatanassa ceva saṅgharatanassa ca paṇītāni
atk-s0513a4:3716_3: khādanīyabhojanīyāni ceva sukhumavatthāni ca dento niccaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karomi, idāni
atk-s0513a4:3716_4: dhammaratanassapi karissāmi, kathaṃ nu kho tassa sakkāraṃ karontena kattabba”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3716_5: So bahūni gandhamālādīni ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pucchi “ahaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3716_6: bhante, dhammaratanassa sakkāraṃ kattukāmomhi, kathaṃ nu kho tassa sakkāraṃ karontena
atk-s0513a4:3716_7: kattabba”nti. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “sace dhammaratanassa sakkāraṃ kattukāmo, dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0513a4:3716_8: ānandassa sakkāraṃ karohī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā theraṃ nimantetvā punadivase
atk-s0513a4:3716_9: mahantena sakkārena attano gehaṃ netvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0513a4:3716_10: pūjetvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ datvā mahagghe ticīvarappahonake sāṭake adāsi. Theropi
atk-s0513a4:3716_11: “ayaṃ sakkāro dhammaratanassa kato, na mayhaṃ anucchaviko, aggasāvakassa dhammasenāpatissa
atk-s0513a4:3716_12: anucchaviko”ti cintetvā piṇḍapātañca vatthāni ca vihāraṃ haritvā sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0513a4:3716_13: adāsi. Sopi “ayaṃ sakkāro dhammaratanassa kato, ekantena dhammassāmino sammāsambuddhasseva
atk-s0513a4:3716_14: anucchaviko”ti cintetvā dasabalassa adāsi. Satthā attano uttaritaraṃ adisvā piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3717_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, asuko nāma kuṭumbiko ‘dhammaratanassa
atk-s0513a4:3717_1: sakkāraṃ karomī’ti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa ānandattherassa adāsi. Thero ‘nāyaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3717_2: anucchaviko’ti dhammasenāpatino adāsi, sopi ‘nāyaṃ mayhaṃ anucchaviko’ti tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a4:3717_3: adāsi. Tathāgato aññaṃ uttaritaraṃ apassanto attano dhammassāmitāya ‘mayhameveso
atk-s0513a4:3717_4: anucchaviko’ti taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji, cīvarasāṭakepi gaṇhi, evaṃ so piṇḍapāto
atk-s0513a4:3717_5: yathānucchavikatāya dhammassāminova pādamūlaṃ gato”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a4:3717_6: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:3717_7: idāneva piṇḍapāto paramparā yathānucchavikaṃ gacchati, pubbepi anuppanne buddhe agamāsiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3718_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto agatigamanaṃ pahāya dasa rājadhamme akopento dhammena
atk-s0513a4:3718_1: rajjaṃ kāresi. Evaṃ santepissa vinicchayo suñño viya ahosi. Rājā attano aguṇagavesako
atk-s0513a4:3718_2: hutvā antonivesanādīni pariggaṇhanto antepure ca antonagare ca dvāragāmesu ca attano
atk-s0513a4:3718_3: aguṇaṃ kathentaṃ adisvā “janapade gavesissāmī”ti amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyādetvā purohitena
atk-s0513a4:3718_4: saddhiṃ aññātakaveseneva kāsiraṭṭhe caranto kañci aguṇaṃ kathentaṃ adisvā paccante
atk-s0513a4:3718_5: ekaṃ nigamaṃ patvā bahidvārasālāyaṃ nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe nigamavāsī asītikoṭivibhavo
atk-s0513a4:3718_6: kuṭumbiko mahantena parivārena nhānatitthaṃ gacchanto sālāyaṃ nisinnaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3718_7: sukhumālasarīraṃ rājānaṃ disvā uppannasineho sālaṃ pavisitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:3718_8: “idheva hothā”ti vatvā gehaṃ gantvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ sampādetvā mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a4:3718_9: bhattabhājanāni gāhāpetvā agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe himavantavāsī pañcābhiñño tāpaso
atk-s0513a4:3718_10: āgantvā tattheva nisīdi. Nandamūlakapabbhārato paccekabuddhopi āgantvā tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3719_0: Kuṭumbiko rañño hatthadhovanaudakaṃ datvā nānaggarasehi sūpabyañjanehi bhattapātiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3719_1: sajjetvā rañño upanesi. Rājā naṃ gahetvā purohitassa brāhmaṇassa adāsi. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a4:3719_2: gahetvā tāpasassa adāsi. Tāpaso paccekabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā vāmahatthena bhattapātiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3719_3: dakkhiṇahatthena kamaṇḍaluṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā patte bhattaṃ pakkhipi. So
atk-s0513a4:3719_4: kañci animantetvā anāpucchitvā paribhuñji. Tassa bhattakiccapariyosāne kuṭumbiko
atk-s0513a4:3719_5: cintesi “mayā rañño bhattaṃ dinnaṃ, raññā brāhmaṇassa, brāhmaṇena tāpasassa, tāpasena
atk-s0513a4:3719_6: paccekabuddhassa, paccekabuddho kañci anāpucchitvā paribhuñji, kiṃ nu kho imesaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3719_7: ettakaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ, kiṃ imassa kañci anāpucchitvāva bhuñjanakāraṇaṃ, anupubbena
atk-s0513a4:3719_8: te pucchissāmī”ti. So ekekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pucchi. Tepissa kathesuṃ –
atk-s0513a4:3728: Attānaṃ anasitvāna, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3731: Garu ca āmantanīyo ca, dātumarahāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3734: Rājā te bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3736: “Taṃ tvaṃ bhattaṃ paṭiggayha, isissa bhojanaṃ adā;
atk-s0513a4:3737: Akhettaññūsi dānassa, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3749: Bhikkhu kena tayā seyyo, yassa tvaṃ bhojanaṃ adā.
atk-s0513a4:3755: Tāni āharitvā bhuñjāmi, atthi me so pariggaho.
atk-s0513a4:3761: Isi te bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3763: “Taṃ tvaṃ bhattaṃ paṭiggayha, tuṇhī bhuñjasi ekako;
atk-s0513a4:3764: Nāññaṃ kañci nimantesi, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3766: “Na pacāmi na pācemi, na chindāmi na chedaye;
atk-s0513a4:3767: Taṃ maṃ akiñcanaṃ ñatvā, sabbapāpehi ārataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3770: Isi me bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3774_0: Tattha vivananti nirudakāraññasadisaṃ imaṃ paccantaṃ āgataṃ. Kūṭāgāravarūpetanti
atk-s0513a4:3774_1: kūṭāgāravarena upagataṃ, ekaṃ varakūṭāgāravāsinanti attho. Mahāsayanamupāsitanti
atk-s0513a4:3774_2: tattheva supaññattaṃ sirisayanaṃ upāsitaṃ. Tassa teti evarūpaṃ taṃ disvā ahaṃ pemamakāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3774_3: tassa te pemakena. Vaḍḍhamodananti uttamodanaṃ. Vicitanti apagatakhaṇḍakāḷakehi vicitataṇḍulehi
atk-s0513a4:3774_4: kataṃ. Adāsayīti adāsi. Attānanti attanā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Anasitvānāti abhuñjitvā.
atk-s0513a4:3774_5: Koyaṃ dhammoti mahārāja, ko esa tumhākaṃ sabhāvo. Namatthu teti namo tava atthu,
atk-s0513a4:3774_6: yo tvaṃ attanā abhuñjitvā parassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3775_0: Ācariyoti kuṭumbika esa mayhaṃ ācārasikkhāpako ācariyo. Byāvaṭoti ussuko. Āmantanīyoti
atk-s0513a4:3775_1: āmantetabbayuttako mayā dinnaṃ bhattaṃ gahetuṃ anurūpo. Dātumarahāmīti “ahaṃ evarūpassa
atk-s0513a4:3775_2: ācariyassa bhojanaṃ dātuṃ arahāmī”ti rājā brāhmaṇassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi. Akhettaññūsīti
atk-s0513a4:3775_3: nāhaṃ dānassa khettaṃ, mayi dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na hotīti evaṃ attānaṃ dānassa akhettaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3775_4: jānāsi maññeti. Anusāsāmīti attano atthaṃ pahāya rañño atthañca dhammañca anusāsāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3776_0: Evaṃ attano aguṇaṃ kathetvā āraññikassāti isino guṇaṃ kathesi. Isinoti sīlādiguṇapariyesakassa.
atk-s0513a4:3776_1: Tapassinoti tapanissitassa. Vuḍḍhassāti paṇḍitassa guṇavuḍḍhassa. Nāvakaṅkhasīti
atk-s0513a4:3776_2: sayaṃ dullabhabhojano hutvā evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ aññassa desi, kiṃ attano jīvitaṃ na
atk-s0513a4:3776_3: kaṅkhasi. Bhikkhu kenāti ayaṃ bhikkhu katarena guṇena tayā seṭṭhataro.
atk-s0513a4:3777_0: Khaṇantālukalambānīti khaṇanto ālūni ceva tālakandāni ca. Bilālitakkalāni cāti bilālikandatakkalakandāni
atk-s0513a4:3777_1: ca. Dhunaṃ sāmākanīvāranti sāmākañca nīvārañca dhunitvā. Saṅghāriyaṃ pasāriyanti
atk-s0513a4:3777_2: ete sāmākanīvāre dhunanto saṅghāretvā puna sukkhāpite pasāretvā suppena papphoṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:3777_3: koṭṭetvā taṇḍule ādāya pacitvā bhuñjāmīti vadati. Sākanti yaṃ kiñci sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3777_4: Maṃsanti sīhabyagghavighāsādimaṃsaṃ. Tāni āharitvāti tāni sākādīni āharitvā. Amamassāti
atk-s0513a4:3777_6: Dātumarahāmīti evarūpassa paccekabuddhassa attanā laddhabhojanaṃ dātuṃ arahāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3778_0: Tuṇhīmāsīnanti kiñci avatvā nisinnaṃ. Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanādīhi rahitaṃ. Āratanti
atk-s0513a4:3778_1: virataṃ sabbapāpāni pahāya ṭhitaṃ. Kamaṇḍalunti kuṇḍikaṃ. Ete hīti ete rājādayo tayo
atk-s0513a4:3778_2: janāti hatthaṃ pasāretvā te niddisanto evamāha. Dātumarahantīti mādisassa dātuṃ arahanti.
atk-s0513a4:3778_3: Paccanīkanti paccanīkapaṭipadaṃ. Dāyakassa hi nimantanaṃ ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu aññatarāya
atk-s0513a4:3779: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā kuṭumbiko attamano dve osānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3782: Sohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3785: Isī mūlaphale giddhā, vippamuttā ca bhikkhavo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3786: Tattha rathesabhoti rājānaṃ sandhāyāha. Kiccākiccesūti rañño kiccakaraṇīyesu. Bhikkhavoti paccekabuddhā bhikkhavo pana sabbabhavehi vippamuttā.
atk-s0513a4:3787: Paccekabuddho tassa dhammaṃ desetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato, tathā tāpaso. Rājā pana katipāhaṃ tassa santike vasitvā bārāṇasimeva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3788_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva piṇḍapāto yathānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3788_1: gacchati, pubbepi gatoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kuṭumbiko dhammaratanassa
atk-s0513a4:3788_2: sakkārakārako kuṭumbiko ahosi, rājā ānando, purohito sāriputto, himavantatāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3799_0: Kuto nu āgacchasi dummavāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udenaṃ nāma vaṃsarājānaṃ
