atk-s0513a4:5548_2: dasa purato ṭhite kañcanavicitte rathe dassento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5549: Taṃ sutvā sakko devattabhāvaṃ dassetvā attānaṃ jānāpento ākāse ṭhatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5551: “Taveva dāsīsatamatthu rāja, gāmā ca gāvo ca taveva hontu;
atk-s0513a4:5552: Ājaññayuttā ca rathā taveva, sakkohamasmī tidasānamindo.
atk-s0513a4:5554: “Maṃsodanaṃ sappipāyāsaṃ bhuñja, khādassu ca tvaṃ madhumāsapūve;
atk-s0513a4:5555: Evaṃ tuvaṃ dhammarato janinda, anindito saggamupehi ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5556: Tattha evaṃ tuvaṃ dhammaratoti evaṃ tvaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto surāpānā virato tīṇi duccaritāni pahāya tividhasucaritadhammarato hutvā kenaci anindito saggaṭṭhānaṃ upehīti.
atk-s0513a4:5557_0: Iti sakko tassa ovādaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Sopi suraṃ apivitvā surābhājanāni
atk-s0513a4:5557_1: bhindāpetvā sīlaṃ samādāya dānaṃ datvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi. Jambudīpepi anukkamena
atk-s0513a4:5558: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, sakko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5562_0: Cirassaṃ vata meti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a4:5562_1: kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu sāmajātakasadisaṃ. Tadā pana satthā “porāṇakapaṇḍitā kañcanamālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5562_2: setacchattaṃ pahāya mātāpitaro posesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5563_0: Atīte kapilaraṭṭhe uttarapañcālanagare pañcālo nāma rājā ahosi. Tassa aggamahesī
atk-s0513a4:5563_1: gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi. Tassā purimabhave ekā sapattikā kujjhitvā “tuyhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5563_2: jātaṃ jātaṃ pajaṃ khādituṃ samatthā bhavissāmī”ti patthanaṃ ṭhapetvā yakkhinī ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_3: Sā tadā okāsaṃ labhitvā tassā passantiyāva taṃ allamaṃsapesivaṇṇaṃ kumārakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:5563_4: murumurāyantī khāditvā pakkāmi. Dutiyavārepi tatheva akāsi. Tatiyavāre pana tassā
atk-s0513a4:5563_5: pasūtigharaṃ paviṭṭhakāle gehaṃ parivāretvā gāḷhaṃ ārakkhaṃ akaṃsu. Vijātadivase
atk-s0513a4:5563_6: yakkhinī āgantvā puna dārakaṃ aggahesi. Devī “yakkhinī”ti mahāsaddamakāsi. Āvudhahatthā
atk-s0513a4:5563_7: purisā āgantvā deviyā dinnasaññāya yakkhiniṃ anubandhiṃsu. Sā khādituṃ okāsaṃ alabhantī
atk-s0513a4:5563_8: tato palāyitvā udakaniddhamanaṃ pāvisi. Dārako mātusaññāya tassā thanaṃ mukhena gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_9: Sā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā tato palāyitvā susānaṃ gantvā dārakaṃ pāsāṇaleṇe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:5563_10: paṭijaggi. Athassa anukkamena vaḍḍhamānassa manussamaṃsaṃ āharitvā adāsi. Ubhopi
atk-s0513a4:5563_11: manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā tattha vasiṃsu. Dārako attano manussabhāvaṃ na jānāti “yakkhiniputtosmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5563_12: saññāya. So attabhāvaṃ jahitvā antaradhāyituṃ na sakkoti. Athassa sā antaradhānatthāya
atk-s0513a4:5563_13: ekaṃ mūlaṃ adāsi. So mūlānubhāvena antaradhāyitvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0513a4:5563_14: Yakkhinī vessavaṇassa mahārājassa veyyāvaccatthāya gatā tattheva kālamakāsi. Devīpi
atk-s0513a4:5563_15: catutthavāre aññaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. So yakkhiniyā muttattā arogo ahosi. Paccāmittaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5563_16: yakkhiniṃ jinitvā jātattā “jayaddisakumāro”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto sabbasippesu
atk-s0513a4:5564_0: Tadā bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, “alīnasattukumāro”tissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5564_1: kariṃsu. So vayappatto uggahitasabbasippo uparājā ahosi. Sopi yakkhiniputto aparabhāge
atk-s0513a4:5564_2: pamādena taṃ mūlaṃ nāsetvā antaradhāyituṃ asakkonto dissamānarūpova susāne manussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5564_3: khādi. Manussā taṃ disvā bhītā āgantvā rañño upakkosiṃsu “deva eko yakkho dissamānarūpo
atk-s0513a4:5564_4: susāne manussamaṃsaṃ khādati, so anukkamena nagaraṃ pavisitvā manusse māretvā khādissati,
atk-s0513a4:5564_5: taṃ gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā “gaṇhatha na”nti āṇāpesi. Balakāyo
atk-s0513a4:5564_6: gantvā susānaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhāsi. Yakkhiniputto naggo ubbiggarūpo maraṇabhayabhīto
atk-s0513a4:5564_7: viravanto manussānaṃ antaraṃ pakkhandi. Manussā “yakkho”ti maraṇabhayabhītā dvidhā
atk-s0513a4:5564_8: bhijjiṃsu. Sopi tato palāyitvā araññaṃ pāvisi, na puna manussapathaṃ āgacchi. So
atk-s0513a4:5564_9: ekaṃ mahāvattaniaṭaviṃ nissāya maggapaṭipannesu manussesu ekekaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5564_10: pavisitvā māretvā khādanto ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:5565_0: Atheko satthavāhabrāhmaṇo aṭavipālānaṃ sahassaṃ datvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi taṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5565_1: paṭipajji. Manussayakkho viravanto pakkhandi, bhītā manussā urena nipajjiṃsu. So
atk-s0513a4:5565_2: brāhmaṇaṃ gahetvā palāyanto khāṇunā pāde viddho aṭavipālesu anubandhantesu brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5565_3: chaḍḍetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānarukkhamūle nipajji. Tassa tattha nipannassa sattame
atk-s0513a4:5565_4: divase jayaddisarājā migavadhaṃ āṇāpetvā nagarā nikkhami. Taṃ nagarā nikkhantamattameva
atk-s0513a4:5565_5: takkasilavāsī nando nāma mātuposakabrāhmaṇo catasso satārahagāthāyo ādāya āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:5565_6: rājānaṃ addasa. Rājā “nivattitvā suṇissāmī”ti tassa nivāsagehaṃ dāpetvā migavaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:5565_7: “yassa passena migo palāyati, tasseva gīvā”ti āha. Atheko pasadamigo uṭṭhahitvā rañño
atk-s0513a4:5565_8: abhimukho gantvā palāyi. Amaccā parihāsaṃ kariṃsu. Rājā khaggaṃ gahetvā taṃ anubandhitvā
atk-s0513a4:5565_9: tiyojanamatthake patvā khaggena paharitvā dve khaṇḍāni karitvā kājenādāya āgacchanto
atk-s0513a4:5565_10: manussayakkhassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ patvā dabbatiṇesu nisīditvā thokaṃ vissamitvā gantuṃ
atk-s0513a4:5565_11: ārabhi. Atha naṃ so uṭṭhāya “tiṭṭha kuhiṃ gacchasi, bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:5567: “Cirassaṃ vata me udapādi ajja, bhakkho mahā sattamibhattakāle;
atk-s0513a4:5568: Kutosi kovāsi tadiṅgha brūhi, ācikkha jātiṃ vidito yathāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5569: Tattha bhakkho mahāti mahābhakkho. Sattamibhattakāleti pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya nirāhārassa sattamiyaṃ bhattakāle. Kutosīti kuto āgatosīti.
atk-s0513a4:5570: Rājā yakkhaṃ disvā bhīto ūrutthambhaṃ patvā palāyituṃ nāsakkhi, satiṃ pana paccupaṭṭhāpetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5572: “Pañcālarājā migavaṃ paviṭṭho, jayaddiso nāma yadissuto te;
atk-s0513a4:5573: Carāmi kacchāni vanāni cāhaṃ, pasadaṃ imaṃ khāda mamajja muñcā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5574: Tattha migavaṃ paviṭṭhoti migavadhāya raṭṭhā nikkhanto. Kacchānīti pabbatapassāni. Pasadanti pasadamigaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5577: “Seneva tvaṃ paṇasi sassamāno, mamesa bhakkho pasado yaṃ vadesi;
atk-s0513a4:5578: Taṃ khādiyāna pasadaṃ jighaññaṃ, khādissaṃ pacchā na vilāpakālo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5579_0: Tattha senevāti mama santakeneva. Paṇasīti voharasi attānaṃ vikkiṇāsi. Sassamānoti
atk-s0513a4:5579_1: vihiṃsayamāno. Taṃ khādiyānāti taṃ paṭhamaṃ khāditvā. Jighaññanti ghasitukāmo. Khādissanti
atk-s0513a4:5579_2: etaṃ pacchā khādissāmi. Na vilāpakāloti mā vilapi. Nāyaṃ vilāpakāloti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5580: Taṃ sutvā rājā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ saritvā catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5582: “Na catthi mokkho mama nikkayena, gantvāna pacchāgamanāya paṇhe;
atk-s0513a4:5584_0: Tattha na catthīti na ce mayhaṃ nikkayena vimokkho atthi. Gantvānāti evaṃ sante ajja
atk-s0513a4:5584_1: imaṃ migamaṃsaṃ khāditvā mama nagaraṃ gantvā. Paṇheti pageyeva, sveva pātarāsakāle
atk-s0513a4:5584_2: paccāgamanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhāhīti adhippāyo. Taṃ saṅgaranti mayā “dhanaṃ te dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5584_3: brāhmaṇassa saṅgaro kato, taṃ tassa datvā imaṃ mayā vuttaṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5587: “Kiṃ kammajātaṃ anutappate tvaṃ, pattaṃ samīpaṃ maraṇassa rāja;
atk-s0513a4:5588: Ācikkha me taṃ api sakkuṇemu, anujānituṃ āgamanāya paṇhe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5589_0: Tattha kammameva kammajātaṃ. Anutappateti taṃ anutappati. Pattanti upagataṃ. Api
atk-s0513a4:5589_1: sakkuṇemūti api nāma taṃ tava sokakāraṇaṃ sutvā pātova āgamanāya taṃ anujānituṃ sakkuṇeyyāmāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5590: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5592: “Katā mayā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅgaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5594: Tattha paṭimukkaṃ na muttanti catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā “dhanaṃ te dassāmī”ti paṭiññāya mayā attani paṭimuñcitvā ṭhapitaṃ, na pana taṃ muttaṃ dhanassa adinnattā.
atk-s0513a4:5597: “Yā te katā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅgaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5600_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājānaṃ vissajjesi. So tena vissaṭṭho “tvaṃ mā cintayi, ahaṃ pātova
atk-s0513a4:5600_1: āgamissāmī”ti vatvā magganimittāni sallakkhento attano balakāyaṃ upagantvā balakāyaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:5600_2: nagaraṃ pavisitvā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā tā gāthā
atk-s0513a4:5600_3: sutvā cattāri sahassāni datvā yānaṃ āropetvā “imaṃ takkasilameva nethā”ti manusse
atk-s0513a4:5600_4: datvā brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā dutiyadivase paṭigantukāmo hutvā puttaṃ āmantetvā anusāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5600_5: Tamatthaṃ dīpento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5602: “Muttoca so porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0513a4:5605: “Ajjeva rajjaṃ abhisiñcayassu, dhammaṃ cara sesu paresu cāpi;
atk-s0513a4:5606: Adhammakāro ca te māhu raṭṭhe, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5607_0: Tattha alīnasattunti evaṃnāmakaṃ kumāraṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “arinasattu”nti likhitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5607_1: Ajjeva rajjanti putta rajjaṃ te dammi, tvaṃ ajjeva muddhani abhisekaṃ abhisiñcayassu.
atk-s0513a4:5610: “Kiṃ kamma krubbaṃ tava deva pāva, nārādhayī taṃ tadicchāmi sotuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5611: Yamajja rajjamhi udassaye tuvaṃ, rajjampi niccheyyaṃ, tayā vināha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5612: Tattha krubbanti karonto. Yamajjāti yena anārādhakammena ajja maṃ rajjamhi tvaṃ udassaye ussāpesi patiṭṭhāpesi, taṃ me ācikkha, ahañhi tayā vinā rajjampi na icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5615: “Na kammunā vā vacasāva tāta, aparādhitohaṃ tuviyaṃ sarāmi;
atk-s0513a4:5616: Sandhiñca katvā purisādakena, saccānurakkhī punāhaṃ gamissa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5617_0: Tattha aparādhitoti aparādhaṃ ito. Tuviyanti tava santakaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tāta,
atk-s0513a4:5617_1: ahaṃ ito tava kammato vā tava vacanato vā kiñci mama appiyaṃ aparādhaṃ na sarāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5617_2: Sandhiñca katvāti maṃ pana migavaṃ gataṃ eko yakkho “khādissāmī”ti gaṇhi. Athāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5617_3: brāhmaṇassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tassa sakkāraṃ katvā “sve tava pātarāsakāle āgamissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5617_4: tena purisādakena sandhiṃ saccaṃ katvā āgato, tasmā taṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto puna
atk-s0513a4:5617_5: tattha gamissāmi, tvaṃ rajjaṃ kārehīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5620: “Ahaṃ gamissāmi idheva hohi, natthi tato jīvato vippamokkho;
atk-s0513a4:5621: Sace tuvaṃ gacchasiyeva rāja, ahampi gacchāmi ubho na homā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5622: Tattha idhevāti tvaṃ idheva hoti. Tatoti tassa santikā jīvantassa mokkho nāma natthi. Ubhoti evaṃ sante ubhopi na bhavissāma.
atk-s0513a4:5625: “Addhā hi tāta satānesa dhammo, maraṇā ca me dukkhataraṃ tadassa;
atk-s0513a4:5626: Kammāsapādo taṃ yadā pacitvā, pasayha khāde bhidā rukkhasūle”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5627_0: Tassattho – addhā ekaṃsena esa, tāta, satānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dhammo sabhāvo, yuttaṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5627_1: vadasi, api ca kho pana mayhaṃ maraṇatopetaṃ dukkhataraṃ assa, yadā taṃ so kammāsapādo.
atk-s0513a4:5627_2: Bhidā rukkhasūleti tikhiṇarukkhasūle bhitvā pacitvā pasayha balakkārena khādeyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5630: “Pāṇena te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, mā tvaṃ agā porisādassa ñatte;
atk-s0513a4:5631: Evañca te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, tasmā mataṃ jīvitassa vaṇṇemī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5632_0: Tattha nimissanti ahaṃ idheva tava pāṇena mama pāṇaṃ parivattessaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā
atk-s0513a4:5632_1: etaṃ pāṇaṃ tava pāṇenāhaṃ nimissaṃ, tasmā tava jīvitassatthāya mama maraṇaṃ vaṇṇemi
atk-s0513a4:5633: Taṃ sutvā rājā puttassa balaṃ jānanto “sādhu tāta, gacchāhī”ti sampaṭicchi. So mātāpitaro vanditvā nagaramhā nikkhami. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5635: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, vanditvā mātu ca pitu ca pāde”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5636: Tattha pādeti pāde vanditvā nikkhantoti attho;
atk-s0513a4:5637_0: Athassa mātāpitaropi bhaginīpi bhariyāpi amaccaparijanehi saddhiṃyeva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5637_1: So nagarā nikkhamitvā pitaraṃ maggaṃ pucchitvā suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:5637_2: sesānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā acchambhito kesarasīho viya maggaṃ āruyha yakkhāvāsaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5637_3: Taṃ gacchantaṃ disvā mātā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī pathaviyaṃ pati. Pitā bāhā
atk-s0513a4:5637_4: paggayha mahantena saddena kandi. Tampi atthaṃ pakāsento satthā –
atk-s0513a4:5638: “Dukhinissa mātā nipatā pathabyā, pitāssa paggayha bhujāni kandatī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:5639: Upaḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā tassa pitarā payuttaṃ āsīsavādaṃ abhivādanavādaṃ mātarā bhaginībhariyāhi ca kataṃ saccakiriyaṃ pakāsento aparāpi catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5641: “Taṃ gacchantaṃ tāva pitā viditvā, parammukho vandati pañjalīko;
atk-s0513a4:5642: Somo ca rājā varuṇo ca rājā, pajāpatī candimā sūriyo ca;
atk-s0513a4:5643: Etehi gutto purisādakamhā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi tāta.
atk-s0513a4:5645: “Yaṃ daṇḍakirañño gatassa mātā, rāmassakāsi sotthānaṃ suguttā;
atk-s0513a4:5646: Taṃ te ahaṃ sotthānaṃ karomi, etena saccena sarantu devā;
atk-s0513a4:5649: “Āvī raho vāpi manopadosaṃ, nāhaṃ sare jātu malīnasatte;
atk-s0513a4:5650: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi bhātika.
atk-s0513a4:5652: “Yasmā ca me anadhimanosi sāmi, na cāpi me manasā appiyosi;
atk-s0513a4:5653: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5654_0: Tattha parammukhoti ayaṃ me putto parammukho mātāpitaro vanditvā gacchati, iti etaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5654_1: parammukhaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā viditvā. Pañjalīkoti tasmiṃ kāle sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:5654_2: vandati devatā namassati. Purisādakamhāti purisādassa santikā tena anuññāto sotthinā paccehi.
atk-s0513a4:5655_0: Rāmassakāsīti rāmassa akāsi. Eko kira bārāṇasivāsī rāmo nāma mātuposako mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a4:5655_1: paṭijagganto vohāratthāya gato daṇḍakirañño vijite kumbhavatīnagaraṃ gantvā navavidhena
atk-s0513a4:5655_2: vassena sakalaraṭṭhe vināsiyamāne mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ sari. Atha naṃ mātupaṭṭhānakammassa
atk-s0513a4:5655_3: phalena devatā sotthinā ānayitvā mātu adaṃsu. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutavasenāharitvā evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5655_4: Sotthānanti sotthibhāvaṃ. Taṃ pana kiñcāpi devatā kariṃsu, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:5655_5: nibbattattā pana mātā akāsīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ te ahanti ahampi te tameva sotthānaṃ karomi,
atk-s0513a4:5655_6: maṃ nissāya tatheva tava sotthibhāvo hotūti attho. Atha vā karomīti icchāmi. Etena
atk-s0513a4:5655_7: saccenāti sace devatāhi tassa sotthinā ānītabhāvo sacco, etena saccena mamapi puttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5655_8: sarantu devā, rāmaṃ viya tampi āharitvā mama dassantūti attho. Anuññātoti porisādena
atk-s0513a4:5655_9: “gacchā”ti anuññāto devatānaṃ ānubhāvena sotthi paṭiāgaccha puttāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5656_0: Jātu malīnasatteti jātu ekaṃsena alīnasatte mama bhātike ahaṃ sammukhā vā parammukhā
atk-s0513a4:5656_1: vā manopadosaṃ na sarāmi, na mayā tamhi manopadoso katapubboti evamassa kaniṭṭhā
atk-s0513a4:5656_2: saccamakāsi. Yasmā ca me anadhimanosi, sāmīti mama, sāmi alīnasattu yasmā tvaṃ anadhimanosi,
atk-s0513a4:5656_3: maṃ abhibhavitvā atikkamitvā aññaṃ manena na patthesi. Na cāpi me manasā appiyosīti
atk-s0513a4:5656_4: mayhampi ca manasā tvaṃ appiyo na hosi, aññamaññaṃ piyasaṃvāsāva mayanti evamassa
atk-s0513a4:5657_0: Kumāropi pitarā akkhātanayena rakkhāvāsamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Yakkhopi “khattiyā nāma
atk-s0513a4:5657_1: bahumāyā honti, ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī”ti rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā rañño āgamanaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a4:5657_2: nisīdi. So kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “pitaraṃ nivattetvā putto āgato bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:5657_3: natthi me bhaya”nti otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ dassento nisīdi. So āgantvā tassa purato
atk-s0513a4:5659: “Brahā ujū cārumukho kutosi, na maṃ pajānāsi vane vasantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5661: Tattha ko sotthimājānamidhāvajeyyāti kumāra ko nāma puriso attano sotthibhāvaṃ jānanto icchanto idhāgaccheyya, tvaṃ ajānanto āgato maññeti.
atk-s0513a4:5664: “Jānāmi ludda purisādako tvaṃ, na taṃ na jānāmi vane vasantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5665: Ahañca puttosmi jayaddisassa, mamajja khāda pituno pamokkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5666: Tattha pamokkhāti pamokkhahetu ahaṃ pitu jīvitaṃ datvā idhāgato, tasmā taṃ muñca, maṃ khādāhīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5669: “Jānāmi puttoti jayaddisassa, tathā hi vo mukhavaṇṇo ubhinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5670: Sudukkaraññeva kataṃ tavedaṃ, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5671: Tattha tathā hi voti tādiso vo tumhākaṃ. Ubhinnampi sadisova mukhavaṇṇo hotīti attho. Kataṃ tavedanti idaṃ tava kammaṃ sudukkaraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5674: “Na dukkaraṃ kiñci mahettha maññe, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā;
atk-s0513a4:5675: Mātu ca hetu paraloka gantvā, sukhena saggena ca sampayutto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5676_0: Tattha kiñci mahettha maññeti kiñci ahaṃ ettha na maññāmi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yakkha
atk-s0513a4:5676_1: yo puggalo pitu vā pamokkhatthāya mātu vā hetu paralokaṃ gantvā sukhena sagge nibbattanakasukhena
atk-s0513a4:5676_2: sampayutto bhavituṃ mattumicche marituṃ icchati, tasmā ahaṃ ettha mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0513a4:5677: Taṃ sutvā yakkho “kumāra, maraṇassa abhayānakasatto nāma natthi, tvaṃ kasmā na bhāyasī”ti pucchi. So tassa kathento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5679: “Ahañca kho attano pāpakiriyaṃ, āvī raho vāpi sare na jātu;
atk-s0513a4:5680: Saṅkhātajātīmaraṇohamasmi, yatheva me idha tathā parattha.
atk-s0513a4:5682: “Khādajja maṃ dāni mahānubhāva, karassu kiccāni imaṃ sarīraṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5683: Rukkhassa vā te papatāmi aggā, chādayamāno mayhaṃ tvamadesi maṃsa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5684_0: Tattha sare na jātūti ekaṃseneva na sarāmi. Saṅkhātajātīmaraṇohamasmīti ahaṃ ñāṇena
atk-s0513a4:5684_1: suparicchinnajātimaraṇo, jātasatto amaraṇadhammo nāma natthīti jānāmi. Yatheva me
atk-s0513a4:5684_2: idhāti yatheva mama idha, tathā paraloke, yathā ca paraloke, tathā idhāpi maraṇato
atk-s0513a4:5684_3: mutti nāma natthīti idampi mama ñāṇena suparicchinnaṃ. Karassu kiccānīti iminā sarīrena
atk-s0513a4:5684_4: kattabbakiccāni kara, imaṃ te mayā nissaṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ. Chādayamāno mayhaṃ tvamadesi
atk-s0513a4:5684_5: maṃsanti mayi rukkhaggā patitvā mate mama sarīrato tvaṃ chādayamāno rocayamāno yaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5684_6: yaṃ icchasi, taṃ taṃ maṃsaṃ adesi, khādeyyāsīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5685: Yakkho tassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhīto hutvā “na sakkā imassa maṃsaṃ khādituṃ, upāyena naṃ palāpessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5687: “Idañca te ruccati rājaputta, cajesi pāṇaṃ pituno pamokkhā;
atk-s0513a4:5688: Tasmā hi so tvaṃ taramānarūpo, sambhañja kaṭṭhāni jalehi aggi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5689: Tattha jalehīti araññaṃ pavisitvā sāradārūni āharitvā aggiṃ jāletvā niddhūme aṅgāre kara, tattha te maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:5690: So tathā katvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakāsento satthā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5692: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, dāruṃ samāharitvā mahantamaggiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5694_0: Yakkho aggiṃ katvā āgataṃ kumāraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ purisasīho, maraṇāpissa bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5694_1: mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ nibbhayo nāma na diṭṭhapubbo”ti lomahaṃsajāto kumāraṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5694_2: olokento nisīdi. Kumāro tassa kiriyaṃ disvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5696: “Khādajja maṃ dāni pasayhakāri, kiṃ maṃ muhuṃ pekkhasi haṭṭhalomo;
atk-s0513a4:5697: Tathā tathā tuyhamahaṃ karomi, yathā yathā maṃ chādayamāno adesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5698_0: Tattha muhunti punappunaṃ. Tathā tathā tuyhamahanti ahaṃ tuyhaṃ tathā tathā vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5698_1: karomi, idāni kiṃ karissāmi, yathā yathā maṃ chādayamāno rocayamāno adesi khādissasi,
atk-s0513a4:5701: “Ko tādisaṃ arahati khāditāye, dhamme ṭhitaṃ saccavādiṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5702: Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5703_0: Taṃ sutvā kumāro “sace maṃ na khāditukāmosi, atha kasmā dārūni bhañjāpetvā aggiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5703_1: kāresī”ti vatvā “palāyissati nu kho, noti tava pariggaṇhanatthāyā”ti vutte “tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5703_2: idāni maṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhissasi, yohaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto sakkassa devarañño
atk-s0513a4:5705: “Idañhi so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre;
atk-s0513a4:5706: Teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthuto kāmaduhajja yakkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5707_0: Tassattho – idañhi so sasapaṇḍito “brāhmaṇo eso”ti brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno “ajja imaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5707_1: sarīraṃ khāditvā idheva vasā”ti evaṃ sake sarīre attano sarīraṃ dātuṃ avāsesi, vasāpesīti
atk-s0513a4:5707_2: attho. Sarīrañcassa bhakkhatthāya adāsi. Sakko pabbatarasaṃ pīḷetvā ādāya candamaṇḍale
atk-s0513a4:5707_3: sasalakkhaṇaṃ akāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya teneva sasalakkhaṇena so candimā devaputto “sasī
atk-s0513a4:5707_4: sasī”ti evaṃ sasatthuto lokassa kāmaduho pemavaḍḍhano ajja yakkha virocati. Kappaṭṭhiyañhetaṃ pāṭihāriyanti.
atk-s0513a4:5708: Taṃ sutvā yakkho kumāraṃ vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5710: “Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā;
atk-s0513a4:5711: Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kappile mahānubhāva;
atk-s0513a4:5712: Āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5713_0: Tattha bhāṇumāti sūriyo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā pannarase rāhumukhā mutto cando
atk-s0513a4:5713_1: vā bhāṇumā vā virocati, evaṃ tvampi mama santikā mutto kapilaraṭṭhe viroca mahānubhāvāti. Nandatūti tussatu.
atk-s0513a4:5714_0: Gaccha mahāvīrāti mahāsattaṃ uyyojesi. Sopi taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañca sīlāni datvā
atk-s0513a4:5714_1: “yakkho nu kho esa, no”ti pariggaṇhanto “yakkhānaṃ akkhīni rattāni honti animmisāni
atk-s0513a4:5714_2: ca, chāyā na paññāyati, acchambhitā honti. Nāyaṃ yakkho, manusso eso. Mayhaṃ pitu
atk-s0513a4:5714_3: kira tayo bhātaro yakkhiniyā gahitā. Tesu etāya dve khāditā bhavissanti, eko puttasinehena
atk-s0513a4:5714_4: paṭijaggito bhavissati, iminā tena bhavitabbaṃ, imaṃ netvā mayhaṃ pitu ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a4:5714_5: rajje patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “ehi ambho, na tvaṃ yakkho, pitu me jeṭṭhabhātikosi,
atk-s0513a4:5714_6: ehi mayā saddhiṃ gantvā kulasantake rajje chattaṃ ussāpehī”ti vatvā itarena “nāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5714_7: manusso”ti vutte “na tvaṃ mayhaṃ saddahasi, atthi pana so, yassa saddahasī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a4:5714_8: “atthi asukaṭṭhāne dibbacakkhukatāpaso”ti vutte taṃ ādāya tattha agamāsi. Tāpaso
atk-s0513a4:5714_9: te disvāva “kiṃ karontā pitāputtā araññe carathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ ñātibhāvaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5714_10: Porisādo tassa saddahitvā “tāta, tvaṃ gaccha, ahaṃ ekasmiññeva attabhāve dvidhā jāto,
atk-s0513a4:5714_11: na me rajjenattho, pabbajissāmaha”nti tāpasassa santike isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Atha
atk-s0513a4:5714_12: naṃ kumāro vanditvā nagaraṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā –
atk-s0513a4:5716: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, katañjalī pariyāya porisādaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5717: Anuññāto sotthi sukhī arogo, paccāgamā kapilamalīnasattā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:5718: Gāthaṃ vatvā tassa nagaraṃ gatassa negamādīhi katakiriyaṃ dassento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5720: “Taṃ negamā jānapadā ca sabbe, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
atk-s0513a4:5721: Namassamānā pañjalikā upāgamuṃ, namatthu te dukkarakārakosī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5722_0: Rājā “kumāro kira āgato”ti sutvā paccuggamanaṃ akāsi. Kumāro mahājanaparivāro gantvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_1: rājānaṃ vandi. Atha naṃ so pucchi – “tāta, kathaṃ tādisā porisādā muttosī”ti. “Tāta,
atk-s0513a4:5722_2: nāyaṃ yakkho, tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko, esa mayhaṃ petteyyo”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_3: “tumhehi mama petteyyaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Rājā taṅkhaṇaññeva bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_4: mahantena parivārena tāpasānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Mahātāpaso tassa yakkhiniyā ānetvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_5: akhāditvā positakāraṇañca yakkhābhāvakāraṇañca tesaṃ ñātibhāvañca sabbaṃ vitthārato
atk-s0513a4:5722_6: kathesi. Rājā “ehi, bhātika, rajjaṃ kārehī”ti āha. “Alaṃ mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi etha
atk-s0513a4:5722_7: uyyāne vasissatha, ahaṃ vo catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti? “Na āgacchāmi mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5722_8: Rājā tesaṃ assamapadato avidūre ekaṃ pabbatantaraṃ bandhitvā mahantaṃ taḷākaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_9: kedāre sampādetvā mahaḍḍhakulasahassaṃ ānetvā mahāgāmaṃ nivāsetvā tāpasānaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:5722_10: paṭṭhapesi. So gāmo cūḷakammāsadammanigamo nāma jāto. Sutasomamahāsattena porisādassa
atk-s0513a4:5723_0: Satthā idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a4:5723_1: mātuposakatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5723_2: tāpaso sāriputto, porisādo aṅgulimālo, kaniṭṭhā uppalavaṇṇā, aggamahesī rāhulamātā,
atk-s0513a4:5727_0: Kiṃ nu socasīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5727_1: Sā kira sāvatthiyaṃ kuladhītā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_2: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ dhammasavanāya gantvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa
atk-s0513a4:5727_4: oloketvā “pariciṇṇapubbā nu kho me bhavasmiṃ vicarantiyā imassa mahāpurisassa pādaparicārikā”ti
atk-s0513a4:5727_5: cintesi. Athassā taṅkhaṇaññeva jātissarañāṇaṃ uppajji – “chaddantavāraṇakāle ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_6: imassa mahāpurisassa pādaparicārikā bhūtapubbā”ti. Athassā sarantiyā mahantaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_7: uppajji. Sā pītivegena mahāhasitaṃ hasitvā puna cintesi – “pādaparicārikā nāma sāmikānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_8: hitajjhāsayā appakā, ahitajjhāsayāva bahutarā, hitajjhāsayā nu kho ahaṃ imassa mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a4:5727_9: ahosiṃ, ahitajjhāsayā”ti. Sā anussaramānā “ahaṃ appamattakaṃ dosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:5727_10: vīsaratanasatikaṃ chaddantamahāgajissaraṃ sonuttaraṃ nāma nesādaṃ pesetvā visapītasallena
atk-s0513a4:5727_11: vijjhāpetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi”nti addasa. Athassā soko udapādi, hadayaṃ uṇhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_12: ahosi, sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī assasitvā passasitvā mahāsaddena parodi. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:5727_13: satthā sitaṃ pātu karitvā “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti
atk-s0513a4:5727_14: bhikkhusaṅghena puṭṭho “bhikkhave, ayaṃ daharabhikkhunī pubbe mayi kataṃ aparādhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5728_0: Atīte himavantapadese chaddantadahaṃ upanissāya aṭṭhasahassā hatthināgā vasiṃsu iddhimantā
atk-s0513a4:5728_1: vehāsaṅgamā. Tadā bodhisatto jeṭṭhakavāraṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, so sabbaseto
atk-s0513a4:5728_2: ahosi rattamukhapādo. So aparabhāge vuddhippatto aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedho ahosi vīsaratanasatāyāmo.
atk-s0513a4:5728_3: Aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthāya rajatadāmasadisāya soṇḍāya samannāgato. Dantā panassa parikkhepato
atk-s0513a4:5728_4: pannarasahatthā ahesuṃ dīghato tiṃsahatthā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samannāgatā. So aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5728_5: nāgasahassānaṃ jeṭṭhako ahosi, pañcasate paccekabuddhe pūjesi. Tassa dve aggamahesiyo
atk-s0513a4:5728_6: ahesuṃ – cūḷasubhaddā, mahāsubhaddā cāti. Nāgarājā aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivāro kañcanaguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5728_7: vasati. So pana chaddantadaho āyāmato ca vitthārato ca paṇṇāsayojano hoti. Tassa
atk-s0513a4:5728_8: majjhe dvādasayojanappamāṇe ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi, maṇikkhandhavaṇṇaudakameva
atk-s0513a4:5728_9: santiṭṭhati, tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthataṃ suddhaṃ kallahāravanaṃ, taṃ udakaṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:5728_10: ṭhitaṃ, tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthatameva suddhaṃ nīluppalavanaṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:5728_12: purimaṃ purimaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitāni. Imesaṃ pana sattannaṃ vanānaṃ anantaraṃ sabbesampi
atk-s0513a4:5728_13: tesaṃ kallahārādivanānaṃ vasena omissakavanaṃ yojanavitthatameva tāni parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:5728_14: ṭhitaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake yojanavitthatameva rattasālivanaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5728_16: khuddakagacchavanaṃ, iti imāni dasa vanāni yojanavitthatāneva. Tato khuddakarājamāsamahārājamāsamuggavanaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5728_18: tato hatthidantappamāṇaphalaṃ kadalivanaṃ, tato sālavanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ cāṭippamāṇaphalaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5728_19: panasavanaṃ, tato madhuraphalaṃ ciñcavanaṃ, tato ambavanaṃ, tato kapiṭṭhavanaṃ, tato
atk-s0513a4:5728_20: omissako mahāvanasaṇḍo, tato veḷuvanaṃ, ayamassa tasmiṃ kāle sampatti. Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5729_0: Veḷuvanaṃ pana parikkhipitvā satta pabbatā ṭhitā. Tesaṃ bāhirantato paṭṭhāya paṭhamo
atk-s0513a4:5729_1: cūḷakāḷapabbato nāma, dutiyo mahākāḷapabbato nāma, tato udakapabbato nāma, tato candimapassapabbato
atk-s0513a4:5729_2: nāma, tato sūriyapassapabbato nāma, tato maṇipassapabbato nāma, sattamo suvaṇṇapassapabbato
atk-s0513a4:5729_3: nāma. So ubbedhato sattayojaniko chaddantadahaṃ parikkhipitvā pattassa mukhavaṭṭi
atk-s0513a4:5729_4: viya ṭhito. Tassa abbhantarimaṃ passaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ, tato nikkhantena obhāsena chaddantadaho
atk-s0513a4:5729_5: samuggatabālasūriyo viya hoti. Bāhirapabbatesu pana eko ubbedhato chayojaniko, eko
atk-s0513a4:5729_6: pañca, eko cattāri, eko tīṇi, eko dve, eko yojaniko, evaṃ sattapabbataparikkhittassa
atk-s0513a4:5729_7: pana tassa dahassa pubbuttarakaṇṇe udakavātappaharaṇokāse mahānigrodharukkho atthi.
atk-s0513a4:5729_8: Tassa khandho parikkhepato pañcayojaniko, ubbedhato sattayojaniko, catūsu disāsu
atk-s0513a4:5729_9: catasso sākhā chayojanikā, uddhaṃ uggatasākhāpi chayojanikāva, iti so mūlato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:5729_10: ubbedhena terasayojaniko, sākhānaṃ orimantato yāva pārimantā dvādasayojaniko, aṭṭhahi
atk-s0513a4:5729_11: pārohasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito muṇḍamaṇipabbato viya vilāsamāno tiṭṭhati. Chaddantadahassa
atk-s0513a4:5729_12: pana pacchimadisābhāge suvaṇṇapassapabbate dvādasayojanikā kañcanaguhā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a4:5729_13: Chaddanto nāma nāgarājā vassāratte hemante aṭṭhasahassanāgaparivuto kañcanaguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5729_14: vasati. Gimhakāle udakavātaṃ sampaṭicchamāno mahānigrodhamūle pārohantare tiṭṭhatī.
atk-s0513a4:5730_0: Athassa ekadivasaṃ “mahāsālavanaṃ pupphita”nti taruṇanāgā āgantvā ārocayiṃsu. So
atk-s0513a4:5730_1: saparivāro “sālakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti sālavanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ supupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5730_2: kumbhena pahari. Tadā cūḷasubhaddā paṭivātapasse ṭhitā, tassā sarīre sukkhadaṇḍakamissakāni
atk-s0513a4:5730_3: purāṇapaṇṇāni ceva tambakipillikāni ca patiṃsu. Mahāsubhaddā adhovātapasse ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a4:5730_4: tassā sarīre pupphareṇukiñjakkhapattāni patiṃsu. Cūḷasubhaddā “ayaṃ nāgarājā attano
atk-s0513a4:5730_5: piyabhariyāya upari pupphareṇukiñjakkhapattāni pātesi, mama sarīre sukkhadaṇḍakamissāni
atk-s0513a4:5730_6: purāṇapaṇṇāni ceva tambakipillikāni ca pātesi, hotu, kātabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti mahāsatte veraṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a4:5731_0: Aparampi divasaṃ nāgarājā saparivāro nhānatthāya chaddantadahaṃ otari. Atha dve taruṇanāgā
atk-s0513a4:5731_1: soṇḍāhi usirakalāpe gahetvā kelāsakūṭaṃ majjantā viya nhāpesuṃ. Tasmiṃ nhatvā uttiṇṇe
atk-s0513a4:5731_2: dve kareṇuyo nhāpesuṃ. Tāpi uttaritvā mahāsattassa santike aṭṭhaṃsu. Tato aṭṭhasahassanāgāsaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:5731_3: otaritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā sarato nānāpupphāni āharitvā rajatathūpaṃ alaṅkarontā
atk-s0513a4:5731_4: viya mahāsattaṃ alaṅkaritvā pacchā dve kareṇuyo alaṅkariṃsu. Atheko hatthī sare vicaranto
atk-s0513a4:5731_5: sattuddayaṃ nāma mahāpadumaṃ labhitvā āharitvā mahāsattassa adāsi. So taṃ soṇḍāya
atk-s0513a4:5731_6: gahetvā reṇuṃ kumbhe okiritvā jeṭṭhakāya mahāsubhaddāya adāsi. Taṃ disvā itarā “idampi
atk-s0513a4:5731_7: sattuddayaṃ mahāpadumaṃ attano piyabhariyāya eva adāsi, na mayha”nti punapi tasmiṃ veraṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a4:5732_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatte madhuraphalāni ceva bhisamuḷālāni ca pokkharamadhunā yojetvā
atk-s0513a4:5732_1: pañcasate paccekabuddhe bhojente cūḷasubhaddā attanā laddhaphalāphalaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5732_2: datvā “bhante, ito cavitvā maddarājakule nibbattitvā subhaddā nāma rājakaññā hutvā
atk-s0513a4:5732_3: vayappattā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesibhāvaṃ patvā tassa piyā manāpā taṃ attano ruciṃ
atk-s0513a4:5732_4: kāretuṃ samatthā hutvā tassa ācikkhitvā ekaṃ luddakaṃ pesetvā imaṃ hatthiṃ visapītena
atk-s0513a4:5732_5: sallena vijjhāpetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiṃ vissajjente yamakadante
atk-s0513a4:5732_6: āharāpetuṃ samatthā homī”ti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi. Sā tato paṭṭhāya gocaraṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0513a4:5732_7: sussitvā nacirasseva kālaṃ katvā maddaraṭṭhe rājaaggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5732_8: subhaddātissā nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Atha naṃ vayappattaṃ bārāṇasirañño adaṃsu. Sā tassa
atk-s0513a4:5732_9: piyā ahosi manāpā, soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikā hutvā jātissarañāṇañca paṭilabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5732_10: Sā cintesi – “samiddhā me patthanā, idāni tassa nāgassa yamakadante āharāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5732_11: Tato sarīraṃ telena makkhetvā kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gilānākāraṃ dassetvā sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5732_12: pavisitvā mañcake nipajji. Rājā “kuhiṃ subhaddā”ti vatvā “gilānā”ti sutvā sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5732_13: pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5736: Tattha anuccaṅgīti kañcanasannibhasarīre. Mālāva parimadditāti hatthehi parimadditā padumamālā viya.
atk-s0513a4:5740: Na so sulabharūpova, yādiso mama dohaḷo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5741: Tattha na soti yādiso mama supinantenupajjhagā supine passantiyā mayā diṭṭho dohaḷo, so sulabharūpo viya na hoti, dullabho so, mayhaṃ pana taṃ alabhantiyā jīvitaṃ natthīti avaca.
atk-s0513a4:5744: “Ye keci mānusā kāmā, idha lokamhi nandane;
atk-s0513a4:5745: Sabbe te pacurā mayhaṃ, ahaṃ te dammi dohaḷa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5747_0: Taṃ sutvā devī, “mahārāja, dullabho mama dohaḷo, na taṃ idāni kathemi, yāvattakā
atk-s0513a4:5747_1: pana te vijite luddā, te sabbe sannipātetha, tesaṃ majjhe kathessāmī”ti dīpentī anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5749: “Luddā deva samāyantu, ye keci vijite tava;
atk-s0513a4:5751_0: Rājā “sādhū”ti sirigabbhā nikkhamitvā “yāvatikā tiyojanasatike kāsikaraṭṭhe luddā,
atk-s0513a4:5751_1: tesaṃ sannipātatthāya bheriṃ carāpethā”ti amacce āṇāpesi. Te tathā akaṃsu. Nacirasseva
atk-s0513a4:5751_2: kāsiraṭṭhavāsino luddā yathābalaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgantvā āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5751_3: Te sabbepi saṭṭhisahassamattā ahesuṃ. Rājā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātapāne ṭhito
atk-s0513a4:5751_4: hatthaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ deviyā kathento āha –
atk-s0513a4:5754: Vanaññū ca migaññū ca, mamatthe cattajīvitā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5755_0: Tattha ime teti ye tvaṃ sannipātāpesi, ime te. Katahatthāti vijjhanachedanesu katahatthā
atk-s0513a4:5755_1: kusalā susikkhitā. Visāradāti nibbhayā. Vanaññū ca migaññū cāti vanāni ca mige ca
atk-s0513a4:5755_2: jānanti. Mamattheti sabbepi cete mamatthe cattajīvitā, yamahaṃ icchāmi, taṃ karontīti.
atk-s0513a4:5756: Taṃ sutvā devī te āmantetvā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5759: Chabbisāṇaṃ gajaṃ setaṃ, addasaṃ supine ahaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5760: Tassa dantehi me attho, alābhe natthi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5764: “Na no pitūnaṃ na pitāmahānaṃ, diṭṭho suto kuñjaro chabbisāṇo;
atk-s0513a4:5765: Yamaddasā supine rājaputtī, akkhāhi no yādiso hatthināgo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5766_0: Tattha pitūnanti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – devi neva amhākaṃ pitūhi,
atk-s0513a4:5766_1: na pitāmahehi evarūpo kuñjaro diṭṭhapubbo, pageva amhehi, tasmā attanā diṭṭhalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0513a4:5766_2: akkhāhi no, yādiso tayā diṭṭho hatthināgoti.
atk-s0513a4:5769: “Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo;
atk-s0513a4:5770: Katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā, yamaddasā supine chabbisāṇa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5771: Tattha disāti disāsu. Katamanti etāsu disāsu katamāya disāyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5772_0: Evaṃ vutte subhaddā sabbe ludde oloketvā tesaṃ antare patthaṭapādaṃ bhattapuṭasadisajaṅghaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5772_2: bībhacchaṃ sabbesaṃ matthakamatthakena paññāyamānaṃ mahāsattassa pubbaveriṃ sonuttaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:5772_3: nāma nesādaṃ disvā “esa mama vacanaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:5772_4: ādāya sattabhūmikapāsādassa uparimatalaṃ āruyha uttarasīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā uttarahimavantābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5774: “Ito ujuṃ uttariyaṃ disāyaṃ, atikkamma so satta girī brahmante;
atk-s0513a4:5775: Suvaṇṇapasso nāma girī uḷāro, supupphito kimpurisānuciṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:5783: “Tiṭṭhanti te tumūlaṃ passasantā, kuppanti vātassapi eritassa;
atk-s0513a4:5784: Manussabhūtaṃ pana tattha disvā, bhasmaṃ kareyyuṃ nāssa rajopi tassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5785_0: Tattha itoti imamhā ṭhānā. Uttariyanti uttarāya. Uḷāroti mahā itarehi chahi pabbatehi
atk-s0513a4:5785_1: uccataro. Olokayāti ālokeyyāsi. Tatthacchatīti tasmiṃ nigrodhamūle gimhasamaye udakavātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5785_2: sampaṭicchanto tiṭṭhati. Duppasahoti aññe taṃ upagantvā pasayhakāraṃ kātuṃ samatthā
atk-s0513a4:5785_3: nāma natthīti duppasaho parebhi. Īsādantāti rathīsāya samānadantā. Vātajavappahārinoti
atk-s0513a4:5785_4: vātajavena gantvā paccāmitte paharaṇasīlā evarūpā aṭṭhasahassanāgā nāgarājānaṃ rakkhanti.
atk-s0513a4:5785_5: Tumūlanti bhiṃsanakaṃ mahāsaddānubandhaṃ assāsaṃ muñcantā tiṭṭhanti. Eritassāti vātapaharitassa
atk-s0513a4:5785_6: yaṃ saddānubandhaṃ eritaṃ calanaṃ kampanaṃ, tassapi kuppanti, evaṃpharusā te nāgā.
atk-s0513a4:5785_7: Nāssāti tassa nāsavātena viddhaṃsetvā bhasmaṃ katassa tassa rajopi na bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5788: “Bahū hime rājakulamhi santi, piḷandhanā jātarūpassa devi;
atk-s0513a4:5789: Muttā maṇī veḷuriyāmayā ca, kiṃ kāhasi dantapiḷandhanena;
atk-s0513a4:5790: Māretukāmā kuñjaraṃ chabbisāṇaṃ, udāhu ghātessasi luddaputte”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5791: Tattha piḷandhanāti ābharaṇāni. Veḷuriyāmayāti veḷuriyamayāni. Ghātessasīti udāhu piḷandhanāpadesena luddaputte ghātāpetukāmāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:5794: “Sā issitā dukkhitā casmi ludda, uddhañca sussāmi anussarantī;
atk-s0513a4:5795: Karohi me luddaka etamatthaṃ, dassāmi te gāmavarāni pañcā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5796_0: Tattha sāti sā ahaṃ. Anussarantīti tena vāraṇena pure mayi kataṃ veraṃ anussaramānā.
atk-s0513a4:5796_1: Dassāmi teti etasmiṃ te atthe nipphādite saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake pañca gāmavare dadāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5797_0: Evañca pana vatvā “samma luddaputta ahaṃ ‘etaṃ chaddantahatthiṃ mārāpetvā yamakadante
atk-s0513a4:5797_1: āharāpetuṃ samatthā homī’ti pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ dānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5797_2: mayā supinantena diṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sā pana mayā patthitapatthanā samijjhissati,
atk-s0513a4:5797_3: tvaṃ gacchanto mā bhāyī”ti taṃ samassāsetvā pesesi. So “sādhu, ayye”ti tassā vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5797_4: sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi me pākaṭaṃ katvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī”ti pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5799: “Katthacchatī kattha mupeti ṭhānaṃ, vīthissa kā nhānagatassa hoti;
atk-s0513a4:5800: Kathañhi so nhāyati nāgarājā, kathaṃ vijānemu gatiṃ gajassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5801_0: Tattha katthacchatīti kattha vasati. Kattha mupetīti kattha upeti, kattha tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0513a4:5801_1: attho. Vīthissa kāti tassa nhānagatassa kā vīthi hoti, kataramaggena so gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:5801_2: Kathaṃ vijānemu gatinti tayā akathite mayaṃ kathaṃ tassa nāgarājassa gatiṃ vijānissāma,
atk-s0513a4:5802: Tato sā jātissarañāṇena paccakkhato diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ tassa ācikkhantī dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5804: “Tattheva sā pokkharaṇī adūre, rammā sutitthā ca mahodikā ca;
atk-s0513a4:5805: Sampupphitā bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇā, ettha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
atk-s0513a4:5808: Āmodamāno gacchati sanniketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhadda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5809_0: Tattha tatthevāti tassa vasanaṭṭhāneyeva. Pokkharaṇīti chaddantadahaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0513a4:5809_1: Sampupphitāti duvidhehi kumudehi tividhehi uppalehi pañcavaṇṇehi ca padumehi samantato
atk-s0513a4:5809_2: pupphitā. Ettha hi soti so nāgarājā ettha chaddantadahe nhāyati. Uppalamālabhārīti
atk-s0513a4:5809_3: uppalādīnaṃ jalajathalajānaṃ pupphānaṃ mālaṃ dhārento. Puṇḍarīkattacaṅgīti puṇḍarīkasadisatacena
atk-s0513a4:5809_4: odātena aṅgena samannāgato. Āmodamānoti āmoditapamodito. Sanniketanti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5809_5: Purakkhatvāti sabbabhaddaṃ nāma mahesiṃ purato katvā aṭṭhahi nāgasahassehi parivuto
atk-s0513a4:5810_0: Taṃ sutvā sonuttaro “sādhu ayye, ahaṃ taṃ vāraṇaṃ māretvā tassa dante āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5810_1: sampaṭicchi. Athassa sā tuṭṭhā sahassaṃ datvā “gehaṃ tāva gaccha, ito sattāhaccayena
atk-s0513a4:5810_2: tattha gamissasī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā kammāre pakkosāpetvā “tātā amhākaṃ vāsipharasu-kuddāla-nikhādana-muṭṭhikaveḷugumbacchedana-sattha-tiṇalāyana-asilohadaṇḍakakacakhāṇuka-
atk-s0513a4:5810_3: ayasiṅghāṭakehi attho, sabbaṃ sīghaṃ katvā āharathā”ti āṇāpetvā cammakāre pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:5810_5: no attho, sabbaṃ sīghaṃ katvā āharathā”ti āṇāpesi. Te ubhopi sabbāni tāni sīghaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5810_6: katvā āharitvā adaṃsu. Sā tassa pātheyyaṃ saṃvidahitvā araṇisahitaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5810_7: upakaraṇañca baddhasattumādiṃ katvā pātheyyañca cammabhastāyaṃ pakkhipi, taṃ sabbampi
atk-s0513a4:5811_0: Sonuttaropi attano parivacchaṃ katvā sattame divase āgantvā deviṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5811_1: Atha naṃ sā “niṭṭhitaṃ te samma sabbūpakaraṇaṃ, imaṃ tāva pasibbakaṃ gaṇhā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5811_2: So pana mahāthāmo pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti, tasmā tambūlapasibbakaṃ viya
atk-s0513a4:5811_3: ukkhipitvā upakacchantare ṭhapetvā rittahattho viya aṭṭhāsi. Subhaddā luddassa puttadārānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_4: paribbayaṃ datvā rañño ācikkhitvā sonuttaraṃ uyyojesi. Sopi rājānañca deviñca vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_5: rājanivesanā oruyha rathe ṭhatvā mahantena parivārena nagarā nikkhamitvā gāmanigamajanapadaparamparāya
atk-s0513a4:5811_6: paccantaṃ patvā jānapade nivattetvā paccantavāsīhi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā manussapathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_7: atikkamma paccantavāsinopi nivattetvā ekakova gacchanto tiṃsayojanaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_8: dabbagahanaṃ kāsagahanaṃ tiṇagahanaṃ tulasigahanaṃ saragahanaṃ tirivacchagahananti
atk-s0513a4:5811_9: cha gahanāni, kaṇṭakaveḷugumbagahanāni vettagahanaṃ omissakagahanaṃ naḷagahanaṃ saragahanasadisaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_10: uragenapi dubbinivijjhaṃ ghanavanagahanaṃ rukkhagahanaṃ veḷugahanaṃ aparampi veḷugumbagahanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_11: kalalagahanaṃ udakagahanaṃ pabbatagahananti aṭṭhārasa gahanāni paṭipāṭiyā patvā dabbagahanādīni
atk-s0513a4:5811_12: asitena lāyitvā tulasigahanādīni veḷugumbacchedanasatthena chinditvā rukkhe pharasunā
atk-s0513a4:5811_13: koṭṭetvā atimahante rukkhe nikhādanena vijjhitvā maggaṃ karonto veḷuvane nisseṇiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_14: katvā veḷugumbaṃ āruyha veḷuṃ chinditvā aparassa veḷugumbassa upari pātetvā veḷugumbamatthakena
atk-s0513a4:5811_15: gantvā kalalagahane sukkharukkhapadaraṃ attharitvā tena gantvā aparaṃ attharitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_16: itaraṃ ukkhipitvā puna purato attharanto taṃ atikkamitvā udakagahane doṇiṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_17: tāya udakagahanaṃ taritvā pabbatapāde ṭhatvā ayasiṅghāṭakaṃ yottena bandhitvā uddhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_18: khipitvā pabbate laggāpetvā yottenāruyha vajiraggena lohadaṇḍena pabbataṃ vijjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_19: khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha ṭhatvā siṅghāṭakaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā puna upari laggāpetvā tattha
atk-s0513a4:5811_20: ṭhito cammayottaṃ olambetvā taṃ ādāya otaritvā heṭṭhimakhāṇuke bandhitvā vāmahatthena
atk-s0513a4:5811_21: yottaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena muggaraṃ ādāya yottaṃ paharitvā khāṇukaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_22: puna abhiruhati. Etenupāyena pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruyha parato otaranto purimanayeneva
atk-s0513a4:5811_23: paṭhamaṃ pabbatamatthake khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvā cammapasibbake yottaṃ bandhitvā khāṇuke
atk-s0513a4:5811_24: veṭhetvā sayaṃ antopasibbake nisīditvā makkaṭakānaṃ makkaṭasuttavissajjanākārena
atk-s0513a4:5811_25: yottaṃ viniveṭhento otarati. Cammachattena vātaṃ gāhāpetvā sakuṇo viya otaratītipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:5812_0: Evaṃ tassa subhaddāya vacanaṃ ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā sattarasa gahanāni atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:5812_1: pabbatagahanaṃ patvā tatrāpi cha pabbate atikkamitvā suvaṇṇapassapabbatamatthakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5814: “Tattheva so uggahetvāna vākyaṃ, ādāya tūṇiñca dhanuñca luddo;
atk-s0513a4:5815: Vituriyati satta girī brahante, suvaṇṇapassaṃ nāma giriṃ uḷāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5824: Sampupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇaṃ, yattha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
atk-s0513a4:5826: “Disvāna nāgassa gatiṃ ṭhitiñca, vīthissayā nhānagatassa hoti;
atk-s0513a4:5828_0: Tattha soti, bhikkhave, so luddo tattheva sattabhūmikapāsādatale ṭhitāya tassā subhaddāya
atk-s0513a4:5828_1: vacanaṃ uggahetvā saratūṇiñca mahādhanuñca ādāya pabbatagahanaṃ patvā “kataro nu
atk-s0513a4:5828_2: kho suvaṇṇapassapabbato nāmā”ti satta mahāpabbate vituriyati, tasmiṃ kāle tuleti
atk-s0513a4:5828_3: tīreti. So evaṃ tīrento suvaṇṇapassaṃ nāma giriṃ uḷāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ so bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5828_4: cintesi. Olokayīti taṃ kinnarānaṃ bhavanabhūtaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha subhaddāya dinnasaññāvasena
atk-s0513a4:5828_5: heṭṭhā olokesi. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pabbatapādamūle avidūreyeva taṃ nigrodhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5829_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ nigrodharukkhamūle ṭhitaṃ. Tatthāti tattheva antopabbate tassa nigrodhassāvidūre
atk-s0513a4:5829_1: yattha so nhāyati, taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ addasa. Disvānāti suvaṇṇapassapabbatā oruyha hatthīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5829_2: gatakāle hatthipādaupāhanaṃ āruyha tassa nāgarañño gataṭṭhānaṃ nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5829_3: upadhārento “iminā maggena gacchati, idha nhāyati, nhatvā uttiṇṇo, idha tiṭṭhatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5829_4: sabbaṃ disvā ahirikabhāvena anariyarūpo tāya cittavasānugāya payojito, tasmā opātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – “so kira mahāsattassa vasanokāsaṃ sattamāsādhikehi sattahi
atk-s0513a4:5830_1: saṃvaccharehi sattahi ca divasehi patvā vuttanayeneva tassa vasanokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_2: “idha āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tasmiṃ ṭhito vāraṇādhipatiṃ visapītena sallena vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_3: pāpessāmī”ti vavatthapetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā thambhādīnaṃ atthāya rukkhe chinditvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_4: dabbasambhāre sajjetvā hatthīsu nhānatthāya gatesu tassa vasanokāse mahākuddālena
atk-s0513a4:5830_5: caturassaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā uddhatapaṃsuṃ bījaṃ vapanto viya udakena vikiritvā udukkhalapāsāṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_6: upari thambhe patiṭṭhapetvā tulā ca kāje ca datvā padarāni attharitvā kaṇḍappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_7: chiddaṃ katvā upari paṃsuñca kacavarañca pakkhipitvā ekena passena attano pavisanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_8: katvā evaṃ niṭṭhite āvāṭe paccūsakāleyeva patisīsakaṃ paṭimuñcitvā kāsāyāni paridahitvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_9: saddhiṃ visapītena sallena dhanuṃ ādāya āvāṭaṃ otaritvā aṭṭhāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5832: “Khaṇitvāna kāsuṃ phalakehi chādayi, attānamodhāya dhanuñca luddo;
atk-s0513a4:5835: “Viddho ca nāgo koñcamanādi ghoraṃ, sabbe ca nāgā ninnaduṃ ghorarūpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5836: Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca raṇaṃ karontā, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭha disā samantato.
atk-s0513a4:5839: Dukkhena phuṭṭhassudapādi saññā, arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharūpo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5840_0: Tattha odhāyāti odahitvā pavesetvā. Passāgatanti attano āvāṭassa passaṃ āgataṃ. So
atk-s0513a4:5840_1: kira dutiyadivase āgantvā nhatvā uttiṇṇo tasmiṃ mahāvisālamālake nāma padese aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5840_2: Athassa sarīrato udakaṃ nābhipadesena ogalitvā tena chiddena luddassa sarīre pati.
atk-s0513a4:5840_3: Tāya saññāya so mahāsattassa āgantvā ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ passāgataṃ puthunā sallena
atk-s0513a4:5840_4: samappayi vijjhi. Dukkaṭakammakārīti tassa mahāsattassa kāyikacetasikassa dukkhassa
atk-s0513a4:5841_0: Koñcamanādīti koñcanādaṃ akari. Tassa kira taṃ sallaṃ nābhiyaṃ pavisitvā pihakādīni
atk-s0513a4:5841_1: sañcuṇṇetvā antāni chinditvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ pharasunā padālentaṃ viya uggantvā ākāse
atk-s0513a4:5841_2: pakkhandi. Bhinnarajatakumbhato rajanaṃ viya pahāramukhena lohitaṃ pagghari, balavavedanā
atk-s0513a4:5841_3: uppajji. So vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto vedanāppatto sakalapabbataṃ ekaninnādaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5841_4: karonto tikkhattuṃ mahantaṃ koñcanādaṃ nadi. Sabbe cāti tepi sabbe aṭṭhasahassanāgā
atk-s0513a4:5841_5: taṃ saddaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayabhītā ghorarūpaṃ ninnaduṃ anuravaṃ kariṃsu. Raṇaṃ karontāti
atk-s0513a4:5841_6: tena saddena gantvā chaddantavāraṇaṃ vedanāppattaṃ disvā “paccāmittaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:5841_7: tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontā samantā dhāviṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5842_0: Vadhissametanti “bhikkhave, so chaddantavāraṇo disā pakkantesu nāgesu subhaddāya
atk-s0513a4:5842_1: kareṇuyā passe ṭhatvā sandhāretvā samassāsayamānāya vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā kaṇḍassa
atk-s0513a4:5842_2: āgataṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhento ‘sace idaṃ puratthimadisādīhi āgataṃ abhavissa, kumbhādīhi
atk-s0513a4:5842_3: pavisitvā pacchimakāyīdīhi nikkhamissa, idaṃ pana nābhiyā pavisitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi,
atk-s0513a4:5842_4: tasmā pathaviyaṃ ṭhitena vissaṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī’ti upadhāretvā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhitukāmo
atk-s0513a4:5842_5: “ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissati, subhaddaṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “bhadde, aṭṭhasahassanāgā
atk-s0513a4:5842_6: mama paccāmittaṃ pariyesantā disā pakkhandā, tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosī”ti vatvā, “deva,
atk-s0513a4:5842_7: ahaṃ tumhe sandhāretvā samassāsentī ṭhitā, khamatha me”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5842_8: katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā tāya ākāsaṃ pakkhandāya nāgarājā bhūmiṃ pādanakhena
atk-s0513a4:5842_9: pahari, padaraṃ uppatitvā gataṃ. So chiddena olokento sonuttaraṃ disvā “vadhissāmi
atk-s0513a4:5842_10: na”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā rajatadāmavaṇṇasoṇḍaṃ pavesetvā parāmasanto buddhānaṃ isīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5842_11: dhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ addakkhi. Luddo kāsāvaṃ mahāsattassa hatthe ṭhapesi. So taṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:5842_12: purato ṭhapesi. Athassa tena tathārūpenapi dukkhena phuṭṭhassa “arahaddhajo nāma
atk-s0513a4:5842_13: sabbhi paṇḍitehi avajjharūpo, aññadatthu sakkātabbo garukātabboyevā”ti ayaṃ saññā udapādi.
atk-s0513a4:5850_0: Tassattho – samma luddaputta yo puriso rāgādīhi kasāvehi anikkasāvo indriyadamena
atk-s0513a4:5850_1: ceva vacīsaccena ca apeto anupagato tehi guṇehi kasāvarasapītaṃ kāsāvavatthaṃ paridahati,
atk-s0513a4:5850_2: so taṃ kāsāvaṃ nārahati, nānucchaviko so tassa vatthassa. Yo pana tesaṃ kasāvānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5850_3: vantattā vantakasāvo assa sīlesu susamāhito supatiṭṭhito paripuṇṇasīlācāro, so taṃ
atk-s0513a4:5851: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto tasmiṃ cittaṃ nibbāpetvā “samma kimatthaṃ tvaṃ maṃ vijjhasi, kiṃ attano atthāya, udāhu aññena payojitosī”ti pucchi. Tamatthaṃ āvīkaronto satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5854: Kimatthayaṃ kissa vā samma hetu, mamaṃ vadhī kassa vāyaṃ payogo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5855_0: Tattha kimatthayanti āyatiṃ kiṃ patthento. Kissa vāti kissa hetu kena kāraṇena, kiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5855_1: nāma tava mayā saddhiṃ veranti adhippāyo. Kassa vāti kassa vā aññassa ayaṃ payogo,
atk-s0513a4:5858: “Kāsissa rañño mahesī bhadante, sā pūjitā rājakule subhaddā;
atk-s0513a4:5859: Taṃ addasā sā ca mamaṃ asaṃsi, dantehi atthoti ca maṃ avocā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5860_0: Tattha pūjitāti aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pūjitā. Addasāti sā kira taṃ supinante
atk-s0513a4:5860_1: addasa. Asaṃsīti sā ca mama sakkāraṃ kāretvā “himavantapadese evarūpo nāma nāgo asukasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5860_2: nāma ṭhāne vasatī”ti mamaṃ ācikkhi. Dantehīti tassa nāgassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsisamujjalā
atk-s0513a4:5860_3: dantā, tehi mama attho, piḷandhanaṃ kāretukāmāmhi, te me āharāti maṃ avocāti.
atk-s0513a4:5861: Taṃ sutvā “idaṃ cūḷasubhaddāya kamma”nti ñatvā mahāsatto vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā “tassā mama dantehi attho natthi, maṃ māretukāmatāya pana pahiṇī”ti dīpento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5863: “Bahū hime dantayugā uḷārā, ye me pitūnañca pitāmahānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5864: Jānāti sā kodhanā rājaputtī, vadhatthikā veramakāsi bālā.
atk-s0513a4:5866: “Uṭṭhehi tvaṃ ludda kharaṃ gahetvā, dante ime chinda purā marāmi;
atk-s0513a4:5867: Vajjāsi taṃ kodhanaṃ rājaputtiṃ, nāgo hato handa imassa dantā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5868_0: Tattha imeti tassa kira pitu pitāmahānaṃ dantā mā vinassantūti guhāyaṃ sannicitā,
atk-s0513a4:5868_1: te sandhāya evamāha. Jānātīti bahūnaṃ vāraṇānaṃ idha sannicihe dante jānāti. Vadhatthikāti
atk-s0513a4:5868_2: kevalaṃ pana sā maṃ māretukāmā appamattakaṃ dosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā attano veraṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a4:5868_3: evarūpena pharusakammena matthakaṃ pāpesi. Kharanti kakacaṃ. Purā marāmīti yāva na
atk-s0513a4:5868_4: marāmi. Vajjasīti vadeyyāsi. Handa imassa dantāti hato so mayā nāgo, manoratho te
atk-s0513a4:5869_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā nisīdanaṭṭhānā vuṭṭhāya kakacaṃ ādāya “dante chindissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5869_1: tassa santikaṃ upagato. So pana ubbedhato aṭṭhāsītihattho rajatapabbato viya ṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:5869_2: tenassa so dantaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇi. Atha mahāsatto kāyaṃ upanāmento heṭṭhāsīsako nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5869_3: Tadā nesādo mahāsattassa rajatadāmasadisaṃ soṇḍaṃ maddanto abhiruhitvā kelāsakūṭe
atk-s0513a4:5869_4: viya kumbhe ṭhatvā mukhakoṭimaṃsaṃ dhanukena paharitvā anto pakkhipitvā kumbhato
atk-s0513a4:5869_5: oruyha kakacaṃ antomukhe pavesesi, ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ aparāparaṃ kaḍḍhi. Mahāsattassa
atk-s0513a4:5869_6: balavavedanā uppajji, mukhaṃ lohitena pūri. Nesādo ito cito ca sañcārento kakacena
atk-s0513a4:5869_7: chindituṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ mahāsatto mukhato lohitaṃ chaḍḍetvā vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā
atk-s0513a4:5869_8: “kiṃ samma chindituṃ na sakkosī”ti pucchi. “Āma, sāmī”ti. Mahāsatto satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:5869_9: “tena hi samma mama soṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā kakacakoṭiṃ gaṇhāpehi, mama sayaṃ soṇḍaṃ ukkhipituṃ
atk-s0513a4:5869_10: balaṃ natthī”ti āha. Nesādo tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5870_0: Mahāsatto soṇḍāya kakacaṃ gahetvā aparāparaṃ cāresi, dantā kaḷīrā viya chijjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5870_1: Atha naṃ te āharāpetvā gaṇhitvā “samma luddaputta ahaṃ ime dante tuyhaṃ dadamāno
atk-s0513a4:5870_2: neva ‘mayhaṃ appiyā’ti dammi, na sakkattamārattabrahmattāni patthento, imehi pana
atk-s0513a4:5870_3: me dantehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena sabbaññutaññāṇadantāva piyatarā,
atk-s0513a4:5870_4: sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭivedhāya me idaṃ puññaṃ paccayo hotū”ti dante datvā “samma idaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5870_5: ṭhānaṃ kittakena kālena āgatosī”ti pucchitvā “sattamāsasattadivasādhikehi sattahi
atk-s0513a4:5870_6: saṃvaccharehī”ti vutte – “gaccha imesaṃ dantānaṃ ānubhāvena sattadivasabbhantareyeva
atk-s0513a4:5870_7: bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti vatvā tassa parittaṃ katvā taṃ uyyojesi. Uyyojetvā ca pana
atk-s0513a4:5870_8: anāgatesuyeva tesu nāgesu subhaddāya ca anāgatāya kālamakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5872: “Uṭṭhāya so luddo kharaṃ gahetvā, chetvāna dantāni gajuttamassa;
atk-s0513a4:5873: Vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā, ādāya pakkāmi tato hi khippa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5874: Tattha vaggūti vilāsavante. Subheti sundare. Appaṭimeti imissaṃ pathaviyaṃ aññehi dantehi asadiseti.
atk-s0513a4:5875: Tasmiṃ pakkante te nāgā paccāmittaṃ adisvā āgamiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5877: “Bhayaṭṭitā nāgavadhena aṭṭā, ye te nāgā aṭṭha disā vidhāvuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5878: Adisvāna posaṃ gajapaccamittaṃ, paccāgamuṃ yena so nāgarājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5879_0: Tattha bhayaṭṭitāti maraṇabhayena upaddutā. Aṭṭāti dukkhitā. Gajapaccamittanti gajassa
atk-s0513a4:5879_1: paccāmittaṃ. Yena soti yattha visālamālake so nāgarājā kālaṃ katvā kelāsapabbato
atk-s0513a4:5879_2: viya patito, taṃ ṭhānaṃ paccāgamunti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5880_0: Tehi pana saddhiṃ mahāsubhaddāpi āgatā. Te sabbepi aṭṭhasahassanāgā tattha roditvā
atk-s0513a4:5880_1: kanditvā mahāsattassa kulupakānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5880_2: paccayadāyako visapītena sallena viddho kālakato, sīvathikadassanamassa āgacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a4:5880_3: vadiṃsu. Pañcasatā paccekabuddhāpi ākāsenāgantvā visālamālake otariṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0513a4:5880_4: dve taruṇanāgā nāgarañño sarīraṃ dantehi ukkhipitvā paccekabuddhe vandāpetvā citakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5880_5: āropetvā jhāpayiṃsu. Paccekabuddhā sabbarattiṃ āḷāhane dhammasajjhāyamakaṃsu. Aṭṭhasahassanāgā
atk-s0513a4:5880_6: āḷāhanaṃ nibbāpetvā vanditvā nhatvā mahāsubhaddaṃ purato katvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5882: “Te tattha kanditvā roditvāna nāgā, sīse sake paṃsukaṃ okiritvā;
atk-s0513a4:5883: Agamaṃsu te sabbe sakaṃ niketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhadda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5885: Sonuttaropi appatteyeva sattame divase dante ādāya bārāṇasiṃ sampāpuṇi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5887: “Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
atk-s0513a4:5888: Suvaṇṇarājīhi samantamodare, so luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami;
atk-s0513a4:5889: Upanesi so rājakaññāya dante, nāgo hato handa imassa dantā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5890_0: Tattha suvaṇṇarājīhīti suvaṇṇarājiraṃsīhi. Samantamodareti samantato obhāsante sakalavanasaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5890_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ viya karonte. Upanesīti ahaṃ chaddantavāraṇassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjane
atk-s0513a4:5890_2: yamakadante ādāya āgacchāmi, nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpethāti deviyā sāsanaṃ pesetvā tāya
atk-s0513a4:5890_3: rañño ārocāpetvā devanagaraṃ viya nagare alaṅkārāpite sonuttaropi nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:5890_4: pāsādaṃ āruhitvā dante upanesi, upanetvā ca pana, “ayye, yassa kira tumhe appamattakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5890_5: dosaṃ hadaye karittha, so nāgo mayā hato mato, ‘matabhāvaṃ me āroceyyāsī’ti āha,
atk-s0513a4:5890_6: tassa matabhāvaṃ tumhe jānātha, gaṇhatha, ime tassa dantā”ti dante adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5891_0: Sā mahāsattassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsivicittadante maṇitālavaṇṭena gahetvā ūrūsu ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:5891_1: purimabhave attano pirasāmikassa dante olokentī “evarūpaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ vāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5891_2: visapītena sallena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā ime dante chinditvā sonuttaro āgato”ti mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5891_3: anussarantī sokaṃ uppādetvā adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi. Athassā tattheva hadayaṃ phali,
atk-s0513a4:5891_4: taṃ divasameva kālamakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5894: Tattheva tassā hadayaṃ aphāli, teneva sā kālamakāsi bālā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5896: “Sambodhipatto sa mahānubhāvo, sitaṃ akāsī parisāya majjhe;
atk-s0513a4:5897: Pucchiṃsu bhikkhū suvimuttacittā, nākāraṇe pātukaronti buddhā.
atk-s0513a4:5900: Sā kho tadā rājakaññā ahosi, ahaṃ tadā nāgarājā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5902: “Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
atk-s0513a4:5903: Yo luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami, so kho tadā devadatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5906: Vītaddaro vītasoko visallo, sayaṃ abhiññāya abhāsi buddho.
atk-s0513a4:5908: “Ahaṃ vo tena kālena, ahosiṃ tattha bhikkhavo;
atk-s0513a4:5909: Nāgarājā tadā homi, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:5910: Imā gāthā dasabalassa guṇe vaṇṇentehi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0513a4:5911_0: Tattha sitaṃ akāsīti so sambodhippatto satthā mahānubhāvo alaṅkatadhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5911_1: alaṅkatadhammāsane parisamajjhe nisinno ekadivasaṃ sitaṃ akāsi. Nākāraṇeti “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:5911_2: buddhā nāma akāraṇe sitaṃ na karonti, tumhehi ca sitaṃ kataṃ, kena nu kho kāraṇena
atk-s0513a4:5911_3: sitaṃ kata”nti mahākhīṇāsavā bhikkhū pucchiṃsu. Yamaddasāthāti evaṃ puṭṭho, āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:5911_4: satthā attano sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ dassetvā evamāha – “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:5911_5: yaṃ ekaṃ daharaṃ yobbanappattaṃ kumāriṃ kāsāyavatthaṃ anagāriyaṃ upetaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a4:5911_6: imasmiṃ sāsane carantiṃ addasātha passatha, sā tadā ‘visapītena sallena nāgarājaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5911_7: vijjhitvā vadhehī”’ti sonuttarassa pesetā rājakaññā ahosi. Tena gantvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5911_8: pāpito ahaṃ tadā so nāgarājā ahosinti attho. Devadattoti, bhikkhave, idāni devadatto
atk-s0513a4:5912_0: Anāvasūranti na avasūraṃ, anatthaṅgatasūriyanti attho. Cirarattasaṃsitanti ito ciraratte
atk-s0513a4:5912_1: anekavassakoṭimatthake saṃsitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – āvuso, ito
atk-s0513a4:5912_2: anekavassakoṭimatthake saṃsaritampi pubbaṇhe kataṃ taṃ divasameva sāyanhe saranto
atk-s0513a4:5912_3: viya attano caritavasena uccattā tāya rājadhītāya ca sonuttarassa ca caritavasena
atk-s0513a4:5912_4: nīcattā uccānīcaṃ caritaṃ idaṃ purāṇaṃ rāgādīnaṃ darānaṃ vigatatāya vītaddaro, ñātidhanasokādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5912_5: abhāvena vītasoko, rāgasallādīnaṃ vigatattā visallo attanāva jānitvā buddho abhāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:5912_6: Ahaṃ voti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ, bhikkhave, ahaṃ tena kālena tattha chaddantadahe
atk-s0513a4:5912_7: ahosinti attho. Nāgarājāti honto ca pana na añño koci tadā homi, atha kho nāgarājā
atk-s0513a4:5912_8: homīti attho. Evaṃ cārethāti tumhe taṃ jātakaṃ evaṃ dhāretha uggaṇhātha pariyāpuṇāthāti.
atk-s0513a4:5913: Imañca pana dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Sā pana bhikkhunī pacchā vipassitvā arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0513a4:5917: Rajjañca paṭipannāsmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu mahāumaṅgajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:5918_0: Atīte pana kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare dhanañcayakorabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:5918_1: Tassa sucirato nāma brāhmaṇo purohito atthadhammānusāsako ahosi. Rājā dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a4:5918_2: karonto dhammena rajjamanusāsi. So ekadivasaṃ dhammayāgaṃ nāma pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0513a4:5918_3: sucirataṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ purohitaṃ āsane nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchanto
atk-s0513a4:5923: “Dhammena no adhammena, adhammo me na ruccati;
atk-s0513a4:5924: Kiccova dhammo carito, rañño hoti sucīrata.
atk-s0513a4:5930: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, brāhmaṇakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5931_0: Tattha rajjanti, ācariya, mayaṃ imasmiṃ sattayojanike indapatthanagare rajjañca,
atk-s0513a4:5931_1: tiyojanasatike kururaṭṭhe issarabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ādhipaccañca. Paṭipannāsmāti adhigatā
atk-s0513a4:5931_2: bhavāma. Mahattanti idāni mahantabhāvaṃ. Pattumicchāmi vijetunti imaṃ pathaviṃ dhammena
atk-s0513a4:5931_3: abhibhavituṃ ajjhottharituṃ icchāmi. Kiccovāti avasesajanehi rañño carito dhammo
atk-s0513a4:5931_4: kicco karaṇīyataro. Rājānuvattako hi loko, so tasmiṃ dhammike sabbopi dhammiko hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5931_5: Tasmā esa dhammo nāma raññova kiccoti.
atk-s0513a4:5932_0: Idha cevāninditāti yena mayaṃ idhaloke paraloke ca aninditā. Yena pappomūti yena
atk-s0513a4:5932_1: mayaṃ nirayādīsu anibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca yasaṃ issariyaṃ sobhaggaṃ pāpuṇeyyāma,
atk-s0513a4:5932_2: taṃ no kāraṇaṃ kathehīti. Yohanti, brāhmaṇa, yo ahaṃ phalavipākasaṅkhātaṃ atthañca
atk-s0513a4:5932_3: tassa atthassa hetubhūtaṃ dhammañca kattuṃ samādāya vattituṃ uppādetuñca icchāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5932_4: Taṃ tvanti tassa mayhaṃ tvaṃ sukheneva nibbānagāmimaggaṃ āruyha apaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5932_5: patthentassa taṃ atthañca dhammañca pucchito akkhāhi, pākaṭaṃ katvā kathehīti brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5933_0: Ayaṃ pana pañho gambhīro buddhavisayo, sabbaññubuddhameva taṃ pucchituṃ yuttaṃ, tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5933_1: asati sabbaññutaññāṇapariyesakaṃ bodhisattanti. Sucirato pana attano abodhisattatāya
atk-s0513a4:5933_2: pañhaṃ kathetuṃ nāsakkhi, asakkonto ca paṇḍitamānaṃ akatvā attano asamatthabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5936: Yaṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, kattumicchasi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5937_0: Tassattho – avisayo esa, mahārāja, pañho mādisānaṃ. Ahañhi nevassa ādiṃ, na pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5937_1: passāmi, andhakāraṃ paviṭṭho viya homi. Bārāṇasirañño pana purohito vidhuro nāma
atk-s0513a4:5937_2: brāhmaṇo atthi, so etaṃ ācikkheyya, taṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca kattumicchasi,
atk-s0513a4:5938: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “tena hi, brāhmaṇa, khippaṃ tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pesetukāmo hutvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5943_0: Tattha upantikanti santikaṃ. Nikkhanti pañcasuvaṇṇo eko nikkho. Ayaṃ pana rattasuvaṇṇassa
atk-s0513a4:5943_1: nikkhasahassaṃ datvā evamāha. Imaṃ dajjāti tena imasmiṃ dhammayāgapañhe kathite tassa
atk-s0513a4:5943_2: atthadhammānusiṭṭhiyā abhihārapūjaṃ karonto imaṃ nikkhasahassaṃ dadeyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:5944_0: Evañca pana vatvā pañhavissajjanassa likhanatthāya satasahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭañca
atk-s0513a4:5944_1: gamanatthāya yānaṃ, parivāratthāya balakāyaṃ, tañca paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a4:5944_2: uyyojesi. So pana indapatthanagarā nikkhamitvā ujukameva bārāṇasiṃ agantvā yattha
atk-s0513a4:5944_3: yattha paṇḍitā vasanti, sabbāni tāni ṭhānāni upasaṅkamitvā sakalajambudīpe pañhassa
atk-s0513a4:5944_4: vissajjetāraṃ alabhitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nivāsaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:5944_5: katipayehi janehi saddhiṃ pātarāsabhuñjanavelāya vidhurassa nivesanaṃ gantvā āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5944_6: ārocāpetvā tena pakkosāpito taṃ sake ghare bhuñjamānaṃ addasa. Tamatthaṃ āvikaronto
atk-s0513a4:5948: Tattha svādhippāgāti so bhāradvājagotto sucirato adhippāgā, gatoti attho. Mahābrahmāti mahābrāhmaṇo. Asamānanti bhuñjamānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5949_0: So pana tassa bālasahāyako ekācariyakule uggahitasippo, tasmā tena saddhiṃ ekato
atk-s0513a4:5949_1: bhuñjitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne sukhanisinno “samma kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti puṭṭho āgamanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5953: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, vidhurakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5954_0: Tattha raññohanti ahaṃ rañño korabyassa yasassino dūto. Pahitoti tena pesito idhāgamiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5954_1: Pucchesīti so yudhiṭṭhilagotto dhanañcayarājā maṃ dhammayāgapañhaṃ nāma pucchi, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5954_2: kathetuṃ asakkonto “tvaṃ sakkhissasī”ti ñatvā tassa ārocesiṃ, so ca paṇṇākāraṃ datvā
atk-s0513a4:5954_3: pañhapucchanatthāya maṃ tava santikaṃ pesento “vidhurassa santikaṃ gantvā imassa
atk-s0513a4:5954_4: pañhassa atthañca pāḷidhammañca puccheyyāsī”ti abravi. “Taṃ tvaṃ idāni mayā pucchito akkhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5955: Tadā pana so brāhmaṇo “mahājanassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gaṅgaṃ pidahanto viya vinicchayaṃ vicāreti. Tassa pañhavissajjane okāso natthi. So tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5957: “Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0513a4:5958: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati;
atk-s0513a4:5959: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5960_0: Tassattho – brāhmaṇa, mayhaṃ “mahājanassa nānācittagatisaṅkhātaṃ gaṅgaṃ pidahissa”nti
atk-s0513a4:5960_1: byāpāro uppanno, tamahaṃ mahāsindhuṃ apidhetuṃ na sakkomi, tasmā kathaṃ so okāso
atk-s0513a4:5960_2: bhavissati, yasmā te ahaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeyyaṃ. Iti cittekaggatañceva okāsañca alabhanto
atk-s0513a4:5960_3: na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ atthaṃ dhammañca pucchitoti.
atk-s0513a4:5961: Evañca pana vatvā “putto me paṇḍito mayā ñāṇavantataro, so te byākarissati, tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti vatvā dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5963: “Bhadrakāro ca me putto, oraso mama atrajo;
atk-s0513a4:5964: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5965: Tattha orasoti ure saṃvaḍḍho. Atrajoti attanā jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:5966: Taṃ sutvā sucirato vidhurassa gharā nikkhamitvā bhadrakārassa bhuttapātarāsassa attano parisamajjhe nisinnakāle nivesanaṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā ekādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5971: So tattha gantvā bhadrakāramāṇavena katāsanābhihārasakkāro nisīditvā āgamanakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho dvādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5975: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, bhadrakāra pabrūhi me”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5976_0: Atha naṃ bhadrakāro, “tāta, ahaṃ imesu divasesu paradārikakamme abhiniviṭṭho, cittaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5976_1: me byākulaṃ, tena tyāhaṃ vissajjetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, mayhaṃ pana kaniṭṭho sañcayakumāro
atk-s0513a4:5976_2: nāma mayā ativiya ñāṇavantataro, taṃ puccha, so te pañhaṃ vissajjessatī”ti tassa
atk-s0513a4:5979: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
atk-s0513a4:5981: “Sañcayo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5982: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5983_0: Tattha maṃsakājanti yathā nāma puriso thūlamigamaṃsaṃ kājenādāya gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0513a4:5983_1: godhapotakaṃ disvā maṃsakājaṃ chaḍḍetvā taṃ anubandheyya, evameva attano ghare vasavattiniṃ
atk-s0513a4:5983_2: bhariyaṃ chaḍḍetvā parassa rakkhitagopitaṃ itthiṃ anubandhanto homīti dīpento evamāhāti.
atk-s0513a4:5984: So tasmiṃ khaṇe sañcayassa nivesanaṃ gantvā tena katasakkāro āgamanakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ācikkhi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5991: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sañcayakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5992_0: Sañcayakumāro pana tadā paradārameva sevati. Athassa so “ahaṃ, tāta, paradāraṃ sevāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5992_1: sevanto ca pana gaṅgaṃ otaritvā paratīraṃ gacchāmi, taṃ maṃ sāyañca pāto ca nadiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5992_2: tarantaṃ maccu gilati nāma, tena cittaṃ me byākulaṃ, na tyāhaṃ ācikkhituṃ sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5992_3: kaniṭṭho pana me sambhavakumāro nāma atthi jātiyā sattavassiko, mayā sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a4:5992_4: satasahassaguṇenādhikañāṇataro, so te ācikkhissati, gaccha taṃ pucchāhī”ti āha. Imamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5994: “Sadā maṃ gilate maccu, sāyaṃ pāto sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5995: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
atk-s0513a4:5997: “Sambhavo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5998: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5999: Taṃ sutvā sucirato “ayaṃ pañho imasmiṃ loke abbhuto bhavissati, imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ samattho nāma natthi maññe”ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6001: “Abbhuto vata bho dhammo, nāyaṃ asmāka ruccati;
atk-s0513a4:6002: Tayo janā pitāputtā, te su paññāya no vidū.
atk-s0513a4:6004: “Na taṃ sakkotha akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchitā;
atk-s0513a4:6005: Kathaṃ nu daharo jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6006_0: Tattha nāyanti ayaṃ pañhadhammo abbhuto, imaṃ kathetuṃ samatthena nāma na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6006_1: tasmā yaṃ tvaṃ “kumāro kathessatī”ti vadati, nāyaṃ asmākaṃ ruccati. Te sūti ettha
atk-s0513a4:6006_2: su-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Pitāti vidhuro paṇḍito, puttā bhadrakāro sañcayo cāti tepi
atk-s0513a4:6006_3: tayo pitāputtā paññāya imaṃ dhammaṃ no vidū, na vijānanti, añño ko jānissatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6006_4: Na tanti tumhe tayo janā pucchitā etaṃ akkhātuṃ na sakkotha, daharo sattavassiko
atk-s0513a4:6006_5: kumāro pucchito kathaṃ nu jaññā, kena kāraṇena jānituṃ sakkhissatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6007_0: Taṃ sutvā sañcayakumāro, “tāta, sambhavakumāraṃ ‘daharo’ti mā uññāsi, sacepi pañhavissajjanenātthiko,
atk-s0513a4:6007_1: gaccha naṃ pucchā”ti atthadīpanāhi upamāhi kumārassa vaṇṇaṃ pakāsento dvādasa gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6010: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6016: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6017: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6023: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6024: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6028: Osadhehi ca dibbehi, disā bhāti pavāti ca.
atk-s0513a4:6031: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6032: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6041: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6042: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6048: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6049: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6050_0: Tattha jaññāti jānissasi. Candoti puṇṇacando. Vimaloti abbhādimalavirahito. Evampi
atk-s0513a4:6050_1: daharūpetoti evaṃ sambhavakumāro daharabhāvena upetopi paññāyogena sakalajambudīpatale
atk-s0513a4:6050_2: avasese paṇḍite atikkamitvā virocati. Rammakoti cittamāso. Atevaññehīti ativiya aññehi
atk-s0513a4:6050_3: ekādasahi māsehi. Evanti evaṃ sambhavopi paññāyogena sobhati. Himavāti himapātasamaye
atk-s0513a4:6050_4: himayuttoti himavā, gimhakāle himaṃ vamatīti himavā. Sampattaṃ janaṃ gandhena madayatīti
atk-s0513a4:6050_5: gandhamādano. Mahābhūtagaṇālayoti devagaṇānaṃ nivāso. Disā bhātīti sabbadisā ekobhāsā
atk-s0513a4:6050_6: viya karoti. Pavātīti gandhena sabbadisā vāyati. Evanti evaṃ sambhavopi paññāyogena
atk-s0513a4:6051_0: Yasassimāti tejasampattiyā yasassimā. Accimālīti accīhi yutto. Jalamāno vane gaccheti
atk-s0513a4:6051_1: gacchasaṅkhāte mahāvane jalanto carati. Analoti atitto. Gatamaggassa kaṇhabhāvena
atk-s0513a4:6051_2: kaṇhavattanī. Yaññe āhutivasena āhutaṃ ghataṃ asnātīti ghatāsano. Dhūmo ketukiccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6051_3: assa sādhetīti dhūmaketu. Uttamāhevanandahoti ahevanaṃ vuccati vanasaṇḍo, uttamaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6051_4: vanasaṇḍaṃ dahatīti attho. Nisītheti rattibhāge. Pabbataggasminti pabbatasikhare.
atk-s0513a4:6051_5: Pahūtedhoti pahūtaindhano. Virocatīti sabbadisāsu obhāsati. Evanti evaṃ mama kaniṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:6051_6: sambhavakumāro daharopi paññāyogena virocati. Bhadranti bhadraṃ assājānīyaṃ javasampattiyā
atk-s0513a4:6051_7: jānanti, na sarīrena. Vāhiyeti vahitabbabhāre sati bhāravahatāya “ahaṃ uttamo”ti
atk-s0513a4:6051_8: balibaddaṃ jānanti. Dohenāti dohasampattiyā dhenuṃ “sukhīrā”ti jānanti. Bhāsamānanti
atk-s0513a4:6051_9: ettha “nābhāsamānaṃ jānanti, missaṃ bālehi paṇḍita”nti suttaṃ āharitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6052_0: Sucirato evaṃ tasmiṃ sambhavaṃ vaṇṇente “pañhaṃ pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti “kahaṃ pana
atk-s0513a4:6052_1: te kumāra kaniṭṭho”ti pucchi. Athassa so sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā
atk-s0513a4:6052_2: “yo esa pāsādadvāre antaravīthiyā kumārakehi saddhiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kīḷati, ayaṃ mama
atk-s0513a4:6052_3: kaniṭṭho, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ puccha, buddhalīḷāya te pañhaṃ kathessatī”ti āha. Sucirato
atk-s0513a4:6052_4: tassa vacanaṃ sutvā pāsādā oruyha kumārassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Kāya velāyāti? Kumārassa
atk-s0513a4:6052_5: nivatthasāṭakaṃ mocetvā khandhe khipitvā ubhohi hatthehi paṃsuṃ gahetvā ṭhitavelāya.
atk-s0513a4:6057_0: Mahāsattopi brāhmaṇaṃ āgantvā purato ṭhitaṃ disvā “tāta, kenatthenāgatosī”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0513a4:6057_1: “tāta, kumāra ahaṃ jambudīpatale āhiṇḍanto mayā pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6057_2: alabhitvā tava santikaṃ āgatomhī”ti vutte “sakalajambudīpe kira avinicchito pañho
atk-s0513a4:6057_3: mama santikaṃ āgato, ahaṃ ñāṇena mahallako”ti hirottappaṃ paṭilabhitvā hatthagataṃ
atk-s0513a4:6057_4: paṃsuṃ chaḍḍetvā khandhato sāṭakaṃ ādāya nivāsetvā “puccha, brāhmaṇa, buddhalīḷāya
atk-s0513a4:6057_5: te kathessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi. Tato brāhmaṇo –
atk-s0513a4:6061: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sambhavakkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:6063: Tassa attho sambhavapaṇḍitassa gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6064: Atha naṃ “tena hi suṇohī”ti vatvā dhammayāgapañhaṃ vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6067: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6068_0: Tassa antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā madhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa saddo dvādasayojanikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6068_1: sakalabārāṇasinagaraṃ avatthari. Atha rājā ca uparājādayo ca sabbe sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6069_0: Tattha tagghāti ekaṃsavacanaṃ. Yathāpi kusaloti yathā atikusalo sabbaññubuddho ācikkhati,
atk-s0513a4:6069_1: tathā te ekaṃseneva ahamakkhissanti attho. Rājā ca kho tanti ahaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ yathā
atk-s0513a4:6069_2: tumhākaṃ rājā jānituṃ sakkoti, tathā kathessāmi. Tato uttari rājā eva taṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:6069_3: yadi karissati vā na vā karissati, karontassa vā akarontassa vā tassevetaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:6070: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya pañhakathanaṃ paṭijānitvā idāni dhammayāgapañhaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0513a4:6073: Mā katvā avasī rājā, atthe jāte yudhiṭṭhilo.
atk-s0513a4:6076: Kummaggaṃ na niveseyya, yathā mūḷho acetaso.
atk-s0513a4:6079: Atitthe nappatāreyya, anatthe na yuto siyā.
atk-s0513a4:6081: “Yo ca etāni ṭhānāni, kattuṃ jānāti khattiyo;
atk-s0513a4:6082: Sadā so vaḍḍhate rājā, sukkapakkheva candimā.
atk-s0513a4:6085: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6086_0: Tattha saṃseyyāti katheyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tāta, sucirata sace tumhākaṃ raññā
atk-s0513a4:6086_1: “ajja dānaṃ dema, sīlaṃ rakkhāma, uposathakammaṃ karomā”ti koci puṭṭho, “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:6086_2: ajja tāva pāṇaṃ hanāma, kāme paribhuñjāma, suraṃ pivāma, kusalaṃ pana karissāma suve”ti
atk-s0513a4:6086_3: rañño katheyya, tassa atimahantassapi amaccassa vacanaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ rājā yudhiṭṭhilagotto
atk-s0513a4:6086_4: tathārūpe atthe jāte taṃ divasaṃ pamādena vītināmento mā avasi, tassa vacanaṃ akatvā
atk-s0513a4:6086_5: uppannaṃ kusalacittaṃ aparihāpetvā kusalapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kammaṃ karotuyeva, idamassa
atk-s0513a4:6091_0: Ajjhattaññevāti, tāta, sucirata sambhavapaṇḍito tayā dhammayāgapañhe pucchite kiṃ
atk-s0513a4:6091_1: kathesīti raññā puṭṭho samāno tumhākaṃ rañño ajjhattaññeva saṃseyya, niyakajjhattasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6091_2: khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā abhāvato aniccanti katheyyāsi. Ettāvatā mahāsatto –
atk-s0513a4:6095_0: Kummagganti, brāhmaṇa, yathā mūḷho acetano andhabālaputhujjano dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6095_1: kummaggaṃ sevati, evaṃ tava rājā taṃ kummaggaṃ na seveyya, niyyānikaṃ dasakusalakammapathamaggameva
atk-s0513a4:6096_0: Attānanti imaṃ sugatiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ attabhāvaṃ nātivatteyya, yena kammena tisso kusalasampattiyo
atk-s0513a4:6096_1: sabbakāmasagge atikkamitvā apāye nibbattanti, taṃ kammaṃ na kareyyāti attho. Adhammanti
atk-s0513a4:6096_2: tividhaduccaritasaṅkhātaṃ adhammaṃ na samācareyya. Atittheti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisaṅkhāte
atk-s0513a4:6096_3: atitthe nappatāreyya na otāreyya. “Na tāreyyā”tipi pāṭho, attano diṭṭhānugatimāpajjantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6096_4: janaṃ na otāreyya. Anattheti akāraṇe. Na yutoti yuttapayutto na siyā. Brāhmaṇa, yadi
atk-s0513a4:6096_5: te rājā dhammayāgapañhe vattitukāmo, “imasmiṃ ovāde vattatū”ti tassa katheyyāsīti
atk-s0513a4:6097_0: Sadāti satataṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “yo khattiyo etāni kāraṇāni kātuṃ jānāti, so rājā
atk-s0513a4:6097_1: sukkapakkhe cando viya sadā vaḍḍhatī”ti. Virocatīti mittāmaccānaṃ majjhe attano sīlācārañāṇādīhi
atk-s0513a4:6098_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto gaganatale candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya buddhalīḷāya brāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6098_1: kathesi. Mahājano nadanto selento apphoṭento sādhukārasahassāni adāsi, celukkhepe
atk-s0513a4:6098_2: ca aṅguliphoṭe ca pavattesi, hatthapiḷandhanādīni khipi. Evaṃ khittadhanaṃ koṭimattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6098_3: ahosi. Rājāpissa tuṭṭho mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi. Suciratopi nikkhasahassena pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:6098_4: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe jātihiṅgulakena pañhavissajjanaṃ likhitvā indapatthanagaraṃ gantvā rañño
atk-s0513a4:6098_5: dhammayāgapañhaṃ kathesi. Rājā tasmiṃ dhamme vattitvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:6099_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi tathāgato mahāpaññoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:6099_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā dhanañcayarājā ānando ahosi, sucirato anuruddho,
atk-s0513a4:6099_2: vidhuro kassapo, bhadrakāro moggallāno, sañcayamāṇavo sāriputto, sambhavapaṇḍito
atk-s0513a4:6103_0: Bārāṇasyaṃ ahū rājāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa silāpavijjhanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6103_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tena hi dhanuggahe payojetvā aparabhāge silāya paviddhāya bhikkhūhi
atk-s0513a4:6103_2: devadattassa avaṇṇe kathite satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6104_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kāsikagāmake eko kassakabrāhmaṇo khettaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6104_1: kasitvā goṇe vissajjetvā kuddālakammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi. Goṇā ekasmiṃ gacche paṇṇāni
atk-s0513a4:6104_2: khādantā anukkamena aṭaviṃ pavisitvā palāyiṃsu. So velaṃ sallakkhetvā kuddālaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:6104_3: goṇe olokento adisvā domanassappatto te pariyesanto antoaṭaviṃ pavisitvā āhiṇḍanto
atk-s0513a4:6104_4: himavantaṃ pāvisi. So tattha disāmūḷho hutvā sattāhaṃ nirāhāro vicaranto ekaṃ tindukarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6104_5: disvā abhiruyha phalāni khādanto tindukarukkhato parigaḷitvā saṭṭhihatthe narakapapāte
atk-s0513a4:6104_6: pati. Tatrassa dasa divasā vītivattā. Tadā bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā phalāphalāni
atk-s0513a4:6104_7: khādanto taṃ purisaṃ disvā silāya yoggaṃ katvā taṃ purisaṃ uddharitvā silāya matthake
atk-s0513a4:6104_8: nisīdāpetvā evamāha – “bho brāhmaṇa, ahaṃ kilamāmi, muhuttaṃ niddāyissāmi, maṃ rakkhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6104_9: So tassa niddāyantassa silāya matthakaṃ padālesi. Mahāsatto tassa taṃ kammaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a4:6104_10: uppatitvā sākhāya nisīditvā “bho purisa, tvaṃ bhūmiyā gaccha, ahaṃ sākhaggena tuyhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6104_11: maggaṃ ācikkhanto gamissāmī”ti taṃ purisaṃ araññato nīharitvā magge ṭhapetvā pabbatapādameva
atk-s0513a4:6104_12: pāvisi. So puriso mahāsatte aparajjhitvā kuṭṭhī hutvā diṭṭhadhammeyeva manussapeto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6105_0: So satta vassāni dukkhapīḷito vicaranto bārāṇasiyaṃ migājinaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:6105_1: pākārantare kadalipaṇṇaṃ attharitvā vedanāppatto nipajji. Tadā bārāṇasirājā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6105_2: gantvā tattha vicaranto taṃ disvā “kosi tvaṃ, kiṃ vā katvā imaṃ dukkhaṃ patto”ti
atk-s0513a4:6105_3: pucchi. Sopissa sabbaṃ vitthārato ācikkhi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:6114: Avaca byamhito rājā, yakkhānaṃ katamo nusi.
atk-s0513a4:6116: “Hatthapādā ca te setā, tato setataraṃ siro;
atk-s0513a4:6120: Kāḷapabbāva te aṅgā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6126: Janetti yāpi te mātā, na taṃ iccheyya passituṃ.
